quotes.author: Jacques Roumain

quotes.quote: The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: He that eats till he is sick must fast till he is well.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: When engaged in eating, the brain should be the servant of the stomach.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: To eat is to appropriate by destruction.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Thou shouldst eat to live; not live to eat.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The more you eat, the less flavor; the less you eat, the more flavor.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: We struggle with eating healthily, obesity, and access to good nutrition for everyone. But we have a great opportunity to get on the right side of this battle by beginning to think differently about the way that we eat and the way that we approach food.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.quote: To eat is a necessity, but to eat intelligently is an art.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Eat little, sleep sound.
quotes.author: Iranian proverb

quotes.quote: Every time you eat or drink, you are either feeding disease or fighting it.
quotes.author: Heather Morgan

quotes.quote: To eat is human, to digest, divine.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Tell me what you eat, I'll tell you who you are.
quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: The food you eat can be either the safest and most powerful form of medicine or the slowest form of poison.Â
quotes.author: Ann Wigmore

quotes.quote: There is an art to eavesdropping, but I think to some extent we are all guilty of picking up those little odds and ends that can be quite intriguing if you analyse them.
quotes.author: Susie Dent

quotes.quote: There's nothing like eavesdropping to show you that the world outside your head is different from the world inside your head.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: The key to good eavesdropping is not getting caught.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: Any place is good for eavesdropping, if you know how to eavesdrop.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: Eavesdropping's a sin, but ignorance is fatal. Take your pick.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bear

quotes.quote: I shouldn't have eavesdropped, but sometimes, that's the only way to find out the truth.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Nothing good was ever learned from eavesdropping, so mind your business and let others mind theirs.
quotes.author: Maryrose Wood

quotes.quote: Eavesdropping's sort of thrilling 'cause you learn what people really think, but eavesdropping makes you miserable for exactly the same reason.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: A writer's occupational hazard: I think of eavesdropping as minding my business.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Spying is a like a game of chess: Sometimes you have to withdraw, sometimes you have to sacrifice one of your pieces to win - preferably a knight rather than a king or queen.
quotes.author: John Rhys-Davies

quotes.quote: Eavesdropping is a deplorable habit, but I have developed worse ones since.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: The first rule of snooping is to come at it sideways.
quotes.author: Mary Ann Shaffer

quotes.quote: The end and aim of spying in all its five varieties is knowledge of the enemy; and this knowledge can only be derived, in the first instance, from the converted spy. Hence it is essential that the converted spy be treated with the utmost liberality.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: I do love to eavesdrop. It's inspirational, not only for subject matter but for actual dialogue, the way people talk.
quotes.author: Lynda Barry

quotes.quote: If you could eavesdrop on everything said about you, you'd spend most of your time waiting for the subject to come up.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Eavesdropping is such a regular-person activity.
quotes.author: Franny Billingsley

quotes.quote: We're no longer in the Cold War. Eavesdropping on friends is unacceptable.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: Spying on people by magic is the same as spying on them in any other way.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The first step in good reporting is good snooping.
quotes.author: Matt Drudge

quotes.quote: Spying among friends is never acceptable.
quotes.author: Angela Merkel

quotes.quote: Spying is always an expensive method of acquiring information.
quotes.author: Muriel Lester

quotes.quote: There's been spying for years, there's been surveillance for years, and so forth, I'm not going to pass judgement on that, it's the nature of our society.
quotes.author: Eric Schmidt

quotes.quote: Every time you overhear something hurtful, I want you to do something kind for someone else.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: The eccentricities of a person can not be drawn with a conventional compass tool.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: The only way to become an eccentric is to end your relationship with extroverts.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Uniqueness is like a signature, nobody can forge it's exact copy.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: People of uncommon abilities generally fall into eccentricities when their sphere of life is not adequate to their abilities.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The amount of eccentricity in a society has generally been proportional to the amount of genius, mental vigor, and moral courage it contained. That so few now dare to be eccentric marks the chief danger of the time.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: It's important to keep the eccentric spirit alive, because when that goes, the work will go.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.quote: It's okay to be eccentric if you're rich; otherwise you're just crazy.
quotes.author: Yvon Chouinard

quotes.quote: Most people are much more unusual and complicated and eccentric and playful and creative than they have time to express.
quotes.author: Oliver Herring

quotes.quote: Eccentric men have peculiar habits; they do not seem to move in the same sphere with other mortals, but are actuated by different influences from those which affect the bulk of mankind.
quotes.author: George Frederick Graham

quotes.quote: The world thinks eccentricity in great things is genius, but in small things, only crazy.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Eccentricity comes from the mind and a playfulness about life and language, manifesting itself in real individualistic character.
quotes.author: Coulter Watt

quotes.quote: Eccentric people have these happy obsessive preoccupations, and a wonderful, unusual sense of humor, and this gives them a significant meaning in life. And they are far healthier than most people because of that.
quotes.author: David Weeks

quotes.quote: Eccentricity has always abounded when and where strength of character has abounded; and the amount of eccentricity in a society has generally been proportional to the amount of genius, mental vigor, and moral courage which it contained.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The really great eccentrics are all inimitable; they are not possessed by a single oddity; they are, in their deepest selves, unlike the generality of mankind.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: Eccentricity is developed monomania.
quotes.author: Bayard Taylor

quotes.quote: One may have a right to be unconventional and even eccentric, so long as one is fully competent and a decent person; but one's ideal as a professor should be to conduct oneself as an admirable human being: just, kind, tolerant, competent, committed, and good-humored.
quotes.author: Robert Audi

quotes.quote: Normality is the new eccentric.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It is to the eccentrics that the world owes most of its knowledge.
quotes.author: Rose Macaulay

quotes.quote: The surest way of being considered eccentric is just to be yourself. So few of us have the nerve.
quotes.author: Marjorie Benton Cooke

quotes.quote: The artist's task is to become a successful eccentric, a strange but wise duck able to venture out of solitary confinement and mingle among society.
quotes.author: Eric Maisel

quotes.quote: The mind always functions in an eccentric way, the mind is always an idiot. The really intelligent person has no mind. Intelligence arises out of no-mind, idiocy out of the mind. Mind is idiotic, no-mind is wise. No-mind is wisdom, intelligence. Mind depends on knowledge, on methods, on money, on experience, on this and that. Mind always needs props, it needs supports, it cannot exist on its own. On its own, it flops.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: They eccentrics are explosive mixtures. Some of them are as sensitive as those fulminates which can be detonated by a falling leaf.
quotes.author: Gilbert Highet

quotes.quote: Weirdism is definitely the cornerstone of many an artist's career.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: We are all as full of echoes as a rocky wood--echoes of the past, reflex echoes of the future, and echoes of the soil (these last reverberating through our filmiest dreams, like the sound of thunder in a blossoming orchard).
quotes.author: Mary Webb

quotes.quote: Perhaps the echoes of people we once loved still linger in the places we frequented with them and that is why we go back… Not so much to remember them as to feel them…
quotes.author: Ranata Suzuki

quotes.quote: Where we find echoes, we generally find emptiness and hollowness; it is the contrary with the echoes of the heart.
quotes.author: John Frederick Boyes

quotes.quote: The echo is a gift, passed on to us by our ancestors many ages ago, to remind us of ourselves. To confirm our existence. To remedy our loneliness. Though we must be still in order to hear it.
quotes.author: Thomas Lloyd Qualls

quotes.quote: A word into the silence thrown always finds its echo somewhere where silence opens hidden lexicons.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: All whispers and echoes from a past that is gone teem into the sleeper's brain, and he is with them, and part of them.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.quote: No sound, once made, is ever truly lost. In electric clouds, all are safely trapped, and with a touch, if we find them, we can recapture those echoes of sad, forgotten wars, long summers, and sweet autumns.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: We hear only our own voices, still echoes returning to our emptiness.
quotes.author: Dajan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: How cruelly sweet are the echoes that start, when memory plays an old tune on the heart!
quotes.author: Eliza Cook

quotes.quote: Life is an echo. What you send out comes back. What you sow, you reap. What you give, you get. What you see in others, exists in you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Your true friends echo your own philosophies back at you.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: No earthly act escapes its eternal echoes, echoes more substantial than the acts themselves.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Wood

quotes.quote: When there is an original sound in the world, it makes a hundred echoes.
quotes.author: John G. Shedd

quotes.quote: I would hurl words into this darkness and wait for an echo, and if an echo sounded, no matter how faintly, I would send other words to tell, to march, to fight, to create a sense of hunger for life that gnaws in us all.
quotes.author: Richard Wright

quotes.quote: Echo is the voice of a reflection in a mirror.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Let echo, too, perform her part, Prolonging every note with art; And in a low expiring strain, Play all the comfort o'er again.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Echo waits with art and care, and will the faults of song repair.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There is no love that is not an echo.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: Better to be a nettle in the side of your friend than his echo.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: What would it profit thee to be the first Of echoes, tho thy tongue should live forever, A thing that answers, but hath not a thought As lasting but as senseless as a stone.
quotes.author: Frederick Tennyson

quotes.quote: Lost Echo sits amid the voiceless mountains, and feeds her grief.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Ennui is the echo in us of time tearing itself apart.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: Like an echo from a ruined castle, prayer is an echo from the ruined human soul of the sweet promise of God.
quotes.author: William Arnot

quotes.quote: Words never fade away but echo on for eternity. Let your echo ring sweet.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: A bad word whispered will echo a hundred miles
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: As the call, so the echo.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Sometimes the world seems like a big hole. You spend all your life shouting down it and all you hear are echoes of some idiot yelling nonsense down a hole.
quotes.author: Adam Duritz

quotes.quote: Most people read poetry listening for echoes because the echoes are familiar to them. They wade through it the way a boy wades through water, feeling with his toes for the bottom: The echoes are the bottom.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: The poetic image is not an echo of the past. On the contrary: through the brilliance of any image, the distant past resounds with echoes.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: Echoes are more noisy than the source.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: If power was a a cry, then human lives were lived in the echo of the cries of others.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: When you're singing you can hear the echo of people in the audience singing every single word with you, and that was that big dream that I had for myself. It's happening.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: And where there is no Echo there is no description of space or love. There is only silence.
quotes.author: Mark Z. Danielewski

quotes.quote: Even Echo speaks not on these radiant moors.
quotes.author: Barry Cornwall

quotes.quote: Multitudinous echoes awoke and died in the distance. . . . . And, when the echoes had ceased, like a sense of pain was the silence.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: If you're in a forest, the quality of the echo is very strange because echoes back off so many surfaces of all those trees that you get this strange, itchy ricochet effect.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: Others live for the lie of love; Echo lives for her lovely lies, loves for their livening.
quotes.author: John Barth

quotes.quote: The old echoes are long in dying.
quotes.author: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quotes.quote: Sweetest echo, sweetest nymph, that liv'st unseen Within thy airy shell, By slow Meander's margent green, And in the violet-embroidered vale.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: How sweet the answer Echo makes To music at night, When, roused by lute or horn, she wakes, And far away, o'er lawns and lakes, Goes answering light.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: But her voice is still living immortal, The same you have frequently heard, In your rambles in valleys and forests, Repeating your ultimate word.
quotes.author: J.G. Saxe

quotes.quote: O love, they die in yon rich sky, They faint on hill or field or river: Our echoes roll from soul to soul, And grow for ever and for ever.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: The whole wide world is a cathedral; I stand inside, the air is calm, And from afar at times there reaches My ear the echo of a psalm.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.quote: And a million horrible bellowing echoes broke From the red-ribb'd hollow behind the wood, And thunder'd up into Heaven.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: For he loved her, as you can only love someone who is an echo of yourself at your time of deepest sorrow.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: It is the folly of too many to mistake the echo of a London coffee-house for the voice of the kingdom.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Mysterious haunts of echoes old and far, The voice divine of human loyalty.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The sound of a kiss is not so loud as that of a cannon, but its echo lasts a great deal longer.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Knowledge is soon changed, then lost in the mist, an echo half-heard.
quotes.author: Gene Wolfe

quotes.quote: Laughter appears to stand in need of an echo.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.quote: I love people that work with passion and love. When you make choices that way, there's reverberations, consequences. That's what I'm interested in, that echo, that ripple of choice.
quotes.author: Derek Cianfrance

quotes.quote: Only echoes answer me.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: Nothing echoes like an empty mailbox.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Stars are echoes of the past. It's important to look to them for guidance, but as long as people reach for them, they never realize the beauty and potential awaiting just in front of them.
quotes.author: Emory R. Frie

quotes.quote: When you hear the echoes of my mind, you'll know that I wasn't listening to what you said.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: To exist in an echo chamber and only talk to people with whom we agree is fruitless.
quotes.author: Tomi Lahren

quotes.quote: I take it for granted that you do not wish to hear an echo from the pulpit nor from the theological class-room.
quotes.author: Asa Gray

quotes.quote: What we do now echoes in eternity.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: It is not so much the example of others we imitate as the reflection of ourselves in their eyes and the echo of ourselves in their words.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Poetry is an echo, asking a shadow to dance.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: My job is to notice echoes and notice resonances. Scientists are not supposed to do the same thing that cultural critics do.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: Be a voice, not an echo
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: And more than echoes talk along the walls.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: I came to the place of my birth and cried, The friends of my youth, where are they? And echo answered, Where are they?
quotes.author: Arabic Proverb

quotes.quote: As in the soft and sweet eclipse, when soul meets soul on lover's lips
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: The moon's a powerful mistress. She can reach through any wall or covering and work her wicked charms.
quotes.author: Darren Shan

quotes.quote: Objects close to the eye shut out much larger objects on the horizon; and splendors born only of the earth eclipse the stars. So it is with people who sometimes cover the entire disc of eternity with a dollar, and so quench transcendent glories with a little shining dust.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: Nations, like stars, are entitled to eclipse. All is well, provided the light returns and the eclipse does not become endless night. Dawn and resurrection are synonymous. The reappearance of the light is the same as the survival of the soul
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: You don't want your personality to eclipse your work because no one would be interested in seeing your work anymore.
quotes.author: Amy Landecker

quotes.quote: We are in the days of miracles and wonders that will eventually eclipse those of any other time.
quotes.author: Rick Joyner

quotes.quote: Comparing what you see during an eclipse to the darkness at night is like comparing an ocean to a teardrop.
quotes.author: Wendy Mass

quotes.quote: The right scent can make you feel a little more stylish, but it should never eclipse who you are. It should complement who you are.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: And the moon in haste eclipsed her, and the Sun in anger swore He would curl his wick within him and give light to you no more.
quotes.author: Aristophanese

quotes.quote: It's best not to stare at the sun during an eclipse.
quotes.author: Jeff Goldblum

quotes.quote: Maybe it's just hiding somewhere. Or gone on a trip to come home. But falling in love is always a pretty crazy thing. It might appear out of the blue and just grab you. Who knows â€” maybe even tomorrow.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Eclipse of the light of heaven, eclipse of God - such indeed is the character of the historic hour through which the world is now passing.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: Whenever a total eclipse of the sun was visible in an accessible region parties were sent out to observe it.
quotes.author: Simon Newcomb

quotes.quote: In dim eclipse, disastrous twilight sheds On half the nations, and with fear of change Perplexes monarchs
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Eclipse' is overlong and overly self-conscious, but it isn't a fake or a zero; it just gets exhausting. It raises a crucial question: 'When does Concept morph into Gimmick?'
quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

quotes.quote: Once every lunar eclipse, you should be able to see me smile!
quotes.author: Sophie Turner

quotes.quote: The sun loves to be eclipsed.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: As the sun eclipses the stars by its brilliancy, so the man of knowledge will eclipse the fame of others in assemblies of the people if he proposes algebraic problems, and still more if he solves them.
quotes.author: Brahmagupta

quotes.quote: Oh dark, dark, dark, amid the blaze of noon, Irrecoverably dark, total Eclipse Without all hope of day!
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Ecology also teaches that all life on earth can be viewed as a competition among species for the solar energy captured by green plants and stored in the form of complex carbon molecules. A food chain is a system for passing those calories on to species that lack the pant's unique ability to synthesize them from sunlight.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: In an ecology of love, people can relate in trust and face the future without fear. They do not need to play it safe. They can take uncertainty in their stride.
quotes.author: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.quote: Ecology, like genetics, is not about equilibrium states. It is about change, change and change. Nothing stays the same forever.
quotes.author: Matt Ridley

quotes.quote: When you pursue great flavor, you also pursue great ecology.
quotes.author: Dan Barber

quotes.quote: A forest ecology is a delicate one. If the forest perishes, its fauna may go with it. The Athshean word for world is also the word for forest.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Probably the most visible example of unintended consequences, is what happens every time humans try to change the natural ecology of a place.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: The first law of ecology is that everything is related to everything else.
quotes.author: Barry Commoner

quotes.quote: Respect the delicate ecology of your delusions.
quotes.author: Tony Kushner

quotes.quote: We need to renegotiate our contract with nature. Ecology is a unifying force that can diminish intolerance and expand our empathy towards others â€“ both human and animal.
quotes.author: Gregory Colbert

quotes.quote: Ecology is often confused with environmentalism, while in fact, environmentalism often leaves out the fact that people, too, can be a legitimate part of an ecosystem.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The world's deteriorating ecology poses as great a danger to mankind today as did the nuclear standoff between the superpowers at the height of the Cold War.
quotes.author: Mikhail Gorbachev

quotes.quote: Relationships are the core message of ecology.
quotes.author: Frances Moore Lappe

quotes.quote: We won't have a society if we destroy the environment.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Ecology and spirituality are fundamentally connected, because deep ecological awareness, ultimately, is spiritual awareness.
quotes.author: Fritjof Capra

quotes.quote: Ecology is the overall science of which economics is a minor speciality.
quotes.author: Garrett Hardin

quotes.quote: Ecological differentiation is the necessary condition for coexistence.
quotes.author: Garrett Hardin

quotes.quote: Continuity is at the heart of conservatism: ecology serves that heart.
quotes.author: Garrett Hardin

quotes.quote: The highest function of ecology is the understanding of consequences.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: It is horrifying that we have to fight our own government to save the environment.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: By ecology we understand the total science of the connections of the organism to the surrounding external world.
quotes.author: Ernst Haeckel

quotes.quote: Over and over again, we must stress that a healthy ecology is the basis for a healthy economy.
quotes.author: Claudine Schneider

quotes.quote: It is our collective and individual responsibility to preserve and tend to the environment in which we all live.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: As a word, ecology has been so debased by recent political usage that many people employ it to identify anything good that happens far from cities and without human interference.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: Ecology should be object lessons that the world sees, that explains in a visceral, physical way, the attributes of God.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.quote: Wildlife is something which man cannot construct. Once it is gone, it is gone forever. Man can rebuild a pyramid, but he can't rebuild ecology, or a giraffe.
quotes.author: Joy Adamson

quotes.quote: Economics and ethics have little in common.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Economics exists to make astrology look respectable.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Economics is too important to leave to the economists.
quotes.author: Steve Keen

quotes.quote: Economics is haunted by more fallacies than any other study known to man.
quotes.author: Henry Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The point of studying economics is so as not to be fooled by economists.
quotes.author: Joan Robinson

quotes.quote: Economics make homeopath and alternative healers look empirical and scientific.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Economics is like gravity: Ignore it and you will be in for some rude surprises.
quotes.author: Charles Wheelan

quotes.quote: Economics limps along with one foot in untested hypotheses and the other in untestable slogans.
quotes.author: Joan Robinson

quotes.quote: Economics teaches humility because it teaches us more about what we can't do than what we can do
quotes.author: Peter Boettke

quotes.quote: Economics was the only profession where a person could be considered an expert without having once been right.
quotes.author: George Meany

quotes.quote: Good economics is good politics.
quotes.author: Paul Keating

quotes.quote: Economics is not a morality play.
quotes.author: Paul Krugman

quotes.quote: Economics is a very dangerous science.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: Good environmentalism is good economics.
quotes.author: Barber Conable

quotes.quote: Economics is really politics in disguise.
quotes.author: Hazel Henderson

quotes.quote: In human life, economics precedes politics or culture.
quotes.author: Park Geun-hye

quotes.quote: Economics is a subject that does not greatly respect one's wishes.
quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.quote: Economics is concerned with what emerges, not what anyone intended.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Economics is extremely useful as a form of employment for economists.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Economics is a slave-driver. No one has free time; no one has any leisure.
quotes.author: James Hillman

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as economics, only social science applied to economic problems.
quotes.author: Kenneth E. Boulding

quotes.quote: Economics dominates politics - and with that domination comes different forms of ruthlessness.
quotes.author: Chris Hedges

quotes.quote: Economics becomes redundant if it can rationalise an exchange that sells the future of humankind.
quotes.author: Andrew Simms

quotes.quote: Economics is not about things and tangible material objects; it is about men, their meanings and actions.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: Economics that hurt the moral well-being of an individual or a nation are immoral and, therefore, sinful.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Economics brings into view that conflict of choice is one of the permanent characteristics of human existence.
quotes.author: Lionel Robbins

quotes.quote: Existing economics is a theoretical system which floats in the air and which bears little relation to what happens in the real world.
quotes.author: Ronald Coase

quotes.quote: Economics has many substantive areas of knowledge where there is agreement, but also contains areas of controversy. That's inescapable.
quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

quotes.quote: Economics is a strange science. Our subject deals with some of the most important as well as mundane issues that impinge on the human condition.
quotes.author: Dale T. Mortensen

quotes.quote: Economics has been called the dismal science. Once you get to understand it, you may not find it so dismal, but you don't find it much of a science either.
quotes.author: Jean Chretien

quotes.quote: Economy and environment are the same thing. That is the rule of nature.
quotes.author: Mollie Beattie

quotes.quote: A strong economy causes an increase in the demand for housing; the increased demand for housing drives real-estate prices and rentals through the roof. And then affordable housing becomes completely inaccessible.
quotes.author: William Baldwin

quotes.quote: Our economy is based on spending billions to persuade people that happiness is buying things, and then insisting that the only way to have a viable economy is to make things for people to buy so they'll have jobs and get enough money to buy things.
quotes.author: Philip Slater

quotes.quote: Economy has frequently nothing whatever to do with the amount of money being spent, but with the wisdom used in spending it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: In the new economy, information, education, and motivation are everything.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: The whole of the global economy is based on supplying the cravings of two per cent of the world's population.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: A free economy and strong communities honor the dignity of every person, rewarding effort with justice, promoting upward mobility, and building solidarity among citizens.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.quote: A single economy makes the constant adjustments necessary to facilitate trade impossible.
quotes.author: Vladimir Bukovsky

quotes.quote: When we replace a sense of service and gratitude with a sense of entitlement and expectation, we quickly see the demise of our relationships, society, and economy.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Economic growth is not only unncessary, but ruinous.
quotes.author: Alexander Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: The economic owning class is always the political ruling class.
quotes.author: Eugene V. Debs

quotes.quote: Economics is extremely useful as a form of employment for economists.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: The economy is the start and end of everything. You can't have successful education reform or any other reform if you don't have a strong economy.
quotes.author: David Cameron

quotes.quote: A strong economy begins with a strong, well-educated workforce.
quotes.author: Bill Owens

quotes.quote: Economy is the basis of society. When the economy is stable, society develops. The ideal economy combines the spiritual and the material, and the best commodities to trade in are sincerity and love.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: An economy genuinely local and neighborly offers to localities a measure of security that they cannot derive from a national or a global economy controlled by people who, by principle, have no local commitment.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: The economy of human time is the next advantage of machinery in manufactures.
quotes.author: Charles Babbage

quotes.quote: Economy is not baseball, where the game is always played by the same rules.
quotes.author: Nate Silver

quotes.quote: The best way to boost the economy is to redistribute wealth downward, as poorer people tend to spend a higher proportion of their income.
quotes.author: Ha-Joon Chang

quotes.quote: A global economy requires a global currency.
quotes.author: Paul Volcker

quotes.quote: Economy is the method by which we prepare today to afford the improvements of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: The way to turn our economy around is not by making rich people poorer, it's by making poor people richer.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.quote: The economy's always been the engine for our national security.
quotes.author: James Mattis

quotes.quote: If the economy grows, housing gets better, quicker.
quotes.author: Jamie Dimon

quotes.quote: Economy, prudence, and a simple life are the sure masters of need, and will often accomplish that which, their opposites, with a fortune at hand, will fail to do.
quotes.author: Clara Barton

quotes.quote: Economy does not consist in saving the coal, but in using the time while it burns.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Economy is the art of making the most of life. The love of economy is the root of all virtue.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Economy is half the battle of life; it is not so hard to earn money as to spend it well.
quotes.author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: No economy can succeed without a high-quality workforce, particularly in an age of globalization and technical change.
quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

quotes.quote: Economic progress, in capitalist society, means turmoil.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Schumpeter

quotes.quote: A successful economic development strategy must focus on improving the skills of the area's workforce, reducing the cost of doing business and making available the resources business needs to compete and thrive in today's global economy.
quotes.author: Rod Blagojevich

quotes.quote: When our economy is truly healthy, and everyone rises with the tide of prosperity, then issues such as the lack of affordable housing, homelessness, and hunger are greatly diminished.
quotes.author: David Ige

quotes.quote: The market economy is very good at wealth creation but not perfect at all about wealth distribution.
quotes.author: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.quote: Instead of having a set of policies that are equipping people for the globalization of the economy, we have policies that are accelerating the most destructive trends of the global economy.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Capitalism works better from every perspective when the economic decision makers are forced to share power with those who will be affected by those decisions.
quotes.author: Barney Frank

quotes.quote: There can be economy only where there is efficiency.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: If there's any part of the economy that's delivered for all the citizens, it's got to be the work that we and our partners in our industry have done,
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Many individuals are doing what they can. But real success can only come if there is a change in our societies and in our economics and in our politics.
quotes.author: David Attenborough

quotes.quote: Don't ever let economic alone determine your career or how you spend the majority of your time.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: We don't have to sacrifice a strong economy for a healthy environment.
quotes.author: Dennis Weaver

quotes.quote: First rule of Economics 101, our desires are insatiable. Second rule, we can stomach only three Big Macs at a time.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: The curious task of economics is to demonstrate to men how little they really know about what they imagine they can design.
quotes.author: Friedrich August von Hayek

quotes.quote: If all the economists were laid end to end, they would not reach a conclusion.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The private sector of the economy is, in fact, the voluntary sector; and the 'public sector is, in fact, the coercive sector.
quotes.author: Henry Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Economic growth without social progress lets the great majority of people remain in poverty, while a privileged few reap the benefits of rising abundance.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: In economics, the majority is always wrong.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: The great dialectic in our time is not, as anciently and by some still supposed, between capital and labor; it is between economic enterprise and the state.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: An economist is an expert who will know tomorrow why the things he predicted yesterday didn't happen today.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Economy is too late when you are at the bottom of your purse.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: People do not understand what a great revenue economy is.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Truth is the most valuable thing we have. Let us economize it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: Nobody spends somebody else's money as carefully as he spends his own. Nobody uses somebody else's resources as carefully as he uses his own. So if you want efficiency and effectiveness, if you want knowledge to be properly utilized, you have to do it through the means of private property.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: A major source of objection to a free economy is precisely that group thinks they ought to want. Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: Government is not the generator of economic growth; working people are.
quotes.author: Phil Gramm

quotes.quote: Government's view of the economy could be summed up in a few short phrases Ronald Reagan If it moves, tax it. If it keeps moving, regulate it. And if it stops moving, subsidise it
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Advertising is, actually, a simple phenomenon in terms of economics. It is merely a substitute for a personal sales force - an extension, if you will, of the merchant who cries aloud his wares.
quotes.author: Rosser Reeves

quotes.quote: The study of economy usually shows us that the best time for purchase was last year.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Ecstasy should not be viewed as an unusual experience, but rather a natural experience â€“ feeling all of the living matrix of existence around us.
quotes.author: fredre

quotes.quote: There is an ecstasy that marks the summit of life, and beyond which life cannot rise. And such is the paradox of living, this ecstasy comes when one is most alive, and it comes as a complete forgetfulness that one is alive.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: Ecstasy is from the contemplation of things vaster than the individual and imperfectly seen perhaps, by all those that still live.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: The ecstasy is so short but the forgetting is so long.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: It was then that the ecstasy and the dream began, in which emotion was the matter of the universe, and matter but an adventitious intrusion likely to hinder you from spinning where you wanted to spin.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Any real ecstasy is a sign you are moving in the right direction.
quotes.author: Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: Find ecstasy within yourself. It is not out there. It is in your innermost flowering. The one you are looking for is you.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: You will find inner ecstasy when you can be reckless in love.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: There is no other greater ecstasy, no other greater blissfulness, than to know who you are. To know the inner space is to know all. It is unlimited silence but not dead, it is alive with songs of its own, with dances of its own.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: With the happiness, ecstasy and power you gain from meditation, you can gradually remove your mind from the things it has become hooked to that cause it pain.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Ecstasy carries you completely outside your ego boundaries. In ecstasy you know yourself as cosmic ego, unbounded in time and space.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Ecstasy is a glass full of tea and a piece of sugar in the mouth.
quotes.author: Alexander Pushkin

quotes.quote: The helpless ecstasy of loosing himself in her charm was a powerful opiate rather than a tonic.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: An ecstasy is a thing that will not go into words; it feels like music.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Ecstasy is the energy of spirit. When life flows, ecstasy is natural.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The highest ecstasy is the attention at its fullest.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: True ecstasy is stepping out of the bondage of the time-bound, space-bound world. We long to be free of fear and limitation. We hunger to experience our infinite, unbounded Self.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: This is the very ecstasy of love, whose violent property ordoes itself and leads the will to desperate undertakings.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Religious ecstasy is a madness of thought freed of its bodily bonds, whereas in the ecstasy of love, the forces of twin natures unite, blend and embrace one another.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Ecstasy is not simply joy. Ecstasy is an emotion of great complexity that hovers almost on the edge of terror sometimes.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Ecstasy is not really part of the scene we can do on celluloid.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: Ecstasy is a complex emotion containing elements of joy, fear, terror, triumph, surrender, and empathy. What has replaced our prehistoric understanding of this complex of ecstasy now is the word comfort, a tremendously bloodless notion. Drugs are not comfortable, and anyone who thinks they are comfortable or even escapist should not toy with drugs unless they're willing to get their noses rubbed in their own stuff.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Find ecstasy in life; the mere sense of living is joy enough.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Ecstasy is the accurate term for the intensity of consciousness that occurs in the creative act.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: Ecstasy can be painful when it's intense enough, when the kundalini surges enough. The ecstasy is so complete, it's overwhelming sometimes.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: We all have an edge. We all are floating our psyche on top with a great ocean underneath.
quotes.author: Brad Dourif

quotes.quote: Learn to live on the edge.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Prayer begins at the edge of emptiness.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: We live at the edge of the miraculous.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Service is the ultimate edge. Keep it sharp.
quotes.author: Ron Kaufman

quotes.quote: The finest edge is made with the blunt whetstone.
quotes.author: John Lyly

quotes.quote: The hand is the cutting edge of the mind.
quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

quotes.quote: Whenever you're aggressive, you're at the edge of mistakes.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.quote: Pounding an edge to sharpness will not make it last.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: On the edge of destiny, you must test your strength.
quotes.author: Billy Bishop

quotes.quote: Being on the edge is always worse than going through.
quotes.author: Joseph Brown

quotes.quote: You learn the most when you're out on the edge.
quotes.author: Jim Whittaker

quotes.quote: The key to success is to develop a winning edge.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: If you round out your edges, you lose your edge.
quotes.author: Danielle LaPorte

quotes.quote: Laughter is what spills over the edge of an inspired life.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: The cutting edge of service is always being honed and polished.
quotes.author: Ron Kaufman

quotes.quote: Only on the edge of the grave can man conclude anything.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Life and death are balanced on the edge of a razor.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: The edge of the sea is a strange and beautiful place.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: If they think we've got an edge, we've got an edge.
quotes.author: Red Auerbach

quotes.quote: When one jumps over the edge, one is bound to land somewhere.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Being on the edge isn't as safe, but the view is better.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: It's the knowledge derived from information that gives you a competitive edge.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The edge of the world is always the next step when you're blind.
quotes.author: Ryan Knighton

quotes.quote: If you're not living on the edge, you're taking up too much space.
quotes.author: Stephen Hunt

quotes.quote: A sharp tongue is the only edge tool that grows keener with constant use.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: People on the edge of love go with their heart and not their head.
quotes.author: Sienna Miller

quotes.quote: The leading edge of reality is mind, and mind is the primary substratum of being.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: You have to just dive over the edge. You haven't got time to mess about.
quotes.author: Ralph Fiennes

quotes.quote: When you are at the edge of life it will be either silence or violence.
quotes.author: Gopichand Lagadapati

quotes.quote: If you want to live on the edge of life, you need to be flexible.
quotes.author: Kim Novak

quotes.quote: You really need to be on the edge and you have to keep your eyes open.
quotes.author: Jam Master Jay

quotes.quote: You have to keep on the very edge of something, all the time, or the picture dies.
quotes.author: Willem de Kooning

quotes.quote: Make sure you have an edge. Know what your edge is. And have rigid risk control rules.
quotes.author: Monroe Trout

quotes.quote: Develop the winning edge; small differences in your performance can lead to large differences in your results.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Being out on the edge, with everything at risk, is where you learn and grow the most.
quotes.author: Jim Whittaker

quotes.quote: The leading edge in evidence presentation is in science; the leading edge in beauty is in high art.
quotes.author: Edward Tufte

quotes.quote: Maybe what frightens us about the edge isn't our fear of morality, but the thoughts it leads us to have.
quotes.author: Lauren DeStefano

quotes.quote: Exoticism can give you an edge: it makes people assume you're cleverer than you are and gives you the upper hand.
quotes.author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quotes.quote: There's a certain edge about cruelty. If you're honest about it, most people wince, but say it had to be said.
quotes.author: Pete Waterman

quotes.quote: You always have to be on edge. You always have to take every practice, every game, like it is your last.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.quote: Knowing the edge of your competency is important. If you think you know more than you do, you will get in trouble.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: As a coach, you're just trying to figure out how to keep a team on edge. You've got to find that edge.
quotes.author: Don Meyer

quotes.quote: Sooner or later we will come to the edge of all that we can control and find life, waiting there for us.
quotes.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.quote: The whole idea is to get an edge. Sometimes it takes just a little extra something to get that edge, but you have to have it.
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.quote: You have a certain set of facts and you are looking for situations where you have an edge, whether the edge is psychological or statistical.
quotes.author: David Einhorn

quotes.quote: Empathy took the edge off, and the truth is, we need our edge. Our edge is trying to speak to us, and we are too, too good at shutting it up.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: The edge is a great place to be. Inside the box is too dark. Outside the box, there's no leverage. But on the edge of the box, you can get things done!
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: People in love often become edgy, dangerous. They lose their sense of perspective.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Being anxious is the worst feeling in the world.
quotes.author: Enrique Iglesias

quotes.quote: The most anxious man in a prison is the governor.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: No distance can keep anxious lovers long asunder.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Lazy people are always anxious to be doing something.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: The mind that is anxious about future events is miserable.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: If you want to be anxious today, pretend you're in control.
quotes.author: Michael Reeves

quotes.quote: Nobody should ever look anxious except those who have no anxiety.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The way to be anxious about nothing is to be prayerful about everything.
quotes.author: D. A. Carson

quotes.quote: The thinner the ice, the more anxious is everyone to see whether it will bear.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: When we are anxious about what is going to happen next, we are not staying in our now!
quotes.author: Evinda Lepins

quotes.quote: Any time you try to be edgy just for the sake of being edgy, that's the worst way.
quotes.author: Billy Lawrence

quotes.quote: The weak are always anxious for justice and equality. The strong pay no heed to either.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Be not anxious to avoid poverty. In this way the wealth of the universe may be securely invested.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Some of us seem so anxious about avoiding hell that we forget to celebrate our journey toward heaven.
quotes.author: Philip Yancey

quotes.quote: Being anxious, or in a painful rush of any kind, kills the possibility of meeting anyone with compassion.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Wasting your time in anxious worry over what you may not have is a good way to waste what you need to get it.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: One is a great deal less anxious if one feels perfectly free to be anxious, and the same may be said of guilt.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: If you are anxious, you can't learn. It's like dropping seeds on concrete. With a quiet mind, people take things in.
quotes.author: Herbert Benson

quotes.quote: Writers are always anxious, always on the run--from the telephone, from responsibilities, from the distractions of the world.
quotes.author: Edna O'Brien

quotes.quote: Do not be anxious about tomorrow, for tomorrow will be anxious for itself. Let the day's own trouble be sufficient for the day.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: If you are anxious about death, then you don't have a sense of the oneness of things—you feel that after death, you will be no more.
quotes.author: Sidney Poitier

quotes.quote: We are anxious in the face of our unchangeable past; we long to recreate segments of our private histories, but we are stuck with them.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: Temperamentally anxious people can have a hard time staying motivated, period, because their intense focus on their worries distracts them from their goals.
quotes.author: Winifred Gallagher

quotes.quote: There is a great multitude of individuals who are like blind mules, anxious enough to kick, but can't tell where.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: She. like a hospitable country hostess anxious to give pleasure, but afraid that she has not much to offer citizens of a larger world.
quotes.author: Phyllis Bottome

quotes.quote: Therefore, do not be anxious about tomorrow, for tomorrow will be anxious for itself.
quotes.author: Matthew 6:34

quotes.quote: Anxiety is simply part of the condition of being human. If we were not anxious, we would never create anything.
quotes.author: William Barrett

quotes.quote: Men are not worried by things, but by their ideas about things. When we meet with difficulties, become anxious or troubled, let us not blame others, but rather ourselves, that is: our ideas about things.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The superior man is anxious lest he should not get the truth; he is not anxious lest poverty should come upon him.
quotes.author: Liu Lang Ji

quotes.quote: One is a great deal less anxious if one feels perfectly free to be anxious.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: The life of folly is empty of gratitude, full of anxiety; it is focused wholly on the future.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Something unpleasant is coming when men are anxious, to tell the truth.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: If I knew what I was so anxious about I wouldn't be anxious.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: It is not yet noon in heaven, whoever is anxious to get there may go ahead by himself or herself.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: If you round out your edges, you lose your edge.
quotes.author: Danielle LaPorte

quotes.quote: My head spins. One moment I'm told I'm too edgy, then people say I'm too angry, then that I show too much passion… make your minds up.
quotes.author: Nick Clegg

quotes.quote: I have an attitude. It’s what I do. I'm edgy. I have an attitude.
quotes.author: Hope Solo

quotes.quote: Myspace was always a bit edgy. People identified it with edginess and music.
quotes.author: Michael Birch

quotes.quote: I don’t get to be edgy and angry, but the rewards are that I’m generally quite happy with my day. I spend an awful lot of time in a good mood.
quotes.author: Raul Esparza

quotes.quote: People try to be edgier, or write about that first explosive meeting between two people in a club, but not so much the long-term issues; I don't know how to write a song about teenage heartbreak anymore.
quotes.author: Joe Goddard

quotes.quote: My personal style can be everything from girly and flirty to edgy and chic.
quotes.author: Kristin Cavallari

quotes.quote: People have maybe, sometimes, said that I can, occasionally, be a teeny bit edgy and judgmental.
quotes.author: Christa Miller

quotes.quote: I was seen in earlier years by family members and people of authority as somebody wasting his time. I had trouble with the restrictions of conformity. It made me edgy.
quotes.author: Robert Redford

quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
quotes.author: Allan Bloom

quotes.quote: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing that is worth knowing can be taught.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future in life.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Education is learning what you didn't even know you didn't know.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Without education, we are in a horrible and deadly danger of taking educated people seriously.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: No man who worships education has got the best out of education.... Without a gentle contempt for education no man's education is complete.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The aim of education should be to teach us rather how to think, than what to think rather to improve our minds, so as to enable us to think for ourselves, than to load the memory with thoughts of other men.
quotes.author: Bill Beattie

quotes.quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Education is a better safeguard of liberty than a standing army.
quotes.author: Edward Everett

quotes.quote: The object of education is to prepare the young to educate themselves throughout their lives.
quotes.author: Robert Maynard Hutchins

quotes.quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: Education is an ornament in prosperity and a refuge in adversity.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Education is simply the soul of a society as it passes from one generation to another.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Education: the inculcation of the incomprehensible into the indifferent by the incompetent.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: Education is the process of driving a set of prejudices down your throats.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: I've learned... that the best classroom in the world is at the feet of an elderly person.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Much education today is monumentally ineffective. All too often we are giving young people cut flowers when we should be teaching them to grow their own plants.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: Creativity is a type of learning process where the teacher and pupil are located in the same individual.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
quotes.author: Henry B Adams

quotes.quote: Example isn't another way to teach, it is the only way to teach.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If I had learned education I would not have had time to learn anything else.
quotes.author: Cornelius Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: Teachers should guide without dictating, and participate without dominating.
quotes.author: C. B. Neblette

quotes.quote: Education would be much more effective if its purpose was to ensure that by the time they leave school every boy and girl should know how much they do not know, and be imbued with a lifelong desire to know it.
quotes.author: William Haley

quotes.quote: Education should be exercise; it has become massage.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Education without values, as useful as it is, seems rather to make man a more clever devil.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Education is simply the soul of a society as it passes from one generation to another.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: Education is a better safeguard of liberty than a standing army.
quotes.author: Edward Everett

quotes.quote: What does education often do? It makes a straight-cut ditch of a free, meandering brook.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Education: the path from cocky ignorance to miserable uncertainty.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating. Education is the premise of progress, in every society, in every family.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Upon the subject of education. I can only say that I view it as the most important subject which we as a people may be engaged in.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Education's purpose is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
quotes.author: Malcolm S. Forbes

quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: I suppose it is because nearly all children go to school nowadays, and have things arranged for them, that they seem so forlornly unable to produce their own ideas.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: A good head and good heart are always a formidable combination. But when you add to that a literate tongue or pen, then you have something very special.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Education is the key to success in life, and teachers make a lasting impact in the lives of their students.
quotes.author: Solomon Ortiz

quotes.quote: The educated differ from the uneducated as much as the living differ from the dead.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The true teacher defends his pupils against his own personal influence.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: It is as impossible to withhold education from the receptive mind as it is impossible to force it upon the unreasoning.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplierg

quotes.quote: The best teachers are those that show you where to look but don't tell you what to see.
quotes.author: Alexandra K. Trenfor

quotes.quote: I have never let my schooling interfere with my education.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Education is an ornament in prosperity and a refuge in adversity.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Despise school and remain a fool.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: You can teach a student a lesson for a day; but if you can teach him to learn by creating curiosity, he will continue the learning process as long as he lives.
quotes.author: Clay P. Bedford

quotes.quote: Children have never been very good at listening to their elders, but they have never failed to imitate them.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: No man who worships education has got the best out of educationâ€¦. Without a gentle contempt for education no man's education is complete.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: To teach is to learn twice.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Teaching is the highest form of understanding.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: My idea of education is to unsettle the minds of the young and inflame their intellects.
quotes.author: Robert Maynard Hutchins

quotes.quote: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: I am not a teacher, but an awakener.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: It is impossible for a man to learn what he thinks he already knows.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The most efficient way to live reasonably is every morning to make a plan of one's day and every night to examine the results obtained.
quotes.author: Alexis Carrel

quotes.quote: So there is a natural efficiency that you pick up as you can prioritize capital across a bigger set of opportunities.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Loyal and efficient work in a great cause, even though it may not be immediately recognized, ultimately bears fruit.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Conscienceless efficiency is no match for efficiency quickened by conscience.
quotes.author: Kelly Miller

quotes.quote: The highest and best form of efficiency is the spontaneous cooperation of a free people.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Efficiency was just a measurement of how fast money moved from the poor to the rich. We prefer the opposite of efficiency, which is to say, justice.
quotes.author: Kim Stanley Robinson

quotes.quote: Efficiency and focus are the keys to success.
quotes.author: Robert Crais

quotes.quote: Efficiency is anything that scores.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Management is efficiency in climbing the ladder of success; leadership determines whether the ladder is leaning against the right wall.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Efficiency is the foundation for survival. Effectiveness is the foundation for success.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: You think effectiveness with people and efficiency with things.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The efficient management of organizations is key to generating wealth, for the development of a country, for the preservation of natural resources and the enhancement of the human being.
quotes.author: Vinicius Montgomery

quotes.quote: Organizations cannot make a genius out of an incompetent. On the other hand, disorganization can scarcely fail to result in efficiency.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Efficiency was a higher priority than imagination.
quotes.author: Adam Christopher

quotes.quote: Progress isn't made by early risers. It's made by lazy men trying to find easier ways to do something.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The most efficient way to produce anything is to bring together under one management as many as possible of the activities needed to turn out the product.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the mother of effort, and without it nothing great was ever achieved.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Being efficient without regard to effectiveness is the default mode of the universe.
quotes.author: Timothy Ferriss

quotes.quote: True efficiency is taking some time to be fully first thing in the morning. Rushing isn't always efficient.
quotes.author: Waylon H. Lewis

quotes.quote: The most inefficient and self-harming thing a person can do is go out looking for love. Let it find you when the time is right and you're out doing what you love to do. Only then will you find it in its truest form.
quotes.author: A.J. Darkholme

quotes.quote: The trouble with lying and deceiving is that their efficiency depends entirely upon a clear notion of the truth that the liar and deceiver wishes to hide.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Efficiency is intelligent laziness.
quotes.author: David Dunham

quotes.quote: The efficiency of most workers is beyond the control of the management and depends more than has been supposed upon the willingness of men to do their best.
quotes.author: Sumner Slichter

quotes.quote: Organizational effectiveness does not lie in that narrow minded concept called rationality. It lies in the blend of clearheaded logic and powerful intuition.
quotes.author: Henry Mintzberg

quotes.quote: Our work activities are perhaps most interesting when the element of competition is present.
quotes.author: Ralph Alfred Habas

quotes.quote: Efficiency is doing better what is already being done.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The more efficient you are at doing the wrong thing, the wronger you become. It is much better to do the right thing wronger than the wrong thing righter. If you do the right thing wrong and correct it, you get better.
quotes.author: Russell L. Ackoff

quotes.quote: Efficiency, which is doing things right, is irrelevant until you work on the right things.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Improving efficiency on the farm is not only a risk-reduction strategy, it's a profitability strategy.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Once we've made a decision, we are efficient only if we go through with it decisively, undistracted by doubts about its correctness.
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: Do not believe that it is very much of an advance to do the unnecessary three times as fast.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: You cannot increase the quality or quantity of your achievement or performance except to the degree in which you increase your ability to use your time effectively.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The efficiency of God may be understood as either creation or providence.
quotes.author: William Ames

quotes.quote: The effectiveness of your work will never rise above your ability to lead and influence others.
quotes.author: John C Maxwell

quotes.quote: Effectiveness without values is a tool without a purpose.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: You must never forget for a moment that so far from the doctrine of efficiency being a base doctrine, it is a doctrine vital to good in this country.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You must be efficient. You must be able to hold your own in the world of politics, the world of business; able to keep your head above water, to make your work satisfactory, to make it pay. If you do not, you cannot do good to others.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The efficient man is the one who thinks for himself and thinks long and hard.
quotes.author: Charles W. Eliot

quotes.quote: The average man could probably increase his efficiency fifty percent.
quotes.author: Walter Dill Scott

quotes.quote: Efficiency without ideals is brutal; ideals without efficiency are futile.
quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

quotes.quote: I don't like a man to be too efficient. He's likely not to be human enough.
quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

quotes.quote: I'll take fifty percent efficiency to take 100 percent loyalty.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: It is idiotic to do only one thing at a time when there is so much to be done and to be forgiving of anything less than efficiency and perfection.
quotes.author: Richard W. Pound

quotes.quote: Efficiency signifies the productivity of the process. Does the process minimize the use of resources, improve cycle time, and eliminate bureaucracy?
quotes.author: Susan Page

quotes.quote: Tommy's leaden soldiers we, / Glittering with efficiency. / Not a button's out of place, / Tons and tons of golden lace / Wind about our officers.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: She whispered to her friends to shoo me away; which they executed with supreme efficiency; pelting me with their shoes; and whatever rotten piece of junk that came across their hands.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Tell Him what day you are missin’ out on / Tell Him His grace is efficient and strong / Love Him all day or you're missing on Him / Tell Him his grace is efficient and strong.
quotes.author: Armour Stephen III

quotes.quote: It's so vicious / She's so sufficient / Oh, efficiency's her middle name / Efficient / Special you know I care / Darling, tell the truth to the world.
quotes.author: Neil Leitao

quotes.quote: I'm in no rush / I'm a man on a mission / Just lay back I'm so efficient / You'll have what you want and more.
quotes.author: Earlwin Opanga

quotes.quote: Who decides who lives in this world? / Who decides who dies in this world? / More efficient ways of execution / This is not a type of resolution / Who dares to throw the first rock? / Who believes in justice being done? / More efficient ways to confess / We got to know the truth no less.
quotes.author: Andreas Rudolf Kisser

quotes.quote: Modern technology has become a total phenomenon for civilization, the defining force of a new social order in which efficiency is no longer an option but a necessity imposed on all human activity.
quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

quotes.quote: Simplicity is efficient.
quotes.author: Adrienne Posey

quotes.quote: Wherever there is human intervention, there is subjective prejudice. Systems implementation is the only solution for efficiency.
quotes.author: Krishna Saagar Rao

quotes.quote: You will be exceptional only few times, but you can be excellent all the times.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: It's surprising how much free time and productivity you gain when you lose the busyness in your mind.
quotes.author: Brittany Burgunder

quotes.quote: Good managers don't set a goal to increase efficiency, but rather an implementation of business process improvements that result in higher efficiency as well.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: The first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency. The second is that automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: There can be economy only where there is efficiency.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Freud had a gene for inefficiency, and I think I have a gene for efficiency.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: The worst enemy of life, freedom and the common decencies is total anarchy; their second worst enemy is total efficiency.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: The obvious rule of efficiency is you don't want to spend more time organizing than it's worth.
quotes.author: Daniel Levitin

quotes.quote: The gold medals from world championships and National Games prove the efficiency of my daily training.
quotes.author: Lin Dan

quotes.quote: The outgrowth of conservation, the inevitable result, is national efficiency.
quotes.author: Gifford Pinchot

quotes.quote: Efficiency is to do what is effective, achieve high customer satisfaction with less operating cost, and improve employee productivity with good teamwork.
quotes.author: Pearl Zhu

quotes.quote: Efficiency was just a measurement of how fast money moved from the poor to the rich. We prefer the opposite of efficiency, which is to say, justice.
quotes.author: Kim Stanley Robinson

quotes.quote: Your dreams will take time. It will take efforts and require dedication and sacrifice. But in the end it WILL be worth it.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment, full effort is full victory.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the mother of effort, and without it nothing great was ever achieved.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Respect your efforts, respect yourself. Self-respect leads to self-discipline. When you have both firmly under your belt, that's real power.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Quality is never an accident. It is always the result of intelligent effort.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: Putting forth the effort to succeed is tantamount to your success.
quotes.author: Jon Jones

quotes.quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Progress can be slow and gradual. Continue putting in effort with patience, enthusiasm and faith.
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: Life can be boring unless you put some effort into it.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: An effort made for the happiness of others lifts above ourselves.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: Leaders are made, they are not born. They are made by hard effort, which is the price which all of us must pay to achieve any goal that is worthwhile.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Effort is only effort when it begins to hurt.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset
