quotes.quote: The unselfish effort to bring cheer to others will be the beginning of a happier life for ourselves.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: A great thing can only be done by a great person; and they do it without effort.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: The results you achieve will be in direct proportion to the effort you apply.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The healthiest competition occurs when average people win by putting in above-average effort.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Who you are tomorrow begins with what you do today.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: The bitter and the sweet come from the outside, the hard from within, from one's own efforts.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The mode by which the inevitable comes to pass is effort.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: For every disciplined effort there is a multiple reward.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: People put so much effort into starting a relationship and so little effort into ending one.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.quote: All the effort in the world won't matter if you're not inspired.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: If I put forth a legitimate effort, then I feel like, if that doesn't work out, that's all I can do.
quotes.author: Dave Chappelle

quotes.quote: A minute of perfection was worth the effort. A moment was the most you could ever expect from perfection.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Well, any effort to maximize your potential and ability is a good thing.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: What is written without effort is in general read without pleasure.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: The best effort of a fine person is felt after we have left their presence.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In all human affairs there are efforts, and there are results, and the strength of the effort is the measure of the result.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Make every effort matter, and always make the following effort better than the last one.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: Understand from top to bottom what the effort requires.
quotes.author: Bill Toomey

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: It is always the start that requires the greatest effort.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: Without some goal and some effort to reach it, no one can live.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Education comes from within; you get it by struggle and effort and thought.
quotes.author: Napolean Hill

quotes.quote: The greater the effort, the greater the glory.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Goals are the end results of a long hard struggle that is considered the fruit of all efforts.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of effort to do things effortlessly.
quotes.author: Alexander Den Heijer

quotes.quote: Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: One must develop an instinct for what one can just barely achieve through one's greatest efforts.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Then the effort that I have made is what people are pleased to call the fruit of genius. It is the fruit of labor and thought.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
quotes.author: Herm Albright

quotes.quote: Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: We've put more effort into helping folks reach old age than into helping them enjoy it.
quotes.author: Frank Howard Clark

quotes.quote: My experience as a school nurse taught me that we need to make a concerted effort, all of us, to increase physical fitness activity among our children and to encourage all Americans to adopt a healthier diet that includes fruits and vegetables, but there is more.
quotes.author: Lois Capps

quotes.quote: An excuse becomes an obstacle in your journey to success when it is made in place of your best effort or when it is used as the object of the blame.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Failure is something many people take great efforts to avoid but failure is essential for growth and learning.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: By letting you suffer a little or work harder now and achieve it on your own, I know that I am doing you a better service than the disservice of giving you what you want without efforts.
quotes.author: James Fray

quotes.quote: We help each other and we both benefit from these efforts.
quotes.author: James Fray

quotes.quote: Nothing prospers without effort.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: What can't be done easily rarely gets done.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: When you can't change the direction of the winds, adjust your sails.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: The greater the price in effort, the greater the reward.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: Don't wait for the ship to come in. Row out and meet it.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: All human actions have one of these causes: chance, nature, compulsion, habit, reason, passion and desire.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: Sometimes, in an effort to improve one area of our life, we discover that what we're learning, is valuable to others too.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: In an effort to become more efficient in one are, we ultimately create ways to replace it with something new.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: It can be a shock for people to realize it still takes time & effort to realize a dream.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: You can't live your dream if you're living like most people.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: A child at play isn't wasting effort, like a craftsman sharpening his tools isn't wasting time.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: A surplus of effort could overcome a deficit of confidence.
quotes.author: Sonia Sotomayor

quotes.quote: If people knew how hard I worked to get my mastery, it wouldn't seem so wonderful at all. 'It's hard to be great. But it's well worth the effort.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: The key to being successful in life and with your business is focus, knowing how and where to focus your time and efforts.
quotes.author: Pat Williams

quotes.quote: If you want to be successful, the key is finding something you're good at and focusing your efforts to help people.
quotes.author: Pat Williams

quotes.quote: Every effort in life is marked down as a win or loss.
quotes.author: Edward Bennett Williams

quotes.quote: The only two things in this world you can control are your effort and your attitude.
quotes.author: Sue Enquist

quotes.quote: Dreaming is easy, but actual moving the mountains or the hills that need moving requires some effort.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: Always make the needed effort to bring success into your reality.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: Maintaining your enthusiasm is the real difference between an impressive effort, and a total victory.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: Artist rarely criticize other artists because they appreciate the artistic effort. Ordinary people are often critical based on their ignorance of that effort.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: If you make little effort you deserve little results, everything in the universe is governed by this principle.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: Inspiration is given to inspire. We give what we receive.
quotes.author: David O. Mears

quotes.quote: We may need inspiration ourselves one hour, and be called upon to give inspiration to others the next.
quotes.author: David O. Mears

quotes.quote: The ability to inspire others does not necessarily require great physical strength or health.
quotes.author: David O. Mears

quotes.quote: Good deeds inspire remembrance in return.
quotes.author: David O. Mears

quotes.quote: Continue in such a work of inspiration for others, the world would take on a new appearance within less than twelve months.
quotes.author: David O. Mears

quotes.quote: Hard work isn't what you think it is. It's more about love than it is about money and material possessions.
quotes.author: Michael Crews

quotes.quote: Hard work is about loving yourself enough to be the best you can be. It's about loving the people you work with enough to be an effective team player who performs well so that everyone else can succeed, too.
quotes.author: Michael Crews

quotes.quote: Hard work is about using your abilities for purposes greater than yourself. You may get rich in the process, and, if you're a real hard worker, you'll use much of the wealth you generate to help others.
quotes.author: Michael Crews

quotes.quote: Hard work is a precious gift. If you're able to work hard, generate income for yourself, and enrich the lives of your community, then success will surely be yours.
quotes.author: Michael Crews

quotes.quote: Where there are difficulties, there are ways too. It you have the passion to do something and more ahead, then you can achieve everything in life. There is a need to have courage.
quotes.author: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.quote: You struggle at every point in your life. You die everyday and live everyday. In these conditions, the aim before us is to please everyone be becoming better.
quotes.author: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.quote: If you want to win in life and get success, then you would have to remove your weakness and make it your strength, If you prove yourself, then there would be no difference between success and you.
quotes.author: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.quote: Success is more of a lifestyle but a lifestyle with purpose. When every are of your life is prioritized and balanced you will begin to prosper.
quotes.author: William A. McLean

quotes.quote: You control your life. You control your path to success.
quotes.author: Garrett Pierson

quotes.quote: Desire is a choice that you hold within your heart, your mind, and your soul. The true desire within is what will lead you to action and the opportunities of success.
quotes.author: Garrett Pierson

quotes.quote: Success is more a function of consistent common sense than it is of genius.
quotes.author: Ann Wang

quotes.quote: Another thing that successful people have obtained in their lifetime is self-control, self-control over their thoughts, their desires, and their successes.
quotes.author: Garrett Pierson

quotes.quote: Keeping the mind happy makes work effortless. This is the skill for productivity!
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: What stands in the way of effortless effort is caring, or a conscious attempt to do well.
quotes.author: Joe Hyams

quotes.quote: Once you realize how effortless the highest way of life is, it takes tremendous effort to assume the opposite.
quotes.author: Lester Levenson

quotes.quote: To become effortless takes a lot of effort. It's good to compare it to learning an instrument or learning a sport.
quotes.author: Tenzin Palmo

quotes.quote: Work requires effort. Things we love to do feel effortless. Only do the things you love and you'll never have to work again.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Looking effortless takes a lot of effort.
quotes.author: Alexa Chung

quotes.quote: Being effortless is the coolest thing in the world.
quotes.author: Stella Mccartney

quotes.quote: When something is right, it will feel easier and much more effortless.
quotes.author: Sherry Argov

quotes.quote: Our ability to perceive the world around us seems so effortless that we tend to take it for granted.
quotes.author: Vilayanur S. Ramachandran

quotes.quote: When you know in your bones that your body is a sacred gift, you move in the world with an effortless grace. Gratitude and humility rise up spontaneously.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: You will be effortlessly filled with as much as you can open yourself to receive.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: We spend a lot of effort trying to make things look effortless.
quotes.author: Alexander Isley

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of effort to make a building look effortless.
quotes.author: Ben Mitchell

quotes.quote: Self-realization is effortless. What you are trying to find is what you already are.
quotes.author: Ramesh S Balsekar

quotes.quote: Sometimes not talking is effortless, and other times it's more exhausting than lifting pianos.
quotes.author: Steve Toltz

quotes.quote: Luxury must have that over-the-top attitude but be effortless at the same time, that's what feels chic to me.
quotes.author: Stefano Pilati

quotes.quote: Stick around long enough to be someone's friend. Because true friendship, once recognized, in its essence is effortless.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: The language must be careful and must appear effortless. It must not sweat. It must suggest and be provocative at the same time.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: The act of 'letting go' is actually very easy - it's effortless. Thinking about, talking about, and contemplating 'letting go' is hard.
quotes.author: Mike Brown

quotes.quote: If only it was effortless to understand you because if it wasn't so. . .there wouldn't be any point to be by your side.
quotes.author: Natsuki Takaya

quotes.quote: Effortless [performance] and improvisation are two different things. Just because it's improvised doesn't mean it's effortless and just because it's effortless doesn't necessarily mean it's improvised.
quotes.author: Christoph Waltz

quotes.quote: Cooking is not effortless. To get a recipe that feels effortless is really hard.
quotes.author: Claire Saffitz

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: It may be hard for an egg to turn into a bird: it would be a jolly sight harder for it to learn to fly while remaining an egg. We are like eggs at present. And you cannot go on indefinitely being just an ordinary, decent egg. We must be hatched or go bad.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The present was an egg laid by the past that had the future inside its shell.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Noise proves nothing. Often a hen who has merely laid an egg cackles as if she laid an asteroid.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Being born in a duck yard does not matter, if only you are hatched from a swan's egg.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: The bird fights its way out of the egg. The egg is the world. Whoever will be born must destroy a world.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Boredom is the dream bird that hatches the egg of experience. A rustling in the leaves drives him away.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.quote: Remorse, the fatal egg that pleasure laid.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: What is done is done; and the cracked egg cannot be cured.
quotes.author: Howard Pyle

quotes.quote: If you count your chickens before theyve hatched, they won't lay an egg.
quotes.author: Bobby Robson

quotes.quote: Patriotism is a kind of religion; it is the egg from which wars are hatched.
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: Everyone needs time to develop their dreams. An egg in the nest doesn't become a bird overnight.
quotes.author: Lois Ehlert

quotes.quote: Each thought that is welcomed and recorded is a nest egg, by the side of which more will be laid.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Cherish a heart like you'd carry an egg, cause when it drops it becomes pieces of shell, never to be mended.
quotes.author: Poise

quotes.quote: It was not curiosity that killed the goose who laid the golden egg, but an insatiable greed that devoured common sense.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Remember, people will judge you by your actions not your intentions. You may have a heart of gold but so does a hard-boiled egg.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Words are like eggs dropped from great heights; you can no more call them back than ignore the mess they leave when they fall.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: It may be the cock that crows, but it is the hen that lays the eggs.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Gentleness doesn't get work done unless you happen to be a hen laying eggs.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: A clever arrangement of bad eggs will never make a good omelet.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The sky broke like an egg into full sunset and the water caught fire.
quotes.author: Pamela Hansford Johnson

quotes.quote: Purposes, like eggs, unless they be hatched into action, will run into rottenness.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: We shall sooner have the fowl by hatching the egg than by smashing it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The world is full of hopeful analogies and handsome, dubious eggs, called possibilities.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The key to everything is patience. You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: A hen is only an egg's way of making another egg.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: A day without an argument is like an egg without salt.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: What makes one a genius? The ability to recognize the butterfly in a catterpillar; the eagle in an egg; the saint in a selfish human being.
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: Be quick to resolve conflicts before they mature to become wars. The energetic crocodile was once a delicate egg!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: There is always a best way of doing everything, if it be to boil an egg. Manners are the happy ways of doing things.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The greatest achievement was at first and for a time a dream. The oak sleeps in the acorn, the bird waits in the egg, and in the highest vision of the soul a waking angel stirs. Dreams are the seedlings of realities.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: An egg is always an adventure; the next one may be different.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It is the part of a wise man to keep himself today for tomorrow, and not to venture all his eggs in one basket.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: If you've broken the eggs, you should make the omelette.
quotes.author: Sir Robert Anthony Eden

quotes.quote: Man is the only creature that consumes without producing. He does not give milk, he does not lay eggs, he is too weak to pull the plough, he cannot run fast enough to catch rabbits. Yet he is lord of all the animals.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The vulgar boil, the learned roast, an egg.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: The difference between involvement and commitment is like ham and eggs. The chicken is involved; the pig is committed.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.
quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.quote: Don't let your ego get too close to your position, so that if your position gets shot down, your ego doesn't go with it.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Ego is one of the biggest weapons that is used to take us down. It's self-destructive. It's a problem on all levels - even regular people can have big ego problems.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.quote: The ego is nothing other than the focus of conscious attention.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Ego is the immediate dictate of human consciousness.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.quote: The ego is not master in its own house.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Ego is a social fiction for which one person at a time gets all the blame.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: To me the ego is the habitual and compulsive thought processes that go through everybody's mind continuously. External things like possessions or memories or failures or successes or achievements. Your personal history.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Ego is the great enemy. Ego will hold you back every single time.
quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

quotes.quote: When you're older and wiser a lot of the ego has gone out of the window.
quotes.author: Billy Ocean

quotes.quote: The ego is as little absolutely permanent as are bodies.
quotes.author: Ernst Mach

quotes.quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: The greatest conflicts are not between two people but between one person and himself.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: Every man who is high up likes to think that he has done it all himself, and the wife smiles and lets it go at that.
quotes.author: J. M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Big egos are big shields for lots of empty space.
quotes.author: Diana Black

quotes.quote: Our own self-love draws a thick veil between us and our faults.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Letting go of your ego opens the door to taking a new and creative course of action.
quotes.author: Suzanne Mayo Frindt

quotes.quote: The nice thing about egotists is that they don't talk about other people.
quotes.author: Lucille S. Harper

quotes.quote: It's hard to be humble when you are as great as I am.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The last time I saw him he was walking down lover's lane holding his own hand.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: Well-ordered self-love is right and natural.
quotes.author: St. Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Ego expands to fill the space not filled with knowledge.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Armstrong

quotes.quote: When ego is lost, limit is lost. You become infinite, kind, beautiful.
quotes.author: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.quote: It is hard to resist a flatterer who gets it right.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: You are the sky. Everything else - it's just the weather.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: The Ego is an exquisite instrument. Enjoy it, use it-just don't get lost in it.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Self-worth comes from one thing - thinking that you are worthy.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: I'm willing to admit that I may not always be right, but I am never wrong.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: I live for myself and I answer to nobody.
quotes.author: Steve Mcqueen

quotes.quote: Self-love seems so often unrequited.
quotes.author: Anthony Powell

quotes.quote: A bad day for your ego is a great day for your soul.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: My opponent is my teacher, my ego is my enemy.
quotes.author: Renzo Gracie

quotes.quote: Your ego screams for people to acknowledge you. But you must do nothing. Take it. Eat it until you’re sick. Endure it. Quietly brush it off and work harder.
quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

quotes.quote: Ego trip: a journey to nowhere.
quotes.author: Robert Half

quotes.quote: If the egotist is weak, his egotism is worthless. If the egotist is strong, acute, full of distinctive character, his egotism is precious, and remains a possession of the race.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Egotism is the anesthetic which nature gives us to deaden the pain of being a fool.
quotes.author: Dr. Herbert Shofield

quotes.quote: If a man thinks he is not conceited, he is very conceited indeed.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The ego is the false self-born out of fear and defensiveness
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: The ego relies on the familiar. It is reluctant to experience the unknown, which is the very essence of life.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The most common ego identifications have to do with possessions, the work you do, social status and recognition, knowledge and education, physical appearance, special abilities, relationships, person and family history, belief systems, and often nationalistic, racial, religious, and other collective identifications. None of these is you.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Ego says, "Once everything falls into place, I'll feel peace." Spirit says, "Find your peace, and then everything will fall into place."
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: One realizes that human relationships are the tragic necessity of human life; that they can never be wholly satisfactory, that every ego is half the time greedily seeking them, and half the time pulling away from them.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: The secret to happiness is a small ego. And a big wallet. Good wine helps, too. But that's not really a secret, is it?
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: An average man is egoistic, proud and has strong self-esteem.They always require partners who massage their ego not those who will drag their ego to the mud.
quotes.author: Agu Jaachynma N. E.

quotes.quote: The more you can have control over your ego rather than let it run amuck, the more successful you'll be in all areas of life.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The ego’s relation to the id might be compared to that of a rider to his horse. The horse supplies the locomotive energy, while the rider has the privilege of deciding on the goal and of guiding the powerful animal’s movement.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: We understand the ego as the complex factor to which all conscious contents are related. It forms, as it were, the centre of the field of consciousness; and, in so far as this comprises the empirical personality, the ego is the subject of all personal acts of consciousness. The relation of a psychic content to the ego forms the criterion of its consciousness, for no content can be conscious until it is represented to a subject.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: I once found an ego, crawling around and trying to shine on me. I took it in my arms and the ego turned itself into a virus. First it took over my mind , then my heart, and finally, it attempted to destroy my soul, by corrupting me with fear and guilt. Therefore, with as much energy as I could gather, I trapped the ego within my anger and pulled it out of me.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: I like to dress egos. If you haven't got an ego today, you can forget it.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: You believe your opinions,- you believe your judgments,- you believe your emotions. And these beliefs become your ego— but this ego is not you.
quotes.author: Ezra Bayda

quotes.quote: Whenever I climb I am followed by a dog called 'Ego'.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Once you let go nothing dies, only the ego. You remain for ever and ever.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Ego is just like a dust in the eyes... without clearing the dust you can't see anything clearly... so clear the ego and see the world.
quotes.author: Sukh Sandhu

quotes.quote: Analysis does not set out to make pathological reactions impossible, but to give the patient's ego freedom to decide one way or another.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Only in your ego are you alone.
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.quote: Ego; "E" for excellence, "G" for greatness, and "O" for "Oh, I'm so good!"
quotes.author: Artie Smalls

quotes.quote: Ego death is where you find happiness / That's the only place you find happiness... / I let my ego down and then I rise back up / I let my ego down and then I'll be stronger.
quotes.author: Craig Ritchie Allan; Jahmal Gwin; Jason Brunton; etal.

quotes.quote: Your ego you is what's eating at your heart / Your ego you is what tears me apart / And you're not who I've fallen in love with / Now tell me / What's running through your veins? / That got the ego you / Taking control of you.
quotes.author: Madeline Obrigewitsch and Dave Roth

quotes.quote: Inflate my ego gently / Go tell them heaven sent me / Oh cause I'm so expressive / And I'm so obsessed / With my ego, my ego / And its message to inform the press / invite the guests I need the press tonight.
quotes.author: Bernie Taupin and Elton John

quotes.quote: Ego is an impostor pretending to be real. / Ego is a charlatan / with quackery appeal. / Ego is a pseudonym for an impious state. / Ego is sacrilegious / to mock and imitate. / Ego is duplicity with "doubleness" of thought. / Ego is double-dealer / leaving many distraught. / Ego is a hypocrite who's sanctimonious. / Ego is a deceiver / who's disingenuous. / Ego is a "Robin Hood" using a poison dart. / Ego is a thespian / of histrionic art. / Ego is a basilisk of mythical report. / Ego is a hippogriff / without a life support.
quotes.author: Wallace Dean LaBenne

quotes.quote: Fear stokes that mighty, wretched ego, / Blame to wear suffering's glorious crown; / Hatred's bowels, bellows the flames of blame, / Anger's rage to beat the humble spirit down.
quotes.author: Gabriel McBride

quotes.quote: Egotistical people are not pretty. We all know that, I'm sure everybody knows an egotistical person someplace.
quotes.author: Joan Jett

quotes.quote: One is not necessarily made self-centered because he is foolish, but one is very often made foolish because he is self-centered.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: A sort of egotistical self-evaluation is unavoidable in those joys in which erudition and art mingle and in which aesthetic pleasure may become more acute, but not remain as pure.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: You are happiest when you are most humble. You are most miserable when you are egotistical.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Oh, believe me. The greatest egos are those which are too egotistical to show just how egotistical they are.
quotes.author: William Inge

quotes.quote: Happiness is egotistical.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: There's something ever egotistical in mountain tops and towers, and all things grand and lofty.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Never be late. When you're late, what you're saying is that your time is more important than the other person's time. That's pretty egotistical.
quotes.author: Alice Cooper

quotes.quote: Loneliness is the price we have to pay for being born in this modern age, so full of freedom, independence, and our own egotistical selves.
quotes.author: Soseki Natsume

quotes.quote: The more self-centered and egotistical a guy is, the better ballplayer he's going to be.
quotes.author: Bill Lee

quotes.quote: If you are not egotistical, you will welcome the opportunity to learn more.
quotes.author: John Templeton

quotes.quote: All artists are egotistical maniacs with inferiority complexes.
quotes.author: Lionel Richie

quotes.quote: Nobility is often no more than the inner aspect which our egotistical feelings assume when we have not yet named and classified them.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives. Do good anyway.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The egotistical ambition to always want to earn more money harms both the company and the individual himself. That is the biggest weakness of many managers â€“ the financial crisis has proven this.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: Egoistical opinion that a man is the king of nature was created by the man himself, so he can justify his wrong decisions.
quotes.author: Ruben Papian

quotes.quote: Humility is, in a sense, admitting how egotistical you are.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: There's only one rule you need to remember: laugh at everything and foget everybody else! It sound egotistical, but it's actually the only cure for those suffering from self-pity.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: You have to love yourself, not in an egotistical way, but if you love yourself, everyone else will love you.
quotes.author: Michelle Mone

quotes.quote: There's a tendency, especially among academics, to see politics as deeply dirty and deeply egotistical.
quotes.author: Zephyr Teachout

quotes.quote: It is not arrogant or egotistical to feel good inside. You had nothing to do with it. It's simply the honest response to clearly perceived Reality.
quotes.author: Erich Schiffmann

quotes.quote: It's just too egotistical to think that we are the only lifeform in the universe.
quotes.author: Kathleen Quinlan

quotes.quote: The unfortunate are always egotistical.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: We have self-centered minds which get us into plenty of trouble. If we do not come to understand the error in the way we think, our self-awareness, which is our greatest blessing, is also our downfall.
quotes.author: Joko Beck

quotes.quote: It's self-centered to think that human beings, as limited as we are, can describe divinity.
quotes.author: John Templeton

quotes.quote: Too many people, when they get old, think that they have to live by the calendar.
quotes.author: John Glenn

quotes.quote: The tragedy of old age is not that one is old, but that one is young.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Do not try to live forever, you will not succeed.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The wiser mind mourns less for what age takes away than what it leaves behind.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The glory of the elderly is their insight to life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The old are in a second childhood.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: Never tease an old dog; he might have one bite left.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Nature gives you the face you have at twenty; it is up to you to merit the face you have at fifty.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Age should not have its face lifted, but it should rather teach the world to admire wrinkles as the etchings of experience and the firm line of character.
quotes.author: Ralph B. Perry

quotes.quote: You can only perceive real beauty in a person as they get older.
quotes.author: Anouk Aimee

quotes.quote: Old age is ready to undertake tasks that youth shirked because they would take too long.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: It doesn't behoove elderly persons to follow fashion in their thinking nor in the way they dress.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Old age hath yet his honour and his toil.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: The way the elderly are treated, and in some cases warehoused and medicated, rather than nurtured and listened to, is distressing.
quotes.author: Bill Nighy

quotes.quote: Old age is the most unexpected of all the things that can happen to a man.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: The elderly have so much to offer. They're our link with history.
quotes.author: John Cusack

quotes.quote: He thought that the world would make more rapid progress without the burden of old people.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: You can live to be a hundred if you give up all the things that make you want to live to be a hundred.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Live your life and forget your age.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Youth cannot know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: As we grow older, we must discipline ourselves to continue expanding, broadening, learning, keeping out minds active and open.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: You are as young as your faith, as old as your doubt; as young as your self-confidence, as old as your fear; as young as your hope, as old as your despair.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: None are so old as those who have outlived enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: One of the things you realize about gettin older is that not everybody is goin to get older with you.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: They only name things after you when you're dead or really old.
quotes.author: George H. W. Bush

quotes.quote: To know how to grow old is the master work of wisdom, and one of the most difficult chapters in the great art of living.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: By the time you're eighty years old you've learned everything. You only have to remember it.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: We are not limited by our old ages; we are liberated by it.
quotes.author: Stu Mittleman

quotes.quote: About the only thing that comes without effort is old age.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: By the time you're eighty years old you've learned everything. You only have to remember it.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Age is a matter of feeling, not of years.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.quote: Getting older was definitely preferable to an up close and personal meeting with the Grim Reaper.
quotes.author: JoAnn Ross

quotes.quote: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: You don't have a little time for your elderly parents. Most of you ignore and even forget your parents.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: For, in spite of our whiskers, we elderly friskers are kiddies the most of our time.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote:
By the side of a murmuring stream, an elderly gentleman sat.
On the top of his head was a wig, and a-top of his wig was his hat.
quotes.author: George Canning

quotes.quote: I would prioritise an Elderly Person that needs to be looked after.
quotes.author: Rob Hopkin

quotes.quote: The elderly are often isolated, voiceless, powerlessness. The elderly are often more trusting.
quotes.author: Neil Edwards

quotes.quote: A little respect for the elderly.
quotes.author: Guy Andrews

quotes.quote: Language sound very strange to elderly ears.
quotes.author: George Callahan

quotes.quote: Well, despite our elderliness, some things remain from our youth.
quotes.author: Liz W. Garcia

quotes.quote: Caring for an elderly parent, that's a - that's an awesome responsibility.
quotes.author: Gary David Goldberg

quotes.quote: It is a culture's duty to take care of it's elderly.
quotes.author: Theodore Melfi

quotes.quote: You two need to learn some respect for the elderly. And I'm gonna teach you.
quotes.author: Haim Saban

quotes.quote: Love, care and treasure the elderly people in the society.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Elections are not a beauty contest. It is all about tolerance.
quotes.author: Vladimir Franz

quotes.quote: Every election is a sort of advance auction sale of stolen goods.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Free election of masters does not abolish the masters or the slaves.
quotes.author: Herbert Marcuse

quotes.quote: Winning or losing of the election is less important than strengthening the country.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: The people who cast the votes decide nothing. The people who count the votes decide everything.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: If voting made any difference they wouldn't let us do it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: An election is a moral horror, as bad as a battle except for the blood; a mud bath for every soul concerned in it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Leadership is not about the next election, it's about the next generation.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: People never lie so much as after a hunt, during a war or before an election.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: Clever and attractive women do not want to vote; they are willing to let men govern as long as they govern men
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: This election could come down to just a handful of votes. It could come down to just one vote.
quotes.author: Vicky Hartzler

quotes.quote: The election is not very far off when a candidate can recognize you across the street.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: An election is coming. Universal peace is declared, and the foxes have a sincere interest in prolonging the lives of the poultry.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Elections belong to the people. It's their decision. If they decide to turn their back on the fire and burn their behinds, then they will just have to sit on their blisters.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: In an election, one needs both hope and audacity.
quotes.author: Francois Hollande

quotes.quote: We elected a man who knows how to build walls when we needed someone who knows how to build bridges.
quotes.author: DaShanne Stokes

quotes.quote: Elections determine who is in power, but they do not determine how power is used.
quotes.author: Paul Collier

quotes.quote: In elections, the undecided vote is usually the deciding factor.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: In elections, you can't tell the outcome until you open the ballot boxes.
quotes.author: Katsuya Okada

quotes.quote: To finalize, the purpose of an election is to hear the will of the people, not to fabricate votes.
quotes.author: Lincoln Diaz-Balart

quotes.quote: During an election campaign the air is full of speeches and vice versa.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Elections are about the future.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.quote: We deserve elections we can trust.
quotes.author: Jill Stein

quotes.quote: An election cannot give a country a firm sense of direction if it has two or more national parties which merely have different names, but are as alike in their principals and aims as two peas in the same pod.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: An election is an opportunity for a new consensus.
quotes.author: Martin O'Malley

quotes.quote: The right of election is the very essence of the constitution.
quotes.author: Junius

quotes.quote: If elections really changed anything, they would be outlawed.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: People are what this election is all about.
quotes.author: Patty Berg

quotes.quote: Every election is determined by the people who show up.
quotes.author: Larry J. Sabato

quotes.quote: You cannot win an election without a fight.
quotes.author: Tony Abbott

quotes.quote: A politician thinks of the next election. A statesman, of the next generation.
quotes.author: James Freeman Clarke

quotes.quote: Politics resemble religion; attempting to divest either of ceremony is the most certain mode of bringing either into contempt.
quotes.author: Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Great political questions stir the deepest nature of one half the nation; but they pass far above and over the heads of the other half.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: A politician weakly and amiably in the right is no match for a politician tenaciously and pugnaciously in the wrong.
quotes.author: Whipple

quotes.quote: We go by the major vote, and if the majority are insane, the sane must go to the hospital.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: The universe would not be rich enough to buy the vote of an honest man.
quotes.author: St. Gregory

quotes.quote: The men I am afraid of are the men who believe everything, subscribe to everything, and vote for everything.
quotes.author: Bishop Shipley

quotes.quote: We cannot, and we must not do away with democracy at any level. For democracy is not merely political institution. It is a way of life.
quotes.author: Bidhan Nagar

quotes.quote: Election, lest it be realized, is just the beginning of democracy.
quotes.author: Bidhan Nagar

quotes.quote: Voters are not a common mass of men and women. They belong to so many distinctive functional groups with diverse and often conflicting interests.
quotes.author: Bidhan Nagar

quotes.quote: Always vote for principle, though you may vote alone, and you may cherish the sweetest reflection that your vote is never lost.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: To vote is like the payment of a debt, a duty never to be neglected, if its performance is possible.
quotes.author: Rutherford B. Hayes

quotes.quote: He who uses the office he owes to the voters wrongfully and against them is a thief.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: Some people including colonists who founded America think voting is the most important right a citizen of a democracy can have. Yet when America was founded, only white male landowners age twenty-one and over had the right to vote.
quotes.author: Susan Buckley

quotes.quote: It's not the voting that's democracy, it's the counting.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Democracy substitutes election by the incompetent many for appointment by the corrupt few.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: When you turn an election into a three-ring circus, there’s always a chance that the dancing bear will win.
quotes.author: Nancy Isenberg

quotes.quote: Contrary to popular opinion, leadership is not a reserved position for a particular group of people who were elected or appointed, ordained or enthroned. Leadership is self-made, self-retained, self-inculcated and then exposed through a faithful, sincere and exemplary life.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: It is morally permissible to sell one's vote to another person such that the seller acquires another vote.
quotes.author: Jason Brennan

quotes.quote: Philosophers believe that we have a duty not merely to vote but to vote well.
quotes.author: Jason Brennan

quotes.quote: Citizens typically have no duty to vote. However, if citizens do vote, they must vote well, on the basis of sound evidence for what is likely to promote the common good.
quotes.author: Jason Brennan

quotes.quote: Citizens who lack the motive, knowledge, rationality, or ability to vote well should abstain from voting.
quotes.author: Jason Brennan

quotes.quote: Having the right to vote is important, even if it is not always important to exercise that right.
quotes.author: Jason Brennan

quotes.quote: The popular wisdom is that voting is a freedom that citizens have a right to exercise or not to exercise.
quotes.author: Julia Maskivker

quotes.quote: It is common to encounter the belief that democracy affords us the freedom to have our voice heard. It also offers us the freedom not to care about being heard.
quotes.author: Julia Maskivker

quotes.quote: When members of a group of people each make a choice and each person's choice is counted, that's voting.
quotes.author: Kristen Rajczak Nelson

quotes.quote: You may have voted by simply raising your hand in class to pick what move to watch.
quotes.author: Kristen Rajczak Nelson

quotes.quote: Some TV shows let fans call in, text or visit a website to vote for winners each week.
quotes.author: Kristen Rajczak Nelson

quotes.quote: Voting contributes to a collective outcome, rather than affecting us purely as individuals.
quotes.author: Jocelyn A J Evans

quotes.quote: Even in the most anodyne of situations, voting matters.
quotes.author: Jocelyn A J Evans

quotes.quote: Elections belong to the people. It's their decision. If they decide to turn their back on the fire and burn their behinds, then they will just have to sit on their blisters.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: My start in politics was watching my parents go to the polls on election day. It reminded me that being an active, engaged citizen and voter is critical to the success of our democracy.
quotes.author: Josh Earnest

quotes.quote: I think that Election Day is the closest thing we have to a civic sacrament, when people meet their neighbors at the firehouse or the school and they vote at the same time.
quotes.author: Judy Woodruff

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is Election Day. That's the day we Americans wake up, consider our options, and then remember we didn't register to vote.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: If an election is simply a one-day snapshot of transient mass delusions, then this is not a very noble form of government.
quotes.author: James Bovard

quotes.quote: It is a paradox that far too few Americans participate in the wonderful ritual of democracy that we call Election Day.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: The people we need to hear from most are the ones who make themselves heard least - except, of course, on Election Day.
quotes.author: Bret Stephens

quotes.quote: The political process does not end on Election Day. Young people need to stay involved in the process by continuing to pay attention to the conversation and holding their leaders accountable for the decisions they make.
quotes.author: Patrick Murphy

quotes.quote: Election Day outside of big cities is different. For one thing, there are so few people in my town that each individual vote really does matter, and several local races have been decided by as many votes as you can count on one hand.
quotes.author: Susan Orlean

quotes.quote: Voters have a responsibility to make a judgment with whatever facts are available on Election Day.
quotes.author: Zephyr Teachout

quotes.quote: The poll that matters is the one that happens on Election Day.
quotes.author: Heather Wilson

quotes.quote: Elections determine who is in power, but they do not determine how power is used.
quotes.author: Paul Collier

quotes.quote: As is the case with that generation [Millennials], they look like they're interested and all fired up and ready to go, and then Election Day comes.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: Republicans are relentless and they're smart, too - they're not all dumb - and on Election Day, they'll be up at five in the morning.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.quote: There is only one opinion poll that I am interested in and that is the one that will take place on election day.
quotes.author: Michael Howard

quotes.quote: Any poll is a picture of an unfinished horse race except the Election Day polls.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: You have to knock doors, make calls, and build a relationship with voters long before Election Day.
quotes.author: Keith Ellison

quotes.quote: I think the voters believe that when you become president of the United States, you have a higher obligation and a higher standard than anybody in the world. And if you violate that standard, they're going to remember it on election day.
quotes.author: Bob Dole

quotes.quote: Since the majority is always wrong, might we try one election day where all the losers take office?
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: I can get a good doctor in a minute and a half. Getting a really good electrician - that's hard.
quotes.author: Charles Murray

quotes.quote: If lawyers are disbarred and clergymen defrocked, doesn't it follow that electricians can be delighted, musicians denoted?
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: To be honest, in my five years as an electrician, I never got the license.
quotes.author: Nick Flynn

quotes.quote: A smell of burning fills the startled air / The electrician is no longer there!
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: I think it is a mistake for any lad to do electrical work pure and simple, he should start by obtaining a thorough grounding in Mechanical Engineering and specialise afterwards if he thinks proper—really electrical matters to my mind consist of about 75% Mechanical Engineering, 20% common sense and 5% purely electrical work.
quotes.author: George Hughes

quotes.quote: I have the credit of being the inventor of the locomotive and it is true that I have done something to improve the action of steam for that purpose. But I tell you, young man, that the day will come when electricity will be the great motive power of the world.
quotes.author: George Stephenson

quotes.quote: A switchman sat in a Southern sub., / And viewed with practised eye / The metered toll, for the public needs / The "CC" load on his traction feeds, / As the "Tizzies" scuttled by. / His gaze was fixed on the panel tops / Where the well-placed flashguards showed; / The hour has struck when breakers break, / When brushes spark and panels shake, / Through the urge of an overload. / The needles crept to their peak time line, / The voltage dropped and soared, / While the Kents advance to wield their pen, / Full twenty packed in a coach for ten, / On a "P" train all aboard.
quotes.author: Percy Morris

quotes.quote: I was training to be an electrician. I supposed I got wired the wrong way round.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: I am the final silence / The last electrician alive / And they called me the sparkle / I was the best / I worked them all / New ways, new ways / I dream of wires.
quotes.author: Gary Anthony Webb

quotes.quote: If I could do what I want / I'd become an electrician / I'd climb inside my head / And I'd rearrange the wires in my brain / A different me would be inhabiting this body / Have two cars, a garage, a job / And I would go to church on Sunday.
quotes.author: Julien Baker

quotes.quote: The most embarrassing moment for an electrician was when he insipidly handed live current wires in the hands of his customer; instead of giving them the compactly molded switch.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Long hast thou borne the burden of the day, / Thy task is ended, venerable Grey! / No more shall art thy dexterous hand require, / To break the sleep of elemental fire: / To rouse the powers that actuate Nature's frame, / The momentaneous shock, th' electric flame; / The flame, which at first, weak pupil of thy lore, / I saw, condemn'd, alas! to see no more.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: If lawyers are disbarred and clergymen defrocked, doesn't it follow that electricians can be delighted, musicians denoted, cowboys deranged, models deposed, tree surgeons debarked, and dry cleaners depressed?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: There are things done today in electrical science which would have been deemed unholy by the very man who discovered electricity, who would themselves not so long before been burned as wizards.
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: Electricity is really just organized lightning.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Electricity for example was considered a very Satanic thing when it was first discovered and utilized.
quotes.author: Zeena Schreck

quotes.quote: We are more casual about qualifying the people we allow to act as advocates in the courtroom than we are about licensing electricians.
quotes.author: Warren E. Burger

quotes.quote: But it is not given to every electrician to die in so glorious a manner as the justly envied Richmann.
quotes.author: Joseph Priestley

quotes.quote: Electricians that like good health avoid the known biologically toxic very high powered electrical utility jobs.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Electricity can transform people's lives, not just economically but also socially.
quotes.author: Piyush Goyal

quotes.quote: Power which can be abused, will be abused.
quotes.author: Jim Warner

quotes.quote: We will make electricity so cheap that only the rich will burn candles.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Electricity generation emits more carbon dioxide in the United States than does transportation or industry, and nuclear power is the largest source of carbon-free electricity in the country.
quotes.author: Ernest Moniz

quotes.quote: Electricity is an example of a general purpose technology, like the steam engine before it. General purpose technologies drive most economic growth, because they unleash cascades of complementary innovations, like lightbulbs and, yes, factory redesign.
quotes.author: Erik Brynjolfsson

quotes.quote: Electricity is doing for the distribution of energy what the railroads have done for the distribution of materials.
quotes.author: Charles Proteus Steinmetz

quotes.quote: Electricity is but yet a new agent for the arts and manufactures, and, doubtless, generations unborn will regard with interest this century, in which it has been first applied to the wants of mankind.
quotes.author: Alfred Smee

quotes.quote: Electricity is really just organized lightning.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Everything is just electricity and magnetism; everything is only an illusion. The reality is in the spiritual plane.
quotes.author: Lobsang Rampa

quotes.quote: Faith is like electricity. You can't see it, but you can see the light.
quotes.author: Gregory Dickow

quotes.quote: Electricity sparked between them at the touch, and she savored the way he made her yearn. How the crush of their lips together inspired revelations.
quotes.author: Katherine McIntyre

quotes.quote: Energy is liberated matter, matter is energy waiting to happen.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: The real potential of electricity lies not in providing social amenities but in stimulating long-term economic development
quotes.author: Christopher Flavin

quotes.quote: Power always brings with it responsibility.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Electricity for example was considered a very Satanic thing when it was first discovered and utilized.
quotes.author: Zeena Schreck

quotes.quote: The electricity came on for the second time today wile we were eating. This may be a fool's paradise, but it's a paradise nonetheless.
quotes.author: Susan Beth Pfeffer

quotes.quote: Power tends to get confused with repression.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

quotes.quote: Power without authority is tyranny.
quotes.author: Jacques Maritain

quotes.quote: Electricity is derived from many non-renewable energy sources like oil, natural gas and coal.
quotes.author: Lamar S. Smith

quotes.quote: Electricity is actually made up of extremely tiny particles called electrons, that you cannot see with the naked eye unless you have been drinking.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Electricity is the power that causes all natural phenomena not known to be caused by something else
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Everything is light, everything is warmth, everything is electricity, everything is a magnetic field, everything is you.
quotes.author: L.H.

quotes.quote: Power concedes nothing without a demand. It never did and it never will.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: The price of power is responsibility for the public good.
quotes.author: Winthrop Aldrich

quotes.quote: We believe that electricity exists, because the electric company keeps sending us bills for it, but we cannot figure out how it travels inside wires.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Electricity and magnetism are those forces of nature by which people who know nothing about electricity and magnetism can explain everything.
quotes.author: Egon Friedell

quotes.quote: One of the effects of living with electric information is that we live habitually in a state of information overload. There's always more than you can cope with
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Electricity does not centralize, but decentralizes.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: The electrical matter consists of particles extremely subtile, since it can permeate common matter, even the densest metals, with such ease and freedom as not to receive any perceptible resistance.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Power is dangerous unless you have humility.
quotes.author: Richard J. Daley

quotes.quote: Electricity, the peril the wind sings to in the wires on a gray day.
quotes.author: Janet Frame

quotes.quote: Since with electricity we extend our central nervous system globally, instantly interrelating every human experience.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Only electricity can give the transport sector the flexibility to switch fuels when one or more become too expensive.
quotes.author: Frederick W Smith

quotes.quote: If it weren't for electricity, we'd all be watching television by candlelight.
quotes.author: George Gobel

quotes.quote: Love is like electricity sometimes; it may shock you anytime, yet you cannot live without it.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Why is electricity so expensive these days? Why does it cost so much for something I can make with a balloon and my hair?
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.quote: The two great agents of the physical world have become subject to the will of man and have been made subservient to his wants and enjoyments; I allude to steam and electricity, under whatever name the latter may be called.
quotes.author: John C. Calhoun

quotes.quote: I am somewhat exhausted; I wonder how a battery feels when it pours electricity into a non-conductor?
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Who would not have been laughed at if he had said in 1800 that metals could be extracted from their ores by electricity or that portraits could be drawn by chemistry.
quotes.author: Michael Faraday

quotes.quote: We're electrical items and when we die the electricity goes somewhere else. When we die our energy goes into the galaxy.
quotes.author: Dominic Monaghan

quotes.quote: All the rest of the world uses the word electricity. They've borrowed the word from English. But we Chinese have our own word for it!
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Every age thinks it's the modern age, but this one really is. Electricity is going to change everything. Everything!
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: People always fear change. People feared electricity when it was invented, didn't they?
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Alternate currents, especially of high frequencies, pass with astonishing freedom through even slightly rarefied gases. The upper strata of the air are rarefied. To reach a number of miles out into space requires the overcoming of difficulties of a merely mechanical nature.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: Wonderful as are the laws... of electricity when made evident to us in inorganic... matter, their interest can bear scarcely any comparison... when connected with the nervous system and with life.
quotes.author: Michael Faraday

quotes.quote: Is it a fact—or have I dreamt it—that, by means of electricity, the world of matter has become a great nerve, vibrating thousands of miles in a breathless point of time?
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: The new electronic interdependence recreates the world in the image of a global village.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Energy is eternal delight.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Electricity is the soul of the universe.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: Thomas Edison said that genius is 1 percent inspiration and 99 percent perspiration. I dunno. I hate to think of anyone that sweaty handling electricity.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: By 2600, the world population would be standing shoulder to shoulder and the electricity consumed would make the earth glow red-hot.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: In going on with these experiments, how many pretty systems do we build, which we soon find ourselves obliged to destroy! If there is no other use discovered of electricity, this, however, is something considerable, that it may help to make a vain man humble.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: As in nature, all is ebb and tide, all is wave motion, so it seems that in all branches of industry, alternating currents—electric wave motion—will have the sway.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: We wind a simple ring of iron with coils; we establish the connections to the generator, and with wonder and delight we note the effects of strange forces which we bring into play, which allow us to transform, to transmit and direct energy at will.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: We're so used to circumstances in which these electrical phenomena are all canceled out, everything is sort of neutral, where pushing and pulling is sort of dull, but nature has these wonderful things: magnetic forces and electrical forces.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: Science takes a Niagara River with its violent turbulence and transforms it into electrical energy to illuminate a million homes and to turn the productive wheels of industry. [God] does in the spiritual realm what science does in the physical realm.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Electricity is no longer a luxury. It is a definite necessity. It lights our homes, our places of work and our streets. It turns the wheels of most of our transportation and our factories. In our homes it serves not only for light, but it can become the willing servant of the family in countless ways. It can relieve the drudgery of the housewife and lift the great burden off the shoulders of the hardworking farmer.
quotes.author: Franklin Delano Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Without electricity, modern life would grind to a halt and the complexity of modern society is such that if you take out one or two little pieces of the jigsaw, the whole thing collapses.
quotes.author: Lord Arbuthnot

quotes.quote: Electric power is everywhere present in unlimited quantities and can drive the world's machinery without the need of coal, oil, or any other fuel.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: We live in a world full of meta-phones and meta-weathervanes. What's next? My electric toothbrush?
quotes.author: Iris West-Allen

quotes.quote: They say an elephant never forgets. What they don't tell you is, you never forget an elephant.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: The elephant is never won by anger; nor must that man who would reclaim a lion take him by the teeth.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Nature's great masterpiece, an elephant; the only harmless great thing.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: They say that somewhere in Africa the elephants have a secret grave where they go to lie down, unburden their wrinkled gray bodies, and soar away, light spirits at the end.
quotes.author: Robert McCammon

quotes.quote: No one in the world needs an elephant tusk but an elephant.
quotes.author: Thomas Schmidt

quotes.quote: I have a memory like an elephant. I remember every elephant I've ever met.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.quote: Th' unwieldy elephant, To make them mirth, us'd all his might, and wreathed His lithe proboscis.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Only elephants should own ivory.
quotes.author: Yao Ming

quotes.quote: If anyone wants to know what elephants are like, they are like people only more so.
quotes.author: Peter Corneille

quotes.quote: I have a memory like an elephant. In fact, elephants often consult me.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: An elephant: A mouse built to government specifications.
quotes.author: Lazarus Long

quotes.quote: You don't shoot elephants, you ride them–you might as well shoot your charger.
quotes.author: King George V

quotes.quote: She owned the road as an elephant owns the veldt and like a big blue elephant moved with massive grace and dignity.
quotes.author: David Drake

quotes.quote: A novelist is an elephant, but an elephant who must pretend to forget.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: When eating an elephant take one bite at a time.
quotes.author: Creighton Abrams

quotes.quote: My roommate got a pet elephant. Then it got lost. It's in the apartment somewhere.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If size mattered, the elephant would be the king of the jungle.
quotes.author: Rickson Gracie

quotes.quote: When there is an invisible elephant in the room, one is from time to time bound to trip over a trunk.
quotes.author: Karen Joy Fowler

quotes.quote: An Elephant can trumpet and shake the earth but not the self-possession of the ants who hold it.
quotes.author: Alistair Cooke

quotes.quote: As an elephant in the battlefield withstands arrows shot from bows all around, even so shall I endure abuse.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.quote: Awake. Be the witness of your thoughts. The elephant hauls himself from the mud. In the same way drag yourself out of your sloth.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Elephants love reunions. They recognize one another after years and years of separation and greet each other with wild, boisterous joy. There's bellowing and trumpeting, ear flapping and rubbing. Trunks entwine.
quotes.author: Jennifer Richard Jacobson

quotes.quote: Our elders say that an elephant does not find its own trunk heavy.
quotes.author: Zakes Mda

quotes.quote: He frowned as he struggled to remember. It was like watching an elephant crochet.
quotes.author: Val McDermid

quotes.quote: He who mounts a wild elephant goes where the elephant goes.
quotes.author: Randolph Bourne

quotes.quote: Just in case you thought elephants were all sweetness, I can attest to the fact that this one had the time of her life scaring the bejeezus out of those dudes.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: When you have got an Elephant by the hind leg, and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: When there's an elephant in the room introduce him.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Elephants don't know anything about the world of ants; the peaks of mountains are oblivious of what is happening on the plains!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The elephant, the huge old beast, is slow to mate.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: Elephants ears are full of blood vessels and help cool the blood as it travels through the extensive vein network that runs close to the surface.
quotes.author: Jeff Henschel

quotes.quote: They couldn't hit an elephant at this distance.
quotes.author: General John B. Sedgwick

quotes.quote: I'm an elephant today. I will need to have lots of room and also a bowl of water on the floor.
quotes.author: Jesse Ball

quotes.quote: Mediocrity is the elephant in the room.
quotes.author: Kevin Spacey

quotes.quote: The knife flaying the elephant does not have to be large, only sharp!
quotes.author: Andre Norton

quotes.quote: The elephant has just one basic gait: an ambling walk; elephants cannot run or jump like other animals.
quotes.author: Richard D. Estes

quotes.quote: The elephant's a gentleman.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: So slowly the hot elephant hearts grow full of desire, and the great beasts mate in secret at last, hiding their fire.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: When we are hungry, elephants are food. When we are full, elephants are beautiful.
quotes.author: Edward R. Ricciuti

quotes.quote: It was an exceedingly odd thing to see an elephant in a spacesuit.
quotes.author: Alastair Reynolds

quotes.quote: Elephants, it turns out, are surprisingly stealthy.
quotes.author: Thomas French

quotes.quote: Words are cheap. The biggest thing you can say is 'elephant'.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: What is bigger than an elephant? But this also is become man's plaything, and a spectacle at public solemnities; and it learns to skip, dance, and kneel.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: It was an elephant. Cause elephants bring good luck, especially if the trunks are up and his trunk was up.
quotes.author: Dale Kerrigan

quotes.quote: The elephant can survive only if forests survive.
quotes.author: Mark Shand

quotes.quote: The Indian Elephant is said sometimes to weep.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Elephants can sense danger. They're able to detect an approaching tsunami or earthquake before it hits.
quotes.author: Jennifer Richard Jacobson

quotes.quote: A chain as thick as a palm tree cannot stop an elephant; the vine that proposes to stop the elephant from going to the grassland will go with the elephant.
quotes.author: Oyekan Owomoyela

quotes.quote: One digs a pit in the path of the elephant, but the elephant can read signs; the elephant does not go that way.
quotes.author: Oyekan Owomoyela

quotes.quote: A blind elephant does not know a man from a tree.
quotes.author: Oyekan Owomoyela

quotes.quote: While you sit on an elephant you will be able to break through your neighbor's hedge.
quotes.author: Stephen Arnott

quotes.quote: She's big and friendly (Elephant!) Wrinkled and gray (Elephant!) / And with her great big feet, better get out of the way of the elephant (Elephant!)
quotes.author: Lory J Lazarus

quotes.quote: Sitting on my elephant / Pretty and intelligent / Na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na / Gonna take a ride that you won't forget.
quotes.author: Robin Rex

quotes.quote: Holabaloo, my elephant's jumping / Up and down from side to side / Holabaloo, my elephant's pumping / Elephant ride all over the town / Holabaloo, my elephant's jumping / Inside-out, moving up and down / Holabaloo, my elephant's pumping / Elephant ride in Calcutta town.
quotes.author: Robin Rex

quotes.quote: Look out! Look out / Pink elephants on parade / Here they come / Hippety hoppety / They're here and there / Pink elephants everywhere.
quotes.author: Oliver Wallace

quotes.quote: The elephant, the huge old beast, is slow to mate; / He finds a female, they show no haste they wait.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: A true elephant is the one who never forgets his Herculean strength; / the astounding power that reverberated from his body as he strolled; / even in times when he lay timidly wounded on the ground.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: All I want is a wild elephant; which swishes tones of water merrily all around with its trunk.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Never ever enter into the brain of the elephant; / or you'll suddenly find yourself a lugubriously disoriented burden to earth; / emanating an infinite groans to just alight your foot an inconspicuous inch from the soil.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: To emulate an elephant was very easy; / as all you had to do was inflate your persona like a colossal gas balloon; / tread triumphantly on the soil of the jungle as the largest organism existing in the rampant outgrowths.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Elephants are enslaved ensnared endangered exploited / Elephants are exterminated / They're eradicated / Elephants are eaten / Elephants are forgotten / Fatally forgotten famished fossils / Elephants are gone.
quotes.author: William Scott Bruford

quotes.quote: The elephant needs a thousand times more food than the ant but that is not an indication of inequality.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Elephants have the largest brains of any mammal on the face of the Earth. They are creative, altruistic and kind.
quotes.author: Ingrid Newkirk

quotes.quote: Elephants are so wise and so funny and so endangered and so intelligent. I just think there is a lot to learn from them.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: And the elephant sings deep in the forest-maze About a star of deathless and painless peace But no astronomer can find where it is.
quotes.author: Ted Hughes

quotes.quote: Although elephants are far more distantly related to us than the great apes, they seem to have evolved similar social and cognitive capacities.
quotes.author: Frans De Waal

quotes.quote: Elephants love to play around. They are very intelligent animals. They have a strong bond, at times stretching to several decades, with their mahouts.
quotes.author: Mark Shand

quotes.quote: If elephants didn't exist, you couldn't invent one. They belong to a small group of living things so unlikely they challenge credulity and common sense.
quotes.author: Lyall Watson

quotes.quote: Stairs elevate you; ethics elevates you; goodness elevates you; awareness elevates you; wisdom elevates you.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Seeking higher ground is not a destination, but an elevation. Wings up, eyes shut open.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Separation before elevation. You have to let some people and things go so you can go to the next level.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: Elevate. Each day, live to elevate yourself, each day elevate one person. Make elevation your religion and you shall reach infinity.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: There is a kind of elevation which does not depend on fortune; it is a certain air which distinguishes us, and seems to destine us for great things; it is a price which we imperceptibly yet upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rocherfoucauld

quotes.quote: While fear depletes power, faith gives wings for the soul’s elevation.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: I like anything that is thought provoking and elevates one's consciousness to the highest and out of it's safety net, making one breathe aspiration.
quotes.author: Petra Remes

quotes.quote: The first shall be the last. Humiliation precedes elevation.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Our elevation must be the result of self-efforts and work of our own hands. No other human power can accomplish it. If we but determine it shall be so, it will be so.
quotes.author: Martin Delany

quotes.quote: The true grandeur of humanity is in moral elevation, sustained, enlightened and decorated by the intellect of man.
quotes.author: Charles Sumner

quotes.quote: I think that if you have a sense of the sacredness of nature and of human relations, I think you will be uplifted in some sort of spiritual elevation.
quotes.author: Eugene Green

quotes.quote: Encountering sufferings will definitely contribute to the elevation of your spiritual practice, provided you are able to transform calamity and misfortune into the path.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Sometimes what appears to be a setback is God's mode of elevation.
quotes.author: Roderick L. Evans

quotes.quote: When emulation leads us to strive for self-elevation by merit alone, and not by belittling another, then it is one of the grandest possible incentives to action.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Merit has rarely risen of itself, but a pebble or a twig is often quite sufficient for it to spring from to the highest ascent. There is usually some baseness before there is any elevation.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: There is no real elevation of mind in a contempt of little things; it is, on the contrary, from too narrow views that we consider those things of little importance which have in fact such extensive consequences.
quotes.author: François Fénelon

quotes.quote: Eat not to dullness; drink not to elevation.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
