quotes.quote: Only passions, great passions can elevate the soul to great things.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Your elevation is definite. The time for it, not really. You are the infinite. The time for realization, not guaranteed.
quotes.author: Namita Satija

quotes.quote: The elevation of appearance over substance, of celebrity over character, of short term gains over lasting achievement displays a poverty of ambition. It distracts you from what’s truly important.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Most of the luxuries, and many of the so-called comforts of life are not only indispensible, but positive hindrances to the elevation of mankind.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Even the juncture in history and the zeitgeist we live in is something we choose, setting the scene for the spiritual fodder we need to grow and achieve deeper elevation of our souls.
quotes.author: Raquel Cepeda

quotes.quote: You can cease to be influenced by people who tease you... Just neglect their help and elevate your steps...You can do it!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Discipline is a fast track to elevation in life.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Failure is not the time of rejection, but is the time of our next challenge of elevation.
quotes.author: S Roses S

quotes.quote: Once I buried my fear I got my elevation.
quotes.author: Ingenious

quotes.quote: The art which is grand and yet simple is that which presupposes the greatest elevation both in artist and in public.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Having influence is not about elevating self, but about lifting others.
quotes.author: Sheri Dew

quotes.quote: The limitless loving devotion to God, and the gift God makes of Himself to you, are the highest elevation of which the heart is capable; it is the highest degree of prayer. The souls that have reached this point are truly the heart of the Church.
quotes.author: Edith Stein

quotes.quote: What wealth is it to have such friends that we cannot think of them without elevation.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Humility forms the basis of honor, just as the low ground forms the foundation of a high elevation.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Vision without power does bring moral elevation but cannot give a lasting culture.
quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.quote: Honor is the currency of elevation.
quotes.author: Pastor John Gray

quotes.quote: The principal advantage of a democracy, is a general elevation in the character of the people.
quotes.author: James Fenimore Cooper

quotes.quote: Nothing contributes more to nourish elevation of sentiments in a people, than the large and free character of their habitations.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: The cigar-box which the European calls a 'lift' needs but to be compared with our elevators to be appreciated. The lift stops to reflect between floors. That is alright in a hearse, but not in elevators. The American elevator acts like a man's patent purge—it works.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: People waiting for an elevator don't know what to do, standing with strangers. There is nothing to do. Its an uneasy time. Some press the button repeatedly as though it would help.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Everyone should be able to do one card trick, tell two jokes, and recite three poems, in case they are ever trapped in an elevator.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: I hate getting off the elevator on the wrong floor. Anyone ever do that... and then you have to turn around and face those people. I feel like I owe everyone in there an explanation.
quotes.author: Brian Regan

quotes.quote: Usually, the energy in elevators is so awkward; I mean, I can't imagine the politics in the ones in the Conde Nast building.
quotes.author: Marco Brambilia

quotes.quote: A sofa on an elevator would be like a slow roller coaster where you get to work on your small talk skills. Oh yes, I am an adrenaline junky.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Now, finally has the elevator arrived. The stairs was about to become a personal inferno.
quotes.author: Anders Zorn

quotes.quote: Okay, okay, okay. I understood that pushing the elevator button over and over again would not make the elevator appear sooner. But I couldn't help myself.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: After seeing 'Big,' I wanted an elevator that opened directly into my apartment, just like Tom Hanks did.
quotes.author: Macaulay Culkin

quotes.quote: I was born in an elevator, and - as my mother said - naturally it was going down. She said, All I remember is telling your father, ‘That's it! Never again!' That's why I'm an only child.
quotes.author: Jack Lemmon

quotes.quote: Why are people getting on elevators shocked to find people getting off elevators?
quotes.author: Brian Regan

quotes.quote: John, you say you met in an elevator. Was the elevator going up at the time, or down? This is very important, for going down in an elevator one always has that sinking feeling and for all I know you may have this confused with love. If you were going up, it is clearly a case of love at first sight.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: It might not be rational, but I am terrified of getting stuck in an elevator with a bear.
quotes.author: Dana Gould

quotes.quote: Had the perfect opportunity to get back at the guy who didn't hold the elevator for me. I couldn't do it. Held it. I'm going to heaven.
quotes.author: Christian Serratos

quotes.quote: When you get to the top, don't forget to send the elevator down for the next guy.
quotes.author: Stan Kenton

quotes.quote: It pays off in your life when you’re in an elevator and people are uncomfortable. You can just say, ‘That’s a beautiful scarf.’ It’s just thinking about making someone else feel comfortable. You don’t worry about yourself, because we’re vibrating together. If I can make yours just a little bit groovier, it’ll affect me. It comes back, somehow.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: The elevator shaft was a kind of heat sink. Hot food was cold by the time it arrived. Cold food got colder. No one knew what would happen to ice cream, but it would probably involve some rewriting of the laws of thermodynamics.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Happiness is being stuck in an elevator and discovering the ravishing blonde with you is a liquor salesman with a case of samples.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Elevators are brilliant. I'm going to stand here a little longer. The good thing about riding in an elevator as a grown-up is that nobody questions my being in the elevator. Nobody suspects me of just riding the elevator. I look like I'm one of the others.
quotes.author: Erlend Loe

quotes.quote: The next time you and somebody are in an elevator alone, give them the creepiest stare followed by the creepiest smile ever. While they're leaving, give them a crazy laugh and say, 'It was a meet to pleasure you'.
quotes.author: Dan Cummins

quotes.quote: Standing facing the door in an elevator and pretending you're the only person there, no matter how crowded it is.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: If you die in an elevator, be sure to push the up button.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Never run for an elevator. It looks needy.
quotes.author: Timothy Hurley

quotes.quote: When you open the elevator on the top floor of a building and the other guy doesn't get out, something is seriously wrong.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: I'm afraid of elevators, because they are an enclosed space, but I get in.
quotes.author: Amanda Lindhout

quotes.quote: Every time I get in an elevator, the operator says the same thing to me: `Basement?'
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Now, I had been frightened on several different occasions in my life. The most frightening of these involved an elevator and a mime.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: If one elevator button has a star on it, I'm pressing it.
quotes.author: B.J. Novak

quotes.quote: Slow elevator rides with strangers are so awkward.
quotes.author: Kendall Jenner

quotes.quote: Certain things make me anxious. God forbid I get stuck in an elevator.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Vargas

quotes.quote: Never take an elevator in city hall.
quotes.author: Harvey Milk

quotes.quote: Elite is not a bad word, it's an aspirational one.
quotes.author: Aaron Sorkin

quotes.quote: A "racist" thinks themselves better than other races. An "elitist" thinks they are better than everyone.
quotes.author: A.E. Samaan

quotes.quote: Long live the elite rower's motto:'early to bed, early to rise, never meet the regular guys.
quotes.author: Brad Alan Lewis

quotes.quote: If life is not a continuum, from conception to natural death, then all of us are potential victims if we fall out of favor with a ruling elite.
quotes.author: Cal Thomas

quotes.quote: There are some among the so-called elite who are overbearing and arrogant. I want to foster leaders, not elitists.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: The elite isn't leading anymore. It's trapped.
quotes.author: David Frum

quotes.quote: Liberalism is not fond of fun, or at least of many forms of fun that many people like.
quotes.author: George F. Will

quotes.quote: No greater mistake can be made than to assume that newspapers are correct indices of public opinion.
quotes.author: Harold Holzer

quotes.quote: We must confront the privileged elite who have destroyed a large part of the world.
quotes.author: Hugo Chavez

quotes.quote: Success is not only for the elite. Success is there for those who want it, plan for it, and take action to achieve it.
quotes.author: Jim Brown

quotes.quote: Language does not make one an elite.
quotes.author: Irrfan Khan

quotes.quote: Socialism simply substitutes the judgment of the individual with the judgment of a few arrogant elites, not so dissimilar to slave owners.
quotes.author: Kathy Barnette

quotes.quote: In today’s life, luxury is sensuality.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: It's easy for common people to say what they think about the government. No one listens to them.
quotes.author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quotes.quote: There's definitely a huge gap between the elite and public perceptions on immigration.
quotes.author: Mark Krikorian

quotes.quote: Feelings of superiority always stem from an illusion.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: If you believe that some opinions are in fact better than others, then you, too, are an elitist of sorts.
quotes.author: Michael Harris

quotes.quote: Studying creativity is not an elite distraction, but provides one of the most exciting models for living.
quotes.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quotes.quote: I care about education for everyone, not just the elite.
quotes.author: Sebastian Thrun

quotes.quote: If you are frustrated with the elite of your society, do something about it.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Email is having an increasingly pernicious effect. Not only is it having a perceptible effect on productivity, it's skewing what it is we focus on. The immediate increasingly crowds out the important.
quotes.author: Noreena Hertz

quotes.quote: The email of the species is deadlier than the mail.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote: No one ever got rich checking their email more often.
quotes.author: Noah Kagan

quotes.quote: Email may well be your most productive marketing tool.
quotes.author: Dan Zarrella

quotes.quote: How to write a good email: 1. Write your email 2. Delete most of it 3. Send.
quotes.author: Dan Munz

quotes.quote: Email is much like an ADD diagnosis. Guaranteed extra time on the test.
quotes.author: Julie Buxbaum

quotes.quote: The difference between email and regular mail is that computers handle email, and computers never decide to come to work one day and shoot all the other computers.
quotes.author: Jamais Cascio

quotes.quote: Every time you write an email, it is in the public domain. There are all these ways where security is not as good as people believe.
quotes.author: Peter Thiel

quotes.quote: Email is a system that delivers other people's priorities to your attention. It's up to you to decide when that priority should be managed into your world. It's not the other way around.
quotes.author: Chris Brogan

quotes.quote: Email is the greatest thing.
quotes.author: Wally Amos

quotes.quote: An email without clarity is like an annoying mime: Just say what you want or get out the way!
quotes.author: Jordie van Rijn

quotes.quote: Email has the virtue - sounds like a bad thing, but it's the virtue of being the lowest common denominator messaging protocol. Everyone can have it. It can cross organizational boundaries. No one owns it. It's not some particular company's platform.
quotes.author: Stewart Butterfield

quotes.quote: Email, instant messaging, and cell phones give us fabulous communication ability, but because we live and work in our own little worlds, that communication is totally disorganized.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: For email, the old postcard rule applies. Nobody else is supposed to read your postcards, but you'd be a fool if you wrote anything private on one.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: The from line is what recipients use to determine whether to delete an email. The subject line is what motivates people to actually open the email.
quotes.author: Loren McDonald

quotes.quote: We're now seeing email that people thought they had deleted showing up as evidence in court. You can't erase email. As that becomes more commonly realized, people will be a little wiser about what they type.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: Every study that's been done on email marketing has shown that increased frequency brings better results. If you're only emailing somebody once a month, they'll forget you.
quotes.author: Ian Brodie

quotes.quote: Email is familiar. It's comfortable. It's easy to use. But it might just be the biggest killer of time and productivity in the office today.
quotes.author: Ryan Holmes

quotes.quote: Email is 20-30 times more effective in generating a purchase than any other tool.
quotes.author: Josh Kaufman

quotes.quote: Each email contains an unsubscribe link. We will never sell, rent, loan, or abuse your email address in any way. One way to break up any kind of tension is good deep breathing.
quotes.author: Byron Nelson

quotes.quote: Emails get reactions. Phone calls start conversations.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: There is no formula for the perfect email â€“ Authentic and honest messaging works.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To get the right message to the right person at the right time you first need to get the right data to the right database at the right time.
quotes.author: John Caldwell

quotes.quote: Email is a push channel, so we need to push it to work harder.
quotes.author: Kath Pay

quotes.quote: Email is not going to disappear. Possibly ever. Until the robots kill us all.
quotes.author: Paul Buchheit

quotes.quote: Email has an ability many channels don't: creating valuable, personal touches â€“ at scale.
quotes.author: David Newman

quotes.quote: Nothing good comes of reading other people's emails.
quotes.author: Mallory Ortberg

quotes.quote: Email is the most popular function on the SmartPhone, so lets call it what it is: A SmartMailer.
quotes.author: Jordie van Rijn

quotes.quote: The basic idea of email has remained essentially unchanged since the first networked message was sent in 1971. And while email is great for one-on-one, formal correspondence, there are far better tools for collaboration.
quotes.author: Ryan Holmes

quotes.quote: Don't let your email dictate your priorities.
quotes.author: Jeff Davidson

quotes.quote: Texts and e-mails travel no faster than phone calls and telegrams, and their content isn't necessarily richer or poorer.
quotes.author: Alison Gopnik

quotes.quote: I want to do business with a company that treats emailing me as a privilege, not a transaction.
quotes.author: Andrea Mignolo

quotes.quote: If you want something, it will elude you. If you do not want something, you will get ten of it in the mail.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: E-mail is a modern Penny Post. The world is a single city with a single postal rate.
quotes.author: Anne Fadiman

quotes.quote: I do love email. Wherever possible I try to communicate asynchronously. I'm really good at email.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Done is better than perfect
quotes.author: Facebook

quotes.quote: Gentlemen don't read each other's mail.
quotes.author: Henry L. Stimson

quotes.quote: Prior to email, our private correspondence was secured by a government institution called the postal service. Today, we trust AOL, Microsoft, Yahoo, Facebook, or Gmail with our private utterances.
quotes.author: John Battelle

quotes.quote: Learning music by reading about it is like making love by mail.
quotes.author: Luciano Pavarotti

quotes.quote: For a writer, mail is not just a collection of bills and letters and offers to subscribe to Sports Illustrated. It's an umbilical cord, a connection to the outside world, the giver of pleasure and pain. It shapes the day, is the moment, inexorable as the tide, toward which all the hours rise and fall.
quotes.author: Mameve Medwed

quotes.quote: The new information technology. Internet and e-mail have practically eliminated the physical costs of communications.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Letters had always defeated distance, but with the coming of e-mail, time seemed to be vanquished as well.
quotes.author: Thomas Mallon

quotes.quote: Emancipation from suffering is your birthright.
quotes.author: Erin Fall Haskell

quotes.quote: Emancipation of women has made them lose their mystery.
quotes.author: Grace Kelly

quotes.quote: Emancipation from error is the condition of real knowledge.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Emancipation from the bondage of the soil is no freedom for the tree.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: The emancipation of man is the emancipation of labor and the emancipation of labor is the freeing of that basic majority of workers who are yellow, brown and black.
quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: True emancipation begins neither at the polls nor in the courts. It begins in woman's soul.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Every emancipation has in it the seeds of a new slavery, and every truth easily becomes a lie.
quotes.author: I. F. Stone

quotes.quote: Emancipation is the demand of civilization. That is a principle; everything else is an intrigue.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Every emancipation is a restoration of the human world and of human relationships to a man himself.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Emancipation of belief is the most formidable of the tasks of reform and the one on which all else depends.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: We shall never secure emancipation from the tyranny of the white oppressor until we have achieved it in our own souls.
quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: We boast our emancipation from many superstitions; but if we have broken any idols, it is through a transfer of idolatry.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The history of men's opposition to women's emancipation is more interesting perhaps than the story of that emancipation itself.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: The progression of emancipation of any class usually, if not always, takes place through the efforts of individuals of that class.
quotes.author: Harriet Martineau

quotes.quote: What we call emancipation is always and of necessity simply the free choice of the soul between one set of limitations and another.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Emancipation of human nature inevitably brings with it scientific and technological progress.
quotes.author: Liu Cixin

quotes.quote: For me emancipation will only be truly reached if a woman can wear makeup and skirts without having her abilities doubted as a result.
quotes.author: Kristina Schroder

quotes.quote: The emancipation of woman will only be possible when woman can take part in production on a large, social scale, and domestic work no longer claims anything but an insignificant amount of her time.
quotes.author: Friedrich Engels

quotes.quote: Emancipation, to be of any value to the slave, must be the free, voluntary act of the master, performed from a conviction of its propriety.
quotes.author: Elijah Parish Lovejoy

quotes.quote: The first effect of emancipation from the Church was not to make men think rationally, but to open their minds to every sort of antique nonsense.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The emancipation of women is practically the greatest egoistic movement of the nineteenth century, and the most intense affirmation of the right of the self that history has yet seen.
quotes.author: Ellen Key

quotes.quote: Merely external emancipation has made of the modern woman an artificial being. Now, woman is confronted with the necessity of emancipating herself from emancipation, if she really desires to be free.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Our emancipation means standing up for strong families, our emancipation means standing against the homosexuality agenda, emancipation for us means standing up against the repealing of the buggery law.
quotes.author: Alvin Bailey

quotes.quote: True emancipation... will have to do away with the absurd notion of the dualism of the sexes, or that man and woman represent two antagonistic worlds.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: The best way to stimulate emancipation is to start to educate your sons to be humans instead of men, and to educate your daughters to be humans instead of women.
quotes.author: Annie M.G. Schmidt

quotes.quote: Emancipation of mind is the greatest liberty.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Emancipation can only come from within; it cannot be dictated by someone else. A law banning the wearing of headscarves changes nothing, except perhaps external appearance. Naturally, Islamic feminism must also include the right to education, to work and the freedom to select one's own husband.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Emancipation should make it possible for woman to be human in the truest sense. Everything within her that craves assertion and activity should reach its fullest expression; all artificial barriers should be broken, and the road towards greater freedom cleared of every trace of centuries of submission and slavery.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Emancipation was a proclamation, but not a fact.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: For souls in growth, great quarrels are great emancipations.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Women's history is the primary tool for women's emancipation.
quotes.author: Gerda Lerner

quotes.quote: A man that is ashamed of passions that are natural and reasonable is generally proud of those that are shameful and silly.
quotes.author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: It is a shameful thing to be weary of inquiry when what we search for is excellent.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Life is a series of embarrassing moments which leave you feeling alone in your confusion and shame.
quotes.author: Miranda Hart

quotes.quote: Nothing is so embarrassing as watching someone do something that you said couldn't be done.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: Embarrassment isn't a just cause of action.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: The rate at which a person can mature is directly proportional to the embarrassment he can tolerate.
quotes.author: Douglas Engelbart

quotes.quote: You can never really trust someone who remembers every embarrassing detail of your adolescence.
quotes.author: Daniel Clowes

quotes.quote: It is humiliating to remain with our hands folded while other write history. It matters little who wins.
quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

quotes.quote: There is nothing in the world more shameful than establishing one's self on lies and fables.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: It was a shameful thing that she had nothing of which to be ashamed.
quotes.author: Philip José Farmer

quotes.quote: Embarrassment is a villain to be crushed.
quotes.author: Robert B. Cialdini

quotes.quote: For shameful deeds are taught by shameful deeds.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Have you ever gotten the feeling that you aren't completely embarrassed yet, but you glimpse tomorrow's embarrassment?
quotes.author: Tom Cruise

quotes.quote: Whoever is detected in a shameful fraud is ever after not believed even if they speak the truth.
quotes.author: Phaedrus

quotes.quote: It is not the criminal things which are hardest to confess, but the ridiculous and shameful.
quotes.author: Henri Rousseau

quotes.quote: It was shameful and embarrassing that there were two years in a row without a single actor of color nominated. That's insane.
quotes.author: Matt Damon

quotes.quote: There is nothing shameful about being efficient.
quotes.author: Arpad Busson

quotes.quote: To an adolescent, there is nothing in the world more embarrassing than a parent.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Most things in life are moments of pleasure and a lifetime of embarrassment; photography is a moment of embarrassment and a lifetime of pleasure.
quotes.author: Tony Benn

quotes.quote: To a shameful extent, the charm of marriage boils down to how unpleasant it is to be alone.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: Nothing is more humiliating than to see idiots succeed in enterprises we have failed in.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: It is not shameful for a man to succumb to pain and it is shameful to succumb to pleasure.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Embarrassment isn't a just cause of action.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Things aren't often what they appear to be at first blush. But embarrassment is.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: It's discouraging to make a mistake, but it's humiliating when you find out you're so unimportant that nobody noticed it.
quotes.author: Chuck Daly

quotes.quote: Almost all our desires, when examined, contain something too shameful to reveal.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Nothing is as embarrassing as watching your boss do something you assured him couldn't be done.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: The first and greatest victory is to conquer yourself; to be conquered by yourself is of all things most shameful and vile.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It's very embarrassing to be put on the spot.
quotes.author: Bess Truman

quotes.quote: Shame cannot exist in conditions of light, sunshine, and humor. So the very moment that you share your most shameful moments - and can learn to laugh about them - then the spell is lifted. And you, too, are free.
quotes.author: Christiane Northrup

quotes.quote: It is a bit embarrassing to have been concerned with the human problem all one's life and find at the end that one has no more to offer by way of advice than 'try to be a little kinder.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: There aren't any embarrassing questions just embarrassing answers.
quotes.author: Carl T. Rowan

quotes.quote: Start in a small TV station so you can make all of your embarrassing mistakes early and in front of fewer people.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: The reason to retire is to try to avoid embarrassment; you ought to do it before people are dropping big hints. You want to be the first to come up with the idea. You don't want to wait until you trip and fall off the stage.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: It is the answers, not the questions, that are embarrassing.
quotes.author: Helen Suzman

quotes.quote: What an embarrassment that was, being somewhere because there was nowhere else for you to be.
quotes.author: Marilynne Robinson

quotes.quote: Embarrassment felt a lot like eating chili peppers. It burned in the back of your throat and there was nothing you could do to make it go away. You just had to take it, suffer from it, until it eased off.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: Much of modern art is devoted to lowering the threshold of what is terrible. By getting us used to what, formerly, we could not bear to see or hear, because it was too shocking, painful, or embarrassing, art changes morals.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Today self-consciousness no longer means anything but reflection on the ego as embarrassment, as realization of impotence knowing that one is nothing.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: Even the most embarrassing mishap can be spun into comedic gold.
quotes.author: Zach Anner

quotes.quote: To whom much is given, much is expected. I do believe this. It's embedded in me.
quotes.author: Tim Cook

quotes.quote: The core political values of our free society are so deeply embedded in our collective consciousness that only a few malcontents, lunatics generally, ever dare to threaten them.
quotes.author: John McCain

quotes.quote: And these things are pretty much foundational: thou shall not kill, steal, bear false witness. All these things are embedded into the laws we enjoy in our nation.
quotes.author: Pat Robertson

quotes.quote: Words cut deeper than knives. A knife can be pulled out, words are embedded into our souls.
quotes.author: William Chapman

quotes.quote: When cultural change succeeds, it succeeds because it's so embedded in what we do that we don't have to think about.
quotes.author: Harvey V. Fineberg

quotes.quote: We are embedded in a biological world and related to the organisms around us.
quotes.author: Walter Gilbert

quotes.quote: Violence has always been unfortunately embedded in masculinity, this alpha thing.
quotes.author: Sebastian Stan

quotes.quote: Part of the joy of looking at art is getting in sync in some ways with the decision-making process that the artist used and the record that's embedded in the work.
quotes.author: Chuck Close

quotes.quote: Revolution is not something fixed in ideology, nor is it something fashioned to a particular decade. It is a perpetual process embedded in the human spirit.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: Environmental concern is now firmly embedded in public life: in education, medicine and law; in journalism, literature and art.
quotes.author: Barry Commoner

quotes.quote: All one's personality is embedded in gloves and hats after they've been good and used. Show me a glove and I'll tell you the character of its owner.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: Poems tend to have instructions for how to read them embedded in their language.
quotes.author: Mattea Harvey

quotes.quote: When any system has for its goal the advancement of the system over the betterment of its individual members, such a system is embedded in slavery.
quotes.author: Gerry Spence

quotes.quote: It is never difficult to see images – when the principle of the image is embedded in the soul.
quotes.author: Marsden Hartley

quotes.quote: Embedded in the larger story of redemption is a principle we must not miss: God uses ordinary people to do extraordinary things in the lives of others.
quotes.author: Paul David Tripp

quotes.quote: There's a natural instinct embedded in friendship, a sympathy that makes us willing to fight for someone we like when they are treated unjustly.
quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

quotes.quote: Your values are embedded within you irrespective of whether you discover them or not.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: The religionist is a living fossil, embedded in that rock called faith.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Do I appreciate my wealth? Absolutely, yes. I'm trying to embed in my children's heads that if you don't earn it, you don't appreciate it.
quotes.author: Eugene Schvidler

quotes.quote: The scars and stains of racism are still deeply embedded in the American society.
quotes.author: John Lewis

quotes.quote: I think the more you understand myths, the more you understand the roots of our culture and the more things will resonate. Do you have to know them? No, but certainly it is nice to recognise how deeply these things are embedded in our literature, our art.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: The parents gave you this body and fostered the intelligence and love that are embedded in it; so, gratitude is their due.
quotes.author: Sri Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: We need to notice and be aware of the injustices embedded in our criminal system.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.quote: It is time for the world, the hemisphere and the region to make sure that relevant institutions of civil society and relevant laws are embedded in the mechanisms of governance.
quotes.author: Baldwin Spencer

quotes.quote: Bond is a classic archetype character, a character that's embedded in our heads forever, one of a lone warrior setting out to avenge a nation - and you find that character across cultures.
quotes.author: Bruce Feirstein

quotes.quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Change is inevitable in life. You can either resist it and potentially get run over by it, or you can choose to cooperate with it, adapt to it, and learn how to benefit from it. When you embrace change you will begin to see it as an opportunity for growth
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy, for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter into another.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Embrace uncertainty. Some of the most beautiful chapters in our lives won't have a title until much later.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: Look for solutions, instead of being difficult; be more thoughtful, instead of allowing anger to burn you out. Look at things from a different perspective, embrace change, look out for opportunities and you will feel much more in control.
quotes.author: Steve Backley

quotes.quote: The art of life is a constant readjustment to our surroundings.
quotes.author: Kakuzo Okakaura

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure, to embrace the new. There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Embrace change. Envision what could be, challenge the status quo, and drive creative destruction.
quotes.author: Charles Koch

quotes.quote: What is magical and mystifying to me about style is not that by seeing we can believe. It is that eventually, we can believe, because we can see we can embrace change the more we can make it tangible
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: I think the growth of the brain is a slow process. But you do change and the more you accept change and embrace change, the better.
quotes.author: Diane Keaton

quotes.quote: Life happens. Adapt. Embrace change, and make the most of everything that comes your way.
quotes.author: Nick Jonas

quotes.quote: Fear stagnation; embrace change.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: You can live your dreams if you can embrace change. It's by taking chances that you'll learn how to be brave.
quotes.author: Nikita Koloff

quotes.quote: Clinging to the past is the problem. Embracing change is the answer.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Embrace change, even when the change slaps you in the face.
quotes.author: Walter Breuning

quotes.quote: Buddhism teaches you to embrace change.
quotes.author: Koo Stark

quotes.quote: We cannot become what we want by remaining what we are.
quotes.author: Max Depree

quotes.quote: Growth means change and change involves risks, stepping from the known to the unknown.
quotes.author: George Shinn

quotes.quote: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Embrace change. True success can be defined by your ability to adapt to changing circumstances.
quotes.author: Connie Sky

quotes.quote: A lot of people resist transition and therefore never allow themselves to enjoy who they are. Embrace the change, no matter what it is; once you do, you can learn about the new world you're in and take advantage of it.
quotes.author: Nikke Giovanni

quotes.quote: Time when learning how to learn (and unlearn) is central to success. Instead of hiding from change, let's embrace it. Each time we try something new, we get better at getting better. Experience builds competence and confidence, so we're ready for the big changes, like re-thinking what we do.
quotes.author: Peter Morville

quotes.quote: If we can recognize that change and uncertainty are basic principles, we can greet the future and the transformation we are undergoing with the understanding that we do not know enough to be pessimistic.
quotes.author: Hazel Henderson

quotes.quote: As self-governing entities, artists have a profound interest in change. Embracing change, we embrace growth and we embrace our future.
quotes.author: Robert Genn

quotes.quote: Resistance is never the agent of change. You have to embrace the actions that are going to get you closer to your goal.
quotes.author: Ali Vincent

quotes.quote: We cannot change what we are not aware of, and once we are aware, we cannot help but change.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: I cannot say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is they must change if they are to get better.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Every generation is gonna keep changing, and you just have to embrace the change.
quotes.author: Wyclef Jean

quotes.quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: We cannot become what we need to be, by remaining what we are.
quotes.author: Max Depree

quotes.quote: Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Adaptability is not imitation. It means power of resistance and assimilation.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we are not really living.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: When in doubt, choose change.
quotes.author: Lily Leung

quotes.quote: Life is about change. Sometimes it's painful. Sometimes it's beautiful. But most of the time, it's both.
quotes.author: Lana Lang

quotes.quote: Change has long been a fearful thing for human beings ... and at the same time, it is our most Divine opportunity. Clinging to the banks of the river may seem safe and more secure, but life's possibilities are truly engaged only when we trust, release and become part of The Flow of the Universe.
quotes.author: Chelle Thompson

quotes.quote: Your desire to change must be greater than your desire to stay the same.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Don't fear change - embrace it.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Become a student of change. It is the only thing that will remain constant.
quotes.author: Anthony D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Worry less, smile more, accept criticism, take responsibility, listen & love, don't hate, Embrace change and feel good anyway.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The moment that judgment stops through acceptance of what it is, you are free of the mind. You have made room for love, for joy, for peace.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Embracing change is never easy. But the reward for doing so can be far greater than you can ever imagine.
quotes.author: Kenneth Johnson

quotes.quote: I'm human. I'm flawed. But I embrace change... and enhancement. Now there's nothing I can't do. Nothing. Nothing I can't know. Nothing I can't be. I want you to listen to something.
quotes.author: Shirow Masamune

quotes.quote: He evolved; he embraced change, because he always wanted to be better than he was.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: Embracing change brings us everyday wisdom, suggestions, and lessons to find the power inside to improve the quality of our lives and get through the difficult times.
quotes.author: Joseph F. Sica

quotes.quote: If you are ready to shape your destiny and change your life to have a more fulfilling career, economic freedom, or more passionate relationships, then you have to embrace change.
quotes.author: Franklin A. Ohiozebau

quotes.quote: To be constantly happy and wise, you must be prepared to and even embrace change.
quotes.author: D. Brewer

quotes.quote: Embrace change enjoy today.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: If you change the future, you change the past. It keeps changing? Change is constant.
quotes.author: Jun Eishima

quotes.quote: Embrace change. Keep your eyes on the prize. Keep moving in the direction where doors of opportunities are opened.
quotes.author: Beverley Childs

quotes.quote: Don't fight change. Stop trying to hold on what is lost. Let go of the old and make room for the new. Time to make adjustments by recognizing when a season has ended. It's time to do it bigger than ever.
quotes.author: Beverley Childs

quotes.quote: In order to renew our life's we must be willing to change and leave behind the things and people that compromise our happiness.
quotes.author: Beverley Childs

quotes.quote: The biggest inhibitor to change lies within yourself, and that nothing gets better until you change.
quotes.author: Spencer Johnson

quotes.quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: One never lose time in vainly regretting the past or in complaining against the changes which cause us discomfort, for change is the essence of life.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: If a rock is in the way, the root of a tree will change its direction. The dumbest animals try to adapt themselves to changed conditions. Even a rat will change tactics to get a piece of cheese.
quotes.author: Melvin B. Tolson

quotes.quote: The first step toward change is acceptance... Change is not something you do, it's something you allow.
quotes.author: Will Garcia

quotes.quote: Each new season grows from the leftovers from the past. That is the essence of change, and change is the basic law.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: We must embrace change.
quotes.author: Sharon Halliday

quotes.quote: Embracing change is having an open mind, soul, spirit and heart of reason and reasoning.
quotes.author: Dr. James J. Krieger D.D.

quotes.quote: Change is not easy. But it is simple. Things will always change. We don't have a choice about that, but we do have a choice on how we react to change; and as a leader whether or not we choose to create change. The choice is really boils down to this. Either we manage change, or it will manage us.
quotes.author: Tom Feltenstein

quotes.quote: When we resist change, it's called suffering. But when we can completely let go and not struggle against it, when we can embrace the groundlessness of our situation and relax into its dynamic quality, that's called enlightenment, or awakening to our true nature, to our fundamental goodness.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: To embrace change, however, and actually welcome challenges that force you to personally grow, is a way to let go of the anger that a mistrusting situation left you with.
quotes.author: Jessica E. Smith

quotes.quote: Learning the hard way, to embrace change.
quotes.author: Jessica E. Smith

quotes.quote: Embrace change by viewing each collaborative opportunity and project as an opportunity to challenge yourself, thereby gleaning experience and knowledge.
quotes.author: Melissa Merz

quotes.quote: We can embrace the challenges and changes in our lives, and discover the seeds of courage, wisdom, and joy that lie within us, waiting to blossom.
quotes.author: Melissa Merz

quotes.quote: Embracing change is a matter of timing and knowledge, vision and guts.
quotes.author: Jay Conrad Levinson

quotes.quote: Everything is change. Embrace that. Flow with it.
quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

quotes.quote: The eye that directs a needle in the delicate meshes of embroidery will equally well bisect a star with the spiderweb of the micrometer.
quotes.author: Maria Mitchell

quotes.quote: Take your needle, my child, and work at your pattern; it will come out a rose by and by. Life is like that - one stitch at a time taken patiently and the pattern will come out all right like the embroidery.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: She watched and taught the girls that sang at their embroidery frames while the great silk flowers grew from their needles
quotes.author: Louise Jordan Miln

quotes.quote: We Irish prefer embroideries to plain cloth. To us Irish, memory is a canvas--stretched, primed, and ready for painting on. We love the 'story' part of the word 'history,' and we love it trimmed out with color and drama, ribbons and bows. Listen to our tunes, observe a Celtic scroll: we always decorate our essence.
quotes.author: Frank Delaney

quotes.quote: Now the Earth with many flowers puts on her spring embroidery.
quotes.author: Sappho

quotes.quote: Love is what carries you, for it is always there, even in the dark, or most in the dark, but shining out at times like gold stitches in a piece of embroidery.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: I have a profound interest in embroidery, as I have female ancestors on both sides who embroidered their way through great trials.
quotes.author: Emil Ferris

quotes.quote: Although the threads of my life have often seemed knotted, I know, by faith, that on the other side of the embroidery there is a crown.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: I love taking prints, embroidery, appliques - precious things that seem to be from another time - and using them to create a contemporary, new story.
quotes.author: Alessandro Michele

quotes.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by Nature and embroidered by imagination.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Tombs are the clothes of the dead and a grave is a plain suit; while an expensive monument is one with embroidery.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: I made my song a coat Covered with embroideries Out of old mythologies From heel to throat But the fools caught it, Wore it in the world's eyes As though they'd wrought it. Song, let them take it, For there's more enterprise In walking naked.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: It will be difficult to break the habits of thinking Abnegation instilled in me, like tugging a single thread from a complex work of embroidery. But I will find new habits, new thoughts, new rules. I will become something else.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: All the embroidery is made in my father's workshop in India... and all the cutting and sewing is done in my studio.
quotes.author: Naeem Khan

quotes.quote: Humility is the embroidery of chiefs
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: If you take away print and embroidery, you have to challenge yourself a bit more on the cut
quotes.author: Joseph Altuzarra

quotes.quote: If you understood the facts they needed no embroidery: all the wonder was already there, the more spellbinding because it was true
quotes.author: Robert Charles Wilson

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: I don't want to be at the mercy of my emotions. I want to use them, to enjoy them, and to dominate them.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We all live at the mercy of our emotions. Our emotions influence and shape our desires, thoughts and behaviors and above all our destiny.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Unexpressed emotions will never die. They are buried alive and will come forth later in uglier ways.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Let's not forget that the little emotions are the great captains of our lives and we obey them without realizing it.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: One thing you can't hide - is when you're crippled inside.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Your emotions are the slaves to your thoughts, and you are the slave to your emotions.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: The world is a tragedy to those who feel, but a comedy to those who think.
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: Never apologize for being sensitive or emotional. It's a sign that you have a big heart, and that you aren't afraid to let others see it. Showing your emotions is a sign of strength.
quotes.author: Brigitte Nicole

quotes.quote: I have learned now that while those who speak about one's miseries usually hurt, those who keep silence hurt more.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Emotion is more powerful than reason. Emotion is the driving force behind thinking and reasoning. Emotional intelligence increases the mind's ability to make positive, brilliant decisions.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: We cannot selectively numb emotions, when we numb the painful emotions, we also numb the positive emotions.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: One ought to hold on to one's heart; for if one lets it go, one soon loses control of the head too.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: We know too much and feel too little. At least, we feel too little of those creative emotions from which a good life springs.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The advantage of the emotions is that they lead us astray.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There can be no transforming of darkness into light and of apathy into movement without emotion.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: Emotions have taught mankind to reason.
quotes.author: Marquis De Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: People hate those who make them feel their own inferiority.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: There is no fire like passion, there is no shark like hatred, there is no snare like folly, there is no torrent like greed.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Realize that now, in this moment of time, you are creating. You are creating your next moment based on what you are feeling and thinking. That is what's real.
quotes.author: Doc Childre

quotes.quote: The sign of intelligent people is their ability to control emotions by the application of reason.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.quote: Instead of resisting any emotion, the best way to dispel it is to enter it fully, embrace it and see through your resistance.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Never speak out of anger,Never act out of fear,Never choose from impatience,But wait... and peace will appear.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: To give vent now and then to his feelings, whether of pleasure or discontent, is a great ease to a man's heart
quotes.author: Francesco Guicciardini

quotes.quote: Feelings are much like waves, we can't stop them from coming but we can choose which one to surf
quotes.author: Jonatan Martensson

quotes.quote: Just like children, emotions heal when they are heard and validated
quotes.author: Jill Bolte Taylor

quotes.quote: Just as your car runs more smoothly and requires less energy to go faster and farther when the wheels are in perfect alignment, you perform better when your thoughts, feelings, emotions, goals, and values are in balance
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: All emotions are pure which gather you and lift you up; that emotion is impure which seizes only one side of your being and so distorts you.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: By starving emotions we become humorless, rigid and stereotyped; by repressing them we become literal, reformatory and holier-than-thou; encouraged, they perfume life; discouraged, they poison it.
quotes.author: Joseph Collins

quotes.quote: Emotion is the surest arbiter of a poetic choice, and it is the priest of all supreme unions in the mind.
quotes.author: Max Eastman

quotes.quote: It is as healthy to enjoy sentiment as to enjoy jam.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Once the last trace of emotion has been eradicated, nothing remains of thought but absolute tautology.
quotes.author: Theodor Wiesengrund Adorno

quotes.quote: You can't expect to prevent negative feelings altogether. And you can't expect to experience positive feelings all the time. The Law of Emotional Choice directs us to acknowledge our feelings but also to refuse to get stuck in the negative ones.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: Our emotions are only incidents in the effort to keep day and night together.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Emotion turning back on itself, and not leading on to thought or action, is the element of madness.
quotes.author: John Sterling

quotes.quote: One's suffering disappears when one let's go, when one yields-even to sadness.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: As none can see the wind but in its effects on the trees, neither can we see the emotions but in their effects on the face and body.
quotes.author: Nathaniel LeTonnerre

quotes.quote: When you own or take responsibility for your feelings, you place yourself in a position of power and control.
quotes.author: Julie A., M.A. Ross and Judy Corcoran

quotes.quote: Swift instincts leaps; slow reason feebly climbs.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Our emotions are the driving powers of our lives.
quotes.author: Earl Riney

quotes.quote: Too much emotion is like none at all
quotes.author: Du Mu

quotes.quote: Where the heart lies, let the brain lie also.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: An emotion is an automatic response, an automatic effect of man's value premises. An effect, not a cause. There is no necessary clash, no dichotomy between man's reason and his emotions
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The finest emotion of which we are capable is the mystic emotion.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Emotions have no place in business, unless you do business with them.
quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quotes.quote: When we acknowledge children's feelings, we do him a great service. We put him in touch with his inner reality. And once he's clear about that reality, he gathers the strength to begin to cope.
quotes.author: Adele Faber

quotes.quote: Cherish your own emotions and never undervalue them.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: Managing our emotions increases intuition and clarity. It helps us self-regulate our brain chemicals and internal hormones. It gives us natural highs, the real fountain of youth we've been searching for. It enables us to drink from elixirs locked within our cells, just waiting for us to discover them.
quotes.author: Doc Childre

quotes.quote: If one uses one's intellect to become master over the unlimited emotions, it may produce a sorry and diversionary effect upon the intellect.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Emotion always has its roots in the unconscious and manifests itself in the body.
quotes.author: Irene Claremont

quotes.quote: Every passion, every emotion , has its effect upon the mind. Every change of mind, however slight, has its effect upon the body.
quotes.author: Khan

quotes.quote: Emotion is the chief source of all becoming conscious. There can be no transformation of darkness into light...without emotion.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: All emotions are pure which gather you and lift you up; that emotio is impure which seizes only one side of your being and so distorts you.
quotes.author: Reiner Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Keep me away from the wisdom that does not cry, the philosophy which does not laugh and the greatness which does not bow before children.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: To think with the heart is to think in living terms.
quotes.author: Jean Gebser

quotes.quote: A man is not as much as he feels he is but as much as he feels.
quotes.author: Jean Toomer

quotes.quote: You cannot know what you cannot feel.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quotes.quote: The heart has its reasons, which reason does not know...All our reasoning ends in surrender to feeling.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Life is a tram of moods like a string of beads, and as we pass through them they proved to be many colored lenses which paint the world in their own hue.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Emotion which does not lead to and flow out in right action is not only useless, but it weakens character, and becomes an excuse for neglect of effort.
quotes.author: Tyron Edwards

quotes.quote: The young man who has not wept is savage, and the old man who will not laugh is a fool.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Do not violence to yourself; respect in yourself the oscillations of feeling: they are your life and your nature; a wiser than you made them.
quotes.author: Henri-Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Each of us really understands in others only those feelings he is capable of producing himself.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Our feelings are the source of our energy, they provide; they provide the horsepower that makes it possible for us to accomplish the tasks of living...Since our feelings work for us, we should treat them with respect.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: One can never repeat exactly the same emotion.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Only one thing remains infinitely fascinating to me, the mystery of moods. To be master of these moods is exquisite, to me mastered by them more exquisite still.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We lose our chances, we lose our figures, we even lose our characters; but we must never lose our tempers. That is our duty to our neighbor...but sometimes we mislay it, don't we?
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If you close your eyes for just one minute, you can experience how a feeling or emotion is born, grows old, and passes away. It's like a wave rising to a peak and then breaking apart.
quotes.author: Bhante Gunaratana

quotes.quote: Men decide many more problems by...emotion than by reason.
quotes.author: Marcus Tulius Cicero

quotes.quote: We are sometimes stirred by emotion and take it for zeal.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Kempis

quotes.quote: Emotions have taught mankind to reason.
quotes.author: Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: Tears are the blood of emotion.
quotes.author: Bea N. Abbling

quotes.quote: In fact, when we are close to both extremes of human emotion— ecstasy and despair— we find absolute honesty about what it is in this life that brings us joy or pain.
quotes.author: Bradley Trevor Greive

quotes.quote: I can only note that the past is beautiful because one never realizes an emotion at the time. It expands later, and thus we don't have complete emotions about the present, only about the past.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Feelings are, as we all know, at the heart of emotion.
quotes.author: Peter Goldie

quotes.quote: I've got so much emotion that I, / Just cannot bear. / I know I don't have much time but, / The world looks to grey. / I think it's about time I, / Come out as gay.
quotes.author: Jason Ritchie

quotes.quote: You've got me feeling emotions / Deeper than I've ever dreamed of / You've got me feeling emotions / Higher than the heavens above
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: Until we find the things we need I know / I want that love / King of Emotion / Stronger than you and so much deeper than me / I know that love is King of Emotion / King of Emotion take a walk with me.
quotes.author: Stuart Adamson

quotes.quote: Can't stop the runaway emotions / Fighting, hiding, can't stop the runaway emotions / Hypnotized, paralyzed / Can't stop the runaway emotions.
quotes.author: Muir

quotes.quote: It is not the the bruises on the body that hurt. It is the wounds of the heart and the scars on the mind.
quotes.author: Aisha Mirza

quotes.quote: Well, I went through some emotionally abusive relationships and allowed myself to not be properly respected as a lady, as a human being even, though I tried everything I knew to be a lady.
quotes.author: Gloria Gaynor

quotes.quote: The results of any traumatic experience, such as abuse, can only be resolved by experiencing, articulating, and judging every facet of the original experience within a process of careful therapeutic disclosure.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.quote: The scars you can't see are the hardest to heal.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: Poisonous relationships can alter our perception. You can spend many years thinking you're worthless... but you're not worthless, you're unappreciated.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Family is supposed to be our safe haven. Very often, it's the place where we find the deepest heartache.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: Screaming at children over their grades, especially to the point of the child's tears, is child abuse, pure and simple. It's not funny and it's not good parenting. It is a crushing, scarring, disastrous experience for the child. It isn't the least bit funny.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: There are far too many silent sufferers. Not because they don't yearn to reach out, but because they've tried and found no one who cares.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Domestic abuse happens only in intimate, interdependent, long-term relationships - in other words, in families - the last place we would want or expect to find violence.
quotes.author: Leslie Morgan Steiner

quotes.quote: The abuse dies in a day, but the denial slays the life of the people, and entombs the hope of the race.
quotes.author: Charles Bradlaugh

quotes.quote: I think anybody who has been abused as a kid - and I was abused as a kid, by various people - will say it's irrational because violence is irrational.
quotes.author: Samantha Morton

quotes.quote: Abuse if you slight it, will gradually die away; but if you show yourself irritated, you will be thought to have deserved it.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: We should meet abuse by forbearance. Human nature is so constituted that if we take absolutely no notice of anger or abuse, the person indulging in it will soon weary of it and stop.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There are more people abusive to others than lie open to abuse themselves; but the humor goes round, and he that laughs at me to-day will have somebody to laugh at him to-morrow.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Abuse is the means in which violence retards love.
quotes.author: Inga Muscio

quotes.quote: You survived the abuse. You're going to survive the recovery.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Bullies may be the perpetrators of evil, but it is the evil of passivity of all those who know what is happening and never intervene that perpetuates such abuse.
quotes.author: Philip Zimbardo

quotes.quote: Abuse of words has been the great instrument of sophistry and chicanery, of party, faction, and division of society.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Some of the world's most appalling abuses have been justified by religion because it is possible for people to find vindication in their scriptures for any of their prejudices.
quotes.author: Zac Goldsmith

quotes.quote: So many people suffer from abuse, and suffer alone.
quotes.author: Pamela Stephenson

quotes.quote: I think that most minorities have experienced some form of racial abuse.
quotes.author: Lynn Swann

quotes.quote: Every abuse ought to be reformed, unless the reform is more dangerous than the abuse itself.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Do you never look at yourself when you abuse another person?
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: It is impossible to correct abuses unless we know that they're going on.
quotes.author: Julian Assange

quotes.quote: The biggest abuses in society happen when people are not able to communicate and not able to connect.
quotes.author: Heather Brooke

quotes.quote: Not all wounds are visible.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Emotional abuse is a major epidemic in our culture.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: Emotional abuse is the least understood form of abuse.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: Ultimately, given enough time, most victim of emotional abuse come not only to blame themselves for all the problems in the relationship come not only to blame themselves for all the problems in the relationship but also to believe that they are inadequate, contemptuous, and even unlovable.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: Emotional abuse is considered by many to be the most painful form of violence and the most detrimental to self-esteem.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: Emotional abuse cuts to the very core of a person, creating scars that may be longer lasting than physical ones.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: With emotional abuse, the insults, insinuations, crtiticism, and accusations slowly eat away at the victim's self-esteem until he or she is incapable of judging a situation realistically.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: Emotional abuse poisons a relationship and infuses it with hostility, contempt, and hatred,
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: No matter how much a couple once loved each other, once emotional abuse becomes a consistent aspect of the relationship, that love is overshadowed by fear, anger, guilt, and shame.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: At the very least, emotional abuse causes both abuser and the victim to lose sight of any redeeming qualities his or her partner once had.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: The disrespect and hatred each partner begins to feel leads to more and more emotional abuse and to each partner justifying inappropriate, even destructive, behavior.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: Over time, anger can build up on the part of both abuser and victim, and emotional abuse can turn into physical violence.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: When emotional abuse is mutual, it becomes a matter of survival, as each partner has to constantly fend off criticism, verbal attacks, or rejection and shore up enough strength to go on with daily tasks.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: As the emotional abuse takes its toll and each partner becomes less and less self-assured, each clings to the relationship even more.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: No one wants to have to face the fact that he or she has lost control in this way and that his or her actions and/or words have caused his or her partner emotional damage.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: The insidiousness and power of emotional abuse paralleled the invisibility, strength, and purpose of a spider's web.
quotes.author: Jess Hill

quotes.quote: What is going on in our relationship is domestic violence, and the type of violence that I'm using on you is called emotional abuse, which means I don't bash you with my fists, I bash you with my emotions, to keep you under control
quotes.author: Jess Hill

quotes.quote:
The scars from mental cruelty can be as deep and long-lasting as wounds from punches or slaps but are often not as
obvious. In fact, even among women who have experienced violence from a partner, half or more report that the man’s emotional abuse is what is causing them the greatest harm.
quotes.author: Lundy Bancroft

quotes.quote: It is not the bruises on the body that hurt. It is the wounds of the heart and the scars on the mind.
quotes.author: Aisha Mirza

quotes.quote: Intimidation, even if it appears unintentional, is a sign that emotional abuse is on the way - or has already begun - and is a warning flag that physical violence may eventually follow.
quotes.author: Lundy Bancroft

quotes.quote: The damage and invisible scars of emotional abuse are very difficult to heal, because memories are imprinted on our minds and hearts and it takes time to be restored. Imprints of past traumas do not mean a person cannot change their future beliefs and behaviors. as people, we do not easily forget. However, as we heal, grieve, and let go, we become clear-minded and focused to live restore and emotionally healthy.
quotes.author: Dee Brown

quotes.quote: Emotional abuse is extensive in our culture, and faith-based communities are no exception.
quotes.author: Dee Brown

quotes.quote: Emotional abuse is a nonphysical behavior or attitude that controls, demeans, punishes or isolates a person
quotes.author: Dee Brown

quotes.quote: In emotionally abusive relationships there is a determined intent to formulate statements or actions which leave a person feeling awful.
quotes.author: Dee Brown

quotes.quote:
Emotional abuse is designed to undermine another's a sense of self.
It is deliberate humiliation, with the intent to seize control of how others feel about themselves.
quotes.author: Lorraine Nilon

quotes.quote: Get pissed because you deserve more than this abuse. Emotional abuse is the gateway to all abuse. Get out!
quotes.author: Tracy Malone

quotes.quote: You can conquer almost any fear if you will only make up your mind to do so. For remember, fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: We define emotional intelligence as the subset of social intelligence that involves the ability to monitor one's own and others' feelings and emotions, to discriminate among them and to use this information to guide one's thinking and actions.
quotes.author: Salovey and Mayer

quotes.quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else: you are the one who gets burned.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence is what humans are good at and that's not a sideshow. That's the cutting edge of human intelligence.
quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

quotes.quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence begins to develop in the earliest years. All the small exchanges children have with their parents, teachers, and with each other carry emotional messages.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: All your thoughts, imagination, feelings, emotions and sensation are part of the mechanical process that can be understood, at the state of self-realization.
quotes.author: Roshan Sharma

quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence is a way of recognizing, understanding, and choosing how we think, feel, and act. It shapes our interactions with others and our understanding of ourselves. It defines how and what we learn; it allows us to set priorities; it determines the majority of our daily actions. Research suggests it is responsible for as much as 80 percent of the success in our lives.
quotes.author: J. Freedman

quotes.quote: Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity or registering wrongs.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Instead of resisting any emotion, the best way to dispel it is to enter it fully, embrace it and see through your resistance.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Even though a high IQ is no guarantee of prosperity, prestige, or happiness in life, our schools and our culture fixate on academic abilities, ignoring the emotional intelligence that also matters immensely for our personal destiny.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence simply means managing your mental state for a positive result.
quotes.author: David Atta

quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence accounts for 80 percent of career success.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: When emotional intelligence merges with spiritual intelligence, human nature is transformed.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Developing emotional intelligence is one way to protect yourself from damaging relationships. Emotional intelligence is a science that has been studied and researched for over a decade. According to the theories, mutual respect and effective communication are key.
quotes.author: Liz Miller

quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence is the ability to sense, understand, and effectively apply the power and acumen of emotions as a source of human energy, information, connection, and influence.
quotes.author: Robert K. Cooper

quotes.quote: In the school of emotional intelligence,even if the action or cause is negative,the reaction or effect should be positive.
quotes.author: David Atta

quotes.quote: The sign of an intelligent people is their ability to control their emotions by the application of reason.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.quote: IQ and technical skills are important, but Emotional Intelligence is the Sine Qua Non of Leadership.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: The strength of character and emotional intelligence to face your failures and learn from them are at the core of success.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Words represent your emotional state, beware of what you speak! Restore your mental balance.
quotes.author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quotes.quote: But once you are in that field, emotional intelligence emerges as a much stronger predictor of who will be most successful, because it is how we handle ourselves in our relationships that determines how well we do once we are in a given job.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence does not mean merely being nice. At strategic moment it may demand not being nice, but rather, for example, bluntly confronting someone with an uncomfortable but consequential truth they've been avoiding.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: People high in emotional intelligence are expected to progress more quickly through the abilities designated and to master more of them.
quotes.author: Mayer & Salovey

quotes.quote: By 2029, computers will have emotional intelligence and be convincing as people.
quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

quotes.quote: It is very important to understand that emotional intelligence is not the opposite of intelligence, it is not the triumph of heart over head it is the unique intersection of both.
quotes.author: David Caruso

quotes.quote: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
quotes.author: Paul Boese

quotes.quote: Emotional self-awareness is the building block of the next fundamental emotional intelligence: being able to shake off a bad mood.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Be not disturbed at being misunderstood; be disturbed rather at not being understanding.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: There is no weakness in being able to love fully. It takes courage, tenacity, and an emotional intelligence that most people are incapable of.
quotes.author: Alafia Stewart

quotes.quote: Women are much more than men in touch with their emotional intelligence. That explains why women read fiction books while men stick to the user manuals.
quotes.author: M.Z.Riffi

quotes.quote: Feelings are self-justifying, with a set of perceptions and proofs all their own.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: If we lack emotional intelligence, whenever stress rises the human brain switches to autopilot and has an inherent tendency to do more of the same, only harder. Which, more often than not, is precisely the wrong approach in today's world.
quotes.author: Robert K. Cooper

quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence grows through perception. Look around at your present situation and observe it through the level of feeling.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: No doubt emotional intelligence is more rare than book smarts, but my experience says it is actually more important in the making of a leader. You just can't ignore it.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Use pain as a stepping stone, not a campground.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Our feelings are our most genuine paths to knowledge.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Every time we allow someone to move us with anger, we teach them to be angry.
quotes.author: Barry Neil Kaufman

quotes.quote: Emotion, which is suffering, ceases to be suffering as soon as we have a clear picture of it.
quotes.author: Benedict Spinoza

quotes.quote: Fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: When dealing with people, remember you are not dealing with creatures of logic, but with creatures of emotion.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: If your emotional abilities aren't in hand, if you don't have self-awareness, if you are not able to manage your distressing emotions, if you can't have empathy and have effective relationships, then no matter how smart you are, you are not going to get very far.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: In a very real sense we have two minds, one that thinks and one that feels
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman
