quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence begins to develop in the earliest years. All the small exchanges children have with their parents, teachers, and with each other carry emotional messages.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Emotional self-awareness is the building block of the next fundamental emotional intelligence being able to shake off a bad mood.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: My hope was that organizations would start including this range of skills in their training programs - in other words, offer an adult education in social and emotional intelligence.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Empathy and social skills are social intelligence, the interpersonal part of emotional intelligence. That's why they look alike.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Feelings are self-justifying, with a set of perceptions and "proofs" all their own.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence is a very important skill set, not just to be happier but also to succeed professionally.
quotes.author: Daniel Lubetzky

quotes.quote: Emotional competence is the single most important personal quality that each of us must develop and access to experience a breakthrough. Only through managing our emotions can we access our intellect and our technical competence. An emotionally competent person performs better under pressure.
quotes.author: Dave Lennick

quotes.quote: The essential difference between emotion and reason is that emotion leads to action while reason leads to conclusions.
quotes.author: Donald Calne

quotes.quote: Whatever we plant in our subconscious mind and nourish with repetition and emotion will one day become a reality.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Any person capable of angering you becomes your master.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Any person capable of angering you becomes your master.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: There is no separation of mind and emotions; emotions, thinking, and learning is all linked.
quotes.author: Eric Jensen.

quotes.quote: There is no separation of mind and emotions; emotions, thinking, and learning are all linked.
quotes.author: Eric Jensen.

quotes.quote: He who spends time regretting the past loses the present and risks the future.
quotes.author: Francisco de Quevedo

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with amazingly intelligent men and women. The people I work with not only are smarter than I am, possessing both intellectual and emotional intelligence, but also share my determination to succeed. I will not make an important decision without them.
quotes.author: George Steinbrenner

quotes.quote: Never speak out of anger, Never act out of fear, Never choose from impatience, But wait and peace will appear.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: We cannot tell what may happen to us in the strange medley of life. But we can decide what happens in us - how we can take it, what we do with it - and that is what really counts in the end
quotes.author: Joseph Fort Newton

quotes.quote: Experiencing one’s self in a conscious manner that is, gaining self-knowledge- is an integral part of learning.
quotes.author: Karen Stone McCown

quotes.quote: Expect the breakthrough and expect to learn.
quotes.author: Kathleen Spike.

quotes.quote: We are dangerous when we are not conscious of our responsibility for how we behave, think, and feel.
quotes.author: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: The ability to process emotional information, particularly as it involves the perception, assimilation, understanding, and management of emotion.
quotes.author: Mayer and Cobb

quotes.quote: Never react emotionally to criticism. Analyze yourself to determine whether it is justified. If it is, correct yourself. Otherwise, go on about your business.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: The advantage of the emotions is that they lead us astray.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I don't want to be at the mercy of my emotions. I want to use them, to enjoy them, and to dominate them.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Transformation occurs when existing solutions, assumed truths and past decisions are exposed as unrealistic and self-defeating
quotes.author: Peter Shepherd

quotes.quote: Leadership is all about emotional intelligence. Management is taught, while leadership is experienced.
quotes.author: Rajeev Suri

quotes.quote: The only way to change someone’s mind is to connect with them from the heart.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: People in good moods are better at inductive reasoning and creative problem solving.
quotes.author: Turvey

quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence is your ability to recognize and understand emotions in yourself and others, and your ability to use this awareness to manage your behavior and relationships.
quotes.author: Travis Bradberry

quotes.quote: People who fail to use their emotional intelligence skills are more likely to turn to other, less effective means of managing their mood. They are twice as likely to experience anxiety, depression, substance abuse, and even thoughts of suicide.
quotes.author: Travis Bradberry

quotes.quote: Love the heart that hurts you, but never hurt the heart that loves you.
quotes.author: Vipin Sharma

quotes.quote: Emotional intelligence, more than any other factor, more than I.Q. or expertise, accounts for 85% to 90% of success at work... I.Q. is a threshold competence. You need it, but it doesn't make you a star. Emotional intelligence can.
quotes.author: Warren G. Bennis

quotes.quote: When dealing with people, remember you are not dealing with creatures of logic, but creatures of emotion.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: I felt no passion, no jealousy, no nostalgia. I was hollow, clear-headed, clean, and as emotionless as an aluminum pot.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: Vision evokes emotion. There is no such thing as an emotionless vision.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Its sad how many emotionless people there are out there and how they don't care when they hurt others, they'll never understand how it feels.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Your emotions are powerful when you use them the right way. That's why emotionless people won't be all they could be.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Dispassionate objectivity is itself a passion, for the real and for the truth.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: We're no longer slaves to fear. That doesn't mean we're emotionless now, or never face fear, it just means we don't have to obey it.
quotes.author: Jeremy Riddle

quotes.quote: Don't let emotionless people into their emo state. Because it will be the most enormous emo people you will know
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Why are so many unexpressive in love, but highly expressive in anger?
quotes.author: Stephy Wasserman

quotes.quote: Emotionless tone hurting as much as the news.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Whenever anyone accuses some person of being unfeeling, he means that that person is just.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Power is emotionless; yet one with personal power will experience more emotions.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Everything else was unemotional and uninspiring. We played very poor baseball.
quotes.author: Bob Jones

quotes.quote: Emotionless people are not emotionless from the beginning they just disappointed and hurt very strongly by who they love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Negative emotions like hatred destroy our peace of mind.
quotes.author: Matthieu Ricard

quotes.quote: All emotions are pure which gather you and lift you up; that emotion is impure which seizes only one side of your being and so distorts you.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: The finest emotion of which we are capable is the mystic emotion.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Any emotion, if it is sincere, is involuntary.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Emotions have taught mankind to reason.
quotes.author: Marquis De Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: It is not our exalted feelings, it is our sentiments that build the necessary home.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: It is as healthy to enjoy sentiment as to enjoy jam.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: Emotion is primarily about nothing and much of it remains about nothing to the end.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Our emotions are only incidents in the effort to keep day and night together.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: You're in bad shape when your emotions force you into acts which you know are foolish.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: We're too busy keeping our emotions in check to ever dream of infinite possibilities. And maybe that is the ultimate conspiracy.
quotes.author: Ramtha

quotes.quote: Your emotions affect every cell in your body. Mind and body, mental and physical, are intertwined.
quotes.author: Thomas Tutko

quotes.quote: Emotions have no place in business, unless you do business with them.
quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quotes.quote: Emotions are the fuel to really move you along - that's the only way you can create music. If you don't feel any emotions, it's not going to happen.
quotes.author: Jan Hammer

quotes.quote: The degree of one's emotions varies inversely with one's knowledge of the facts.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: We all have human emotions that rob our lives.
quotes.author: Jennifer O'Neill

quotes.quote: Emotion is the chief source of all becoming-conscious. There can be no transforming of darkness into light and of apathy into movement without emotion.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: It is a dangerous thing to have instant access to your emotions.
quotes.author: Dennis Potter

quotes.quote: When we direct our thoughts properly, we can control our emotions.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Your emotions are very unstable and should never be the foundation for direction in your life.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: We cannot control what emotions or circumstances we will experience next, but we can choose how we will respond to them.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Our emotions are often beautiful, but they can also be dangerous. They represent our spontaneity, and seem to speak to us of our freedom.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Emotions can certainly be misleading: they can fool you into believing stuff that is definitely, demonstrably untrue.
quotes.author: Francis Spufford

quotes.quote: The first and simplest emotion which we discover in the human mind, is curiosity.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The biggest emotion in creation is the bridge to optimism.
quotes.author: Brian May

quotes.quote: Nothing vivifies, and nothing kills, like the emotions.
quotes.author: Joseph Roux

quotes.quote: Emotion is often what we rely upon to carry us across the unfathomable voids in our intelligence.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: It's a completely useless emotion - jealousy. I don't go there.
quotes.author: Joy Behar

quotes.quote: Sometimes in life one experiences an emotion which is so strong that it is difficult to think, or to reason.
quotes.author: Eric Cantona

quotes.quote: Nothing's wrong with honest emotion.
quotes.author: Tony Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Painful emotions show you what prevents you from creating harmony, cooperation, sharing and reverence for life.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: You can convey a lot of emotion with just some eyebrows and mouth movement.
quotes.author: Gillian Jacobs

quotes.quote: An emotion is suggested and demolished in one glance by certain words.
quotes.author: Robert Smithson

quotes.quote: Feelings or emotions are the universal language and are to be honored. They are the authentic expression of who you are at your deepest place.
quotes.author: Judith Wright

quotes.quote: Emotion is the surest arbiter of a poetic choice, and it is the priest of all supreme unions in the mind.
quotes.author: Max Eastman

quotes.quote: Emotions are products of our mind, and we can actually train ourselves to choose whether we banish or embrace them.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.quote: Once the last trace of emotion has been eradicated, nothing remains of thought but absolute tautology.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: Emotion is always the enemy of wise statesmanship.
quotes.author: Stephen Kinzer

quotes.quote: Emotions may win arguments, but they don't win wars.
quotes.author: Kathleen Troia McFarland

quotes.quote: You can almost read any emotion through someone's eyes.
quotes.author: Jack Huston

quotes.quote: I think you translate emotion better when you take your hands off.
quotes.author: Alison Krauss

quotes.quote: Emotion is messy, contradictory... and true.
quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

quotes.quote: You don't have to work hard to bring emotions. It all just comes naturally, you're there living it.
quotes.author: Camilla Belle

quotes.quote: Everyone has emotions; you just learn to use then and be comfortable with them.
quotes.author: Mitch Gaylord

quotes.quote: To give vent now and then to his feelings, whether of pleasure or discontent, is a great ease to a man's heart.
quotes.author: Francesco Guicciardini

quotes.quote: Feelings are much like waves, we can't stop them from coming but we can choose which one to surf.
quotes.author: Jonatan Martensson

quotes.quote: But feelings can't be ignored, no matter how unjust or ungrateful they seem.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: If you keep your emotions locked in a box, then when you want to open it one day you'll find that they're gone.
quotes.author: M.D. Arnold

quotes.quote: The advantage of the emotions is that they lead us astray.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Cherish your own emotions and never undervalue them.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: Empathy is about standing in someone else's shoes, feeling with his or her heart, seeing with his or her eyes. Not only is empathy hard to outsource and automate, but it makes the world a better place.
quotes.author: Daniel H. Pink

quotes.quote: Empathy is about finding echoes of another person in yourself.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.quote: When you show deep empathy toward others, their defensive energy goes down, and positive energy replaces it. That's when you can get more creative in solving problems.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: All I ever wanted was to reach out and touch another human being not just with my hands but with my heart.
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.quote: Whenever you feel like criticizing any one...just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: We must learn to regard people less in the light of what they do or omit to do, and more in the light of what they suffer.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Whenever you are about to find fault with someone, ask yourself the following question: What fault of mine most nearly resembles the one I am about to criticize?
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: A prerequisite to empathy is simply paying attention to the person in pain.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Empathy is a tool for building people into groups, for allowing us to function as more than self-obsessed individuals.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something and has lost something.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Empathy is really the opposite of spiritual meanness. It's the capacity to understand that every war is both won and lost. And that someone else's pain is as meaningful as your own.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Empathy depends not only on one's ability to identify someone else's emotions but also on one's capacity to put oneself in the other person's place and to experience an appropriate emotional response.
quotes.author: Charles G. Morris

quotes.quote: I believe empathy is the most essential quality of civilization.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: Empathy is a virtue, but it should not be a guiding judicial principle.
quotes.author: Gary Bauer

quotes.quote: Empathy is born out of the old biblical injunction 'Love the neighbor as thyself.'
quotes.author: George Mcgovern

quotes.quote: Empathy means both understanding others on their own terms and bringing them within the orbit of one's own experience.
quotes.author: Jacob A. Belzen

quotes.quote: Empathy is full presence to what's alive in the other person at this moment.
quotes.author: John Cunningham

quotes.quote: You can only understand people if you feel them in yourself.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Empathy is the lovefire of sweet remembrance and shared understanding.
quotes.author: John Eaton

quotes.quote: Empathy is like giving someone a psychological hug.
quotes.author: Lawrence J

quotes.quote: I think we all have empathy. We may not have enough courage to display it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I wouldn't expect someone who's been injured to hear my side until they felt that I had fully understood the depth of their pain.
quotes.author: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Empathy is the only human superpower - it can shrink distance, cut through social and power hierarchies, transcend differences, and provoke political and social change.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Thomas

quotes.quote: Empathy is the most radical of human emotions.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Empathy needs no genius.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: I do not ask the wounded person how he feels, I myself become the wounded person.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Yet, taught by time, my heart has learned to glow for other's good, and melt at other's woe.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Anyone who has experienced a certain amount of loss in their life has empathy for those who have experienced loss.
quotes.author: Anderson Cooper

quotes.quote: If you share in a heart-felt sorrow, you can lighten the load of a friend. Sometimes facing the burden together can mend two broken hearts in the end.
quotes.author: Wes Fessler

quotes.quote: When a good man is hurt all who would be called good must suffer with him.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Are you then unable to recognize unless it has the same sound as yours?
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: The state of empathy, or being empathic, is to perceive the internal frame of reference of another with accuracy and with the emotional components and meanings which pertain thereto as if one were the person.
quotes.author: Carl Rogers

quotes.quote: Empathy is a special way of coming to know another and ourself, a kind of attuning and understanding. When empathy is extended, it satisfies our needs and wish for intimacy, it rescues us from our feelings of aloneness.
quotes.author: Carl Rogers

quotes.quote: Empathy is putting yourself in another's shoes to find out what exactly that person is feeling or going through at the given time. It basically refers to being at a common wavelength with someone.
quotes.author: Deepa Kodikal

quotes.quote: Empathy is the greatest virtue. From it, all virtues flow. Without it, all virtues are an act.
quotes.author: Eric Zorn

quotes.quote: Empathy means both understanding others on their own terms and bringing them within the orbit of one's own experience.
quotes.author: Jacob A. Belzen

quotes.quote: We need to have empathy. When we lose empathy, we lose our humanity.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.quote: Empathy as a complex emotion is different. It requires awareness of the other person's feelings and of one's own reactions. The appropriate reaction may not be to cry when another person cries, but to reassure them, or even to leave them alone.
quotes.author: Frans De Waal

quotes.quote: You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view -- until you climb into his skin and walk around in it.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: We need empathy, we need the eyes that still can weep.
quotes.author: Lydia Millet

quotes.quote: Empathy is the crucible of intercultural relations.
quotes.author: Carolyn Calloway-Thomas

quotes.quote: Loss of empathy might well be the most enduring and deep-cutting scar of all, the silent blade of an unseen enemy, tearing at our hearts and stealing more than our strength.
quotes.author: R.A. Salvatore

quotes.quote: Empathy is a powerful behavior of nurturing. When it is given properly, the receiver can feel that the giver really cares about them, and that what they are going through is not trivial.
quotes.author: William E. Krill

quotes.quote: If there is any one secret of success, it lies in the ability to get the other person's point of view and see things from his angle as well as your own.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Before you criticize someone, you should walk a mile in their shoes. That way when you criticize them, you are a mile away from them and you have their shoes.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: Pain shared is pain lessened; joy shared is joy increased. Thus do we refute entropy.
quotes.author: Spider Robinson

quotes.quote: Empathy frequently informs our earliest days with our infants as we try to figure out what they need, how to comfort and satisfy them
quotes.author: Katherine Ellison

quotes.quote: When I get ready to talk to people, I spend two thirds of the time thinking what they want to hear and one third thinking about what I want to say.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: I feel like songwriting is an experiment in empathy.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.quote: The opposite of anger is not calmness, its empathy.
quotes.author: Mehmet Oz

quotes.quote: Empathy is akin to sympathy, but whereas sympathy says, 'I feel as you do,' empathy says, 'I know how you feel.'
quotes.author: R.W. Armstrong

quotes.quote: Empathy enables us to use our heads more than our hearts, and allow us to appreciate another person's feelings without becoming emotionally involved with him.
quotes.author: R.W. Armstrong

quotes.quote: Universal responsibility is feeling for other people's suffering just as we feel for our own. It is the realization that even our enemy is entirely motivated by the quest for happiness. We must recognize that all human beings want the same things we want.
quotes.author: The XIV Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: It is not granted to the fortunate to understand the sorrow of others.
quotes.author: A.V. Platen

quotes.quote: No one really understands the grief or joy of another.
quotes.author: Franz Schubert

quotes.quote: If you have problems, let me know. I may not have a solution, but I have been working on my empathy for a long time.
quotes.author: Forrest Lang

quotes.quote: There is a great deal of empathy between people who are not only of the same age but genetically identical.
quotes.author: Gordon Randall Garett

quotes.quote: Eat not bread while another stands by without extending your hand to him or her. As for food, it is always here; it is man and woman who do not remain.
quotes.author: Khemetic Saying

quotes.quote: If you know what hurts yourself you know what hurts others.
quotes.author: Malagasy Wisdom

quotes.quote: Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.
quotes.author: Roman 12:15

quotes.quote: Though I be absent in the flesh, yet am I with you in the spirit.
quotes.author: Col 2:5

quotes.quote: Empathy feels these thoughts; your hurt is in my heart, your loss is in my prayers, your sorrow is in my soul, and your tears are in my eyes.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: By compassion, we make others' misery our own, and so, by relieving them, we relieve ourselves also.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Listening to people talking I could enter into their lives, feel their tattered clothes on my back, walk with my feet in their shoes; their desires, their needs, all passed into my soul or my soul passed into theirs.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: A man to be greatly good must imagine intensely and comprehensively; he must himself in the place of another and in many others; the pains and pleasures of his species must become his own.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: True kindness presupposes the faculty of imagining as one's own the suffering and joys of others.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Empathy is not merely the basic principle of artistic creation. It is also the only path by which one can reach the truth about life and society.
quotes.author: Nagai Kafu

quotes.quote: To understand any living thing, you must, so to say, creep within and feel the beating of its heart.
quotes.author: W. Macneile Dixon

quotes.quote: If we revision human nature to include our innate capacity for empathy, then acting on behalf of others lead to self-fulfillment, rather than personal privation.
quotes.author: Tom Hurley

quotes.quote: Compassion for all things / Love grows from many pieces / A glorious day it’ll be / Empathy among the species.
quotes.author: Dance of the Poet's Pen

quotes.quote: No one cares how much you know until they know how much you care.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Empathy begins with understanding life from another person's perspective. Nobody has an objective experience of reality. It's all through our own individual prisms.
quotes.author: Sterling K. Brown

quotes.quote: When you start to develop your powers of empathy and imagination, the whole world opens up to you.
quotes.author: Susan Sarandon

quotes.quote: Learning to stand in somebody else’s shoes, to see through their eyes, that’s how peace begins. And it’s up to you to make that happen. Empathy is a quality of character that can change the world.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The great gift of human beings is that we have the power of empathy, we can all sense a mysterious connection to each other.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone...just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: It is an absolute human certainty that no one can know his own beauty or perceive a sense of his own worth until it has been reflected back to him in the mirror of another loving, caring human being.
quotes.author: John Joseph Powell

quotes.quote: We think we listen, but very rarely do we listen with real understanding, true empathy. Yet listening, of this very special kind, is one of the most potent forces for change that I know.
quotes.author: Carl Rogers

quotes.quote: Empathy is simply listening, holding space, withholding judgment, emotionally connecting, and communicating that incredibly healing message if you’re not alone.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Empathy is the ability to step outside of your own bubble and into the bubbles of other people.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Even Kings and emperors with heaps of wealth and vast dominion cannot compare with an ant filled with the love of God.
quotes.author: Guru Nanak

quotes.quote: No emperor has the power to dictate to the heart.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: How dangerous emperors are when they go mad.
quotes.author: Walid Jumblatt

quotes.quote: No one would have doubted his ability to reign had he never been emperor.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: The finest plans have always been spoiled by the littleness of them that should carry them out. Even emperors can't do it all by themselves.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: I am Emperor, my descendants will be numerous. From the second generation to the ten thousandth, my line will not end.
quotes.author: Qin Shihuangdi

quotes.quote: Christianity ruined emperors, but saved peoples.
quotes.author: Alfred De Musset

quotes.quote: An emperor in his nightcap will not meet with half the respect of an emperor with a glittering crown.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: The supreme nobility of a Roman emperor does not consist in being a master of slaves, but in being a lord of free men, who loves freedom even in those who serve him.
quotes.author: Julius Evola

quotes.quote: Better a living beggar than a buried emperor.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: If the emperor and the palace officials cannot get along well, the country will surely come to extinction.
quotes.author: Su Shi

quotes.quote: At all times an empire is more important than emperor and empress, prince and princess.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The only emperor is the emperor of ice cream.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: It becomes an emperor to die standing.
quotes.author: Vespasian

quotes.quote: Praise the Emperor whose sacrifice is life as ours is death.
quotes.author: Credo Astronomicon

quotes.quote: You don't need to work hard to earn an empire; there is an army of slaves to do it for you.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Only he who has no use for the empire is fit to be entrusted with it.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: Being a king, emperor, or president is mighty small potatoes compared to being a mother.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: The souls of emperors and cobblers are cast in the same mould.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The emperor indeed is within the Church, not about the Church.
quotes.author: St. Ambrose

quotes.quote: Traitors who prevail are patriots usurpers who succeed are divine emperors.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: An Emperor confides in national soldiers, not in mercenaries.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The emperor is just a man, after all.
quotes.author: Ken Liu

quotes.quote: Genius is not a retainer to any emperor.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: An empire founded by war has to maintain itself by war.
quotes.author: Montesquieu

quotes.quote: To give pain is the tyranny; to make happy, the true empire of beauty.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Look to the past and remember no empire rises that sooner or later won't fall.
quotes.author: Al Stewart

quotes.quote: The most fundamental purpose of government is defense, not empire.
quotes.author: Joseph Sobran

quotes.quote: No one is free who has not obtained the empire of himself.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: A man does not automatically become a public figure because he happens to build an empire out of chicken fat.
quotes.author: James Pinckney Miller

quotes.quote: Fate of empires depends on the education of youth.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: In the eyes of empire builders men are not men but instruments.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: A great empire, like a great cake, is most easily diminished at the edges.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The difference between a republic and an empire is the loyalty of one's army
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: To plunder, to slaughter, to steal, these things they misname empire; and where they make a wilderness, they call it peace.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: Terrorism is the price of empire. If we do not wish to pay it, we must give up the empire.
quotes.author: Pat Buchanan

quotes.quote: But though empires, like all the other works of men, have all hitherto proved mortal, yet every empire aims at immortality.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: Loves are like empires: when the idea they are founded on crumbles, they, too, fade away.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Kings fight for empires, madmen for applause.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: The empires of the future are the empires of the mind.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Look back over the past, with its changing empires that rose and fell, and you can foresee the future too.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: I have lived, Sir, a long time, and the longer I live, the more convincing proofs I see of this truth - that god governs in the affairs of men. And if a sparrow cannot fall to the ground without his notice, is it probable that an empire can rise without his aid?
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The foundation of empire is art and science. Remove them or degrade them, and the empire is no more. Empire follows art and not vice versa as Englishmen suppose.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Truth is treason in the empire of lies.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.quote: Information is the mortar that both builds and destroys empires.
quotes.author: Tobsha Learner

quotes.quote: My mind to me an empire is.
quotes.author: Robert Southwell

quotes.quote: All empire is no more than power in trust.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Makers of empire, they have fought for bigger things than crowns and higher seats than thrones.
quotes.author: Herbert Kaufman

quotes.quote: Empires built on force will always be destroyed. Those built on trust in Christ will remain.
quotes.author: Joseph R. Sizoo

quotes.quote: Empires do not suffer emptiness of purpose at the time of their creation. It is when they have become established that aims are lost and replaced by vague ritual.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: Colors fade, temples crumble, empires fall, but wise words endure.
quotes.author: Edward Thorndike

quotes.quote: Skepticism has never founded empires, established principals, or changed the world's heart. The great doers in history have always been people of faith.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: An employee who's one of hundreds, rather than one of a few, is unlikely to feel personally responsible for helping the organization adapt and change.
quotes.author: Gary Hamel

quotes.quote: The employee is regarded by the employer merely in the light of his value as an operative. His productive capacity alone is taken into account.
quotes.author: Leland Stanford

quotes.quote: Employee engagement is an investment we make for the privilege of staying in business.
quotes.author: Ian Hutchinson

quotes.quote: Resources are hired to give results, not reasons.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Employees who are controlled cannot respond caringly, you need superior knowledge and real leadership, not management. Because of this we specifically developed a selection process for leaders; we don't hire managers.
quotes.author: Horst Schulze

quotes.quote: Employee of the month is a good example of how somebody can be both a winner and a loser at the same time.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Employee fathers need to step up to the plate and put their family needs on the table.
quotes.author: James Levine

quotes.quote: Every employee must be essential to the functions of the organization.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Employers have gone away from the idea that an employee is a long-term asset to the company, someone to be nurtured and developed, to a new notion that they are disposable.
quotes.author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.quote: People want to know they matter and they want to be treated as people. That's the new talent contract.
quotes.author: Pamela Stroko

quotes.quote: Your work is to discover your work and then with all your heart to give yourself to it.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The way your employees feel is the way your customers will feel. And if your employees don't feel valued, neither will your customers.
quotes.author: Sybil F. Stershic

quotes.quote: If we consistently exceed the expectations of employees, they will consistently exceed the expectations of our customers.
quotes.author: Shep Hyken

quotes.quote: Employment was invented to make education seem useful.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Motivating employees to work at their full potential is the main premise of successful management.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: The five steps in teaching an employee new skills are preparation, explanation, showing, observation and supervision.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: Employees who believe that management is concerned about them as a whole person - not just an employee - are more productive, more satisfied, more fulfilled. Satisfied employees mean satisfied customers, which leads to profitability.
quotes.author: Anne M. Mulcahy

quotes.quote: Most employees are smarter than their employers. All employers are braver than their employees.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Understanding your employee's perspective can go a long way towards increasing productivity and happiness.
quotes.author: Kathryn Minshew

quotes.quote: If you fulfill the wishes of your employees, the employees will fulfill your visions.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Every employee, not just the senior people, should know how a company is doing.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Employee participation programs and employee ownership are important efforts to deal with powerlessness at work.
quotes.author: Daniel Yankelovich

quotes.quote: Your assets are your employees. Invest more on those performing well. Let the non performers go.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: A great employee is like a four leaf clover, hard to find and lucky to have.
quotes.author: Tammy Cohen

quotes.quote: Employees who don't feel significant rarely make significant contributions.
quotes.author: Mark Sanborn

quotes.quote: You cannot love an employee into creativity, although you can avoid his dissatisfactions with the way you treat him.
quotes.author: Frederick Herzberg

quotes.quote: For employee success, loyalty and integrity are equally as important as ability.
quotes.author: Harry F. Banks

quotes.quote: Realize that employees and the customers both have to be engaged, at the same time, to move your business forward for sustainable success.
quotes.author: Robert G. Thompson

quotes.quote: One mistake employees do is to work for the employers' success at their own expense.
quotes.author: John Muhaise Bikalemesa

quotes.quote: An employee's motivation is a direct result of the sum of interactions with his or her manager.
quotes.author: Bob Nelson

quotes.quote: Treat employees like partners, and they act like partners.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: Every employee can affect your company's brand, not just the front-line employees that are paid to talk to your customers.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.quote: Being an employee is a bad outcome. You want to avoid that. Being an employee is never a good outcome. That's just an opinion.
quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.quote: The employee who is far behind in her work is probably far ahead on her coffee breaks.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The good old days were an era when the day was done before the worker was.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: There are a dozen taxpayers born every hour, and one government worker to live off them.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Ability can take you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: What you do off the job is the determining factor in how far you go on the job.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The best job goes to the person who can get it done without passing the buck or coming back with excuses.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: High achievement always takes place in a framework of high expectation.
quotes.author: Jack Kinder

quotes.quote: Man is always more than he know of himself; consequently, his accomplishments, time and again, will come as a surprise to him.
quotes.author: Golo Mann

quotes.quote: I am always doing things I can't do, that's how I get to do them.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Employees make the best dates. You don't have to pick them up and they're always tax deductible.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: If a job's worth doing, make sure you delegate it to the right person.
quotes.author: Geoff Tibballs

quotes.quote: If two men on the same job agree all the time, then one is useless. If they disagree all the time, then both are useless.
quotes.author: Geoff Tibballs

quotes.quote: A career is a job that has gone too long.
quotes.author: Geoff Tibballs

quotes.quote: When your work speaks for itself, don't interrupt.
quotes.author: Henry John Kaiser

quotes.quote: Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: You know you're getting old when work is a lot less fun and fun is a lot more work.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: As a cure for worrying, work is better than whisky.
quotes.author: Thomas Alva Edison

quotes.quote: I've always felt England was a great place to work in. It's an island and the audience can't run very far.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: No degree of dullness can safeguard a work against the determination of critics to find it fascinating.
quotes.author: Harold Rosenberg

quotes.quote: At work, the authority of a person is inversely proportional to the number of pens he or she is carrying.
quotes.author: Geoff Tibballs

quotes.quote: The way to deal with a boss who steals credit for what you've done is to do inferior work.
quotes.author: Al Franken

quotes.quote: Men have the same choice we've always had: work or prison.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: Paychecks can't buy passion.
quotes.author: Brad Federman

quotes.quote: Somebody once said that in looking for people to hire, you look for three qualities: integrity, intelligence, and energy. And if you don't have the first, the other two will kill you. You think about it; it's true. If you hire somebody without [integrity], you really want them to be dumb and lazy."
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Employees engage with employers and brands when they're treated as humans worthy of respect.
quotes.author: Meghan Biro

quotes.quote: Create caring and robust connections between every employee and their work, customers, leaders, managers, and the organization to achieve results that matter to everyone in this sentence.
quotes.author: David Zinger

quotes.quote: The value of a business is a function of how well the financial capital and the intellectual capital are managed by the human capital. You'd better get the human capital part right.
quotes.author: Dave Bookbinder

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: People want to know they matter and they want to be treated as people. That's the new talent contract.
quotes.author: Pamela Stroko

quotes.quote: An engaged employee understands what to do to help her company succeed, she feels emotionally connected to the organization and its leaders, and she is willing to put that knowledge and emotion into action to improve performance, her own and the organization's.
quotes.author: Julie Gebauer & Don Lowman

quotes.quote: Appreciate everything your associates do for the business. Nothing else can quite substitute for a few well-chosen, well-timed, sincere words of praise. They're absolutely free and worth a fortune.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: Throw yourself into some work you believe in with all your heart, live for it, die for it, and you will find happiness that you had thought could never be yours.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Highly engaged employees make the customer experience. Disengaged employees break it.
quotes.author: Timothy R. Clark

quotes.quote: Culture is about performance, and making people feel good about how they contribute to the whole.
quotes.author: Tracy Streckenbach

quotes.quote: Your number one customers are your people. Look after employees first and then customers last.
quotes.author: Ian Hutchinson

quotes.quote: Brand is how others see you, culture is how you see yourself.
quotes.author: Curt Coffman

quotes.quote: It is never an idea, technology, market forces, or access to capital that makes a company innovative. What differentiates an innovative company from an average company is the people working inside the company.
quotes.author: Jag Randhawa

quotes.quote: The way your employees feel is the way your customers will feel. And if your employees don't feel valued, neither will your customers.
quotes.author: Sybil F. Stershic

quotes.quote: You can't sell it outside if you can't sell it inside.
quotes.author: Stan Slap

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Employee engagement is an investment we make for the privilege of staying in business.
quotes.author: Ian Hutchinson

quotes.quote: It's impossible to win the hearts and minds of people unless you clearly establish goals and values and reward people if they act in a way that leads to the fulfilment of those objectives.
quotes.author: F. Robert Salerno

quotes.quote: our work is to discover your work and then with all your heart to give yourself to it.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: There are many ways to motivate people to do things, but loyalty comes from the ability to inspire people.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: This is a no-brainer: Every leader, every CEO wants engaged employees. After all, an engaged employee is a happy employee, and happy employees produce.
quotes.author: Jeff Boss

quotes.quote: The best executive is the one who has sense enough to pick good men to do what he wants done, and self-restraint enough to keep from meddling with them while they do it.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Employees who believe that management is concerned about them as a whole person â€“ not just an employee â€“ are more productive, more satisfied, more fulfilled. Satisfied employees mean satisfied customers, which leads to profitability.
quotes.author: Anne Mulcahy

quotes.quote: There are only three measurements that tell you nearly everything you need to know about your organization's overall performance: employee engagement, customer satisfaction, and cash flow. It goes without saying that no company, small or large, can win over the long run without energized employees who believe in the mission and understand how to achieve it.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: It is equally important to know if we have a happy and engaged workforce as it is to have a profitable bottom line.
quotes.author: Vern Dosch

quotes.quote: When people go to work, they shouldn't have to leave their hearts at home.
quotes.author: Betty Bender

quotes.quote: Employee engagement is the art and science of engaging people in authentic and recognized connections to strategy, roles, performance, organization, community, relationship, customers, development, energy, and happiness to leverage, sustain, and transform work into results.
quotes.author: David Zinger

quotes.quote: On what high-performing companies should be striving to create: A great place for great people to do great work.
quotes.author: Marilyn Carlson

quotes.quote: Always treat your employees exactly as you want them to treat your best customers.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: When people are financially invested, they want a return. When people are emotionally invested, they want to contribute.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Throw yourself into some work you believe in with all you heart, live for it, die for it, and you will find happiness that you had thought could never be yours.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Employee engagement is the emotional commitment the employee has to the organization and its goals.
quotes.author: Kevin Kruse

quotes.quote: When a person is engaged, dedication to their craft, desire to achieve, and relentless commitment to make a difference is palpable. You can see it, hear it, and feel itâ€¦and it is contagious!
quotes.author: Kevin E. Phillips

quotes.quote: Connect the dots between individual roles and the goals of the organization. When people see that connection, they get a lot of energy out of work. They feel the importance, dignity, and meaning in their job.
quotes.author: Scott Blanchard

quotes.quote: It's about getting the best people, retaining them, nurturing a creative environment & helping to find a way to innovate.
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.quote: Happy employees ensure happy customers. And happy customers ensure happy shareholdersâ€”in that order.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: To build a culture of engagement it is important to incorporate training on intrinsic motivation and employee engagement into management development programs.
quotes.author: Kenneth Thomas

quotes.quote: Engaged employees are in the game for the sake of the game, they believe in the cause of the organization.
quotes.author: Paul Marciano

quotes.quote: Research indicates that workers have three prime needs: Interesting work, recognition for doing a good job, and being let in on things that are going on in the company.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A group of people get together and exist as an institution we call a company so they are able to accomplish something collectively that they could not accomplish separately â€“ they make a contribution to society, a phrase which sounds trite but is fundamental.
quotes.author: David Packard

quotes.quote: People leave when they don't feel appreciated. That's why we've made recognition a really high value. Our business is people-capability first; then you satisfy customers; then you make money.
quotes.author: David Novak

quotes.quote: Average companies give their people something to work on. In contrast, the most innovative organizations give their people something to work toward.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: You can't inspire and lead people without earning their attention. You achieve that in a counter-intuitive way â€“ by paying close attention to what interests them.
quotes.author: Phil Dourado

quotes.quote: Engaged employees stay for what they give (they like their work); disengaged employees stay for what they get (favorable job conditions, growth opportunities, job security).
quotes.author: Blessing White

quotes.quote: To win in the marketplace you must first win in the workplace.
quotes.author: Doug Conant

quotes.quote: The simple act of paying positive attention to people has a great deal to do with productivity.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: If you hire people just because they can do a job, they'll work for your money. But if you hire people who believe what you believe, they'll work for you with blood, sweat, and tears.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: When your employees trust you, they perform at a higher level. When you help them envision their career path, staff members engage.
quotes.author: Lisa Ryan

quotes.quote: Harness the power of thanks and your organization will reap the rewards.
quotes.author: Lisa Ryan

quotes.quote: Connect the dots between individual roles and the goals of the organization. When people see that connection, they get a lot of energy out of work. They feel the importance, dignity, and meaning in their job.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: You manage things; you lead people.
quotes.author: Grace Hopper

quotes.quote: Being a good leader requires remembering that you're there for a reason, and the reason certainly isn't to have your way. High-integrity leaders not only welcome questioning and criticism— they insist on it.
quotes.author: Travis Bradberry

quotes.quote: A boss has the title, a leader has the people.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Lead from the back and let others believe they are in front.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The art of leadership is saying no, not yes. It is very easy to say yes.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: A genuine leader is not a searcher for consensus but a molder of consensus.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: We cannot lead anyone farther than we have been ourselves.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: In time, every post tends to be occupied by an employee who is incompetent to carry out his duties.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peters

quotes.quote: Never hire someone who knows less than you do about what he's hired to do.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: When you hire people who are smarter than you are, you prove you are smarter than they are.
quotes.author: Richard Grant

quotes.quote: You can employ men and hire hands to work for you, but you must win their hearts to have them work with you.
quotes.author: Tiorio

quotes.quote: The man who gives me employment, which I must have or suffer, that man is my master, let me call him what I will.
quotes.author: Henry George

quotes.quote: Management is the art of getting three men to do three men's work.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Every person engaged in a given enterprise is called upon to perform a managerial function, or at least to perform a function that is directly serving the purpose of management.
quotes.author: Donaldson Brown

quotes.quote: Employees who believe that management is concerned about them as a whole person – not just an employee – are more productive, more satisfied, more fulfilled. Satisfied employees mean satisfied customers, which leads to profitability.
quotes.author: Anne Mulcahy

quotes.quote: Business and human endeavors are systems... We tend to focus on snapshots of isolated parts of the system. And wonder why our deepest problems never get solved.
quotes.author: Peter Senge

quotes.quote: This is the only country in the world where today’s employee is tomorrow’s employer.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.quote: Dispirited, unmotivated, unappreciated workers cannot compete in a highly competitive world.
quotes.author: Frances Hesselbein

quotes.quote: I consider my ability to arouse enthusiasm among men the greatest asset I possess. The way to develop the best that is in a man is by appreciation and encouragement.
quotes.author: Charles Schwab

quotes.quote: A good coach can change a game. A great coach can change a life.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Take time to appreciate employees and they will reciprocate in a thousand ways.
quotes.author: Bob Nelson

quotes.quote: The greatest asset of a company is its people.
quotes.author: Jorge Paulo

quotes.quote: We think it’s important for employees to have fun. It drives employee engagement.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.quote: If you fulfill the wishes of your employees, the employees will fulfill your visions.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Some companies don't have an engagement problem, they have a hiring problem.
quotes.author: Bob Kelleher

quotes.quote: Motivating employees to work at their full potential is the main premise of successful management.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: Environments that support their employees in the right way will naturally foster employee engagement.
quotes.author: Aaron Tucker

quotes.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, I will try again tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Maria Robinson

quotes.quote: We cannot all succeed when half of us are held back.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Achievement seems to be connected with action. Successful men and women keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: We may not all live holy lives, but we live in a world alive with holy moments.
quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

quotes.quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our Light, not our Darkness, that most frightens us.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Forget about the fast lane. If you really want to fly, just harness your power to your passion.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: When we argue for our limitations, we get to keep them.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.quote: Laughter gives us distance. It allows us to step back from an event, deal with it and then move on.
quotes.author: Bob Newhart

quotes.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself instead of a second-rate version of someone else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life is not about waiting for the storms to passâ€¦ It's about learning how to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Vivian Greene

quotes.quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We keep moving forward, opening new doors, and doing new things, because we're curious and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: When nothing is sure, everything is possible.
quotes.author: Margaret Drabble

quotes.quote: You can't just hope for happy endings. You have to believe in them. Then do the work, take the risks.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
quotes.author: Alice Walker.

quotes.quote: Divide and conquer must become define and empower.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: When you forgive, you heal your own anger and hurt and are able to let love lead again. It's like spring cleaning for your heart.
quotes.author: Marci Shimoff

quotes.quote: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed on an equal or greater benefit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Always go with the choice that scares you the most, because that's the one that is going to require the most from you
quotes.author: Caroline Myss.

quotes.quote: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
quotes.author: Arnold Glasgow

quotes.quote: Stand up and walk out of your history.
quotes.author: Dr. Phil McGraw

quotes.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: I always tell my kids if you lay down, people will step over you. But if you keep scrambling, if you keep going, someone will always, always give you a hand. Always. But you gotta keep dancing, you gotta keep your feet moving.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Whenever an emotion overtakes you, if even once you can just be without moving your body, without co-operatin with your emotion you wil be liberated from that emotion.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back because if you can look up, you can get up.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: It is better to live your own destiny imperfectly than to live an imitation of someone elses life with perfection.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Every morning is a new beginning, a new chance for you to rewrite the story of your life.
quotes.author: Tina Su

quotes.quote: Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. The fearful are caught as often as the bold.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Everything you are against weakens you. Everything you are for empowers you.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Every time you are tempted to react in the same old way, ask yourself if you want to be a prisoner of the past or a pioneer of the future.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Let individuals create real wealth, empower them, create something that they can leave for their children.
quotes.author: John Sununu

quotes.quote: Happiness is an attitude. We either make ourselves miserable, or happy and strong. The amount of work is the same.
quotes.author: Francesca Reigler

quotes.quote: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning to sail my ship.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott.

quotes.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: We need to reshape our own perception of how we view ourselves. We have to step up as women and take the lead.
quotes.author: Beyonce

quotes.quote: Economic freedom is very important for women empowerment. They must be partners in economic development also. I have seen that women are very good at adapting to latest technology. We should link women and technology up-gradation.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: Empowering women is key to building a future we want.
quotes.author: Amartya Sen

quotes.quote: A woman with a voice is by definition a strong woman. But the search to find that voice can be remarkably difficult.
quotes.author: Melinda Gates

quotes.quote: The true wealth of a community is measured by how carefully it listens to its women and how sincerely it values their wisdom. Empowering women empowers us all.
quotes.author: Forest Whitaker

quotes.quote: Empowering women isn't just the right thing to do - it's the smart thing to do.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you empower women, you can change the world.
quotes.author: Meg Ryan

quotes.quote: Women have to harness their power â€“ it's absolutely true. It's just learning not to take the first no. And if you can't go straight ahead, you go around the corner.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: We need women at all levels, including the top, to change the dynamic, reshape the conversation, to make sure women's voices are heard and heeded, not overlooked and ignored.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: Since violence is largely a male pastime, cultures that empower women tend to move away from the glorification of violence and are less likely to breed dangerous subcultures of rootless young men.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: As women are empowered, violence can come down, for a number of reasons. By all measures, men are the more violent gender.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: When you empower women and help them thrive, you help their communities thrive. Women shoulder the burden disproportionately.
quotes.author: Joy Bryant

quotes.quote: If you really want to change a culture to empower women improve basic hygiene and health care and fight high rates of infant mortality the answer is to educate girls.
quotes.author: Greg Mortenson

quotes.quote: A strong woman understands that the gifts such as logic, decisiveness, and strength are just as feminine as intuition and emotional connection. She values and uses all of her gifts.
quotes.author: Nancy Rathburn

quotes.quote: Empower us women and we will change this whole entire world.
quotes.author: Alicia Keys

quotes.quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture and transform.
quotes.author: Diane Mariechild

quotes.quote: If you economically empower a woman, she represents enormous opportunity that can actually be transformative not only for her family and for her community, but at the aggregate level for the economy.
quotes.author: Sheryl Wudunn

quotes.quote: I think the most important thing people can do to save our planet and the human race is to empower women!
quotes.author: Robert Ballard

quotes.quote: The education and empowerment of women throughout the world cannot fail to result in a more caring, tolerant, just and peaceful life for all.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: Empowering women means trusting them.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: If we don't empower women, we don't allow them to unlock the potential of themselves and their children.
quotes.author: Melinda Gates

quotes.quote: Women empowering other women.They get the psycho-social support. They become part of a community.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.quote: We need to empower women: provide them with work for their own income, and teach them to become independent of men so they will never have to have their children suffering the same torture.
quotes.author: Waris Dirie

quotes.quote: The empowered woman is powerful beyond measure and beautiful beyond description.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli
Margaret Sanger

quotes.quote: That's not to say that women's priorities are better than men's. Rather, when women are empowered, when they can speak from the experience of their own lives, they often address different, previously neglected issues. And families and whole communities benefit.
quotes.author: Dee Dee Myers

quotes.quote: Empowering women isn't for women, but for the world.
quotes.author: Amy Richards

quotes.quote: We need to empower women. Give women a voice in the decision-making process. Give women a political voice where they can champion, for their own welfare. And, of course, for us. United Nations â€“ organizations, agencies â€“ we need to do our part.
quotes.author: Margaret Chan

quotes.quote: I wanted to be an empowered woman, and I became an empowered woman. And now I want to empower every woman. And I do it through my clothes, I do it through my words, I do it through my money, I do it through everything.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: I have always felt strongly about empowering women. I'm living proof that, with confidence and by believing in yourself, you can accomplish any goal.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: By empowering a woman, we empower a child. By educating a girl child, we make it possible for her to grow up to become an empowered woman.
quotes.author: Winnie Byanyima

quotes.quote: Women are leaders everywhere you lookâ€”from the CEO who runs a Fortune 500 company to the housewife who raises her children and heads her household. Our country was built by strong women, and we will continue to break down walls and defy stereotypes.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.quote: Any woman who understands the problems of running a home will be nearer to understanding the problems of running a country.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Societies that empower women are less violent in every way.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: Woman must not accept; she must challenge. She must not be awed by that which has been built up around her; she must reverence that woman in her which struggles for expression.
quotes.author: Margaret Sanger

quotes.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Your own words are the bricks and mortar of the dreams you want to realize. Your words are the greatest power you have. The words you choose and their use establish the life you experience.
quotes.author: Sonia Croquette

quotes.quote: We never know how high we are Till we are called to rise;And then, if we are true to plan, Our statures touch the skies.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we are not really living. Growth demands a temporary surrender of security.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
quotes.author: Pamela Vaull Starr

quotes.quote: You have been criticizing yourself for years, and it hasn't worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens.
quotes.author: Louise L. Hay

quotes.quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Muriel Strode

quotes.quote: If you're able to be yourself, then you have no competition. All you have to do is get closer and closer to that essence.
quotes.author: Barbara Cook

quotes.quote: Nurture your mind with great thoughts, for you will never go any higher than you think.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The question isn't who's going to let me; it's who's going to stop me.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: It took me quite a long time to develop a voice, and now that I have it, I am not going to be silent.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.quote: Instead of looking at the past, I put myself ahead twenty years and try to look at what I need to do now in order to get there then
quotes.author: Diana Ross

quotes.quote: I could not, at any age, be content to take my place by the fireside and simply look on. Life was meant to be lived. Curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Never dull your shine for somebody else.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing must be attained.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Don't ask yourself what the world needs, ask yourself what makes you come alive. And then go and do that. Because what the world needs is people who are alive.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Maria Robinson

quotes.quote: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
quotes.author: Sri Ram

quotes.quote: Our greatness lies not so much in being able to remake the world as in being able to remake ourselves.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If you don't make mistakes, you're not working on hard enough problems. And that's a big mistake.
quotes.author: F. Wikzek

quotes.quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Always make your future bigger than your past.
quotes.author: Dan Sullivan

quotes.quote: The great leaders are like the best conductors - they reach beyond the notes to reach the magic in the players.
quotes.author: Blaine Lee

quotes.quote: Power can be taken, but not given. The process of the taking is empowerment in itself.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity
quotes.author: General George Smith Patton

quotes.quote: One of the most courageous things you can do is identify yourself, know who you are, what you believe in and where you want to go.
quotes.author: Sheila Murray Bethel

quotes.quote: Courage is like a muscle. We strengthen it by use
quotes.author: Ruth Gordo

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: How wrong is it for a woman to expect the man to build the world she wants, rather than to create it herself?
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: A lot of people are afraid to say what they want. That's why they don't get what they want.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You cannot get through a single day without having an impact on the world around you. What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that frightens us. We ask ourselves, who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of courage to stand up to your enemies, but even more to stand up to your friends.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: You are Beautiful ~ You are a beautiful soul. The light that emanates from you has the power to heal and transform others. Your unique and magnificent expression is unlike any others' on the entire planet. Your beauty makes the world a better place the beauty that radiates from your heart is a gift to others.
quotes.author: Christine Kloser

quotes.quote: An authentically empowered person is humble. This does not mean the false humility of one who stoops to be with those who are below him or her. It is the inclusiveness of one who responds to the beauty of each soul. It is the harmlessness of one who treasures, honors,and reveres life in all its forms.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: My goal is not to be better than anyone else..but to be better that I used to be.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
quotes.author: Dr.Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: One little known secret to making precisely the right move, at precisely the right time in your life is knowing that in all cases, there is more than one right move and more than one right time. Lots and lots more.
quotes.author: Mike Dooley

quotes.quote: Authentic empowerment is the knowing that you are on purpose, doing God's work, peacefully and harmoniously.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: There's a basic philosophy here that by empowering...workers you'll make their jobs far more interesting, and they'll be able to work at a higher level than they would have without all that information just a few clicks away.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: You may never know what results come of your action, but if you do nothing there will be no result
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: An idea is never given to you without you being given the power to make it reality. You must, nevertheless, suffer for it.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: AUTONOMOUS NURTURING. Not waiting for someone to give you what you can give yourself.
quotes.author: Rob Brezsny

quotes.quote: I felt very still and empty, the way the eye of a tornado must feel, moving dully along in the middle of the surrounding hullabaloo.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: I said nothing for a time, just ran my fingertips along the edge of the human-shaped emptiness that had been left inside me.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: The artist's job is not to succumb to despair but to find an antidote for the emptiness of existence.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: There's just something obvious about emptiness, even when you try to convince yourself otherwise.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: You can only fit so many words in a postcard, only so many in a phone call, only so many into space before you forget that words are sometimes used for things other than filling emptiness.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: Beyond the edge of the world there’s a space where emptiness and substance neatly overlap, where past and future form a continuous, endless loop. And, hovering about, there are signs no one has ever read, chords no one has ever heard.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Emptiness which is conceptually liable to be mistaken for sheer nothingness is in fact the reservoir of infinite possibilities.
quotes.author: Daisetz Teitaro Suzuki

quotes.quote:
Become totally empty
Quiet the restlessness of the mind
Only then will you witness everything unfolding from emptiness
quotes.author: LaoTzu

quotes.quote: She was tired, with that tiredness that only emptiness brings.
quotes.author: Paolo Giordano

quotes.quote: In all our searching, the only thing we've found that makes the emptiness bearable is each other.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: If emptiness is empty, how can something be borne or awaken from it
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Being empty makes me whole sometimes. I wonder if every hollow hole has its own solidity of fulfillment.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: They are words that are easy enough to say and which fill vast empty spaces.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Empty your mind, be formless, shapeless like water.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee
