quotes.quote: Some people feel like they don't deserve love. They walk away quietly into empty spaces, trying to close the gaps of the past.
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

quotes.quote:
Gold will never fill an empty heart.
Does the world bow to an empty throne?
quotes.author: Dorothy Clarke Wilson

quotes.quote: Sometimes someone says something really small and it just fits into this empty place in your heart.
quotes.author: Winnie Holzman

quotes.quote: The emptiness cannot be destroyed; it had to be filled with love.
quotes.author: Karin Howard

quotes.quote: That thought makes me feel less empty; Makes my desperation less worse.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.quote: All of a sudden, emptiness turns into abundance, and desperation turns into life. It's like a temporary death's sentence strike.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.quote: To all mankind, may we never find space so vast, planets so cold, heart and mind so empty that... that we cannot fill them with love and warmth.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: I don't condemn you for wanting somebody to love. I guess I just reject the notion that your life is empty without a man.
quotes.author: David E. Kelley

quotes.quote: That is also negligible, but you're wrong. Being empty means you can be filled, right? without limitations.
quotes.author: Kinoko Nasu

quotes.quote: The hopeless emptiness? Now, you've said it. Plenty of people are on to the emptiness; but, it takes real guts to see the hopelessness. Wow.
quotes.author: Justin Haythe

quotes.quote: I thought that beauty alone would satisfy. But the soul is gone. I can't bear those empty, staring eyes.
quotes.author: Garnett Weston

quotes.quote: Be grateful you have someone to keep you company. Your heart is empty. Were it not for the darkness in your heart... you would be completely alone.
quotes.author: Daisuke Watanabe

quotes.quote: The trick to beating fear is to live a life so full that there is no room for it. Fear thrives in emptiness son, so just fill it up Teddy, I know u can do it.
quotes.author: David Flebotte

quotes.quote: And go out of your way for others / Sit beneath a light that suits ya / And look forward to a brighter future / Life ain't always empty
quotes.author: Grian Alexander Chatten

quotes.quote: I know I'm god in my mind / But God is still who I call, all in all / Woke up feeling empty, I feel empty, yeah, I feel empty (Empty)
quotes.author: Christopher Gibbs

quotes.quote: I cry when you do, I cry when you don't / Why won't you tell me what, what you want with me / One day we're together then we're apart / Why won't you let me fill up your empty heart
quotes.author: Grace Potter

quotes.quote: But now there's not a star left in the sky / And if you don't come back to me I'll die / Only your embrace can fill this empty place
quotes.author: Burt Bacharach

quotes.quote: The diamond cuts her eye / The crowd beyond went wild / They weren't all that proud / By now they hear it loud / Living in an empty world
quotes.author: Julian Casablancas

quotes.quote: Have a lot an still wanting / Jah without you we're empty / Fill us up with your mercy
quotes.author: Rochester

quotes.quote: Even people who devote their entire lives to prayer (monk, for instance) go through 'dry' or 'empty' periods in their spiritual lives.
quotes.author: Craig R Wagner

quotes.quote: Few people come to therapy because they feel empty inside. It's not a disorder in and of itself life anxiety or depression. Nor, is it experienced by most people as a symptom that interferes with their lives.
quotes.author: Jonice Webb

quotes.quote: Empty feeling arise from not having been filled up emotionally as a child.
quotes.author: Jonice Webb

quotes.quote: You are all walking around like empty cups. Your cups should be filled with love, and be over flowing from you to others.
quotes.author: Dr. Jodi-Anne M Smith

quotes.quote: By isolating yourself out of fear, your cup stays empty. You get stuck in fear, and that is the opposite vibration of love.
quotes.author: Dr. Jodi-Anne M Smith

quotes.quote: Keeping yourself caught in that dynamic of feeling bad, victimized, empty of joy and vitality. You are punishing yourself with your choice of thoughts, and actions that will result from that level of thinking.
quotes.author: Dr. Jodi-Anne M Smith

quotes.quote: The difference between being full and empty is not usually the difference between rich and or poor, at home, or away, cupboards bursting or thinly lined with soup cans and Ramen noodles. The difference, almost always, is gratitude.
quotes.author: Nancy Leigh Demoss

quotes.quote: You can replace emptiness with a positive feeling that if you work on yourself to be the best you can possibly be.
quotes.author: Sandra Cabot MD

quotes.quote: Gorse is a beautiful flower that helps in all those times when the spirit feels empty and devoid of solutions, but nevertheless, continues to hope in the solution that others offer.
quotes.author: Daphne & Cloe

quotes.quote: Ignoring Essence's deeper drives and, instead, believing our fears and obeying our conditioning can leave us depressed and feeling empty and hopeless.
quotes.author: Gina Lake

quotes.quote: The ego us never fulfilled because it never feels full but empty.
quotes.author: Gina Lake

quotes.quote: Let go of mind-numbing activities or pursuits that leave you feeling empty. Take time each day to do something nurturing for yourself. Remember to breathe deeply.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wotton

quotes.quote: When my soul feels empty, I pick up a pen and write out hat's going on inside me.
quotes.author: Anne M. Fletcher

quotes.quote: Living with internal pain such as emptiness, anxiety, worry, agitation, irritability, leads to disturbed lifestyle where people made in the image of God end up living subhuman lives.
quotes.author: James A. Dauer

quotes.quote: People that feel really empty, feel so miserable that they will often do something on a compulsory level and the consequences are troublesome. Empty cups are thirsty and will not be ignored!
quotes.author: James A. Dauer

quotes.quote: Self psychology can be helpful in our understanding of the concept of emptiness.
quotes.author: Charles R. Wang

quotes.quote: The emptiness of an object---that which excludes the true existence of that object---would not reach its true nature.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: EMTs are privileged to play in life’s great game. Too many unlucky people watch the action thunder by, stuck at a desk, or watching it on television at home.
quotes.author: Kelly Grayson

quotes.quote: Answer the urgent call. Help when tragedy strikes. And do it for free.
quotes.author: Isabella Koldras

quotes.quote: If an EMT calls in with a brain or spinal trauma, just divert them to the nearest hospital. All you gotta do is stand around and keep the E.R. open. It's an administrative problem, not a medical one.
quotes.author: Dr. Gregory House

quotes.quote: I didn’t become an EMT to have a front-row seat to other people’s tragedies. I did it because I knew the world was bleeding and so was I, and somewhere deep down inside I knew the only way to stop my own bleeding was to learn how to stop someone else’s.
quotes.author: Daniel Jose Older

quotes.quote: On September 11, 2001, thousands of first responders heroically rushed to the scene and saved tens of thousands of lives. More than 400 of those first responders did not make it out alive. In rushing into those burning buildings, not one of them asked "What God do you pray to?" "What beliefs do you hold?"
quotes.author: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.quote: This man was not thinking about himself. He was thinking about you. The first responders on the front lines.
quotes.author: Captain David Singh

quotes.quote: One single word â€“ like EMERGENCY, or love â€“ can revise a whole night. A whole life.
quotes.author: Alena Graedon

quotes.quote: Caring of patients in the EMS environment is like riding a motorcycle: the moment you get comfortable and think you've seen everything, you become dangerous.
quotes.author: David Persse

quotes.quote: Police officers, firefighters, EMTs - they are all out there every single day - literally just a phone call away for anyone who needs them.
quotes.author: Doreen Cronin

quotes.quote: Be Prepared... the meaning of the motto is that a scout must prepare himself by previous thinking out and practicing how to act on any accident or emergency so that he is never taken by surprise.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: The most basic job of an EMT is to notice things and then wonder about them.
quotes.author: Thom Dick

quotes.quote: You have to keep the body going until the brain and the heart recover enough to go on their own.
quotes.author: Joe Connelly

quotes.quote: When you first become an EMT, you are extremely gung-ho, with a sense that you save lives, ... You are the antidote to all of life's miseries. You make people rise from the dead. But when you are an EMT for a length of time, you come to the grim reality that the number of lives that you actually save are small. You stabilize people until they get to the hospital. You make sure they can breathe and don't bleed to death and nothing more.
quotes.author: Michael Stern

quotes.quote: There is no higher honor than to be given the responsibility to care for another human being.
quotes.author: Richard K. Schachern

quotes.quote: Next to creating a life, the finest thing a man can do is save one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: You can't get through a lot of doors unless you are at least perceived as an EMS professional.
quotes.author: Skip Kirkwood

quotes.quote: Life can be a piece of art, a magic enchantment, a fetching fairy tale or an adventurous story trimmed with alluring episodes. But it may as well be a delusive or hazardous act with many wildcat players seeming to be what they are actually not.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: Incidentally, the world is magical. Magic is simply what's off our human scale... at the moment.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: The psychic witch lives in a state of enchantment, seeing all things as magical and understanding that the universe is composed of endless possibilities and potential. The psychic witch sees a door where others see a wall
quotes.author: Mat Auryn

quotes.quote: Enchantment, even for a day, can make a whole life bearable.
quotes.author: Larry Colker

quotes.quote: We're invited to pay attention to the enchanted world around us in a new way, to be open to the possibility of an encounter with God at every moment.
quotes.author: Mike Cosper

quotes.quote: A sensual lifestyle is all about making a shift from the old way of thinking and stepping into a new one that allows you to be more enchanting.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: Every repast can have soul and can be enchanting; it asks for only a small degree of mindfulness and a habit of doing things with care and imagination.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: People who resist their sensuality resist a better version of themselves and, essentially, their own evolution towards living a more enchanting life.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: We come into the world with an inherent awareness of the magical and an understanding of the enchanted life.
quotes.author: Lynn Williams

quotes.quote: Every age can be enchanting, provided you live within it.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: Charm: the quality in others that makes us more satisfied with ourselves.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: If it is enchantment, I hope it is forever. If it is a dream, I wish never to awaken.
quotes.author: Joseph Schrank

quotes.quote: Your power has enchanted me, I stand helpless against it. Come to me now, tonight let me worship you in my arms.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: I have seen the lights in your eyes / And now / I am glorifying my tragic destiny / Dreams can be wholesome for me / Life is a tormented dream for me / Mesmerize me, enchant me
quotes.author: Anka Wolbert

quotes.quote: I need no soft lights / To enchant me / If you'll only grant me / The right to hold you ever so tight / And to feel in the night the nearness of you
quotes.author: Hoagy Carmichael

quotes.quote: I hear a laugh, it awoke my soul / The wind takes the leaves / Where he wants them to go / His tunes enchant our world / Our thoughts and leave us frozen
quotes.author: Robert Westerholt

quotes.quote: However even if these tiny and inconspicuous little things didn't make the slightest of impact on any of the animate world; they were definitely enough to metamorphose my life from one of gloom and constant despair; to enchanting paradise.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: And the celestial stupor which the savagely bubbling / day thoroughly failed to provide; was profoundly / imparted by the magnificently enchanting night.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Enchanting scenes of young delight, / How changed since first ye rose to sight; / Since first ye rose in infant glories drest / Fresh from the wave, and rear'd your ample breast
quotes.author: Helen Maria Williams

quotes.quote: It flashes o'er the bright'ning deep, / It softens Britain's frowning steep— / 'Tis mild benignant Peace, enchanting form! / That gilds the black abyss, that lulls the storm.
quotes.author: Helen Maria Williams

quotes.quote: And Loch Avoulyen lies like a silver sea with its forests green, / With its fields of rushes and headlands most enchanting to be seen
quotes.author: William Topaz McGonagall

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence.
quotes.author: David Bryne

quotes.quote: Having a delightful life of worship requires you to constantly thank God for His mercies in a similar way that you pray for your daily needs.
quotes.author: Wesley J. Malcolm

quotes.quote: We want life to be more than just the daily grind; we want it to have meaning and purpose. We want it to have enchantment.
quotes.author: Lynn Williams

quotes.quote: Delightful is that, and delightful / The salt main on which the seagulls cry / On my coming from Derry far; / Is is quite, and it is delightful.
quotes.author: George Douglas Campbell Duke of Argyll

quotes.quote: This is why the first step of enchantment is to get people to like you. To accomplish this, you'll need to accept others and find something to like in them.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Imagine working for someone you've enchanted. This benefits include freedom, flexibility, and mentoring.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Enchantment can occur in villages, stores, dealerships, offices, boardrooms, and on the internet. It causes a voluntary change if hearts and minds and therefore actions.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Enchantment transforms situations and relationships. It converts hostility into civility.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Fascination is an instinctive form of connection. We all have this ability in some form. But over time, people can lose their innate ability to fascinate.
quotes.author: Sally Hogshead

quotes.quote: On the day you were born, you already knew how to fascinate. Like breathing and swallowing and smiling. the ability to fascinate is a hardwired survival mechanism.
quotes.author: Sally Hogshead

quotes.quote: The sacred dimension of romance is what lovers long for now: the magical space of an enchanted intimacy.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Ladies and gentleman, ladies and gentleman... this world, this world that we live in is full of enchantment for those with eyes to see it.
quotes.author: Terry Gilliam

quotes.quote: There again, we could be foolish not to quit while we're ahead. For distance lends enchantment.
quotes.author: Tim Rice

quotes.quote: An enchanting word. So civilized, and full of possibilities.
quotes.author: Santiago Moncada

quotes.quote: Enchantment and seduction were fine means of persuasion, but when time is short, an awkward but quick concussion could better serve a girl's purpose.
quotes.author: Christopher Moore

quotes.quote: Enchantment is the oldest form of medicine.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Enchantment is the purest form of sales. Enchantment is all about changing people's hearts, minds and actions because you provide them a vision or a way to do things better. The difference between enchantment and simple sales is that with enchantment you have the other person's best interests at heart, too.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Enchantment lies in everyday moments if you are observant.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Life's enchanted cup sparkles near the brim.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: When you enchant people, your goal is not to make money from them or to get them to do what you want, but to fill them with great delight.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: In order to be enchanted we must be, above all, capable of seeing another person simply opening one's eyes will not do.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: From the very fountain of enchantment there arises a taste of bitterness to spread anguish amongst the flowers.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: The enchanted day is only enchanted if we ourselves believe that anything is possible.
quotes.author: Mark Donnelly

quotes.quote: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever - the one who recognizes the challenges and does something about it.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Often we women are risk averse. I needed the push. Now, more than ever, young women need more seasoned women to provide that encouragement, to take a risk, to go for it. Once a glass ceiling is broken, it stays broken.
quotes.author: Jennifer Grahnolm

quotes.quote: Get going. Move forward. Aim High. Plan a takeoff. Don't just sit on the runway and hope someone will come along and push the airplane. It simply won't happen. Change your attitude and gain some altitude. Believe me, you'll love it up here.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: I decided, very early on, just to accept life unconditionally; I never expected it to do anything special for me, yet I seemed to accomplish far more than I had ever hoped. Most of the time it just happened to me without my ever seeking it.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: There are moments when troubles enter our lives and we can do nothing to avoid them. But they are there for a reason. Only when we have overcome them will we understand why they were there.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Thankfully, persistence is a great substitute for talent.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Everything will be okay in the end. If it's not okay, then it's not the end.
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.quote: Instruction does much, but encouragement everything.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Correction does much, but encouragement does more.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Encouragement to others is something everyone can give. Somebody needs what you have to give. It may not be your money; it may be your time. It may be your listening ear. It may be your arms to encourage. It may be your smile to uplift. Who knows
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: When you encourage others, you in the process are encouraged because you're making a commitment and difference in that person's life. Encouragement really does make a difference.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A word of encouragement from a teacher to a child can change a life. A word of encouragement from a spouse can save a marriage. A word of encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: If you are a leader, you should never forget that everyone needs encouragement. And everyone who receives it - young or old, successful or less-than-successful, unknown or famous - is changed by it.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: It is by going down into the abyss that we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble, there lies your treasure.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Put yourself in a state of mind where you say to yourself, Here is an opportunity for me to celebrate like never before, my own power, my own ability to get myself to do whatever is necessary.
quotes.author: Dr. Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down. It's whether you get up again.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: When one door closes another door opens; but we so often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door, that we do not see the ones which open for us.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Give children encouragement, they will gain confidence, they will perform better.
quotes.author: M. K. Soni

quotes.quote: Taking an interest in what others are thinking and doing is often a much more powerful form of encouragement than praise.
quotes.author: Robert Martin

quotes.quote: When you feel like giving up, like calling it quits, just try one more time - do that little bit more.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself. You must do that which you think you cannot.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If everyone received the encouragement they need to grow, the genius in most everyone would blossom and the world would produce abundance beyond our wildest dreams.
quotes.author: Sidney Madwed

quotes.quote: If you have made mistakes, there is always another chance for you.You may have a fresh start any moment you choose,for this thing we call 'failure' is not the falling down, but the staying down.
quotes.author: Mary Pickford

quotes.quote: If one dream should fall and break into a thousand pieces,never be afraid to pick one of those pieces up and begin again.
quotes.author: Flavia Weedn

quotes.quote: The world is round and the place which may seem like the endmay also be only the beginning.
quotes.author: Ivy Baker Priest

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Risk more than others think is safe.Care more than others think is wise.Dream more than others think is practical.Expect more than others think is possible.
quotes.author: Claude Bissell

quotes.quote: When you feel like giving up, remember why you held on for so long in the first place.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how many say it cannot be done or how many people have tried it before; it's important to realize that whatever you're doing, it's your first attempt at it.
quotes.author: Wally Amos

quotes.quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: One has to remember that every failure can be a stepping stone to something better.
quotes.author: Col. Harland Sanders

quotes.quote: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.quote: Go for the moon. If you don't get it, you'll still be heading for a star.
quotes.author: Willis Reed

quotes.quote: Remember, man does not live on bread alone: sometimes he needs a little buttering up.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than the encouragement of a good friend.
quotes.author: Katharine Butler Hathaway

quotes.quote: Taking an interest in what others are thinking and doing is often a much more powerful form of encouragement than praise.
quotes.author: Robert Martin

quotes.quote: Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow
quotes.author: Daug Firebaugh

quotes.quote: Treat a man as he is and he will remain as he is. Treat a man as he can and should be and he will become as he can and should be.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes including you.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Be comforted, dear soul! There is always light behind the clouds.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: You're tired. You're stressed. You're mentally and physically drained. You feel alone. Struggling with the present, uncertain of the future. Life sucks right now. You'll be fine. I promise...It gets better. Just keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Ralph Napolitano

quotes.quote: Remember how far you've come, not just how far you have to go. You are not where you want to be, but neither are you where you used to be.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: If you want something, start working for it now. Don't wait for anything. The clock is ticking.
quotes.author: Joe De Sena

quotes.quote: When we are comfort and encouragement to others, we are sometimes surprised at how it comes back to us many times over.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: All around you are people whose lives are filled with trouble and sorrow, and they need your compassion and encouragement.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: There are high spots in all of our lives and most of them have come about through encouragement from someone else. I don't care how great, how famous or successful a man or woman may be, each hunger for applause.
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.quote: Most of us, swimming against the tides of trouble the world knows nothing about, need only a bit of praise or encouragement—and we will make the goal.
quotes.author: Jerome P. Fleishman

quotes.quote: Encouragement is a platform from which to launch a project, a career, a life.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: It can put children on the right path, inspire them, and give them the confidence to pursue their dreams, no matter how far-fetched or fantastic.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Remember what I told you, Forrest, you're no different than anybody else.
quotes.author: Mama Gump

quotes.quote: There is no such whetstone, to sharpen a good wit, and encourage a will to learn, as is praise
quotes.author: Roger Ascham

quotes.quote: The finest gift you can give anyone is encouragement. Yet, almost no one gets the encouragement they need to grow to their full potential.
quotes.author: Sidney Madwed

quotes.quote: If everyone received the encouragement they need to grow, the genius in most everyone would blossom and the world would produce abundance beyond our wildest dreams.
quotes.author: Sidney Madwed

quotes.quote: Nine-tenths of education is encouragement.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: With encouragement, anything is possible.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: You need to be aware of what others are doing, applaud their efforts, acknowledge their successes, and encourage them in their pursuits. When we all help one another, everybody wins.
quotes.author: Jim Stovall

quotes.quote: The powers of students sometimes sink under too great severity in correction...while they fear everything, they cease to attempt anything.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: I know more of no more encouraging fact than the unquestionable ability of man to elevate his life by conscious endeavor.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Keep on trying to be the best. Encourage each other. And most of all, encourage yourself. Don't doubt yourself, tell yourself you can do anything and, I guarantee, you can. And when you get an opportunity, take your shot, and if you make it, why not take another shot, and if you miss it, continue to take shots.
quotes.author: Michael Strahan

quotes.quote: Correction does much, but encouragement does more. Encouragement after censure is as the sun after a shower.
quotes.author: Johann Von Goethe

quotes.quote: Our chief want is someone who will inspire us to be what we know we could be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Yelling at living things does tend to kill the spirit in them. Sticks and stones may break our bones, but words will break our hearts...
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Encourage yourself, believe in yourself, and love yourself. Never doubt who you are.
quotes.author: Stephanie Lahart

quotes.quote: Everyone has inside them a piece of good news. The good news is you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost anyhow.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: God uses suffering as a whetstone, to make men sharp with.
quotes.author: Henry Beecher

quotes.quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, not to worry about the future . . . but to live the present moment wisely and earnestly.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Man often becomes what he believes himself to be. If I keep on saying to myself that I cannot do a certain thing, it is possible that I may end by really becoming incapable of doing it. On the contrary, if I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote:
There are moments when troubles enter our lives and we can do nothing to avoid them.
But they are there for a reason. Only when we have overcome them will we understand why they were there.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how many say it cannot be done or how many people have tried it before; it's important to realize that whatever you're doing, it's your first attempt at it.
quotes.author: Wally Amos

quotes.quote: Encourage yourself, believe in yourself, and love yourself. Never doubt who you are.
quotes.author: Stephanie Lahart

quotes.quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: How would your life be different ifâ€¦You walked away from gossip and verbal defamation? Let today be the dayâ€¦You speak only the good you know of other people and encourage others to do the same.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: If you have made mistakes, there is always another chance for you.You may have a fresh start any moment you choose,for this thing we call â€˜failure' is not the falling down, but the staying down.
quotes.author: Mary Pickford

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Everyone has inside them a piece of good news. The good news is you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with people who believe in your dreams, encourage your ideas, support your ambitions, and bring out the best in you.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Some luck lies in not getting what you thought you wanted but getting what you have, which once you have got it you may be smart enough to see is what you would have wanted had you known.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: We can't escape pain; we can't escape the essential nature of our lives. But we do have a choice. We can give in and relent, or we can fight, persevere, and create a life worth living, a noble life. Pain is a fact; our evaluation of it is a choice.
quotes.author: Jacob Held

quotes.quote: Do not sit still; start moving now. In the beginning, you may not go in the direction you want, but as long as you are moving, you are creating alternatives and possibilities.
quotes.author: Rodolfo Costa

quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Who do you spend time with? Criticizers or encouragers? Surround yourself with those who believe in you. Your life is too important for anything less.
quotes.author: Steve Goodier

quotes.quote: Get going. Move forward. Aim High. Plan a takeoff. Don't just sit on the runway and hope someone will come along and push the airplane. It simply won't happen. Change your attitude and gain some altitude. Believe me, you'll love it up here.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Optimism is the most important human trait, because it allows us to evolve our ideas, to improve our situation, and to hope for a better tomorrow.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: In essence, if we want to direct our lives, we must take control of our consistent actions. It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: You are never to old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Everything will be okay in the end. If it's not okay, then it's not the end.
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.quote: I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: God brings men into deep waters, not to drown them, but to cleanse them.
quotes.author: John Aughey

quotes.quote: The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
quotes.author: Victor Kiam

quotes.quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If we are not allowed to deal with small problems, we will be destroyed by slightly larger ones. When we come to understand this, we live our lives not avoiding problems, but welcoming them them as challenges that will strengthen us so that we can be victorious in the future.
quotes.author: Jim Stovall

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever â€“ the one who recognizes the challenges and does something about it.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Sometimes the best goal you can set is just to get out of bed every day. If you can succeed at this, then other things become possible.
quotes.author: Cynthia Patterson

quotes.quote: Press on â€“ nothing can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Perseverance and determination alone are omnipotent.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Somehow I can't believe that there are any heights that can't be scaled by a man who knows the secrets of making dreams come true. This special secret, it seems to me, can be summarized in four C s. They are curiosity, confidence, courage, and constancy, and the greatest of all is confidence. When you believe in a thing, believe in it all the way, implicitly and unquestionable.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Nothing truly stops you. Nothing truly holds you back. For your own will is always within your control. Sickness may challenge your body. But are you merely your body? Lameness may impede your legs. But you are not merely your legs. Your will is bigger than your legs. Your will needn't be affected by an incident unless you let it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Each problem has hidden in it an opportunity so powerful that it literally dwarfs the problem. The greatest success stories were created by people who recognized a problem and turned it into an opportunity.
quotes.author: Joseph Sugarman

quotes.quote: If you are going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: It is by going down into the abyss that we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble, there lies your treasure.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: Hold on to what is good, even if it's a handful of earth.
quotes.author: Hopi Prayer

quotes.quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: An encouraged person will eventually get his drive from encouragement; he becomes more dependent. A person that never really receives encouragement learns to move out of spite; he becomes more independent.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Encouragement is awesome. Think about it. It has the capacity to lift a man's or a woman's shoulders. To breathe fresh air into the fading embers of a smoldering dream. To actually change the course of another human being's day, week, or life.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: If one dream should fall and break into a thousand pieces, never be afraid to pick one of those pieces up and begin again.
quotes.author: Flavia Weedn

quotes.quote: God brings men into deep waters, not to drown them, but to cleanse them.
quotes.author: John Aughey

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how many say it cannot be done or how many people have tried it before; it's important to realize that whatever you're doing, it's your first attempt at it.
quotes.author: Wally Amos

quotes.quote: Everyone has inside them a piece of good news. The good news is you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: If you ever think about giving up, remember why you held on for so long.
quotes.author: Hayley Williams

quotes.quote: Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones.
quotes.author: Ralph Emerson

quotes.quote: The essential support and encouragement comes from within, arising out of the mad notion that your society needs to know what only you can tell it.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Follow your dreams, remember you can achieve All that you dream, whatever your mind can conceive.
quotes.author: Birthday Poems

quotes.quote: It is also important to realize that adding a positive phrase in words that encourage to your daily routine can only help not hinder.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A bend in the road is not the end of the roadâ€¦Unless you fail to make the turn.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: You inspire, you put a smile on someone's face, you make someone laugh or deeply touch a person's heart. We all have that in ourselves no matter how tough our journeys are.
quotes.author: Shellie Palmer

quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter who you are, where you come from. The ability to triumph begins with you. Always.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Hope is the foundational quality of all change, and encouragement is the fuel which keeps hope alive.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.
quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

quotes.quote: Encouragement is the oxygen of the soul.
quotes.author: George Madison Adams

quotes.quote: Do not sit still; start moving now. In the beginning, you may not go in the direction you want, but as long as you are moving, you are creating alternatives and possibilities.
quotes.author: Rodolfo Costa

quotes.quote: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever â€“ the one who recognizes the challenges and does something about it.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: When nobody else celebrates you, learn to celebrate yourself. When nobody else compliments you, then compliment yourself. It's not up to other people to keep you encouraged. It's up to you. Encouragement should come from the inside.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Encourage yourself, believe in yourself, and love yourself. Never doubt who you are.
quotes.author: Stephanie Lahart

quotes.quote: Encouragement is the most important thing in the world for young people, rather than league tables, which demoralise everyone.
quotes.author: Tony Benn

quotes.quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Encouragement is food for the heart, and every heart is a hungry heart.
quotes.author: Pat Morley

quotes.quote: There are moments when troubles enter our lives and we can do nothing to avoid them. But they are there for a reason. Only when we have overcome them will we understand why they were there.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Sometimes the best goal you can set is just to get out of bed every day. If you can succeed at this, then other things become possible.
quotes.author: Cynthia Patterson

quotes.quote: Everybody needs encouragement, even when things are going well.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: Encouragement makes a fault easy to correct, and a challenge easy to take on.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: The greatest act of faith some days is to simply get up and face another day.
quotes.author: Amy Gatliff

quotes.quote: Some people go through hard times, so bad that they can't even talk about it, but no matter what, we should never give up.
quotes.author: Ifeoluwa Egbetade

quotes.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Some luck lies in not getting what you thought you wanted but getting what you have, which once you have got it you may be smart enough to see is what you would have wanted had you known.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Maria Robinson

quotes.quote: Everything will be okay in the end. If it's not okay, then it's not the end.
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.quote: If you have made mistakes, there is always another chance for you.You may have a fresh start any moment you choose,for this thing we call â€˜failure' is not the falling down, but the staying down.
quotes.author: Mary Pickford

quotes.quote: You can have anything you want if you want it badly enough. You can be anything you want to be, do anything you set out to accomplish if you hold to that desire with singleness of purpose.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Never let the odds keep you from doing what you know in your heart you were meant to do.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
quotes.author: Hellen Keller

quotes.quote: A word of encouragement from a teacher to a child can change a life. A word of encouragement from a spouse can save a marriage. A word of encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Make up your mind that no matter what comes your way, no matter how difficult, no matter how unfair, you will do more than simply survive. You will thrive in spite of it.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: A beginning is the end of something, always.
quotes.author: Spider Robinson

quotes.quote: The end never comes when you think it will. It's always ten steps past the worst moment, then a weird turn to the left.
quotes.author: Lena Dunham

quotes.quote: In the end one only experiences oneself.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The end is in the beginning and lies far ahead.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: The end is never the end. It's always the the beginning of something.
quotes.author: Kate Lord Brown

quotes.quote: At the end of reasons comes persuasion.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: The feeling is less like an ending than just another starting point.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The end result of kindness is that it draws people to you.
quotes.author: Anita Roddick

quotes.quote: The end is inherent in the means.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There is an end to every journey. Even life will come to an end one moment in time.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: There is no real ending. It's just the place where you stop the story.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: End of a matter is better than its beginning.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: An end is only a beginning in disguise.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: The end of summer winds make people restless.
quotes.author: Sebastian Faulks

quotes.quote: An ending was an ending. No matter how many pages of sentences and paragraphs of great stories led up to it, it would always have the last word.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: There is no real ending. It's just the place where you stop the story.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: In the end, it's all about perseverance.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Ends are not bad things, they just mean that something else is about to begin. And there are many things that don't really end, anyway, they just begin again in a new way. Ends are not bad and many ends aren't really an ending; some things are never-ending.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Endings to be useful must be inconclusive.
quotes.author: Samuel R. Delany

quotes.quote: At the end of pain is success!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: In the End, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.
quotes.author: Jane D. Hull

quotes.quote: Everything with a beginning has an ending. Any magic that can be done, can be undone. Anything you can make, can be unmade.
quotes.author: Brandon Mull

quotes.quote: At the end, excitement maintained its hysteria.
quotes.author: Jerry Coleman

quotes.quote: In the end, your integrity is all you've got.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: The end may justify the means as long as there is something that justifies the end.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, the goals are simple: safety and security.
quotes.author: Jodi Rell

quotes.quote: Everything that has a beginning comes to an end.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: At the end of every road you meet yourself.
quotes.author: S. N. Behrman

quotes.quote: Every end in history necessarily contains a new beginning.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Endings are really hard to do, and it's hard to do an ending where it's sort of collaborative with thousands and thousands of people, and to satisfy all those people is impossible.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hale

quotes.quote: In the end, winning is sleeping better.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.quote: Don't think of death as an ending. Think of it as a really effective way of cutting down your expenses.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: New Year's Day. A fresh start. A new chapter in life waiting to be written. New questions to be asked, embraced, and loved. Answers to be discovered and then lived in this transformative year of delight and self-discovery. Today carve out a quiet interlude for yourself in which to dream, pen in hand. Only dreams give birth to change.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: A happy new year! Grant that I may bring no tear to any eye when this new year in time shall end Let it be said I've played the friend, Have lived and loved and labored here, And made of it a happy year.
quotes.author: Edgar Guest

quotes.quote: For last year's words belong to last year's language and next year's words await another voice. And to make an end is to make a beginning.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: As the old year retires and a new one is born, we commit into the hands of our creator the happenings of the past year and ask for direction and guidance in the new one. May he grant us his grace, his tranquility and His wisdom!
quotes.author: Peggy Toney Horton

quotes.quote: I made no resolutions for the new year. The habit of making plans, of criticizing, sanctioning and molding my life, is too much of a daily event for me.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: The year end brings no greater pleasure then the opportunity to express to you season's greetings and good wishes. May your holidays and new year be filled with joy.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Another fresh new year is here another year to live! to banish worry, doubt, and fear, to love and laugh and give!
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: As years passed away I have formed the habit of looking back upon that former self as upon another person, the remembrance of whose emotions has been a solace in adversity and added zest to the enjoyment of prosperity.
quotes.author: Simon Newcomb

quotes.quote: Any new beginning is forged from the shards of the past, not from the abandonment of the past.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is the first blank page of a 365 page book. Write a good one.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: Each age has deemed the new-born year the fittest time for festal cheer.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Hope smiles from the threshold of the year to come, Whispering 'it will be happier.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: I hope that in this year to come, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes, then you are making new things, trying new things, learning, living, pushing yourself, changing yourself, changing your world. You're doing things you've never done before, and more importantly, you're doing something.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: For me the end of the year is always a time to reflect and recharge my energies.
quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

quotes.quote: Year's end is neither an end nor a beginning but a going on, with all the wisdom that experience can instill in us. Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I've become fascinated by the idea that it's really achievable to make two or three small improvements in a week and by the end of the year, it's 150 improvements.
quotes.author: Darrell Hammond

quotes.quote: Just read one book a month and at the end of they year you would be totally different but an impressive personality.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Save a little money each month and at the end of the year you'll be surprised at how little you have.
quotes.author: Ernest Haskins

quotes.quote: Drop the last year into the silent limbo of the past. Let it go, for it was imperfect, and thank God that it can go.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: At the end of every day of every year, two things remain unshakable, our constancy of purpose and our continuous discontent with the immediate present.
quotes.author: Roberto Goizueta

quotes.quote: A year of ending and beginning, a year of loss and finding and all of you were with me through the storm. I drink your health, your wealth, your fortune for long years to come, and I hope for many more days in which we can gather like this.
quotes.author: C.J. Cherryh

quotes.quote: Maybe this year, we ought to walk through the rooms of our lives not looking for flaws, but looking for potential.
quotes.author: Ellen Goodman

quotes.quote: Year's end, all corners of this floating world, swept.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: Dear world, I am excited to be alive in you, and I am thankful for another year.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: At the end of each year I make a list of my mistakes and it's pretty friggin long.
quotes.author: Dean Lombardi

quotes.quote: This is a new year. A new beginning. And things will change.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Departure of a year welcomes so many new memories.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Let us embrace the coming year with a living hope for everyday life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: New beginnings are in order, and you are bound to feel some level of excitement as new chances come your way.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Everybody has difficult years, but a lot of times the difficult years end up being the greatest years of your whole entire life, if you survive them.
quotes.author: Brittany Murphy

quotes.quote: We can find a new hope every new day and every New Year.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Year-end financial statements express a truth about office life which is no less irrefutable yet also, in the end, no less irrelevant or irritating than an evolutionary biologist's proud reminder that the purpose of existence lies in the propagation of our genes.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: The new year stands before us, like a chapter in a book, waiting to be written. We can help write that story by setting goals.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Tonight’s December thirty-first, / Something is about to burst. / The clock is crouching, dark and small, / Like a time bomb in the hall. / Hark, it's midnight, children dear. / Duck! Here comes another year!
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: It is December, and nobody asked if I was ready.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: December, being the last month of the year, cannot help but make us think of what is to come.
quotes.author: Fennel Hudson

quotes.quote: Looking back at the end of the year created a little more serious mood than before.
quotes.author: Paul Klee

quotes.quote: I won't be a carer any more come the end of the year, and though I've got a lot out of it, I have to admit I'll welcome the chance to rest.
quotes.author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quotes.quote: Wave after wave of trial rolled over us; but at the end of the year some of us were constrained to confess, that we had learned more of the loving-kindness of the Lord than in any previous year of our lives.
quotes.author: James Hudson Taylor

quotes.quote: Is it just me, or did this year go by faster than ever? I mean, it actually seems like time is speeding up. Lately, I have been getting up earlier everyday. I don't know why. I guess it's the excitement of the end of the year or something. I've only got a few days left.
quotes.author: Felicity Porter

quotes.quote: An optimist stays up until midnight to see the New Year in. A pessimist stays up to make sure the old year leaves.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughn

quotes.quote: We are now at the New Year season. Isn't this a peculiarly appropriate time to look ahead, to indulge in solemn thinking, to formulate life plans, to lay down a definite course to follow?
quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

quotes.quote: Let us enter the New Year cheerfully. Let us resolve to look onto the bright side, to make the best of whatever may befall, to maintain faith that doing the right thing will ultimately bring victory.
quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

quotes.quote: I get myself a gig somewhere, whether it's in a club or in a bar, it doesn't matter, and I just work on New Year's Eve because I feel it's very symbolic for me for the next year, for the new year.
quotes.author: Debbie Harry

quotes.quote: In the past people were drinking because they were socially phobic or they needed to blow off steam at the end of the year. Now they're overdoing it because their bonuses were decreased, their hours have gone up or their job security isn't as safe as it used to be.
quotes.author: Harris Stratyner

quotes.quote: May you begin the Year with cheer, / Surrounded by those you hold dear, / And end it on the same high gear.
quotes.author: Miriam Kinai

quotes.quote: The object of a New Year is not that we should have a new year. It is that we should have a new soul and a new nose; new feet, a new backbone, new ears, and new eyes. Unless a particular man made New Year resolutions, he would make no resolutions. Unless a man starts afresh about things, he will certainly do nothing effective.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, it's about what's on the shelf at the end of the year.
quotes.author: Steve Coppell

quotes.quote: For eleven months and about twenty days each year, we concentrate upon the shortcomings of others, but for a few days at the turn of New Year we look at our own. It is a good habit.
quotes.author: Arthur H. Sulzberger

quotes.quote: It is really an atrocious institution. We must be gluttonous because it is Christmas. We must be drunken because it is Christmas. . . . We must buy things that nobody wants and give them to people we don't like; because the mass of the population, including the all-powerful middle-class tradesman, depends on a week of license and brigandage, waste and intemperance, to clear off its outstanding liabilities at the end of the year.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: This, after all, was the month in which families began tightening and closing and sealing; from Thanksgiving to the New Year, everybody's world contracted, day by day, into the microcosmic single festive household, each with its own rituals and obsessions, rules and dreams. . . . How does one cry for help from these seasonal prisons?
quotes.author: Zadie Smith

quotes.quote: Women get a little more excited about New Year's Eve than men do. It's like an excuse: You get drunk; you make a lot of promises you're not going to keep; the next morning as soon as you wake up you start breaking them. For men, we just call that a date.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: Tomorrow'ill be the happiest time of all the glad New Year; / Of all the glad New Year, mother, the maddest merriest day;
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: When I go, I'll take New Year's Eve with me.
quotes.author: Guy Lombardo

quotes.quote: As the vulgar . . . are always very careful to end the old year well, so they are no less solicitous of making a good beginning of the new one. The old one is ended with a hearty compotation. The new one is opened with the custom of sending presents, which are termed New Year's Gifts, to friends and acquaintance.
quotes.author: John Brand

quotes.quote: Every man should be born again on the first day of January. Start with a fresh page. Take up one hole more in the buckle if necessary, or let down one, according to circumstance; but on the first of January let every man gird himself once more, with his face to the front, and take no interest in the things that were and past.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: These year's-end holidays have in them the quality of transition that we find in other festivals of the new year, no matter when they are celebrated. Yom Kippur marks the end of the solemn days and the beginning of the regular days of the new year. The Ten Days, during which the gates of heaven are open, are a time out of time, a period of liminality during which people can shape their destinies, retract vows and right wrongs. In short one can make oneself over for the new year, in a way that recalls, however dimly, the custom of New Year's resolutions.
quotes.author: Jack Santino

quotes.quote: I leave this year as a man leaves wine, / Remembering the summer bountiful, the good fall, the months mellow and full. / I sit in the northern room, in the dusk, the death of a year, / And watch it go down in thunder.
quotes.author: William Everson

quotes.quote: The end of the year is always a good time to reflect on our spiritual progress. Whether you set goals at the beginning of this year or not, it is certainly good to ask where you have been this year and whether you are heading in the right direction.
quotes.author: Christopher Perry

quotes.quote: Because life is dynamic and we are deeply alive, the end of the year can only mean the end of the year, not the end of life, not the end of us, not even the end of time. We turn our faces toward the year being born with a riding hope that will carry us into the days ahead with courage and with confidence. The old year dies; the new year is being born ⁠— Long live Life!
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: It's about not extending to the overdraft / To scrape out what is left of the end of the year
quotes.author: Matthew Murphy; Tom Overland Knudsen; Dan Haggis

quotes.quote: The wine's all drunk and so am I / Here with the hoi-poloi, don't ask me why / We're celebratin' anticipatin'; end of the year
quotes.author: Peter Gabriel

quotes.quote: They put up the Christmas lights on my street / I saw Santa at the mall hearing kids' dreams / And all of this end-of-the-year spirit's got me so thankful / But I really need you there when I get home
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani; Justin Tranter; Michael James; Ryan Busbee

quotes.quote: Year’s end, all / corners of this / floating world, swept.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: Last of all, December, / The year's sands nearly run, / Speeds on the shortest day, / Curtails the sun;
quotes.author: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.quote: As one in sorrow looks upon / The dead face of a loyal friend, / By the dim light of New Year's dawn / I saw the Old Year end.
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: What does this brazen tongue declare, / That falling on the midnight air / Brings to my heart a sense of care / Akin to fright? / 'Tis telling that the year is dead, / The New Year come, the Old Year fled, / Another leaf before me spread / On which to write.
quotes.author: James Weldon Johnson

quotes.quote: Old papers thrown away, / Old garments cast aside, / The talk of yesterday, / All things identified; / But times once torn away / No voices can recall: / The eve of New Year's Day / Left the Old Year lost to all.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: And now the year is done ⁠— its pleasure / So brief, so bright ⁠— its hours of pain; / Some moments' memories we treasure, / Some recollections loathe in vain.
quotes.author: Edith Nesbit

quotes.quote: Even while we sing, he smiles his last, / And leaves our sphere behind. / The good old year is with the past; / Oh be the new as kind! / Oh stay, oh stay, / One parting strain, and then away.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: Then, too, the Old Year dieth, / And the forests utter a moan, / Like the voice of one who crieth / In the wilderness alone, / "Vex not his ghost!"
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: What the New Year brings to you will depend a great deal on what you bring to the New Year.
quotes.author: Vern McLellan

quotes.quote: It seems as if an age of genius must be succeeded by an age of endeavour; riot and extravagance by cleanliness and hard work.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Part of making any endeavour is that each one has its own special problems. It's the nature of the process.
quotes.author: Martin Scorsese

quotes.quote: Endeavour to be faithful, and if there is any beauty in your thought, your style will be beautiful; if there is any real emotion to express, the expression will be moving.
quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

quotes.quote: All endeavours which are directed to a purely worldly end...contain within themselves the germs of their own corruption.
quotes.author: T.H. White

quotes.quote: The totality of human endeavour is nothing when set against the stars.
quotes.author: Tom Sweterlitsch

quotes.quote: In every endeavour, it is man or woman with unbreakable will who excels.
quotes.author: Eknath Eswaran

quotes.quote: No human endeavour can ever be wholly good… it must always have a cost.
quotes.author: William Golding

quotes.quote: No endeavour is in vain; Its reward is in the doing.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: All endeavour calls for the ability to tramp the last mile, shape the last plan, endure the last hours toil.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Small endeavours obtain strength by unity of action: the most powerful are broken down by discord.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: His high endeavours are an inward light That makes the path before him always bright.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Every endeavour pursued with passion produces a successful outcome, regardless of the result. For it is not about winning or losing rather, the effort put forth in producing the outcome.
quotes.author: Matthew Syed

quotes.quote: It is a hopeless endeavour to unite the contrarieties of spring and winter; it is unjust to claim the privileges of age, and retain the play-things of childhood.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Each of us has a spark of life inside us, and our highest endeavor ought to be to set off that spark in one another.
quotes.author: Kenny Ausubel

quotes.quote: Let us endeavor so to live that when we come to die even the undertaker will be sorry.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: No endeavor that is worthwhile is simple in prospect; if it is right, it will be simple in retrospect.
quotes.author: Edward Teller

quotes.quote: Life without endeavor is like entering a jewel-mine and coming out with empty hands.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Endeavour-with most diligent labour, O aspiring artist!-to master content. The form will rise to meet you.
quotes.author: Multatuli

quotes.quote: The measure of ones creativity is not found in numbers but in the endeavour of the creation. If only one person engages in something we make then it is a resounding success.
quotes.author: Unknown via Twitter

quotes.quote: In any endeavour, you must believe, and act, as if it were impossible to fail.
quotes.author: Ranal Currie

quotes.quote: The most difficult part of any endeavour is taking the first step, making the first decision.
quotes.author: Robyn Davidson

quotes.quote: A thing of beauty / Lasts forever / Stretches through all time / Every endeavour
quotes.author: David Maxwell Clayton

quotes.quote: Goddesses / Must have looked from just such eyes, / Full of still felicities,— / No surprise, / No endeavour / (For endeavour mars perfection), / And, one almost fancies, never / Strong affection.
quotes.author: Henry Laurie

quotes.quote: Endeavour thyself to do well, that others may rather envy at thy knowledge, than laugh at thy ignorance.
quotes.author: Solon

quotes.quote: I guessed life was like that. You gained and you lost, and if you saved anything from the ruins, even if only a shred of self-respect, it was enough to take you through the next bit.
quotes.author: Dick Francis

quotes.quote: In the midst of winter, I finally learned there was in me an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: We all have the strength to endure the misfortunes of others.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Without the strength to endure the crisis, one will not see the opportunity within. It is within the process of endurance that opportunity reveals itself.
quotes.author: Chin-Ning Chu

quotes.quote: So comes snow after fire, and even dragons have their endings.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: To learn strong faith is to endure great trials. I have learned my faith by standing firm amid severe testings.
quotes.author: George Mueller

quotes.quote: It is more difficult to stay on top than to get there.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: Endurance pierces marble.
quotes.author: Moroccan Proverb

quotes.quote: Life asks not merely what you can do; it asks how much can you endure and not be spoiled.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: It is the nature of the strong heart, that like the palm tree it strives ever upwards when it is most burdened.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: If you're going to go through hell... I suggest you come back learning something.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: To struggle when hope is banished! To live when life's salt is gone! To dwell in a dream that's vanished. To endure, and go calmly on!
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: Endurance is the crowning quality, And patience all the passion of great hearts.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Children's talent to endure stems from their ignorance of alternatives.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Happy he who learns to bear what he cannot change.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Endurance is not a young person's game. I thought I might even be better at 60 than I was at 30. You have a body that's almost as strong, but you have a much better mind.
quotes.author: Diana Nyad

quotes.quote: Solitude, isolation, are painful things and beyond human endurance.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.quote: Come what may, all bad fortune is to be conquered by endurance.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: At the end of the day it's about how much you can bear, how much you can endure. Being together, we harm nobody; being apart, we extinguish ourselves.
quotes.author: Tabitha Suzuma

quotes.quote: People have to learn sometimes not only how much the heart, but how much the head, can bear.
quotes.author: Maria Mitchell

quotes.quote: I learned from the example of my father that the manner in which one endures what must be endured is more important than the thing that must be endured.
quotes.author: Dean Acheson

quotes.quote: To be or not to be isn't the question. The question is how to prolong being.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Yes, as my swift days near their goal, 'Tis all that I implore: in life and death a chainless soul with courage to endure.
quotes.author: Emity Bronte

quotes.quote: All philosophy lies in two words, sustain and abstain.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Those who can bear all can dare all.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Life is not a PG feel-good movie. Real life often ends badly. Literature tries to document this reality, while showing us it is still possible for us to endure nobly.
quotes.author: Matthew Quick

quotes.quote: No matter how much falls on us, we keep plowing ahead. That's the only way to keep the roads clear.
quotes.author: Greg Kincaid

quotes.quote: Life was not longer something to endure, but to live.
quotes.author: Hubert Selby Jr.

quotes.quote: Unless you have courage, a courage that keeps you going, always going, no matter what happens, there is no certainty of success. It is really an endurance race.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The men who learn endurance, are they who call the whole world, brother.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The bird that flutters least is longest on the wing.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: He conquers who endures.
quotes.author: Persius

quotes.quote: If God sends us on strong paths, we are provided strong shoes.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Nothing happens to any man that he is not formed by nature to bear.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Don't fear the gods. Don't worry about death; What is good is easy to get, and what is terrible is easy to endure.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Endurance is not just the ability to bear a hard thing, but to turn it into glory.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: Every calamity is to be overcome by endurance.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: The first rule is to keep an untroubled spirit. The second is to look things in the face and know them for what they are.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: For to be poised against fatality, to meet adverse conditions gracefully, is more than simple endurance; it is an act of aggression, a positive triumph.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: Find out what you're afraid of and go live there.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Endurance is patience concentrated.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Not in achievement, but in endurance, of the human soul, does it show its divine grandeur and its alliance with the infinite.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: A man may die, nations may rise and fall, but an idea lives on. Ideas have endurance without death.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The limits of tyrants are prescribed by the endurance of those whom they oppress.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: If you can learn to endure pain, you can survive anything. Some people learn to embrace it- to love it. Some endure it through drowning it in sorrow, or by making themselves forget. Others turn it into anger.
quotes.author: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.quote: No man ever threw away life while it was worth keeping.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: If you are losing faith in human nature, go out and watch a marathon.
quotes.author: Kathrine Switzer

quotes.quote: In the darkest hour the soul is replenished and given strength to continue and endure.
quotes.author: Heart Warrior Chosa
