quotes.quote: The first virtue in a soldier is endurance of fatigue; courage is only the second virtue.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: A man on a thousand mile walk has to forget his goal and say to himself every morning, 'Today I'm going to cover twenty-five miles and then rest up and sleep.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Often you shall think your road impassable, sombre and companionless. Have will and plod along; and round each curve you shall find a new companion.
quotes.author: Mikhail Naimy

quotes.quote: You get yourself up for it somehow, and your endurance and the crowd gets you up, too.
quotes.author: Janet Jackson

quotes.quote: Endurance is one of the most difficult disciplines, but it is to the one who endures that the final victory comes.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Prolonged endurance tames the bold.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Firmness in enduring and exertion is a character I always wish to possess. I have always despised the whining yelp of complaint and cowardly resolve.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: Endurance and to be able to endure is the first lesson a child should learn because it’s the one they will most need to know.
quotes.author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: He who loses wealth loses much. He who loses a friend loses more. But he who loses his courage loses all.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: It even helps stupid people to try hard.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Drag your thoughts away from your troubles... by the ears, by the heels, or any other way you can manage it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Sorrow and silence are strong, and patient endurance is godlike.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: By trying we can easily learn to endure adversity. Another man's, I mean.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There are no gains without pains.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: We should never despair; our situation before has been unpromising and has changed for the better, so I trust, it will again. If new difficulties arise, we must only put forth new exertions and proportion our efforts to the exigency of the times.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Nothing in the world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination are omnipotent. The slogan "press on" has solved and always will solve the problems of the human race.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: I decline to accept the end of man... I believe that man will not merely endure: he will prevail. He is immortal, not because he alone among creatures has an inexhaustible voice, but because he has a soul, a spirit capable of compassion and sacrifice and endurance.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: All daring and courage, all iron endurance of misfortune—make for a finer, nobler type of manhood.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There comes a time when the cup of endurance runs over, and men are no longer willing to be plunged into an abyss of injustice where they experience the blackness of corroding despair.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Patient endurance is the perfection of charity.
quotes.author: St. Ambrose

quotes.quote: There remain times when one can only endure. One lives on, one doesn't die, and the only thing that one can do, is to fill one's mind and time as far as possible with the concerns of other people. It doesn't bring immediate peace, but it brings the dawn nearer.
quotes.author: Arthur Christopher Benson

quotes.quote: Nothing great was ever done without much enduring.
quotes.author: St. Catherine of Siena

quotes.quote: We conquer—not in any brilliant fashion—we conquer by continuing.
quotes.author: George Matheson

quotes.quote: Bear in mind, if you are going to amount to anything, that your success does not depend on the brilliancy and the impetuosity with which you take hold, but upon the everlasting and sanctified bull-doggedness with which you hang on after you have taken hold.
quotes.author: A. B. Meldrum

quotes.quote: The heights by great men reached and kept / Were not attained by sudden flight, / But they, while their companions slept, / Were toiling upward in the night.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: We could never learn to be brave and patient, if there were only joy in the world.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: With all the infinite possibilities of spiritual life before you, do not settle down on a little patch of dusty ground at the mountain's foot in restful content. Be not content until you reach the mountain's summit.
quotes.author: J. R. Miller

quotes.quote: Does the road wind up-hill all the way? / Yes, to the very end. / Will the day's journey take the whole long day? / From morn to night, my friend.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: If you can't stand the heat, get out of the kitchen.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Maybe one day we shall be glad to remember even these hardships.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Bear and endure to the end; one day this pain will be useful to you.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: By bravely enduring it, an evil which cannot be avoided is overcome.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: The greater the difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it. Skillful pilots gain their reputation from storms and tempests.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: The palm tree grows best beneath a ponderous weight, and even so the character of man. The petty pangs of small daily cares have often bent the character of men, but great misfortunes seldom.
quotes.author: Kossuth

quotes.quote: There is nothing in the world so much admired as a man who knows how to bear unhappiness with courage.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Talent is insignificant. I know a lot of talented ruins. Beyond talent lie all the usual words: discipline, love, luck, but most of all, endurance.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: The deeper your passion the greater your endurance.
quotes.author: Ranal Currie

quotes.quote: Endurance is lost rapidly if one ceases to work at its maximum.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: When you have endurance, you have the key to every test in life.
quotes.author: Nichola L Stephenson

quotes.quote: Who speaks of triumph? Endurance is everything!
quotes.author: Al Pacino

quotes.quote: I will love the light because it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The best way to destroy an enemy is to make him a friend.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: If you want to make enemies, try to change something.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: The best weapon against an enemy is another enemy.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: If you are far from the enemy, make him believe you are near.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Observe your enemies, for they first find out your faults.
quotes.author: Antisthenes

quotes.quote: Enemies are so stimulating.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Enemies promises were made to be broken.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: One enemy can do more hurt than ten friends can do good.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Our enemies come nearer the truth in the opinions they form of us than we do in our opinion of ourselves.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Keep your friends close, and your enemies closer.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: It's hard to fight an enemy who has outposts in your head.
quotes.author: Sally Kempton

quotes.quote: Love your enemies; for they shall tell you all your faults.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: You can discover what your enemy fears most by observing the means he uses to frighten you.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The enemy is anybody who's going to get you killed, no matter which side he's on.
quotes.author: Joseph Heller

quotes.quote: We often give our enemies the means for our own destruction.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Let your enemies be disarmed by the gentleness of your manner, but at the same time let them feel, the steadiness of your resentment.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Bear patiently with a rival.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: I bring out the worst in my enemies and that's how I get them to defeat themselves.
quotes.author: Roy M. Cohn

quotes.quote: I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Forgive your enemies, but first get even.
quotes.author: Lester Cole

quotes.quote: If you don't have enemies, you don't have character.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: Enemies, as well as lovers, come to resemble each other over a period of time.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: As our enemies have found we can reason like men, so now let us show them we can fight like men also.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Our enemies are our outward consciences.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: An enemy despised is the most dangerous of all enemies.
quotes.author: Publius Syrus

quotes.quote: It is from our enemies that we often gain excellent maxims, and are frequently surprised into reason by their mistakes.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Enemies' gifts are no gifts and do no good.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Our enemies will tell the rest with pleasure.
quotes.author: Bishop William Fleetwood

quotes.quote: The enemy of my enemy is my friend.
quotes.author: Arabic Proverb

quotes.quote: We can learn even from our enemies.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: An enemy generally says and believes what he wishes.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Know your enemy and know yourself and you can fight a hundred battles without disaster.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: When the enemy attacks you, it means you are on the right road.
quotes.author: Enver Hoxha

quotes.quote: Despise the enemy strategically, but take him seriously tactically.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: We need a common enemy to unite us.
quotes.author: Condoleezza Rice

quotes.quote: Give the enemy not only a road for flight, but also a means of defending it.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: A distant enemy is always preferable to one at the gate.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: If you had no enemies, you had no fun.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.quote: Every educated person is a future enemy.
quotes.author: Martin Bormann

quotes.quote: It is the enemy who can truly teach us to practice the virtues of compassion and tolerance.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Everyone needs a warm personal enemy or two to keep him free from rust in the movable parts of his mind.
quotes.author: Gene Fowler

quotes.quote: Give the enemy an inch, he'll take a yard.
quotes.author: Monica Crowley

quotes.quote: Flee an enemy who knows your weakness.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: One of the most time-consuming things is to have an enemy.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The Bible tells us to love our neighbors, and also to love our enemies; probably because generally they are the same people.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Whenever you are confronted with an opponent. Conquer him with love.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: A wise man gets more use from his enemies than a fool from his friends.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Never explain―your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: There is nothing more admirable than when two people who see eye to eye keep house as man and wife, confounding their enemies and delighting their friends.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: If you have enemies, good that means you stood up for something.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: Those who pray for your downfall are concentrating negative thoughts towards you, without taking cognisance of the slippery ground in which they are standing, which could lead to their downfall.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: A doubtful friend is worse than a certain enemy. Let a man be one thing or the other, and we then know how to meet him.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: No man ever got very high by pulling other people down. The intelligent merchant does not knock his competitors. The sensible worker does not work those who work with him. Don't knock your friends. Don't knock your enemies. Don't knock yourself.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Bitter people are not interested in what you say, but what you hide.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Tis best to weigh the enemy more mighty than he seems.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The haft of the arrow had been feathered with one of the eagles own plumes. We often give our enemies the means of our own destruction.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: When a sinister person means to be your enemy, they always start by trying to become your friend.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Through you we learn to be invisible, through you inaudible; and hence we can hold the enemy's fate in our hands.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: If people think nature is their friend then they sure don't need an enemy.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: People from the past, have a tendency to walk back into the present, and run over the future.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: If we could read the secret history of our enemies we should find in each man’s life sorrow and suffering enough to disarm all hostility.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Remember that nobody will ever get ahead of you as long as he is kicking you in the seat of the pants.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: Concentrated power has always been the enemy of liberty.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: To love our enemy is impossible. The moment we understand our enemy, we feel compassion towards him/her, and he/she is no longer our enemy.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: When there is no enemy within, the enemies outside cannot hurt you.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Never hate your enemies. It affects your judgment.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: Only enemies speak the truth; friends and lovers lie endlessly, caught in the web of duty.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: It's not enough to hate your enemy. You have to understand how the two of you bring each other to deep completion.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: For the enemy to be recognized and feared, he has to be in your home or on your doorstep.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: The truth may not set you free, but used carefully, it can confuse the hell out of your enemies.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Scratch a lover, and find a foe.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: If you are without an enemy in the world, you may be a lamb or an ass, but you are not a man.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: Your enemy is never a villain in his own eyes. Keep this in mind, it may offer a way to make him your friend. If not, you can kill him without hate.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: You can calculate the worth of a man by the number of his enemies, and the importance of a work of art by the harm that is spoken of it.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: I have spent many years of my life in opposition, and I rather like the role.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Let my enemies devour each other.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: We learn our virtues from our friends who love us; our faults from the enemy who hates us. We cannot easily discover our real character from a friend. He is a mirror, on which the warmth of our breath impedes the clearness of the reflection.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Pay attention to your enemies, for they are the first to discover your mistakes.
quotes.author: Antisthenes

quotes.quote: Never wound a snake; kill it.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: Once is happenstance. Twice is coincidence. Three times is enemy action.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: You must not fight too often with one enemy, or you will teach him all your art of war.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: If you want peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: A man can't be too careful in the choice of his enemies.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Time is my greatest enemy.
quotes.author: Evita Peron

quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: The enemies of the future are always the very nicest people.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Faith activates God - Fear activates the Enemy.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: No accurate thinker will judge another person by that which the other person's enemies say about him.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Sooner or later we all must die. Warriors choose to do so on their feet, standing between their enemies and those they hold dear. With a weapon in their hands. Cowards choose to do so on their bellies. Unarmed.
quotes.author: David Gell

quotes.quote: Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Friends come and go but enemies accumulate.
quotes.author: Arthur Bloch

quotes.quote: Memory is man's greatest friend and worst enemy.
quotes.author: Gilbert Parker

quotes.quote: That is the thankless position of the father in the family-the provider for all, and the enemy of all.
quotes.author: August Strindberg

quotes.quote: We make our friends; we make our enemies; but God makes our next door neighbor.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: However bad a man, he will have some friends: however good, he will have some enemies.
quotes.author: Ivan Panin

quotes.quote: Always presume that the enemy has dangerous designs and always be forehanded with the remedy. But do not let these calculations make your timid.
quotes.author: Frederick The Great

quotes.quote: To be wronged is nothing unless you continue to remember it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: If you want enemies, excel others; if you want friends, let others excel you.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: It is a pitiful fortune that is not without enemies.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Man usually avoids attributing cleverness to somebody else unless it is an enemy.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Energy is an eternal delight, and he who desires, but acts not, breeds pestilence.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The energy you bring, positive or negative, dictates your perceptions, receptions and radiations.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Energy doesn't communicate in English, French, Chinese or Swahili, but it does speak clearly.
quotes.author: Elaine Seiler

quotes.quote: You are energy, and energy cannot be created or destroyed. Energy just changes form.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: Energy and perseverance can fit a man for almost any kind of position.
quotes.author: Theodore F. Merseles

quotes.quote: Life begets life. Energy creates energy. It is by spending oneself that one becomes rich.
quotes.author: Sarah Bernhardt

quotes.quote: Energy is the essence of life. Every day you decide how you're going to use it by knowing what you want and what it takes to reach that goal, and by maintaining focus.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Energy is a bit like money: if you have a positive balance, you can distribute it in various ways, but according to the classical laws that were believed at the beginning of the century, you weren't allowed to be overdrawn.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: A man must drive his energy, not be driven by it.
quotes.author: William Frederick Book

quotes.quote: There's enormous energy required to carry grudges - enormous energy! And I'm getting too old to expend my energy that way, cause I think every person has a limited amount of energy. So I have given up all grudges.
quotes.author: Ed Koch

quotes.quote: Put your energy into building what is creative, valuable and empowering. And you won't have to constantly fight against what is destructive and draining.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: It takes as much energy to wish as it does to plan.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Energy is the inherent effort of every multiplicity to become unity.
quotes.author: Henry Brooks Adams

quotes.quote: Energy is time, and time is everything.
quotes.author: Khalid Masood

quotes.quote: Energy is precious, use your energy to build not to destroy.
quotes.author: Constance Chuks Friday

quotes.quote: The sensation of energy expands with increasing relaxation.
quotes.author: Ilchi Lee

quotes.quote: The higher your energy level, the more efficient your body. The more efficient your body, the better you feel and the more you will use your talent to produce outstanding results.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: The more willing you are to surrender to the energy within you, the more power can flow through you.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: The unknown energy that can help humanity is that which lies hidden in the child.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Don't wait for what you need-put in the energy to create what you need.
quotes.author: David Oleski

quotes.quote: Where attention goes, energy flows; Where intention goes, energy flows.
quotes.author: James Redfield

quotes.quote: It's a waste of energy to be angry with a man who behaves badly, just as it is to be angry with a car that won't go.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It takes a lot more energy to fail than to succeed, since it takes a lot of concentrated energy to hold on to beliefs that don't work.
quotes.author: Jerry Gillies

quotes.quote: Energy may be likened to the bending of a cross bow; decision, to the releasing of the trigger.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: A person of intellect without energy added to it, is a failure.
quotes.author: Sébastien-Roch Nicolas

quotes.quote: And what is a man without energy? Nothing - nothing at all.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Energy is the power that drives every human being. It is not lost by exertion but maintained by it, for it is a faculty of the psyche.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: Energy, like the biblical grain of the mustard-seed, will remove mountains.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: It seems that every time mankind is given a lot of energy, we go out and wreck something with it.
quotes.author: David R. Brower

quotes.quote: I learned early that you only have so much energy to give. You have to spend it correctly.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: Without energy life would be extinguished instantaneously, and the cellular fabric would collapse.
quotes.author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quotes.quote: Energy is the key to creativity. Energy is the key to life.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: The more you lose yourself in something bigger than yourself, the more energy you will have.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peal

quotes.quote: The key that unlocks energy is desire. It's also the key to a long and interesting life. If we expect to create any drive, any real force within ourselves, we have to get excited.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Energy is equal to desire and purpose.
quotes.author: Sheryl Adams

quotes.quote: Goals help you channel your energy into action.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: If your energy is as boundless as your ambition, total commitment may be a way of life you should seriously consider.
quotes.author: Dr. Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Energy and persistence alter all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Concentrate your energy and hoard your strength.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Without passion you don't have energy, with out energy you have nothing.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Our energy is in proportion to the resistance it meets.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Out of need springs desire, and out of desire springs the energy and the will to win.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Put good energy out. Get good energy back.
quotes.author: Lawrence Tierney

quotes.quote: All of our energy should be in sacrifice and services. Suffering, at least.
quotes.author: Richard Gere

quotes.quote: You use and lose a lot of energy being grumpy.
quotes.author: Ted Danson

quotes.quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The same energy of character which renders a man a daring villain would have rendered him useful in society, had that society been well organized.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It’s very simple.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Nobody but you is responsible for your life. You are responsible for your life. What is your life? What is all life? What is every flower, every rock, every tree? Energy. And you’re responsible for the energy you create for yourself, and you’re responsible for the energy that you bring to others.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Energy can’t be created or destroyed, and energy flows. It must be in a direction, with some kind of internal, emotive, spiritual direction. It must have some effect somewhere.
quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

quotes.quote: It is evident that our organism has stored-up reserves of energy that are ordinarily not called upon, but that may be called upon: deeper and deeper strata of combustible or explosible material, discontinuously arranged, but ready for use by anyone who probes so deep, and repairing themselves by rest as well as do the superficial strata.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy and inspires your hopes.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: The average person puts only 25% of his energy and ability into his work. The world takes off its hat to those who put more than 50% of their capacity, and stands on its head for those few and far between souls who devote 100%.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Without passion, you don't have energy. Without energy, you have nothing.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Our culture runs on coffee and gasoline, the first often tasting like the second.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: The difference between one man and another is not mere ability—it is energy.
quotes.author: Thomas Arnold

quotes.quote: Energy is the only life, and is from the body; and reason is the bound or outward circumference of energy. Energy is eternal delight.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Energy is liberated matter; matter is energy waiting to happen.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: The longer I live, the more deeply I am convinced that that which makes the difference between one man and another—between the weak and the powerful, the great and the insignificant, is energy—invisible determination—a purpose once formed and then death or victory. This quality will do anything that has to be done in the world, and no talents, no circumstances, no opportunities, will make one a man without it.
quotes.author: Thomas Buxton

quotes.quote: When I first started paying $4 a gallon a gas, I didn't mind; I thought I was just getting better gas.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: I guess I am not naturally energetic. I like to sit around and talk.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Intelligence and the spirit of adventure can be combined to create new energies, and out of these energies may come exciting and rewarding new prospects.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: I'd put my money on the sun and solar energy. What a source of power! I hope we don't have to wait until oil and coal run out before we tackle that.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: The world belongs to the energetic.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The real difference between men is energy. A strong will, a settled purpose, an invincible determination, can accomplish almost anything; and in this lies the distinction between great men and little men.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Energy will do anything that can be done in the world; and no talents, no circumstances, no opportunities will make a two-legged animal a man without it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A man doesn't need brilliance or genius, all he needs is energy.
quotes.author: Albert M. Greenfield

quotes.quote: It takes wit and interest and energy to be happy. The pursuit of happiness is a great activity. One must be open and alive. It is the greatest feat man has to accomplish, and spirits must flow. There must be courage. There are no easy ruts to get into which lead to happiness. A man must become interesting to himself and must become actually expressive before he can be happy.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: He also has energy who cannot be deprived of it.
quotes.author: Johann Lavater

quotes.quote: There is no genius in life like the genius of energy and industry.
quotes.author: D.G. Mitchell

quotes.quote: Energy innovation is not a nationalistic game.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: In energy, you have to plan and do research way in advance, sometimes decades in advance to get a new system that's safer, doesn't require us to go around the world to get all our oil.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Really advanced civilization is based on advances in energy.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: If you take the game of life seriously, if you take your nervous system seriously, if you take your sense organs seriously, if you take the energy process seriously, you must turn on, tune in and drop out.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: Energy out of control is dangerous; energy under control is powerful.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The great qualities, the imperious will, the rapid energy, the eager nature fit for a great crisis are not required—are impediments—in common times.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Consistently investigate what gives other people energy. Be the fan that fuels it.
quotes.author: Darren Rowse

quotes.quote: If only energy is neither created nor destroyed; everything you will ever want is always here. It simply is a matter of choosing the thought which will put you into harmonious vibration with what you desire.
quotes.author: Hina Hashmi

quotes.quote: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Don't use your energy to worry. Use your energy to believe.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: An idea isn't worth much until a man is found who has the energy and ability to make it work.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The magic begins within you. Feel your own energy and recognize similar energy exists within the earth, stones, plants, water, wind, fire, colors, and animals.
quotes.author: Scott Cunningham

quotes.quote: Today, we're very dependent on cheap energy. We just take it for granted—all the things you have in the house, the way industry works.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: There is energy all around us. The energy is both Yin and Yang, positive energy and negative energy. The energy wants to restore balance, and in the moment the positive and negative energy come crashing back together you provide release and guidance, creating lightning. Once you separate the energy, you do not command it, you are simply its humble guide. Breathe first.
quotes.author: Uncle Iroh

quotes.quote: We've got a long way to go but we got the energy / It took a little while to find reality / We've come a long way you know, living inside a dream / Waking to find that we are kings and queens.
quotes.author: Brooke Fraser

quotes.quote: Our one source of energy / Electricity / All we need to live today / A gift for man to throw away / The chance to change has nearly gone / The alternative is only one / The final source of energy / Solar electricity
quotes.author: Andrew McCluskey

quotes.quote: We got the power / Get ready to go / We stand united / The energy flows / We got the power / The moment has come / Nothing can stop us / When we stand as one
quotes.author: Barry Fasman

quotes.quote: As once the winged energy of delight / carried you over childhood's dark abysses, / now beyond your own life build the great / arch of unimagined bridges. / Wonders happen if we can succeed / in passing through the harshest danger; / but only in a bright and purely granted / achievement can we realize the wonder.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: I am the wind vane. / I depend on the wind / To turn. / It is my energy. / I need what wind gives / To be me. / I am the wind vane.
quotes.author: Leslie Alexis

quotes.quote: We robbed the water and the air to give us “energy,” / As we’d exhaust Thy secret store of electricity. / The day may come—and such a day!—when we shall need all three.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: But would the honest patriot, in the full tide of successful experiment, abandon a government which has so far kept us free and firm, on the theoretic and visionary fear that this government, the world's best hope, may by possibility want energy to preserve itself?
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: It is good policy to be stirring about your affairs, for the reward of activity and energy is that if you do not accomplish the object you had professed to yourself, you do accomplish something else. So, in my botanizing or natural history walks, it commonly turns out that, going for one thing, I get another thing.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If more people were actively engaged in advocating their positions I think we'd have a better society.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.quote: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The fully engaged heart is the antibody for the infection of violence.
quotes.author: Mark Nepo

quotes.quote: Anybody who has been seriously engaged in scientific work of any kind realizes that over the entrance to the gates of the temple of science are written the words: Ye must have faith.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.quote: No man who is occupied in doing a very difficult thing, and doing it very well, ever loses his self-respect.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A man occupied with public or other important business cannot, and need not, attend to spelling.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: If we examine our thoughts, we shall find them always occupied with the past and the future.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: When our emotions are engaged, we often have trouble seeing things as they are.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.quote: There is no question but that when one is engaged militarily that there are going to be unintended loss of life.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: "Most people are far too much occupied with themselves to be malicious.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Engage people with what they expect; it is what they are able to discern and confirms their projections. It settles them into predictable patterns of response, occupying their minds while you wait for the extraordinary moment, that which they cannot anticipate.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The much occupied man has no time for wantonness, and it is an obvious commonplace that the evils of leisure can be shaken off by hard work.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: When a couple of young people strongly devoted to each other commence to eat onions, it is safe to pronounce them engaged.
quotes.author: James Montgomery Bailey

quotes.quote: Love one another and you will be happy. It's as simple and as difficult as that.
quotes.author: Michael Leunig

quotes.quote: A soul occupied with great ideas performs small duties.
quotes.author: Harriet Martineau

quotes.quote: To be mindfully engaged is the most natural, creative state we can be in.
quotes.author: Ellen Langer

quotes.quote: No thoroughly occupied man was ever yet very miserable.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: We must not settle for an informed mind without an engaged heart.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: Being engaged in some way for the good of the community, whatever that community, is a factor in a meaningful life. We long to belong, and belonging and caring anchors our sense of place in the universe.
quotes.author: Patricia Churchland

quotes.quote: When your heart and your mind are engaged, you cannot go wrong.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.quote: To be totally engaged with all my functions and all my faculties and all my capacities in life to me that would be success.
quotes.author: Jacob Needleman

quotes.quote: Let every man be occupied, and occupied in the highest employment of which his nature is capable, and die with the consciousness that he has done his best.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: It is better to engaged you mind on positive thoughts.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: Be ever engaged, so that whenever the devil calls he may find you occupied.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: Whoever undertakes to create soon finds himself engaged in creating himself.
quotes.author: Harold Rosenberg

quotes.quote: A man, engaged in his simple reflections in everyday life, will comprehend neither the possibility, nor the benefits of self-sacrifice, but, when given a great cause to defend, and he will find only natural to sacrifice oneself for it.
quotes.author: African Spir

quotes.quote: When we were engaged in the problems of survival we had no time to have anything to do with culture.
quotes.author: Nursultan Nazarbayev

quotes.quote: Be occupied, then, with what you really value and let the thief take something else.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Keep engaged in the all new popular and fancy, positive side of things!
quotes.author: Robert Falcon Scott

quotes.quote: I promise to take care of you when you are old but the first time you hit me with your crane, I'll wash your dentures in toilet water.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I try to remember, as I hear about friends getting engaged, that it's not about the ring and it's not about the wedding. It's a grave thing, getting married. And it's easy to get swept up in the wrong things.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: My instinct is to keep my engagement ring After all, I wouldn't like to see it on the finger of a cheeky girl.
quotes.author: Sian Lloyd

quotes.quote: I won't give my heart to another girl until God shows me it's my wife.
quotes.author: Eric Ludy

quotes.quote: Control leads to compliance; autonomy leads to engagement.
quotes.author: Daniel H. Pink

quotes.quote: We may have started as individuals, but now we are as one.
quotes.author: Bryon Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine

quotes.quote: Not men but measures a sort of charm by which many people get loose from every honorable engagement.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: There are many blanks left in the weeks of courtship, which a loving faith fills with happy assurance.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: You rose into my life like a promised sunrise, brightening my days with the light in your eyes. I've never been so strong. Now I'm where I belong.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: We start a relationship with someone not only because of how great they are but how great they make us feel. And because they have granted us this extraordinary giftâ€”a chance to experience love, joy, compassion, and security â€”it is our exclusive privilege to make them feel wonderful about themselves, especially during days when they, themselves, don't feel so wonderful.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: If you want to sacrifice the admiration of many men for the criticism of one, go ahead, get married.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness - and call it love - true love.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: The Oriole weds his mottled mate, the Lily weds the bee; Heaven's marriage ring is round the earth, let me bind thee?
quotes.author: Victorian Card

quotes.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Engagement marks the end of a whirlwind romance and beginning of an eternal love story.
quotes.author: Rajeev Ranjan

quotes.quote: Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: It is good to have an end to journey toward; But it is the journey that matters, in the end.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: May your love for each other always shine brightly! Well wishes on your engagement!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: All commands from your lips are sweet, I say, and now have you not said the sweetest of all? Marry you!
quotes.author: Byron Caldwell Smith

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances; if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: We have the greatest pre-nuptial agreement in the world. It's called love.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Find the person who will love you because of your differences and not in spite of them and you have found a lover for life.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: To love and to be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: Engagement marks the apex of a relationship's love and happiness. It's all downhill from here. Congratulations.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I couldn't have dreamed you into existence because I didn't even know I needed you. You must have been sent to me.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: It is the duty of the bride's father to give a party to announce the engagement. Apparently this is done only after everyone knows about it.
quotes.author: Spencer Tracy

quotes.quote: An engagement should come upon a young girl as a surprise, pleasant or unpleasant as the case may be. It is hardly a matter she could be allowed to arrange for herself.
quotes.author: Edith Evans

quotes.quote: No engagement is worth anything unless it has been broken at least once.
quotes.author: Dorothy Tutin

quotes.quote: The disgusting way an engagement is regarded public property; all these older women smirking...but my point is their whole attitude is wrong— an engagement, horrid word in the first place, is a private affair and should be regarded as such.
quotes.author: Daniel Day-Lewis

quotes.quote: An engaged woman is always more agreeable than a disengaged. She is satisfied with herself. Her cares are over, and she feels that may exert all her powers of pleasing without suspicion. All is safe with a lady engaged; no harm can be done.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: I would rather not be engaged. When people are engaged, they begin to thin of being married soon...and I should like everything to go on for a long while just as it is.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: To speak frankly, I'm not in favor of long engagements. They give people the opportunity of finding out each other's character before marriage, which I think is never advisable.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Courtship to marriage is a very witty prologue to a very dull play.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: Today, engagement parties still allow both families to meet each other if they haven't done so before. Even if both sets of parents have met, it's nice for siblings and other extended relatives to meet and mingle so they are all acquainted with one another before the wedding.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Kaplan-Mayer

quotes.quote: It's never out of style to have good manners. If possible, make the engagement announcement to the bride's parents in person.
quotes.author: Joyce Scardina-Becker

quotes.quote: Although somewhat outdated, the use of formal announcement cards is a beautiful and elegant way to spread the word of your engagement.
quotes.author: Joyce Scardina-Becker

quotes.quote: And how my anguish, when she drew her glove, /And showed the plain gold sign of wedded love, / Refused assuagement:— / Why is it that I do not care a jot / If this one wears such fateful ring, or not— / Plain, or engagement?
quotes.author: James Brunton-Stephen

quotes.quote: Herbert broke our engagement of eight years / When Annabelle returned to the village / From the Seminary, ah me! / If I had let my love for him alone / It might have grown into a beautiful sorrow.
quotes.author: Edgar Lee Masters

quotes.quote: The best thing that the diamond ring could do; was to amicably occupy a place on the engagement finger,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: If we don't break this off, there will be time enough / For that sort of thing; but the bargain must be, / That as long as I choose I am perfectly free: / For this is a sort of engagement, you see, / Which is binding on you, but not binding on me.
quotes.author: William Allen Butler

quotes.quote: Once I was a King / Now I'm wrapped around her finger / Like a diamond ring / The engagement ring / The wedding ring / The church bells ring / And the suffering.
quotes.author: Stuart Phillips

quotes.quote: Darling me and you, we had a strange arrangement / But you broke all the rules / And I'm through playing the fool for love / Darling yes it's true, we had a grand engagement / But I can't stand by, while you break my heart in two / Ooh, I've got to be a man / Baby I've got to take a stand, so.
quotes.author: Andrew M. Cohen

quotes.quote: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: And I'd choose you; in a hundred lifetimes, in a hundred worlds, in any version of reality, I'd find you and I'd choose you.
quotes.author: Kiersten White

quotes.quote: It is sometimes essential for a husband and a wife to quarrel—they get to know each other better.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfang Von Goethe

quotes.quote: What greater thing is there for human souls than to feel that they are joined for life – to be with each other in silent unspeakable memories.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet to see who they really are.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Success in marriage does not come merely through finding the right mate, but through being the right mate.
quotes.author: Barnett R. Brickner

quotes.quote: Engagement can be a commitment to love or a declaration of war. One must enter every battle without hesitation, willing to fully engage the enemy until death do you apart.
quotes.author: Emily Thorne

quotes.quote: A perfect couple shares their failures, mistakes and their successes equally and deal with them all as a team.
quotes.author: Ricardo Derose

quotes.quote: A pessimist says the glass is half empty, an optimist says the glass is half full, and an engineer says the glass is too big.
quotes.author: Scott Edward Shjefte

quotes.quote: Science is about knowing; engineering is about doing.
quotes.author: Henry Petroski

quotes.quote: Engineering is the art of directing the great sources of power in nature for the use and convenience of man.
quotes.author: Thomas Tredgold

quotes.quote: Engineering is the continuation of politics by other means.
quotes.author: Larrie D. Ferreiro

quotes.quote: Engineering problems are under-defined, there are many solutions, good, bad and indifferent. The art is to arrive at a good solution. This is a creative activity, involving imagination, intuition and deliberate choice.
quotes.author: Ove Arup

quotes.quote: Engineering is the professional art of applying science to the optimum conversion of natural resources to the benefit of man.
quotes.author: Ralph J. Smith

quotes.quote: The fewer moving parts, the better. Exactly. No truer words were ever spoken in the context of engineering.
quotes.author: Christian Cantrell

quotes.quote: Engineering is the art of organizing and directing men and controlling the forces and materials of nature for the benefit of the human race.
quotes.author: Henry G. Stott

quotes.quote: Engineers like to solve problems. If there are no problems handily available, they will create their own problems.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Engineering without imagination sinks to a trade.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Engineering is not only study of 45 subjects but it is moral studies of intellectual life.
quotes.author: Prakhar Srivastav

quotes.quote: What's nice about having an engineering degree is everybody thinks you are smart.
quotes.author: Ato Essandoh

quotes.quote: Engineering or Technology is the making of things that did not previously exist, whereas science is the discovering of things that have long existed.
quotes.author: David Billington

quotes.quote: The history of engineering is really the history of breakages, and of learning from those breakages. I was taught at college 'the engineer learns most on the scrapheap.
quotes.author: C. A. Claremont

quotes.quote: Engineers are not mere technicians and should not approve or lend their name to any project that does not promise to be beneficent to man and the advancement of civilization.
quotes.author: John Fowler

quotes.quote: The engineer has been, and is, a maker of history.
quotes.author: James Kip Finch

quotes.quote: At its heart, engineering is about using science to find creative, practical solutions. It is a noble profession.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: I'm quite into the idea of engineering being beautiful.
quotes.author: Sean Booth

quotes.quote: Engineering is achieving function while avoiding failure.
quotes.author: Henry Petroski

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, humans have a long history of trying to fix their engineering mistakes with more engineering mistakes!
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: A scientist builds in order to learn; an engineer learns in order to build.
quotes.author: Fred Brooks

quotes.quote: Engineering is defining and following datasheets. If it doesn't work then use common sense.
quotes.author: Bhupesh B. Patil

quotes.quote: Engineering is a great profession.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Engineering is the professional art of applying science to the optimum conversion of the resources of nature to the uses of humankind.
quotes.author: ASCE

quotes.quote: A good scientist is a person with original ideas. A good engineer is a person who makes a design that works with as few original ideas as possible. There are no prima donnas in engineering.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: Death and taxes are unsolved engineering problems.
quotes.author: Romana Machado

quotes.quote: One man's magic is another man's engineering. Supernatural is a null word.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: One should proceed with caution. We may simply not be wise enough to do some of the kinds of engineering things that people are talking about doing.
quotes.author: Leon Kass

quotes.quote: A scientist can discover a new star but he cannot make one. He would have to ask an engineer to do it for him.
quotes.author: Gordon Lindsay Glegg

quotes.quote: Engineering is the art of doing that well with one dollar which any bungler can be with two after a fashion.
quotes.author: A. M. Wellington

quotes.quote: Nothing is so inspiring as seeing big works well laid out and planned and a real engineering organisation.
quotes.author: Frederick Handley Page

quotes.quote: Engineering is damn hard work.
quotes.author: Hal Goldberg

quotes.quote: Social engineering, the fancy term for tricking you into giving away your digital secrets, is at least as great a threat as spooky technology.
quotes.author: Barton Gellman

quotes.quote: Engineering is the science of economy, of conserving the energy, kinetic and potential, provided and stored up by nature for the use of man. It is the business of engineering to utilize this energy to the best advantage, so that there may be the least possible waste.
quotes.author: Willard A. Smith

quotes.quote: Engineering is the art or science of making practical.
quotes.author: Samuel Charles Florman

quotes.quote: Engineering is the professional and systematic application of science to the efficient utilization of natural resources to produce wealth.
quotes.author: Theodore Jesse Hoover

quotes.quote: Engineering is the application of science for human benefit.
quotes.author: J. M. Prausnitz

quotes.quote: The human foot is a masterpiece of engineering and a work of art.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Engineering is maths & management.
quotes.author: Bhupesh B. Patil

quotes.quote: Ask the steel, each strut and wire. What gave it force and power.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Strauss

quotes.quote: First rule of engineering; beware prototypes. Along with, avoid anything made by an engineer who doesn't have all his own fingers.
quotes.author: Simon R. Green

quotes.quote: The joy of engineering is to find a straight line on a double logarithmic diagram.
quotes.author: Thomas Koenig

quotes.quote: Engineering is an activity other than purely manual and physical work which brings about the utilization of the materials and laws of nature for the good of humanity.
quotes.author: R. E. Hellmund

quotes.quote: Engineering is the conscious application of science to the problems of economic production.
quotes.author: H. P. Gillete

quotes.quote: Engineering refers to the practice of organizing the design and construction of any artifice which transforms the physical world around us to meet some recognized need.
quotes.author: GFC Rogers

quotes.quote: Engineering stimulates the mind.
quotes.author: Bruce Dickinson

quotes.quote: Always engineering is the basic fundamental solver of human living problems under the sun.
quotes.author: Vitalis Bilauri

quotes.quote: But remember this, Japanese boy, airplanes are not tools for war. They are not for making mone. Airplanes are beautiful dreams. Engineers turn dreams into reality.
quotes.author: Hayao Miyazaki

quotes.quote: If I had nine hours to chop down a tree, I’d spend the first six sharpening my axe.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: My brother is an electrical engineer and went to computer science grad school at Stanford, and he'd tell me stories about the happy hours he'd organize.
quotes.author: Alec Berg

quotes.quote: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: There’s nothing I believe in more strongly than getting young people interested in science and engineering, for a better tomorrow, for all humankind.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Experience serves not only to confirm theory, but differs from it without disturbing it, it leads to new truths which theory only has not been able to reach.
quotes.author: Dalembert

quotes.quote: A common mistake that people make when trying to design something completely foolproof is to underestimate the ingenuity of complete fools.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: The major difference between a thing that might go wrong and a thing that cannot possibly go wrong is that when a thing that cannot possibly go wrong goes wrong, it usually turns out to be impossible to get at and repair.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Projects we have completed demonstrate what we know future projects decide what we will learn.
quotes.author: Dr. Mohsin Tiwana

quotes.quote: I don’t spend my time pontificating about high concept things I spend my time solving engineering and manufacturing problems.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: There can be little doubt that in many ways the story of bridge building is the story of civilization. By it we can readily measure an important part of a people's progress.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: All models are wrong, but some are useful.
quotes.author: George Box

quotes.quote: The scientist discovers a new type of material or energy and the engineer discovers a new use for it.
quotes.author: Gordon Lindsay Glegg

quotes.quote: A good engineer thinks in reverse and asks himself about the stylistic consequences of the components and systems he proposes.
quotes.author: Helmut Jahn

quotes.quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The engineer is a mediator between the philosopher and the working mechanic and, like an interpreter between two foreigners must understand the language of both, hence the absolute necessity of possessing both practical and theoretical knowledge.
quotes.author: Henry Palmer

quotes.quote: No one wants to learn by mistakes, but we cannot learn enough from successes to go beyond the state of the art.
quotes.author: Henry Petroski

quotes.quote: As engineers, we were going to be in a position to change the world not just study it.
quotes.author: Henry Petroski

quotes.quote: Failure is central to engineering. Every single calculation that an engineer makes is a failure calculation. Successful engineering is all about understanding how things break or fail.
quotes.author: Henry Petroski

quotes.quote: Men build bridges and throw railroads across deserts, and yet they contend successfully that the job of sewing on a button is beyond them.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun

quotes.quote: Science can amuse and fascinate us all, but it is engineering that changes the world.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Manufacturing is more than just putting parts together. It’s coming up with ideas, testing principles and perfecting the engineering as well as final assembly.
quotes.author: James Dyson

quotes.quote: Architects and engineers are among the most fortunate of men since they build their own monuments with public consent, public approval and often public money.
quotes.author: John Prebble

quotes.quote: We are continually faced by great opportunities brilliantly disguised as insoluble problems.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: One has to watch out for engineers they begin with the sewing machine and end up with the atomic bomb.
quotes.author: Marcel Pagnol

quotes.quote: What we usually consider as impossible are simply engineering problems… there’s no law of physics preventing them.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.quote: The ideal engineer is a composite. He is not a scientist, he is not a mathematician, he is not a sociologist or a writer, but he may use the knowledge and techniques of any or all of these disciplines in solving engineering problems.
quotes.author: N.W. Dougherty

quotes.quote: A theory may be so rich in descriptive possibilities that it can be made to fit any data.
quotes.author: Phillip Johnson-Laird

quotes.quote: All we know about the new economic world tells us that nations which train engineers will prevail over those which train lawyers. No nation has ever sued its way to greatness.
quotes.author: Richard Lamm

quotes.quote: Normal people believe that if it ain’t broke, don’t fix it. Engineers believe that if it ain’t broke, it doesn’t have enough features yet.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: He was living like an engineer in a mechanical world. No wonder he had become dry as a stone.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Strive for perfection in everything you do. Take the best that exists and make it better. When it does not exist, design it.
quotes.author: Sir Henry Royce

quotes.quote: Whenever you are asked if you can do a job, tell ‘em ‘Certainly I can!’ Then get busy and find out how to do it.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Scientists study the world as it is, engineers create the world that never has been.
quotes.author: Theodore von Karman

quotes.quote: The way to succeed is to double your failure rate.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: Improvement makes strait roads: but the crooked roads without improvement are roads of genius.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: When you want to know how things really work, study them when they’re coming apart.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: We shape our buildings, thereafter they shape us.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: It is not summer, England doesn't have summer, it has continuous autumn with a fortnight's variation here and there.
quotes.author: Natasha Pulley

quotes.quote: England is never in a hurry because she is eternal.
quotes.author: Henryk Sienkiewicz

quotes.quote: England and America are two countries separated by the same language.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: England is not a country of granite and marble, but of chalk, marl, and clay.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: England is merely an island of beef swimming in a warm gulf stream of gravy.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: England is the paradise of individuality, eccentricity, heresy, anomalies, hobbies, and humors.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: England has two books, the Bible and Shakespeare. England made Shakespeare, but the Bible made England.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: England is a nation of shopkeepers.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: England has always been disinclined to accept human nature.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: The people of England are the most enthusiastic in the world.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: England is like the margin of a spring-run: near its source, always green, always cool, always moist, comparatively free from frost in winter and from drought in summer.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: It's not that hard to be glamorous in England.
quotes.author: Isabel Fonseca

quotes.quote: England is a country of pianos, they are everywhere.
quotes.author: Frederic Chopin

quotes.quote: You never find an Englishman among the under dogs except England, of course.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.quote: England is safe, if true within itself.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: England has forty-two religions and only two sauces.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: England's always expecting. No wonder they call her the Mother Country
quotes.author: Fred Trueman

quotes.quote: If you want to eat well in England, eat three breakfasts.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: In England, your life is your life.
quotes.author: Eric Cantona

quotes.quote: England expects every man to do his duty
quotes.author: Horatio Nelson

quotes.quote: Just close your eyes – and think of England.
quotes.author: Queen Victoria

quotes.quote: In England, everything stops for tea.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I am a mystery wrapped in an enigma wrapped in a pita. Why the pita? That counts as another mystery.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: At once he became an enigma. One side or the other of his nature was perfectly comprehensible; but both sides together were bewildering.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: Failure is an enigma. You worry about it, and it teaches you something.
quotes.author: James Dyson

quotes.quote: We shall never resolve the enigma of the relation between the negative foundations of greatness and that greatness itself.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: I have come to believe that the whole world is an enigma, a harmless enigma that is made terrible by our own mad attempt to interpret it as though it had an underlying truth.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: I have always knocked at the door of that wonderful and terrible enigma which is life.
quotes.author: Eugenio Montale

quotes.quote: Enigma isn't difficult, it's impossible.
quotes.author: Graham Moore

quotes.quote: The woman's an enigma wrapped in a grouchy, adorable riddle.
quotes.author: Dan Fogelman

quotes.quote: Is everyone a mystery? Is everyone an enigma? We most certainly are.
quotes.author: William Arntz

quotes.quote: She's an enigma my wife. You can get close to her, but you never quite reach her. She's like a, beautiful ghost.
quotes.author: Darcey Bell

quotes.quote: Life is a mystery. Just accept it.
quotes.author: Paul Attanasio

quotes.quote: Some mysteries aren't meant to be solved.
quotes.author: Andrew W. Marlowe

quotes.quote: I open the door to a new dimension / Sigma enigma / I will create your reality / Believe in me, I am the answer to your questions
quotes.author: Arien Van Weesnbeek

quotes.quote: Ashes to the wind, like shattered days / The enigma, dissolved in the unknown wisdom / Airtight, warmth and cold
quotes.author: Howling in the Fog

quotes.quote: Whisper impossible / Savor the eternal misunderstanding / The dawn of time / The enigma of life / The Enigma!
quotes.author: Howling in the Fog

quotes.quote: Cannot comply much longer to the way my life had been / For once I know the truth, an Enigma within
quotes.author: Goat of Mendes

quotes.quote: You're a silent rage, you're a hurricane / You are everything I cannot see and can't explain / You're an enigma wrapped in a mystery / Everywhere I go, I can't escape Your energy
quotes.author: Alexander Greenwald

quotes.quote: How very enigmatic you are. / If I could be / The me you wanted me to / be you'd see / I'm only scratching at the surface / I'm so much deeper / understand like you an enigma
quotes.author: Enigmatic

quotes.quote: But they're so, so wrong / You are so much more than all of that / You're an enigma and you're so much more than that
quotes.author: Lighthouse Row

quotes.quote: Enigma wrapped in riddle / Your life I belittle / Dignity I'd steal / Now I know how it feels
quotes.author: Jerry Cantrel

quotes.quote: God gives you shelter at heavens shore, / Abandon your thoughts to the mighty. / Into the chapel of holiness, live for the / Sacred empire, engender the Enigma.
quotes.author: Swano

quotes.quote: Each person is an enigma. You're a puzzle not only to yourself but also to everyone else, and the great mystery of our time is how we penetrate this puzzle.
quotes.author: Theodore Zeldin

quotes.quote: The mysterious is always attractive. People will always follow a vail.
quotes.author: Bede Jarrett

quotes.quote: Life has its enigmatic events, that can make it a mystery, or my misery. It all depends on how I view it.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Mystery is the wine of this universe. It makes us dizzy and makes us feel happy! Man needs enigma so that he can get rid of the dullness of the reality!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Mystery is at the heart of creativity. That, and surprise.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Man himself is an enigma in motion; his questions never stay asked; whereas the mold, the footprint, and by natural extension, the statue itself, like the vaults, the arches, the temples with which man records his own passing, remain immobile and fix a moment of man's life, upon which one might endlessly meditate.
quotes.author: Emile Chartier

quotes.quote: Paradoxically though it may seem, it is none the less true that life imitates art far more than art imitates life.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Enigma is really an investment in peace of mind.
quotes.author: Jim Cantrell

quotes.quote: The true mystery of the world is the visible, not the invisible.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man's desire to understand.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: Every mystery of life has its origin in the heart.
quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.quote: This enigma keeps me entangled / On the edge of insanity / Living my / Transient being in / Trance / Wisdom has withered me / Within this warren of confusion
quotes.author: Patrick Savelkoul

quotes.quote: Stay close to me, infinity / Enigma's what we share / But I don't care / You'll be there.
quotes.author: David Brandes

quotes.quote: You rig the enigma can't figure it out / You change the route now you're in doubt
quotes.author: Eric Barrier

quotes.quote: My enigma is / Keeping our secret / Cross my heart / And hope to die / Dream dynamic / So panoramic / When yearning wail / My endless tale
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Bond your seducing enigma so immortally with my indigently commercial countenance; that it was / perennially impossible for me to be ever possessed by / any other enigma on this compassionate Universe; for unending more civilizations; yet to evolve
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Enigma love you swell the heart, / to crush the same when lovers part / But whether love and joy you bring / or bitter pain and Death's cold sting
quotes.author: Ario William Vitale

quotes.quote: For all that suffer release it offers, / But trails forever its own enigma. / A strange alliance with Death unites it, / That all it give Him,--itself excepting!
quotes.author: Bjørnstjerne Bjørnson

quotes.quote: A single shadow of hers instilled so much enigma; that the entire compendium of fairy tales on this earth; unitedly failed to evoke
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: But the trail of mesmerizing enigma on your innocuously budding palms was astoundingly divinely; bestowing upon my staggering / beleaguered footsteps; a / spell of immoral happiness.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: The enigma of health is just one small example form the range of problems which confront us.
quotes.author: Hans-Georg Gadamer

quotes.quote: In the sacred Mysteries this was expressed by the term Agape. It was a word of signifying the Divine being as love..
quotes.author: J Todd Ferrier

quotes.quote: Nevertheless mystery tends to be defined as a secret beyond human reason, in a religion sense known only by divine revelation.
quotes.author: Adrienne E. Gavin

quotes.quote: A mystery may give rise to many interpretations, it cannot be exhausted by any of them. These ideas, thoughts, and beliefs serve as windows to a higher reality; they speak of--and elicit--a deeper truth within the mind.
quotes.author: Bottrell

quotes.quote: We speak of darkness as the domain of mystery where we are confronted by the unknown.
quotes.author: Bottrell

quotes.quote: This was a world of every mystery--the mystery of time, the mystery of life, the mystery of joy, the mystery of love, the mystery of dreams, and every kind of mystery of the world. It was here taht every mystery began to explain itself, for nothing was left a mystery so that on one would be left confused.
quotes.author: V. M. Cokanasiga

quotes.quote: God conceals, meaning that He doesn't let us know everything that's going on, so that there is some mystery to our lives.
quotes.author: John Elzinga

quotes.quote: The secret of life is enjoying the passage of time.
quotes.author: James Taylor

quotes.quote: Slow down and enjoy life. It's not only the scenery you miss by going too fast - you also miss the sense of where you are going and why.
quotes.author: Eddie Cantor

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Live every day as if it were going to be your last; for one day you're sure to be right.
quotes.author: Harry Morant

quotes.quote: Simply enjoy life and the great pleasures that come with it.
quotes.author: Karolina Kurkova

quotes.quote: I enjoy life when things are happening. I don't care if it's good things or bad things. That means you're alive.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: Follow your hopes and not your fears.
quotes.author: Jody Bower

quotes.quote: If you go around being afraid, you're never going to enjoy life. You have only one chance, so you've got to have fun.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.quote: Believe in "live and let live".
quotes.author: Satyendra Pandey

quotes.quote: The safest course is to do nothing against one's conscience. With this secret, we can enjoy life and have no fear from death.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: In all of living, have much fun and laughter. Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Do anything, but let it produce joy.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Do what makes you happy, be with who makes you smile, laugh as much as you breathe, and love as long as you live.
quotes.author: Rachel Ann Nunes

quotes.quote: Stop seeking out the storms and enjoy more fully the sunlight.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Don't ask yourself what the world needs; ask yourself what makes you come alive. And then go and do that. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
quotes.author: Harold Whitman

quotes.quote: Slow down and remember this: Most things make no difference.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: We must be willing to get rid of the life we've planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: You will never find time for anything. If you want time you must make it.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton

quotes.quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: I don't want to get to the end of my life and find that I lived just the length of it. I want to have lived the width of it as well.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Its important to have specific dreams. Dream Big. Dream without fear.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Live in the moment. Forget the past and don't concern yourself with the future.
quotes.author: Tanner Christensen

quotes.quote: Fully embrace the now, no matter what the situation.
quotes.author: Patrick Flynn

quotes.quote: Participate in life instead of just watching it pass you by.
quotes.author: Lindsey Wonderson

quotes.quote: Keep your spirit free, be flexible, let go.
quotes.author: Leslie Brown

quotes.quote: One day your life will flash before your eyes. Make sure it's worth watching.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Never save the best for later. You don't know what tomorrow holds.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho
