quotes.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life, to be happy, it's all that matters.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: No man is a failure who is enjoying life.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Find ecstasy in life. The mere sense of living is joy enough.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Dream big, stay positive, work hard, and enjoy the journey.
quotes.author: Urijah Faber

quotes.quote: Enjoy the journey, enjoy every moment, and quit worrying about Winning and losing.
quotes.author: Matt Biondi

quotes.quote: Take a step back, evaluate what is important, and enjoy life.
quotes.author: Teri Garr

quotes.quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Life is a challenge, meet it! Life is a dream, realize it! Life is a game, play it! Life is love, enjoy it!
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Live and work but do not forget to play, to have fun in life and really enjoy it.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: Life is too short to worry about anything. You had better enjoy it because the next day promises nothing.
quotes.author: Eric Davis

quotes.quote: Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: We will never enjoy life unless we make a quality decision to do so.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: You have to enjoy life. Always be surrounded by people that you like, people who have a nice conversation. There are so many positive things to think about.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Negative thinking keeps us from enjoying life.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
quotes.author: Aaron Lauritsen

quotes.quote: Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.quote: As you walk down the fairway of life you must smell the roses, for you only get to play one round.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is the key to everything, and it is the key to intimacy, because it is the goal of true authenticity.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The real meaning of enlightenment is to gaze with undimmed eyes on all darkness.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Enlightenment must come little by little - otherwise it would overwhelm.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Really, the only thing that makes sense is to strive for greater collective enlightenment.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Borrowing knowledge of reality from all sources, taking the best from every study, Science of Mind brings together the highest enlightenment of the ages.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is always there. Small enlightenment will bring great enlightenment. If you breathe in and are aware that you are alive - that you can touch the miracle of being alive - then that is a kind of enlightenment.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Not creating delusions is enlightenment.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: There are many paths to enlightenment. Be sure to take one with a heart.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Enlightenment means taking full responsibility for your life.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is not about becoming divine. Instead it's about becoming more fully human. . . . It is the end of ignorance.
quotes.author: Lama Surya Das

quotes.quote: There is no enlightenment outside of daily life.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: If I could define enlightenment briefly I would say it is "the quiet acceptance of what is."
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: One does not become enlightened by imagining figures of light, but by making the darkness conscious.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Do not think you will necessarily be aware of your own enlightenment.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.quote: Nirvana or lasting enlightenment or true spiritual growth can be achieved only through persistent exercise of real love.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: Just being the seeker, somebody whose open to spiritual enlightenment, is in itself the important thing and it's the reward for being a seeker in this world.
quotes.author: Walter Isaacson

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is like everyday consciousness but two inches above the ground.
quotes.author: D. T. Suzuki

quotes.quote: The moment of enlightenment is when a person's dreams of possibilities become images of probabilities.
quotes.author: Vic Braden

quotes.quote: Only one person in a million becomes enlightened without a teacher's help.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: Enlightened people seldom or never possess a sense of responsibility.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself is enlightened.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Everybody wants to get enlightened but nobody wants to change.
quotes.author: Andrew Cohen

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is the inner light of wisdom that is permanently free from all mistaken appearance, and whose function is to bestow mental peace upon each and every living being every day.
quotes.author: Kelsang Gyatso

quotes.quote: Only a couple of times have I ever been to church and felt enlightened by it.
quotes.author: Lynn Johnston

quotes.quote: We need enlightenment, not just individually but collectively, to save the planet. We need to awaken ourselves. We need to practice mindfulness if we want to have a future, if we want to save ourselves and the planet.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is not something you achieve. It is the absence of something. All your life you have been going forward after something, pursuing some goal. Enlightenment is dropping all that.
quotes.author: Charlotte Joko Beck

quotes.quote: Enlightenment means waking up to what you truly are and then being that.
quotes.author: Adyashanti

quotes.quote: Spiritual realization is to see clearly that what I perceive, experience, think, or feel is ultimately not who I am, that I cannot find myself in all those things that continually pass away.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: When you awaken, you realize that the separate person you took yourself to be is just a contract, a mental fabrication.
quotes.author: Stephan Bodian

quotes.quote: Spiritual awakening is about waking up from your ego. It is not about awakening the ego.
quotes.author: Sampo Kaasila

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is a demolition project. It simply shows you that everything you ever believed was true isn't.
quotes.author: Adyashanti

quotes.quote: I believe enlightenment or revelation comes in daily life. I look for joy, the peace of action. You need action. I'd have stopped writing years ago if it were for the money.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is intimacy with all things.
quotes.author: Dogen Zenji

quotes.quote: The awakening process, once begun, develops its own momentum without effort on your part, and the truth naturally yearns to awaken itself through you.
quotes.author: Stephan Bodian

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is, in the end, nothing more than the natural state of being.
quotes.author: Adyashanti

quotes.quote: Enlightenment cannot be attained nor forced. It can only happen when it is given a vacant space to appear in.
quotes.author: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.quote: True enlightenment is nothing but the nature of one's own self being fully realized.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is the direct result of freedom from the illusion of a separate self. A profound understanding of this ultimate simplicity provides all that is required for an awakening to enlightenment.
quotes.author: Gary Crowley

quotes.quote: Spiritual awakening is awakening from the dream of thought.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is not a desire, is not a goal, is not an ambition. It is a dropping of all goals, a dropping of all desires, a dropping of all ambitions. It is just being natural. That's what is meant by flowing.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is absolute cooperation with the inevitable.
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is a direct experience with reality.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is ego's ultimate disappointment.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: Even to be attached to the idea of enlightenment is to go astray.
quotes.author: Sen Sen Ming

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is when all hope disappears. Enlightenment is disappearance of hope.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: It is possible to experience an awakening in this life through realizing just how precious each moment, each mental process, and each breath truly is.
quotes.author: Christy Turlington

quotes.quote: A religious awakening which does not awaken the sleeper to love has roused him in vain.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.quote: The attainment of enlightenment from ego's point of view is extreme death, the death of self, the death of me and mine, the death of the watcher. It is the ultimate and final disappointment.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: Waking up to who you are requires letting go of who you imagine yourself to be.
quotes.author: Jim Britt

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is finding that there is nothing to find. Enlightenment is to come to know that there is nowhere to go.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Enlightenment were subjected to a scrutiny so thorough it is only a slight exaggeration to suggest that subsequent critics have raised few points that were not already considered in the 1780s.
quotes.author: James Schmidt

quotes.quote: The Enlightenment has been blamed for many things. It has been held responsible for the French Revolution, for totalitarianism, and for the view that nature is simply an object to be dominated, manipulated, and exploited.
quotes.author: James Schmidt

quotes.quote: Enlightenment has been implicated in one way or another in European imperialism and the most aggressive aspects of capitalism. While some have insisted that its skepticism about absolute values infects our culture with a nihilistic sluggishness, others have suggested that liberal societies should divest themselves of the Enlightenment's obsession with philosophical foundations.
quotes.author: James Schmidt

quotes.quote: It is said that Enlightenment passion for rights and liberties unleashed a destructive individualism that undermines any sense of community. Yet it has also been argued that its assumption that human nature was infinitely malleable has provided the intellectual inspiration for attempts by totalitarian states to eradicate all traces of individuality from their subjects.
quotes.author: James Schmidt

quotes.quote: Enlightenment has been criticized for its insensitivity to the tragic character of moral conflicts and for its naive assumption that all dilemmas have simple solutions.
quotes.author: James Schmidt

quotes.quote: Enlightenment has been argued that its attempt to construct a moral philosophy ended in failure, leaving us with either an impoverished moral vision that suppresses all values that cannot be reduced to instrumental efficiency or a corrupted moral discourse in which ethical evaluations are nother more than a mask for individual preferences.
quotes.author: James Schmidt

quotes.quote: Enlightenment has been castigated for its affection for master metanarratives and its hostility toward otherness. Its racism and its sexism have not passed unnoticed.
quotes.author: James Schmidt

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is at all faithful to its subject. Reservations can be registered on at least two fronts. First, the images of the Enlightenment we have considered here are, at best, caricatures that highlight certain features but miss others. Second, what these caricatures miss may very well be what is of greatest importance in understanding the continuing viability of some version of hopes of the Enlightenment.
quotes.author: James Schmidt

quotes.quote: The Enlightenment's significance was believed to transcent its immediate historical circumstances: it held out the prospect of a new, explicitly modern understanding of human beings' place in the world, and of radical improvement in the human condition.
quotes.author: John Robertson

quotes.quote: The Enlightenment's significance was believed to transcent its immediate historical circumstances: it held out the prospect of a new, explicitly modern understanding of human beings' place in the world, and of radical improvement in the human condition.
quotes.author: John Robertson

quotes.quote: The previous year had seen the foundation of the Paris-based Royal Society of Agriculture, the centerpiece of a vast state-led effort to promote agricultural enlightenment through the creation of a network of provincial associations.
quotes.author: William E. Burns

quotes.quote:
"It keeps changing to something different It keeps changing to something different
Enlightenment, don't know what it is
Enlightenment, don't know what it is
It says it's non attachment
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.quote: Due process, paying these dues, battling crews At the same time, livin in life, giving englightenment Seeing eye for the blind Through the darkness of the industry we ministry
quotes.author: Talib Kweli

quotes.quote: Enlightenment: my child and my doom. It is my project, which knows no bounds. There is nothing which limits or localizes it except for racial
quotes.author: Cryptodira

quotes.quote: With the enlightenment the world saw tighter restrictions and categorizations of discourses and behaviors.
quotes.author: Roger A. Salerno

quotes.quote: Still, proponents of Enlightenment thought advanced the notion of one truth, one reason, and one morality. But often buried under its gloss of universal intellectualism was class and cultural bias that provided little space for otherness.
quotes.author: Roger A. Salerno

quotes.quote: The idea of enlightenment, one sees that the enlightenment properly so-called, that of the modern era, was preceded by a complex history of rationalism that can no longer be ignored or dismissed.
quotes.author: Robert C. Bartlett

quotes.quote: The enlightenment idea of reason embodies, the theory that there is a relation between the ahistorical essence of the human soul and moral truth, a relation which ensures that free and open discussion will produce one right answer.
quotes.author: Robert C. Bartlett

quotes.quote: The tireless self-destruction of enlightenment hypocritically celebrated by implacable fascists and implemented by pliable experts in humanity compels thought to forbid itself its last remaining innocence regarding the habits and tendencies of the Zeitgeist.
quotes.author: Max Horkheimer

quotes.quote: Enlightenment has always aimed at liberating human beings from fear and installing them as masters. Yet the wholly enlightened earth is radiant with triumphant calamity.
quotes.author: Max Horkheimer

quotes.quote: Enlightenment was the disenchantment of the world. It wanted to dispel myths, to overthrow fantasy with knowledge.
quotes.author: Max Horkheimer

quotes.quote: The enlightenment succumbed to a Utopian image which, while deceptively propelling it, helped to produce contradictions which could not be resolved in practice and prepared the way for the Terror and for dictatorship.
quotes.author: Reinhart Koselleck

quotes.quote: The enlightenment acquired a gravity of its own, which came at last to be one of its political conditions.
quotes.author: Reinhart Koselleck

quotes.quote: It was from absolutism that the enlightenment evolved initially as its inner consequence, later as its dialectical conterpart and antagonist, destined to lead the absolutist state to its demise.
quotes.author: Reinhart Koselleck

quotes.quote: Enlightenment, and whereas his reputation in the purely literary sphere did not much survive the eighteenth century, it is above all as the supreme representative of the enlightenment that he has been seen ever since.
quotes.author: Peter Gilmour

quotes.quote: Enlightenment enthusiasms of the times, although shared with some, the desire to deflate certain aspects of its optimism.The interest in the place and scope of religion in society, in the nature of morality, but above all in our attempts to understand the workings of our own minds and our relation to the world we take ourselves to be a part of, are all part of mainstream philosophical thinking as well as themes of the enlightenment.
quotes.author: Peter Gilmour

quotes.quote: Enlightenment thought was a cooperative result not due to any one person. It was to put chemistry in a relatively orderly state.
quotes.author: Peter Gilmour

quotes.quote: Enlightenment, the Age of Sensibility. It is therefore, not without difficulty that reliance on reason can be cited as an easy key to investigating the broad intellectual manifestation of the years.
quotes.author: S. J. Barnett

quotes.quote: Without citing any more than the most vague evidence, postmodernists have repeatedly asserted that the secularizing, reason-oriented enlightenment is the one and only origin of modernity.
quotes.author: S. J. Barnett

quotes.quote: Enlightenment is seen as a more or less homogenous phenomenon, led by a substantial movement of deistic radicals guided solely by the false prophet of reason.
quotes.author: S. J. Barnett

quotes.quote: Enlightenment as a source of modern progressive ideals such as religious toleration, hostility to superstition and a reverence for knowledge.
quotes.author: S. J. Barnett

quotes.quote: There comes a point in every man's life when he has to say. Enough is enough.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: When it's time for me to walk away from something, I walk away from it. My mind, my body, my conscience tell me that enough is enough.
quotes.author: Jerry West

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Just like when there's a time that a smart person knows enough is enough, there's a time when you know you've got to fight.
quotes.author: Christopher Paul Curtis

quotes.quote: Not everyone is lucky enough to understand how delicious it is to suffer.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: We are smart enough to realize that we are stupid, and stupid enough to make the problem of becoming smarter hard.
quotes.author: Anders Sandberg

quotes.quote: We live a short enough time on this earth. A man should do what he loves.
quotes.author: Gail Tsukiyama

quotes.quote: All you can do is all you can do, but all you can do is enough.
quotes.author: Art Williams

quotes.quote: He who knows that enough is enough will always have enough.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Do only work that matters, and you will end up pleasing those who are important enough to care about it.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.quote: Enough is enough and it's time for a change.
quotes.author: Owen Hart

quotes.quote: Enough is abundance to the wise.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: A man must be big enough to admit his mistakes, smart enough to profit from them, and strong enough to correct them.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Enough experience will make you wise.
quotes.author: James R Cook

quotes.quote: Forget it enough to get over it and remember it enough so it doesn't happen again.
quotes.author: Annonymuos

quotes.quote: Never think that you are not good enough for anyone, always ask yourself if they are good enough for you
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Free enterprise cannot be justified as being good for business. It can be justified only as being good for society.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Free enterprise has enabled the creative and the acquisitive urges of man to be given expression in a way which benefits all members of society. Let free enterprise fight back now, not for itself, but for all those who believe in freedom.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: In the enterprise you want to start intentionally small.
quotes.author: Aaron Levie

quotes.quote: Free enterprise is the sure and so far the only known way of constantly improving the well-being of mankind.
quotes.author: Raymond C. Hoiles

quotes.quote: An enterprise is a community of human beings, not a collection of "human resources".
quotes.author: Henry Mintzberg

quotes.quote: Those with the enterprise lack the money and those with the money lack the enterprise to buy stocks when they are cheap.
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.quote: Free enterprise is a rough and competitive game. It is a hell of a lot better than a government monopoly.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Every successful enterprise has a very clear strategic purpose.
quotes.author: Mitch Daniels

quotes.quote: Free enterprise has done more to reduce poverty than all the government programs dreamed up by Democrats.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: An enterprise that is constantly exploring new horizons is likely to have a competitive advantage in attracting and retaining talent.
quotes.author: Gary Hamel

quotes.quote: No enterprise can exist for itself alone. It ministers to some great need, it performs some great service, not for itself, but for others; or failing therein, it ceases to be profitable and ceases to exist.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: An enterprise's most vital assets lie in its design and other creative capabilities.
quotes.author: Lee Kun-hee

quotes.quote: The enterprise can fulfill its human and social functions only if it prospers as a business.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Enterprise is better than ease.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Private enterprise manages so much better all the concerns to which it is equal.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The free enterprise system does not leave people behind.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.quote: If you pour your heart into your work, or into any worthy enterprise, you can achieve dreams others may think impossible.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: The enterprise that does not innovate ages and declines. And in a period of rapid change such as the present, the decline will be fast.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: No enterprise is more likely to succeed than one concealed from the enemy until it is ripe for execution.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: In private enterprises men may advance or recede, whereas they who aim at empire have no alternative between the highest success and utter downfall.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: Free enterprise means that the more enterprising you are, the freer you are.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: Science is an enterprise that can only flourish if it puts the truth ahead of nationality, ethnicity, class and color.
quotes.author: John Charles Polanyi

quotes.quote: The most difficult of enterprises is to secure the cooperation of others in enterprises those others did not think of first.
quotes.author: Murray Leinster

quotes.quote: Enterprise is hard work. You have to integrate the client with the optimized systems of all the servers and software.
quotes.author: Samuel J. Palmisano

quotes.quote: In capitalist enterprise there is no secure income and no security of wealth.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: Business enterprise is an organ of society. There is only one valid definition of business purpose: to create a customer.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: A person of greater enterprise than discretion, who in embracing an opportunity has formed an unfortunate attachment.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Free enterprise is essentially a formula not just for wealth creation, but for life satisfaction.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Brooks

quotes.quote: Free enterprise cannot only make us better off financially, it can make us better people.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.quote: Our free enterprise system of disseminating information is collectively referred to as The Media. But there is no collective.
quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

quotes.quote: Great enterprises usually promise vastly more than they perform.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A business enterprise must continue beyond the lifetime of the individual or of the generation to be capable of producing its contributions to economy and to society.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: No worthy enterprise can be done by us without continual plodding and wearisomeness to our faint and sensitive abilities.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Private enterprise is ceasing to be free enterprise. Private enterprise, indeed, became too private. It became privileged enterprise, not free enterprise.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In the enterprise, the trend is towards smaller, more powerful standardized systems where Dell is uniquely positioned.
quotes.author: Kevin B. Rollins

quotes.quote: In a free enterprise, the community is not just another stakeholder, but is in fact the very purpose of its existence.
quotes.author: Jamsetji Tata

quotes.quote: The enterprise, by definition, must be capable of producing more or better than all the resources that comprise it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Free enterprise is not a bad idea and has produced art.
quotes.author: Ishmael Reed

quotes.quote: It is at the heart of our human enterprise, that is to say, at the heart of society, to allow consensus a power it ought not to have.
quotes.author: Jesse Ball

quotes.quote: Any enterprise of your own is a great enterprise.
quotes.author: Josh Becker

quotes.quote: And entertainment has nothing to do with reality. Entertainment is antithetical to reality.
quotes.author: Michael Crichton

quotes.quote: Entertainment alleviates the fear of life, but art vanquishes the fear of death.
quotes.author: Dean Cavanagh

quotes.quote: Entertainment and art are not isolated.
quotes.author: Martin Kippenberger

quotes.quote: Entertainment and art have power. Our culture is molded more so by entertainment than any other influence.
quotes.author: Michael Landon, Jr.

quotes.quote: Entertainment for entertainment's sake is the most expensive form of death.
quotes.author: Pearl Mary Teresa Craigie

quotes.quote: Entertainment is a sacred pursuit when done well. When done well, it raises the quality of human life.
quotes.author: Michael Chabon

quotes.quote: Entertainment is all right, but entertainment with an idea behind it is much more important.
quotes.author: Gregory Peck

quotes.quote: Entertainment is in art like color in pictures.
quotes.author: Martin Kippenberger

quotes.quote: Entertainment is temporary happiness, but the real happiness is permanent entertainment.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Entertainment is the devil's substitute for joy.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: Entertainment provides relief. Art provokes engagement.
quotes.author: David Foster Wallace

quotes.quote: Entertainment, in the end, is a food industry for feeling.
quotes.author: Jenova Chen

quotes.quote: ENTERTAINMENT, n. Any kind of amusement whose inroads stop short of death by injection.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Entertainment's definition has been reduced to making people happy.
quotes.author: Anurag Kashyap

quotes.quote: If entertainment ran grocery stores, we'd NEVER get oil cured olives or blue cheese, it would be JUST Coke.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.quote: It seems that entertainment is what most excites us and what we value above everything else.
quotes.author: Carroll O'Connor

quotes.quote: Light entertainment means it mustn't teach you anything.
quotes.author: Keith Johnstone

quotes.quote: Most entertainment is trying to get you. It's tested, like toothpaste.
quotes.author: Albert Brooks

quotes.quote: My rejection of the idea of entertainment in its current form is based on the audience that comes with it.
quotes.author: David Antin

quotes.quote: No entertainment is so cheap as reading, nor any pleasure so lasting.
quotes.author: Mary Worley Montagu

quotes.quote: Play is the production of fun; entertainment is the consumption of fun.
quotes.author: Charles Eisenstein

quotes.quote: That's how it always is in the entertainment industry, your feet are always treading Jello.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: The best entertainment speaks to the human condition in an honest way.
quotes.author: Gregory Hines

quotes.quote: The entertainment business is to business what plastic flowers are to flowers.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: Where other powers of entertainment are wanting, the true philosopher will derive benefit from such as are given.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Entertainment and learning are not opposites; entertainment may be the most effective mode of learning.
quotes.author: Herbert Marcuse

quotes.quote: Entertainment can be a more powerful driver than poverty.
quotes.author: Sugata Mitra

quotes.quote: Entertainment has this way of resetting itself.
quotes.author: Zachary Levi

quotes.quote: Entertainment has to come hand in hand with a little bit of medicine.
quotes.author: David Fincher

quotes.quote: Entertainment is not politically neutral.
quotes.author: John Lahr

quotes.quote: Entertainment is such a non-reality.
quotes.author: Katharine McPhee

quotes.quote: Entertainment is the greatest socializing force in the world.
quotes.author: Daniel Beaty

quotes.quote: Entertainment, really, is a dying industry.
quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

quotes.quote: For entertainment, a party bears no one in as much as those who are not there.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: If you're creating an entertainment site, you want the content to be the star.
quotes.author: Chad Hurley

quotes.quote: It's the sad thing about entertainment, it's not always about who is the best.
quotes.author: Jake Roberts

quotes.quote: The entertainment industry is encouraging young people to defy and deceive their parents.
quotes.author: Mike DeWine

quotes.quote: The entertainment industry is terrified of silence.
quotes.author: Laura Linney

quotes.quote: The entertainment industry is vast and is a reflection of the society we live in.
quotes.author: Karrine Steffans

quotes.quote: The entertainment is in the presentation.
quotes.author: John McTiernan

quotes.quote: The one thing about the business of entertainment is that you have to learn patience.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.quote: The world of entertainment is built for big money. It's not built for small-scale projects that sustain themselves.
quotes.author: Chris Gethard

quotes.quote: When entertainment works the best, you're creating an apparatus to convey emotions.
quotes.author: John Ridley

quotes.quote: You know, entertainment is just a curtain at the end of the day.
quotes.author: Aubrey O'Day

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm moves the world.
quotes.author: Arthur Balfour

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is excitement with inspiration, motivation, and a pinch of creativity.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Flaming enthusiasm, backed up by horse sense and persistence, is the quality that most frequently makes for success.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the mother of effort, and without it nothing great was ever achieved.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is everything. It must be taut and vibrating like a guitar string.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm for a cause sometimes warps judgment.
quotes.author: William Howard Taft

quotes.quote: There is a real magic in enthusiasm. It spells the difference between mediocrity and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the yeast that makes your hopes shine to the stars. Enthusiasm is the sparkle in your eyes, the swing in your gait. The grip of your hand, the irresistible surge of will and energy to execute your ideas.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the leaping lightning, not to be measured by the horse-power of the understanding.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Protect your enthusiasm from the negativity of others.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Indeed, there is an eloquence in true enthusiasm that is not to be doubted.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the greatest asset you can possess, for it can take you further than money, power or influence.
quotes.author: Dada Vaswani

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the energy and force that builds literal momentum of the human soul and mind.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: True enthusiasm is a fine feeling whose flash I admire where-ever I see it.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Faked enthusiasm is worse than bad acting - it is bad acting with the intent to deceive.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the yeast that raises the dough.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.quote: If you have enthusiasm, you have a very dynamic, effective companion to travel with you on the road to Somewhere.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm just creates bubbles; it doesn't keep them from popping.
quotes.author: Adora Svitak

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is followed by disappointment and even depression, and then by renewed enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Murray Gell-Mann

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the most important thing in life.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the inspiration of everything great. Without it no man is to be feared, and with it none despised.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Nothing right can be accomplished in art without enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Robert Schumann

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the divine particle in our composition: with it we are great, generous, and true; without it, we are little, false, and mean.
quotes.author: L. E. Landon

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is contagious. Be a carrier.
quotes.author: Susan Rabin

quotes.quote: We rely more on enthusiasm than actual skill. Whatever you do, do it enthusiastically and people will like it more.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm glows, radiates, permeates and immediately captures everyone's interest.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is that secret and harmonious spirit which hovers over the production of genius.
quotes.author: Isaac D'Israeli

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm - a distemper of youth, curable by small doses of repentance in connection with outward applications of experience.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm... the sustaining power of all great action.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is a form of social courage.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: Being accused of enthusiasm is something I'll never live down.
quotes.author: Sargent Shriver

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is that temper of the mind in which the imagination has got the better of the judgment.
quotes.author: William Warburton

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm could not supply the place of experience.
quotes.author: John Lothrop Motley

quotes.quote: If you don't feel enthusiasm for what you are doing, then you probably should be doing something else as enthusiasm is a key to success.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the electricity of life. How do you get it? You act enthusiastic until you make it a habit.
quotes.author: Gordon Parks

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is a volcano on whose top never grows the grass of hesitation.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the Spirit of God working with you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Enthusiasms, like stimulants, are often affected by people with small mental ballast.
quotes.author: Minna Antrim

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the genius of sincerity and truth accomplishes no victories without it.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Your enthusiasm will be infectious, stimulating and attractive to others. They will love you for it. They will go for you and with you.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Great eagerness in the pursuit of wealth, pleasure, or honor, cannot exist without sin.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is something so positive.
quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is a vital element toward the individual success of every man or woman.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the greatest asset in the world. It beats money, power and influence.
quotes.author: Henry Chester

quotes.quote: National enthusiasm is the nursery of genius.
quotes.author: Tuckerman

quotes.quote: Nothing is so contagious as enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Every man without passions has within him no principle of action, nor motive to act.
quotes.author: Claude Helvetius

quotes.quote: I rate enthusiasm even above professional skill.
quotes.author: Sir Edward Appleton

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is nothing more or less than faith in action.
quotes.author: Henry Chester

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm releases the drive to carry you over obstacles and adds significance to all you do.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is a virtue seldom met with in seasons of calm and unruffled prosperity.
quotes.author: Thomas Chalmers

quotes.quote: I prefer the errors of enthusiasm to the indifference of wisdom.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: If you are not fired with enthusiasm, you'll be fired with enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Every production of genius must be the product of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Years wrinkle the skin, but to give up enthusiasm wrinkles the soul.
quotes.author: Samuel Ullman

quotes.quote: If we're not enthusiastic, we can't get things done. If we're overenthusiastic, we run into the danger of being fanatical.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wyatt

quotes.quote: In the realm of ideas, everything depends on enthusiasm. In the real world, all rests on perseverance.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: There is a sort of human paste that when it comes near the fire of enthusiasm is only baked into harder shape.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is at the bottom of all progress. With it, there is an accomplishment. Without it, there are only alibis.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: It's so much easier to be enthusiastic— especially when there are grounds for it.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: It's faith in something and enthusiasm for something that makes life worth looking at.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Experience and enthusiasm are two fine business attributes seldom found in one individual.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Study the unusually successful people you know, and you will find them imbued with enthusiasm for their work which is contagious. Not only are they themselves excited about what they are doing, but they also get you excited.
quotes.author: Paul W. Ivey

quotes.quote: The language of excitement is at best picturesque merely. You must be calm before you can utter oracles.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Apathy can only be overcome by enthusiasm, and enthusiasm can only be aroused by two things; first, an idea that takes the imagination by storm, and second, a definite intelligible plan for carrying that ideal into practice.
quotes.author: Arnold Toynbee

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm finds opportunities, and energy makes the most of them.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is a kind of faith that has been set on fire.
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.quote: An enthusiast may bore others but he has never a dull moment himself.
quotes.author: John Francis Kieran

quotes.quote: Fires can't be made with dead nor can enthusiasm be stirred by spiritless men.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Knowledge is power, but enthusiasm pulls the switch.
quotes.author: Ivern Bell

quotes.quote: I am not eccentric. It's just that I am more alive than most people. I am an unpopular electric eel set in a pond of goldfish.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: A man can succeed at almost anything for which he has unlimited enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Charles Schwab

quotes.quote: What a man knows only through feeling can be explained only through enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm gives life to what is invisible.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: All noble enthusiasms pass through a feverish stage and grow wiser and more serene.
quotes.author: Channing

quotes.quote: No virtue is safe that is not enthusiastic.
quotes.author: Seeley

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is grave, inward, self-controlled; mere excitement is outward, fantastic, hysterical, and passing in a moment from tears to laughter; from one's aim to its very opposite.
quotes.author: J. Sterling

quotes.quote: The enthusiasm of old men is singularly like that of infancy.
quotes.author: Nerval

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is very strong and always right. There is no strength beyond enthusiasm. If one starts a task with enthusiasm, all riches are available to him.
quotes.author: Suktimala

quotes.quote: Fire springs by rubbing wooden sticks and water springs by digging the earth. Nothing is impossible for people who have enthusiasm. Endeavors in the proper direction surely bring success.
quotes.author: Pratijnaa Youghanda Rayana

quotes.quote: Entitlement is the opposite of enchantment.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Gratitude begins where my sense of entitlement ends.
quotes.author: Steven Furtick

quotes.quote: A sense of entitlement is a cancerous thought process that is void of gratitude and can be deadly to our relationships.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Thankfulness eradicates entitlement.
quotes.author: Perry Noble

quotes.quote: What separates privilege from entitlement is gratitude.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: An attitude of entitlement is inversely related to one of gratitude.
quotes.author: Pete Wilson

quotes.quote: When we replace a sense of service and gratitude with a sense of entitlement and expectation, we quickly see the demise of our relationships, society, and economy.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Pride and entitlement always go with unforgiveness. The longer you hold someone's offense over them, the more likely you are to start feeling arrogant and entitled to your posture toward him.
quotes.author: Will Davis Jr.

quotes.quote: Entitlement creates an illusion of superiority that clouds our ability of self-improvisation.
quotes.author: HBR Patel

quotes.quote: When a parent shows up with an attitude of entitlement, understand that under it is a boatload of anxiety.
quotes.author: Robert Evans

quotes.quote: It is true that, when an entitlement begins to be enjoyed by people, they like to keep it.
quotes.author: Jon Kyl

quotes.quote: No major entitlement, once it has been implemented, has ever been unwound.
quotes.author: Ted Cruz

quotes.quote: Male privilege and entitlement are dying a very painful death; no one gives up power without a struggle.
quotes.author: Gloria Allred

quotes.quote: Once an entitlement program has been created with millions of beneficiaries, it becomes almost impossible to repeal.
quotes.author: Pat Buchanan

quotes.quote: People who are given whatever they want soon develop a sense of entitlement and rapidly lose their sense of proportion.
quotes.author: Sarah Churchwell

quotes.quote: The most capricious modern entitlement is not just Social Security but to self-esteem.
quotes.author: George F. Will

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as entitlement, unless someone has first met an obligation.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: What annoys people is the idea that somebody has everything, and they're allowed to get away with anything. It's the sense of entitlement that gets up people's noses.
quotes.author: Douglas Booth

quotes.quote: Thankfulness is difficult to express when one starts with an attitude of entitlement.
quotes.author: Chris Tiegreen

quotes.quote: Entitlement is an expression of conditional love. Nobody is ever entitled to your love. You always have a right to protect your mental, emotional, and physical well-being by removing yourself from toxic people and circumstances.
quotes.author: Dr. Janice Anderson & Kiersten Anderson

quotes.quote: Grace destroys entitlement.
quotes.author: Justin Buzzard

quotes.quote: You are not entitled to your opinion. You are entitled to your informed opinion. No one is entitled to be ignorant.
quotes.author: Harlan Ellison

quotes.quote: Everyone is entitled to his own nostalgia.
quotes.author: James Wolcott

quotes.quote: Every righteous man or woman is entitled to revelation concerning his own affairs.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: If you're entitled, you likely think you know more than you do.
quotes.author: Neil Blumenthal

quotes.quote: We are each entitled to our own opinion, but no one is entitled to his own facts.
quotes.author: Patrick Moynihan

quotes.quote: Every man is entitled to be valued by his best moment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Everybody should be entitled to one lie, one failing, one infidelity.
quotes.author: Martin Firrell

quotes.quote: Everyone is entitled to their own opinions, which people don't seem to be shy about expressing.
quotes.author: Jamie Moyer

quotes.quote: Don't feel entitled to anything you didn't sweat and struggle for.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: You are perfectly entitled to invent your life and to claim that it's true.
quotes.author: James Salter

quotes.quote: We are all entitled to our little harmless habits, but we are not entitled to demand approval for them.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: Entitlement is lethal.
quotes.author: Liev Schreiber

quotes.quote: People who take more than their share usually feel an inflated sense of entitlement.
quotes.author: Jeanne Phillips

quotes.quote: A man is entitled to a few secrets.
quotes.author: Jonathan Coleman

quotes.quote: You are entitled to your own success.
quotes.author: Jesse Neo

quotes.quote: Entitlement? How can you be entitled to someone else's money?
quotes.author: John Stossel

quotes.quote: We're all entitled to our superstitions.
quotes.author: Tea Obreht

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurs pay the price of a road less traveled, while everyone else takes the freeway and perpetually misses their own exit.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: Opportunists seek for a chance. Entrepreneurs make new chances.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Out there in some garage is an entrepreneur who's forging a bullet with your company's name on it.
quotes.author: Gary Hamel

quotes.quote: The one thing all entrepreneurs have in common is that they started. The one thing everyone else has in common is that they haven't.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: The true entrepreneur is a doer, not a dreamer.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.quote: A successful entrepreneur can't be afraid of failures or setbacks. An initial setback can be a great opportunity to take a new and more promising approach to any problem, to come back stronger than ever.
quotes.author: John Roos

quotes.quote: An entrepreneur is someone who jumps off a cliff and builds a plane on the way down.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: An entrepreneur is someone who can make enough money to pay for their mistakes.
quotes.author: Jayson Gaignard

quotes.quote: Everyone is an entrepreneur. The only skills you need to be an entrepreneur: an ability to fail, an ability to have ideas, to sell those ideas, to execute on those ideas, and to be persistent so even as you fail you learn and move onto the next adventure.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.quote: An entrepreneur isn't someone who owns a business, it is someone who makes things happen.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: My best advice to entrepreneurs is this: Forget about making mistakes, just do it.
quotes.author: Ajaero Tony Martins

quotes.quote: The hardest part about being an entrepreneur is that you'll fail ten times for every success.
quotes.author: Adam Horowitz

quotes.quote: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: A real entrepreneur is somebody who has no safety net underneath them.
quotes.author: Henry Kravis

quotes.quote: It's the combination: big idea with a good entrepreneur: there's nothing more powerful.
quotes.author: Bill Drayton

quotes.quote: Any successful entrepreneur knows that time is more valuable than money itself.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Everyone can tell you the risk. An entrepreneur can see the reward.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: All humans are entrepreneurs not because they should start companies but because the will to create is encoded in human DNA.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: When times are bad is when the real entrepreneurs emerge.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: An entrepreneur assumes the risk and is dedicated and committed to the success of whatever he or she undertakes.
quotes.author: Victor Kiam

quotes.quote: I think if you're an entrepreneur, you've got to dream big and then dream bigger.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Honesty and integrity are by far the most important assets of an entrepreneur.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A smart entrepreneur knows they can not run a business on their own. They know that business is a team sport.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Entrepreneur is not a job title. It is a state of mind of people who want to alter the future.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Entrepreneur, make today count but don't let the day count you.
quotes.author: Onyi Anyado

quotes.quote: To any entrepreneur: if you want to do it, do it now. If you don't, you're going to regret it.
quotes.author: Catherine Cook

quotes.quote: An entrepreneur without funding is a musician without an instrument.
quotes.author: Robert A. Rice Jr.

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurs don't finish when we are tired. We finish when we are done.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: The entrepreneur is essentially a visualizer and actualizer. He can visualize something, and when he visualizes it he sees exactly how to make it happen.
quotes.author: Robert L. Schwartz

quotes.quote: The world's most successful entrepreneurs play hard, but they work even harder.
quotes.author: Ben Parr

quotes.quote: An entrepreneur is someone who dares to dream the dreams and is foolish enough to try to make those dreams come true.
quotes.author: Vinod Khosla

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurs: See yourself as victorious- and the best way to be victorious is to be passionate. Find something you love doing!
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurs see the â€œno divingâ€ sign and back-up to get a running start.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: I'm convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The strongest thing you can cultivate as an entrepreneur is to not rely on luck but cultivating an ability to recognize fortunate situations when they are occurring.
quotes.author: Jack Dorsey

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurs see what others can't, do what others won't, and accomplish what others dream.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurs are simply those who understand that there is little difference between obstacle and opportunity and are able to turn both to their advantage.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The entrepreneur builds an enterprise; the technician builds a job.
quotes.author: Michael Gerber

quotes.quote: An entrepreneur is born, when a person has more reasons to drive his dreams against his excuses.
quotes.author: Sukant Ratnakar

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurship is living a few years of your life like most people won't so you can spend the rest of your life like most people can't.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Being an entrepreneur is like eating glass and staring into the abyss of death.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: The future will be owned and operated by the entrepreneurially minded.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hanses

quotes.quote: Entrepreneur is someone who has a vision for something and a want to create.
quotes.author: David Karp

quotes.quote: As an entrepreneur, you have to be OK with failure. If you're not failing, you're likely not pushing yourself hard enough.
quotes.author: Alexa Von Tobel

quotes.quote: You can't study to be an entrepreneur. Sometimes you just have to jump.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.quote: I wasn't born a natural entrepreneur. I had to be trained.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: If you're an entrepreneur and you think that the president makes a difference to your business, you should stay at your current job.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: An entrepreneur tends to bite off a little more than he can chew hoping he'll quickly learn how to chew it.
quotes.author: Roy Ash

quotes.quote: Smart entrepreneurs learn that they must fail often and fast.
quotes.author: Alain Bouchard

quotes.quote: I'd rather invest in an entrepreneur who has failed before than one who assumes success from day one.
quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurship is neither a science nor an art. It is a practice.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: An entrepreneur with strong network makes money even when he is asleep.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurship is living a few years of your life like most people won't so you can spend the rest of your life like most people cant.
quotes.author: Warren G. Tracy

quotes.quote: In the modern world of business, it is useless to be a creative, original thinker unless you can also sell what you create.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: Goals and dreams are the entrepreneur's mental energy. However, the same goals and dreams that drive his behavior will also drive him to an early grave if he doesn't take care of his physical energy through a mix of exercise and relaxation. Energy manipulation is the ability to feed the mind with dreams and sustain the body so it will keep up with those dreams.
quotes.author: Gudjon Bergmann

quotes.quote: To any entrepreneur: if you want to do it, do it now. If you don't, you're going to regret it.
quotes.author: Catherine Cook

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Think big and don't listen to people who tell you it can't be done. Life's too short to think small.
quotes.author: Tim Ferris

quotes.quote:
We all have the DNA of an entrepreneur.
Some are building their own dreams.
While most are building other people's dreams.
Entrepreneurs are Dream Builders. Are you building yours?
quotes.author: Farshad Asl

quotes.quote: Innovation is the specific instrument of entrepreneurship...the act that endows resources with a new capacity to create wealth.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurial profit is the expression of the value of what the entrepreneur contributes to production.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Schumpeter

quotes.quote: It's not about ideas. It's about making ideas happen.
quotes.author: Scott Belsky

quotes.quote: Early to bed, early to rise, work like hell and advertise.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: The true entrepreneur is a doer, not a dreamer.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.quote: The entrepreneurial life is one of challenge, work, dedication, perseverance, exhilaration, agony, accomplishment, failure, sacrifice, control, powerlessness. But ultimately, extraordinary satisfaction.
quotes.author: David S. Rose

quotes.quote: This entrepreneurial energy that we have in the Midwest doesn't have to go out to the coasts to get fed and watered.
quotes.author: Jim McKelvey

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurship is neither a science nor an art. It is a practice.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The five essential entrepreneurial skills for success are concentration, discrimination, organization, innovation and communication.
quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

quotes.quote: If you want to build a successful business, make sure you have three thingsâ€”a big market opportunity, great people, and more than enough capital.
quotes.author: Richard Harroch

quotes.quote: Thinking big is a skill all entrepreneurs should be focused on cultivating.
quotes.author: Laura Busche

quotes.quote: The critical ingredient is getting off your butt and doing something. It's as simple as that. A lot of people have ideas, but there are few who decide to do something about them now. Not tomorrow. Not next week. But today. The true entrepreneur is a doer, not a dreamer.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.quote: Dream big. Start small. But most of all, start.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A year from now you will wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.quote: The entrepreneurial life is one of challenge, work, dedication, perseverance, exhilaration, agony, accomplishment, failure, sacrifice, control, powerlessness... but ultimately, extraordinary satisfaction.
quotes.author: David S. Rose

quotes.quote: Business opportunities are like buses: there's always another one coming.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Any time is a good time to start a company.
quotes.author: Ron Conway

quotes.quote: Everyone has an idea, but it's really about executing the idea and attracting other people to help you with the idea.
quotes.author: Jack Dorsey

quotes.quote: Branding is fascinating. Creating a brand that is authentic and timeless is what entrepreneurs dream of. Dare to be different, dare to dream.
quotes.author: Independent Zen

quotes.quote: What we need is an entrepreneurial society in which innovation and entrepreneurship are normal, steady and continuous.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurial people are never satisfied.
quotes.author: Tom Douglas

quotes.quote: This defines entrepreneur and entrepreneurship - the entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: One key to entrepreneurial success is to get a great group of people around you who believe in your idea.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Goals aren't enough. You need goals plus deadlines: goals big enough to get excited about and deadline to make you run. One isn't much good without the other, but together they can be tremendous.
quotes.author: Ben Feldman

quotes.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Customers don't expect you to be perfect. They do expect you to fix things when they go wrong
quotes.author: Donald Porter

quotes.quote: As long as you're going to be thinking anyway, think big.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Today it is cheaper to start a business than tomorrow.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If you've got an idea, start today. There's no better time than now to get going. That doesn't mean quit your job and jump into your idea 100 percent from day one, but there's always small progress that can be made to start the movement.
quotes.author: Kevin Systrom

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how many times you fail. It doesn't matter how many times you almost get it right. No one is going to know or care about your failures, and neither should you. All you have to do is learn from them and those around you because all that matters in business is that you get it right once. Then everyone can tell you how lucky you are.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurship is neither a science nor an art. It is a practice.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurship is living a few years of your life like most people won't, so you can spend the rest of your life like most people can't.
quotes.author: Warren G. Tracy's student

quotes.quote: Nobody talks about entrepreneurship as survival, but that's exactly what it is and what nurtures creative thinking. Running that first shop taught me business is not financial science; its about trading: buying and selling.
quotes.author: Anita Roddick

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurship is the last refuge of the trouble making individual.
quotes.author: Natalie Clifford Barney

quotes.quote: This defines entrepreneur and entrepreneurship - the entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurship is not for everyone.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: What is great about entrepreneurship is that entrepreneurs create the tangible from the intangible.
quotes.author: Robert Herjavec

quotes.quote: The truth is that entrepreneurship is more like a roller coaster ride than a cruise.
quotes.author: Vivek Wadhwa

quotes.quote: I believe for the first time in history, entrepreneurship is now a viable career.
quotes.author: Eric Ries

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurship is a responsibility rather than a profession.
quotes.author: Ameya Agrawal

quotes.quote: Part of the reward of entrepreneurship lies in having the courage to believe in yourself and take action.
quotes.author: Timothy Freriks

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurship is the ability to create and build from a vision practically nothing: fundamentally it is a human, creative act.
quotes.author: Jeffry Timmons

quotes.quote: One of the biggest hurdles in the path of entrepreneurship is home loans.
quotes.author: Vishwas Mudagal

quotes.quote: When you create more small businesses, you create small entrepreneurship. Out of that comes self-determination and employment.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: To me, entrepreneurship means something different. I think of it as identifying and valuing opportunity.
quotes.author: Glenn Hubbard

quotes.quote: If Entrepreneurship was easy, the term would have been easier to pronounce too!
quotes.author: Shubham Choudhary

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurship without skills limits your growth potential.
quotes.author: Strive Masiyiwa

quotes.quote: The best reason to start an organization is to make meaning-to create a product or service to make the world a better place.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Starting your own business is like riding a roller coaster. There are highs and lows and every turn you take is another twist. The lows are really low, but the highs can be really high. You have to be strong, keep your stomach tight, and ride along with the roller coaster that you started.
quotes.author: Lindsay Manseau

quotes.quote: The opportunity for an entrepreneur to start a company from scratch today is abysmal.
quotes.author: David Geffen

quotes.quote: I had to make my own living and my own opportunity! But I made it! Don't sit down and wait for the opportunities to come. Get up and make them!
quotes.author: Madam C.J. Walker

quotes.quote: The entrepreneur is not really interested in doing the work; he is interested in creating the way the company operates. In that regard, the entrepreneur is an inventor. He or she loves to invent, but does not love to manufacture or sell or distribute what he or she invents.
quotes.author: Michael Gerber

quotes.quote: Any time is a good time to start a company.
quotes.author: Ron Conway

quotes.quote: What do you need to start a business? Three simple things: know your product better than anyone, know your customer, and have a burning desire to succeed.
quotes.author: Dave Thomas

quotes.quote: Early to bed, early to rise, work like hell and advertise.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: Going into business for yourself, becoming an entrepreneur, is the modern-day equivalent of pioneering on the old frontier.
quotes.author: Paula Nelson

quotes.quote: There is only one way to make a great deal of money; and that is in a business of your own.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.quote: To any entrepreneur: if you want to do it, do it now. If you don't, you're going to regret it.
quotes.author: Catherine Cook

quotes.quote: If you've got an idea, start today. There's no better time than now to get going. That doesn't mean quit your job and jump into your idea 100% from day one, but there's always small progress that can be made to start the movement.
quotes.author: Kevin Systrom

quotes.quote: People tend to think that in order to start a new business they have to come up with something new and dazzling, but that's a myth-and it's often propagated by venture capitalists.
quotes.author: Gurbaksh Chahal

quotes.quote: Just as the constant increase of entropy is the basic law of the universe, so it is the basic law of life to be ever more highly structured and to struggle against entropy.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: Entropy theory is indeed a first attempt to deal with global form; but it has not been dealing with structure. All it says is that a large sum of elements may have properties not found in a smaller sample of them.
quotes.author: Rudolf Arnheim

quotes.quote: Entropy theory, on the other hand, is not concerned with the probability of succession in a series of items but with the overall distribution of kinds of items in a given arrangement.
quotes.author: Rudolf Arnheim

quotes.quote: Entropy is time's arrow.
quotes.author: Arthur Stanley Eddington

quotes.quote: Evolution in the biosphere is therefore a necessarily irreversible process defining a direction in time; a direction which is the same as that enjoined by the law of increasing entropy, that is to say, the second law of thermodynamics. This is far more than a mere comparison: the second law is founded upon considerations identical to those which establish the irreversibility of evolution. Indeed, it is legitimate to view the irreversibility of evolution as an expression of the second law in the biosphere.
quotes.author: Jacques Monod

quotes.quote: The powerful notion of entropy, which comes from a very special branch of physics is certainly useful in the study of communication and quite helpful when applied in the theory of language.
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: Any method involving the notion of entropy, the very existence of which depends on the second law of thermodynamics, will doubtless seem to many far-fetched, and may repel beginners as obscure and difficult of comprehension.
quotes.author: Willard Gibbs

quotes.quote: The increase of disorder or entropy with time is one example of what is called an arrow of time, something that distinguishes the past from the future, giving a direction to time.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Entropy is not about speeds or positions of particles, the way temperature and pressure and volume are, but about our lack of information.
quotes.author: Hans Christian von Baeyer

quotes.quote: Entropy is the price of structure.
quotes.author: Ilya Prigogine

quotes.quote: Just as entropy is a measure of disorganization, the information carried by a set of messages is a measure of organization. In fact, it is possible to interpret the information carried by a message as essentially the negative of its entropy, and the negative logarithm of its probability. That is, the more probable the message, the less information it gives. Cliches, for example, are less illuminating than great poems.
quotes.author: Norbert Wiener

quotes.quote: All things tend toward entropy. The whole universe is moving outward, the stars pulling away from one another, God knows what falling through the cracks between them.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Only entropy comes easy.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: Entropy shakes its angry fist at you for being clever enough to organize the world.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: Entropy is the normal state of consciousness a condition that is neither useful nor enjoyable.
quotes.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quotes.quote: Entropy makes things fall, but life ingeniously rigs the game so that when they do they often fall into place.
quotes.author: John Tooby

quotes.quote: Entropy explains why left to the mercy of the elements, mortar crumbles, glass shatters, and building collapse.
quotes.author: Wonders of the Unverse

quotes.quote: Wiggle your big toe...As lay in the back of Buck's truck, trying to will my limbs out of entropy.
quotes.author: Kill Bill

quotes.quote: Until Tuesday, occupy Wall Street seemed, at least from the outside, to be entering a stage of entropy.
quotes.author: Michelle Goldberg

quotes.quote: If you have all your wishes fulfilled, you have what could be called psychological entropy. I found then that what I had thought to be a pathological phenomenon is in fact a rule of nature.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: Heretics are the only bitter remedy against the entropy of human thought.
quotes.author: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quotes.quote: From my earliest youth I have felt the intuition that at some deeper cross-section of this pyramid of consciousness, mere being could become an event, the inviolable presence and simultaneity of everything that we, on the upper 'normal,' apex of self-consciousness, are permitted to experience only as entropy.
quotes.author: Rainier Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: But if one takes control of what the body can do, and learns to impose order on physical sensations, entropy yields to a sense of enjoyable harmony in consciousness.
quotes.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihaly

quotes.quote: It's our job to take entropy and randomness and find meaning.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: Entropy happens in an instant; order takes time.
quotes.author: Joseph Stirt

quotes.quote: The universe and life are based on chance, but no accident. Forces of chance and anti chance coexist in a complementary relationship. The random element is entropy, the agent of chaos, which destroys meaning. The nonrandom element is information.
quotes.author: Joseph Stirt

quotes.quote: Of course, in the long run, the great trivial purpose of maximum entropy will appear to be the most enduring of all.
quotes.author: Norbert Wiener

quotes.quote: The increase of disorder or entropy is what distinguishes the past from the future, giving a direction to time.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Our perception trapped in entropy / Keeps the order one direction/ Our search for meaning stacked upon / —a theory not to last.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: If we assume there is no maximum possible entropy for the universe, then any state can be a state of low entropy.
quotes.author: Alan Guth

quotes.quote: If you stop being scared, that's when entropy sets in, and you may as well go home.
quotes.author: Tamsin Greg

quotes.quote: Software is like entropy. It is difficult to grasp, weighs nothing, and obeys the second law of thermodynamics; i.e. it always increases.
quotes.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

quotes.quote: Entropy' will be a kaleidoscope of thought processes and my identity as an Indian who grew up in California.
quotes.author: Sid Sriram

quotes.quote: Things fall apart, even when you think they're stronger than anything you could ever imagine.
quotes.author: Susane Colasanti

quotes.quote: No structure, even an artificial one, enjoys the process of entropy. It is the ultimate fate of everything, and everything resists it.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: Messy arrangements far outweigh orderly ones.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.quote: Entropy is just a fancy way of saying: things fall apart.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Death always seems to come for you whether you are machine or organic, entropy seems to always win.
quotes.author: L.B. Ó Ceallaigh

quotes.quote: History shows that people are as changeable as rivers.
quotes.author: Andres Neuman

quotes.quote: Creativity is our only weapon against entropy.
quotes.author: Dean Cavanagh

quotes.quote: Entropy requires no maintenance.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: The organism feeds on negative entropy.
quotes.author: Erwin Schrodinger

quotes.quote: To waste and destroy our natural resources, to skin and exhaust the land instead of using it so as to increase its usefulness, will result in undermining in the days of our children the very prosperity which we ought by right to hand down to them.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The environment is everything that isn't me.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: We don't have to sacrifice a strong economy for a healthy environment.
quotes.author: Dennis Weaver

quotes.quote: The environment is where we all meet; where all have a mutual interest; it is the one thing all of us share.
quotes.author: Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: We have forgotten how to be good guests, how to walk lightly on the earth as its other creatures do.
quotes.author: Barbara Ward

quotes.quote: We won't have a society if we destroy the environment.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: It's inevitable your environment will influence what you do.
quotes.author: Duncan Sheik

quotes.quote: The environment acts more strongly upon the individual life the less fixed and strong this individual life may be.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Our planet's alarm is going off, and it is time to wake up and take action!
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: Environment is no one's property to destroy; it's everyone's responsibility to protect.
quotes.author: Mohith Agadi

quotes.quote: The earth has a skin and that skin has diseases; one of its diseases is called man.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Our environment, the world in which we live and work, is a mirror of our attitudes and expectations.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: The only way forward, if we are going to improve the quality of the environment, is to get everybody involved.
quotes.author: Richard Rogers

quotes.quote: Create and maintain a beautiful environment and surroundings in which to live.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
quotes.author: Mark Caine

quotes.quote: Lets nurture the nature, so that we can have a better future.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is a sufficiency in the world for man's need but not for man's greed.
quotes.author: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.quote: It is in man's heart that the life of nature's spectacle exists; to see it, one must feel it.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: When environment changes, there must be a corresponding change in life.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: We cannot command Nature except by obeying her.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: It isn't pollution that's harming the environment. It's the impurities in our air and water that are doing it.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: It is not the sun that wither the plants to death but the man who gradually beats the trees to death.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is horrifying that we have to fight our own government to save the environment.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: We need to promote development that does not destroy our environment.
quotes.author: Wangari Maathai

quotes.quote: Earth is our mother. In spite of our desire to harm our mother, she will always love us forever.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Be nice to the environment. Be nice to animals. Be nice to people. If you do that, you will leave a mark on the world.
quotes.author: Enock Maregesi

quotes.quote: We owe it to ourselves and to the next generation to conserve the environment so that we can bequeath our children a sustainable world that benefits all.
quotes.author: Wangari Maathai

quotes.quote: A nation that destroys its soils destroys itself. Forests are the lungs of our land, purifying the air and giving fresh strength to our people.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Accept that environment compromises values far more than values do their number on environment.
quotes.author: Sidney Poitier

quotes.quote: One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The environment around you shapes who you are. How you handle an emergency or how you react when someone is rude to you, that's you.
quotes.author: Halsey

quotes.quote: Everyone become a creation of their environment.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: With a good heredity, nature deals you a fine hand at cards; and with a good environment, you learn to play the hand well.
quotes.author: Walter C. Alvarez

quotes.quote: Man is the control experiment of heredity and environment; and since his heredity controls him, he tries to control his environment.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Local innovation and initiative can help us better understand how to protect our environment.
quotes.author: Gale Norton

quotes.quote: I think the environment should be put in the category of our national security. Defense of our resources is just as important as defense abroad. Otherwise what is there to defend?
quotes.author: Robert Redford

quotes.quote: Take a course in good water and air; and in the eternal youth of Nature you may renew your own. Go quietly, alone; no harm will befall you.
quotes.author: John Nuir

quotes.quote: Environmental concern is now firmly embedded in public life: in education, medicine and law; in journalism, literature and art.
quotes.author: Barry Commoner

quotes.quote: Within 10 years it will be impossible to travel to the North Pole by dog team. There will be too much open water.
quotes.author: Will Steger

quotes.quote: By polluting clear water with slime you will never find good drinking water.
quotes.author: Aeschylus
