quotes.quote: Everything happens for a reason, Sadie, even bad things.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: I trust that everything happens for a reason, even if we are not wise enough to see it.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Things happen they way they're meant to. There's a pattern and a shape to everything...Nothing happens without a reason...Nothing is impossible.
quotes.author: Rosamunde Pilcher

quotes.quote: Someday, everything will make perfect sense. So for now, laugh at the confusion, smile through the tears, be strong and keep reminding yourself that everything happens for a reason.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: I believe that everything happens for a reason, but I think it's important to seek out that reason; that's how we learn.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: Let go and let God is the way of life! Everything happens for a reason because God plans your life for you ahead of time.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Remember that everything that is happening around you, good or bad, is in some way conspiring to help you.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: I believe that everything happens for a reason, and what seems bad at first might in fact be something of a blessing.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: You can have immediate regrets, but if you look at stuff and say, 'Things happen for a reason', there's a fatalistic thing about it. Something will happen that will justify it in some way.
quotes.author: Martin Landau

quotes.quote: I can't wait till you get what you really deserve when you hurt other people intentionally, because I believe everything happens for a reason. Maybe it was God's will to teach you some manners that is visible to human eyes and will put a mark all through your life.
quotes.author: Elian Martinez

quotes.quote: I think that everything happens for a reason, everything happens when it's going to happen.
quotes.author: Lou Reed

quotes.quote: Things don't happen for a reason, we make reasons out of things that happen.
quotes.author: Michael P. Naughton

quotes.quote: Everything happens for a reason, although we may not understand it at the time, if you hang in there, all the pieces will eventually fall where they belong.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Miracles happen everyday, change your perception of what a miracle is and you'll see them all around you.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: I've always been quite psychic and believe there's a reason why things happen and that we need to learn from them.
quotes.author: Archie Panjabi

quotes.quote: Everything happens for a reason. I may not know why or how, but God does & that is all that matters!
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Everything happens for a reason, everything is part of a puzzle that, even at the time, if we don't understand the bigger picture, everything has significant role in what's to come in the future.
quotes.author: Jon Connor

quotes.quote: Either things happen for a reason, or they happen for no reason at all. Either one's life is a thread in a glorious tapestry or humanity is just a hopelessly tangled knot.
quotes.author: Neal Shusterman

quotes.quote: There will always be a reason why you meet people. Either you need them to change your life or you're the one that will change theirs.
quotes.author: Angel Flonis Harefa

quotes.quote: Thank life for happening, Thank every twist and turn, There is a reason for every single thing, there is a reason for every worry and concern.
quotes.author: Dante Jannicelli

quotes.quote: Do you believe that there are no coincidences in life? Everything happens for a reason. Every person we meet have a roll in our life, either it is big or small. Some will hurt, betray and make us cry. Some will teach us lesson, not to change us, but to make us to be a better person.
quotes.author: Cynthia Rusli

quotes.quote: All is grace. Nothing happens by chance, everything happens for a reason. Life is beautiful!
quotes.author: Joel Randymar

quotes.quote: I believe that things happen for a reason. I think there are no coincidences in life.
quotes.author: Corey Feldman

quotes.quote: The hardest thing about "everything happens for a reason" is waiting for that reason to show up.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: What we consider as “setbacks” often give birth to some of our biggest blessings. Have faith. Something beautiful will emerge from this turmoil.
quotes.author: Simerjeet Singh

quotes.quote: Bad things do happen; how I respond to them defines my character and the quality of my life. I can choose to sit in perpetual sadness, immobilized by the gravity of my loss, or I can choose to rise from the pain and treasure the most precious gift I have – life itself.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.quote: I wouldn’t change anything. I think that it’s important to let things happen, and stay ‘happened’. I think that’s all part of the learning curve, part of fate. I’m just glad that it happened.
quotes.author: Mike Peters

quotes.quote: Sad things happen. They do. But we don’t need to live sad forever.
quotes.author: Mattie Stepanek

quotes.quote: The world is so unpredictable. Things happen suddenly, unexpectedly. We want to feel we are in control of our own existence. In some ways we are, in some ways we’re not. We are ruled by the forces of chance and coincidence.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: Every good thing that has happened in your life happened because something changed.
quotes.author: Andy Andrews

quotes.quote: Change always involves a dark night when everything falls apart. Yet if this period of dissolution is used to create new meaning, then chaos ends and new order emerges.
quotes.author: Margaret Wheatley

quotes.quote: It's not that I believe everything happens for a reason... I just think that some things are meant to be broken. Imperfect. Chaotic. It's the universe's way of providing contrast, you know? There have to be a few holes in the road. It's how life is.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Things are going to happen whether I know why they happen or not. You don't find out why things move. You let them move; you watch them move; you stop them from moving: you start them moving. But you don't sit around and try to figure out why there's movement.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: It is likely that some troubles will befall us; but it is not a present fact. How often has the unexpected happened! How often has the expected never come to pass!
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Philosophers never stood in need of Homer or the Pharisees to be convinced! that everything is done by immutable! laws; that everything is settled; that everything is the necessary effect of some previous cause.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: I do not mean to expose my ideas to ingenious ridicule by maintaining that everything happens to every man for the best; but I will contend, that he who makes the best use of it, fulfills the part of a wise and good man.
quotes.author: Cumberland

quotes.quote: Consider the reason of the case, for nothing is law that is not reason.
quotes.author: John Powell

quotes.quote: Everything is fitting for me, my universe, which fits thy purpose. Nothing in its good time is too early or too late for me; everything is fruit for me which thy seasons, Nature, bear; from thee, in thee, to thee, are all things.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Nothing happens to anybody which he is not fitted by nature to bear.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Receive with simplicity everything that happens to you.
quotes.author: Rashi

quotes.quote: There are powerful kinds of good that can come into life only where something has gone terribly wrong. That does not justify even the smallest area of life going wrong; it just happens to be one aspect of the composition of things.
quotes.author: J. Neville Ward

quotes.quote: The bad things that happen to us in our lives do not have a meaning when they happen. But we can redeem these tragedies from senselessness by imposing meaning on them. In the final analysis, the question is not why bad things happen to good people, but how we respond when such things happen.
quotes.author: Rabbi H. Kushner

quotes.quote: Some people make things happen, some watch things happen, while others wonder what has happened.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: When what you want doesn't happen, learn to want what does.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: You don't always have the power to change the things that happen in your life. However, you have something even more powerful. The power to change the meaning of what happens to you.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: Sometimes life may take you down an unexpected path, but keep an open mind, for that may be the exact path you're supposed to be on at that particular point in time.
quotes.author: Alicia Emamdee

quotes.quote: Everything happens for a reason. If that reason has not become clear yet, it is because whatever is happening is preparing you for something that is yet to come.
quotes.author: Teal Swan

quotes.quote: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
quotes.author: Rita Moreno

quotes.quote: All concerns of men go wrong when they wish to cure evil with evil.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The soul that has conceived one wickedness can nurse no good thereafter.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The evil that is in the world almost always comes of ignorance, and good intentions may do as much harm as malevolence if they lack understanding.
quotes.author: AlbertCamus

quotes.quote: The world is a dangerous place to live, not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Never open the door to a lesser evil, for other and greater ones invariably slink in after it.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracin

quotes.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: It is a man's own mind, not his enemy or foe, that lures him to evil ways.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The evil that is in the world almost always comes of ignorance, and good intentions may do as much harm as malevolence if they lack understanding.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: He who passively accepts evil is as much involved in it as he who helps to perpetrate it.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: No notice is taken of a little evil, but when it increases it strikes the eye.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Evil is unspectacular and always human, and shares our bed and eats at our own table.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: A wisp of evil can lure the vulnerable into a miasma of wickedness.
quotes.author: Michael Shaw

quotes.quote: Men never do evil so completely and cheerfully as when they do it conscientiously
quotes.author: Pascal

quotes.quote: The devil when he purports any evil against man, first perverts his mind.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: The evil of the world is made possible by nothing but the sanction you give it.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: We must as second best...take the least of the evils.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: We are all capable of evil thoughts, but only very rarely of evil deeds: we can all do good deeds, but very few of us can think good thoughts.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Death is the solution to all problems. No man ? no problem.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: One death is a tragedy; one million is a statistic.
quotes.author: Josef Stalin

quotes.quote: The oppressed peoples can liberate themselves only through struggle. This is a simple and clear truth confirmed by history.
quotes.author: Kim Il-Sung

quotes.quote: The worst evil of all is to leave the ranks of the living before one dies.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Fear is pain arising from the anticipation of evil.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The evils we do to others give us less pain than those we do to ourselves.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Evil communication corrupts good manners. I hope to live to hear that good communication corrects bad manners.
quotes.author: Benjamin Banneker

quotes.quote: The greatest evil is physical pain.
quotes.author: Saint Aurelius Augustinus Augustine

quotes.quote: There is nothing evil save that which perverts the mind and shackles the conscience.
quotes.author: Saint Ambrose

quotes.quote: We are each our own devil, and we make this world our hell
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: He who does not punish evil commands it to be done.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: If it were easier to choose to do the right thing, wouldn't people be more likely to do it?
quotes.author: Robert Alan Silverstein

quotes.quote: The sad truth is that most evil is done by people who never make up their minds to be either good or evil.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Evil, begets evil.
quotes.author: Robert Dean Klein

quotes.quote: The struggle between good and evil goes on inside of everyone.
quotes.author: Glen MacDonough

quotes.quote: Destroy all that which is evil.
quotes.author: Troy Duffy

quotes.quote: You must help me. A great evil is taking over the city and shall consume the entire earth if not stopped.
quotes.author: Sam Raimi

quotes.quote: Evil doesn't always look evil. Sometimes it's staring right at us, and we don't even realize it.
quotes.author: Edward Kitsis

quotes.quote: Evil isn't born, dearie, it's made.
quotes.author: Edward Kitsis

quotes.quote: I could never allow him to be used for such evil.
quotes.author: Stephen Sommers

quotes.quote: I don't want to be evil, and stealing is evil.
quotes.author: Adolfo Torres Portillo

quotes.quote: Where innocence is greatest, evil is nearest.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.quote: I shall profit by your knowledge. And good will come of it, not evil.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.quote: That's ridiculous. What's evil is evil. Anyone who says otherwise is just stupid.
quotes.author: Mark O'Green

quotes.quote: Evil is when good gets completely screwed up! Evil is when brave people can't be brave anymore! Evil is an anagram of vile! There's got to be a moral standard somewhere!
quotes.author: Mark O'Green

quotes.quote: Evil does seek to maintain power by suppressing the truth.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: Such is the nature of evil, in time all foul things come forth!
quotes.author: Fran Walsh

quotes.quote: Evil is for evil's sake, period. Its goal is - chaos and destruction.
quotes.author: John Masius

quotes.quote: Evil is a spiritual being, alive and living, perverted and perverting, weaving its way insidiously into the very fabric of life.
quotes.author: William Goodhart

quotes.quote: Good will never succumb to evil!
quotes.author: Jules Bass

quotes.quote: Good and evil, there never is one without the other.
quotes.author: Thomas Malory

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness is to be just. It is such a great gift that those who commit evil deeds are insane.
quotes.author: Roberto Rossellini

quotes.quote: Evil is just destructive? Storms are evil, if it's that simple.
quotes.author: Bryan Fuller

quotes.quote: Within each of us lies conflicting forces: yin and yang, light and dark, good and evil.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.quote: Some concepts, though they may seem simple, are the most difficult, especially those that pertain to the powers of good and evil.
quotes.author: Shôtarô Ishinomori

quotes.quote: The conflict between good and evil is part of the fabric of existence.
quotes.author: Mark Edward Edens

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of evil people in this world. Those who do evil stuff and those who see evil stuff being done and don't try to stop it.
quotes.author: Rosalind Wiseman

quotes.quote: I believe there are evil acts, but those are choices - brain chemistry.
quotes.author: Jeff Davis

quotes.quote: Evil is in your heart, if you don't go out, you'll never get away from it.
quotes.author: Frank Cottrell Boyce

quotes.quote: Evil is a metaphysical condition.
quotes.author: Geraint Wyn Davies

quotes.quote: Adventures! In which good triumphs over evil!
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: When it comes to evil, if something seems too good to be true, it probably is.
quotes.author: Ivan Raimi

quotes.quote: Lesser evil stops greater evil every single time.
quotes.author: David Wolstencroft

quotes.quote: The breeding of malice; which, like other feelings, whether for good or for evil, will grow or decline according to the power of the will.
quotes.author: What

quotes.quote: Censure, when it adds to evil instead of curing it.
quotes.author: What

quotes.quote: Those diseases which often proceed from moral evil.
quotes.author: What

quotes.quote: Being discontented with your position in life, as it often increases the evil.
quotes.author: What

quotes.quote: Retailing evil reports of private life and manners; malice having often more to do with such than truth.
quotes.author: What

quotes.quote: Evil is real, and it must be opposed.
quotes.author: Luke Russell

quotes.quote: Our world is plagued by evil. Evil is no less real, no less menacing, and no less ubiquitous today than it has ever been.
quotes.author: Chad Meister

quotes.quote: We are faced with evil in all its pernicious forms each and everyday as we watch the news, read the newspaper, or simply live out our lives. Yes, evil is always before us.
quotes.author: Chad Meister

quotes.quote: The notion of evil comprises a wide expanse, covering everything harmful and destructive in the world.
quotes.author: Chad Meister

quotes.quote: Evil is what reduces our happiness.
quotes.author: Chad Meister

quotes.quote: The people who think or do evil are like dead streams which misuse the source and therefore their freedom to love hasn't worked.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Life is neither good nor evil, but only a place for good and evil.
quotes.author: Frank A Clark

quotes.quote: The only tragedy that exists in the world is ignorance: all evil comes from that.
quotes.author: Alan Bennett

quotes.quote: Return good for good, and or evil, justice.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It is a sin to believe evil of others, but it is seldom a mistake.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, for the good he seeks.
quotes.author: Mary Willstonecraft

quotes.quote: Evil is limited. One cannot form a scheme for universal evil.
quotes.author: Bailey's Festus

quotes.quote: Evil then results from imperfection.
quotes.author: Bailey

quotes.quote: Many surmises of evil alarm the hearts of the people.
quotes.author: Longfellow's Evangeline

quotes.quote: No evil can happen to a good man, either in life or death.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: It is easier to denature plutonium than to denature the evil spirit of man.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The belief in a supernatural source of evil is not necessary; men alone are quite capable of every wickedness.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: When it's uncertain whether good or evil has been done, the wisest way is not to be boastful.
quotes.author: James Fenimore Cooper

quotes.quote: Satan finds some mischief still, even in the jungle.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Evil is permanent threat to human well-being.
quotes.author: John Kekes

quotes.quote: Not all poison was bitter. Some of the deadliest poisons in the world tasted sweet; they were that much more dangerous because of it.
quotes.author: Nenia Campbell

quotes.quote: There are many good seeds in you. Therefore you must avoid every bad soil in the world.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Evil influence is like a nicotine patch, you cannot help but absorb what sticks to you.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: There are people whose souls have just withered, people who are willing to go along with anything evil - anything so as not to be suspected of disagreeing with whoever is in power.
quotes.author: Vasily Grossman

quotes.quote: O how can wicked men seem so steady and untouched with such black hearts, while poor innocents stand like malefactors before them!
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: The soul that has conceived one wickedness can nurse no good thereafter.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: In every man's heart there is a devil, but we do not know the man as bad until the devil is roused.
quotes.author: James Oliver Curwood

quotes.quote: Even an evil man can have principles he can be true to his own evil, which is not always so easy.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: By the fruit the tree is to be known. An evil tree cannot bring forth good fruit.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The Lord is known by his justice; the wicked are ensnared by the work of their hands.
quotes.author: Psalm 9:16

quotes.quote: Even the gates of Hell shall stay closed when Ted Bundy and Charles Manson come a knocking, for even Satan fears they would glory themselves above him.
quotes.author: Bishop R. Baits

quotes.quote: Men never do evil so completely and cheerfully as when they do it conscientiously.
quotes.author: Pascal

quotes.quote: A belief in a supernatural source of evil is not necessary; men alone are quite capable of every wickedness.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: The man who does evil to another does evil to himself, and the evil counsel is most evil for him who counsels it.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: Praises from wicked men are reproaches.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: For God will bring every deed into judgment, with every secret thing, whether good or evil.
quotes.author: Ecclesiastes 12:14

quotes.quote: Woe to those who devise wickedness and work evil on their beds! When the morning dawns, they perform it, because it is in the power of their hand.
quotes.author: Micah 2:1

quotes.quote: Abstain from every form of evil.
quotes.author: 1 Thessalonians 5:22

quotes.quote: You shall not murder.
quotes.author: Exodus 20:13

quotes.quote: There is a way that seems right to a man, but its end is the way to death.
quotes.author: Proverbs 14:12

quotes.quote: The evil men do lives after them. The good is oft interred with their bones,
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: Never trust thine enemy: for like as iron rusteth, so is his wickedness.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: The belief in a supernatural source of evil is not necessary: men alone are quite capable of every wickedness
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Wickedness sucks in the greater part of its own venom and poisons itself therewith
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: There is a method in man's wickedness; it grows up by degrees
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Bad men live that they may eat and drink, whereas good men eat and drink that they may live.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: I never wonder to see men wicked, but I often wonder to see them not ashamed.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: As long as people believe in absurdities they will continue to commit atrocities.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Man must vanquish himself, must do himself violence, in order to perform the slightest action untainted by evil.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: I have discovered that all human evil comes from this, man's being unable to sit still and quiet in a room alone.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Our greatest evils flow from ourselves.
quotes.author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: There's small choice in rotten apples.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: All things truly wicked start from innocence.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: There is poison in the fang of the serpent, in the mouth of the fly and in the sting of a scorpion; but the wicked man is saturated with it.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: The foolish and wicked practice of profane cursing and swearing is a vice so mean and low that every person of sense and character detests and despises it.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The wicked envy and hate; it is their way of admiring.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Wicked thoughts and worthless efforts gradually set their mark on the face, especially the eyes.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: The wicked flee when no man pursueth: but the righteous are bold as a lion.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Oh, the blind counsels of the guilty! Oh, how cowardly is wickedness always!
quotes.author: Statius

quotes.quote: It is a statistical fact that the wicked work harder to reach hell than the righteous do to enter heaven.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: To see and listen to the wicked is already the beginning of wickedness.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: God bears with the wicked, but not forever.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: They say the best revenge is living well. I say it's acid in the face who will love them now
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.quote: An eye for an eye is never enough. Never, never, never.
quotes.author: Adrian Phoenix

quotes.quote: Wicked men obey from fear; good men, from love.
quotes.author: Augustine

quotes.quote: To the wicked, everything serves as pretext.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The wicked are always surprised to find ability in the good.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Wicked is not much worse than indiscreet.
quotes.author: J. P. Donleavy

quotes.quote: No one ever became extremely wicked suddenly.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.quote: You can believe in evil without supposing that it is supernatural.
quotes.author: James Dawes

quotes.quote: Ideas of evil do not have to posit a cloven-hoofed Satan.
quotes.author: James Dawes

quotes.quote: Evil is fundamentally a privation of the good of being.
quotes.author: James Dawes

quotes.quote: To judge something evil is to put the possibility of forgiveness into question in a way other judgements do not.
quotes.author: James Dawes

quotes.quote: The concept of evil, as various scholars have characterized the position, 'is simply a residue of an outdated theological perspective on the world.
quotes.author: James Dawes

quotes.quote: Evil is present to cleverly disguise itself as good.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Evil is present to control and deceive us.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Every manifestation of evil is the result of basic sin-sin that has remained unchanged since the moment it first entered the human race.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Evil and suffering are real.. They aren't an illusion, nor are they simply an absence of good.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Evil is real-but so is God's power and love.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: God judged it better to bring good out of evil than to suffer no evil to exist
quotes.author: Augustine

quotes.quote: He who passively accepts evil is as much involved in it as he who helps to perpetrate it.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: He accepts evil without protesting against it is really cooperating with it.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: We poor blind creatures, here today and gone tomorrow, born in sin, surrounded by sinners, living in a constant atmosphere of weakness, infirmity, and imperfection - can form none but the most inadequate conceptions of the hideousness of evil.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: A good end cannot sanctify evil means; nor must we ever do evil that good may come of it.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: God himself would not permit evil in this world if good did not come of it.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Deliver me, O Lord, from evil men; preserve me from violent men, who plan evil things in their heart and stir up wars continually.
quotes.author: Psalm 140:1-2

quotes.quote: A good end cannot sanctify evil means; nor must we never do evil that good may come of it.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Wickedness is a myth invented by good people to account for the attractiveness of other.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: All that is necessary for the triumph of evil is that good men do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: There are a thousand hacking at the branches of evil to one who is striking at the root.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: It may be that the world was created so that evil could exist.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: A necessary evil is never necessary but always evil.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: To the cynic, money isn't the root of all evil-evil is the root of all money.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Love of money is the root of half the evil in the world , and lack of money is the root of the other half.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The evil that men do makes them eligible for nomination to office.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A great evil is the number of people who are trying to get something for nothing, and a greater evil is the number of people who succeed.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: I define and use the word evil to mean behavior that deliberately deprives innocent people of their humanity, from small scale assaults on a person's dignity to outright murder.
quotes.author: Fred E. Katz

quotes.quote: Evil is commonly seen in religious, moral and philosophical terms: as violating higher commandments, as breaking valued constraints that bind us to other persons, or as making us depart from a benign deity in favor of following a malignant deity, a Satan.
quotes.author: Fred E. Katz

quotes.quote: And from this more realistic knowledge we will be in a better position to avoid travelling the road to evil, if we so choose.
quotes.author: Fred E. Katz

quotes.quote: We live in a world that is periodically polluted by eruptions of humanly created evil, often resulting in deliberately created deaths on a huge scale, in one or another part of the globe.
quotes.author: Fred E. Katz

quotes.quote: The route to evil often takes the form of a sequence of seemingly small, innocuous incremental steps, in each of which one tries to solve a problem within one's immediate situation.
quotes.author: Fred E. Katz

quotes.quote: Evil exists in the way that courage, malice, or honestly exist; not as as mysterious supernatural force that is capable of taking over a person, but as a character trait and as a moral property of actions.
quotes.author: Luke Russell

quotes.quote: If an evil person is someone who is disposed to perform evil actions, then it is possible for there to be evil persons who have done nothing, then it is possible for there to be evil persons who have done nothing wrong because their disposition has not manifested itself in action.
quotes.author: Luke Russell

quotes.quote: If evil persons are those who are disposed to do evil, then it seems that a very large proportion of us will turn out to be evil.
quotes.author: Luke Russell

quotes.quote: Evil can be used to express the broad concept of bad, or to express a more extreme moral concept.
quotes.author: Luke Russell

quotes.quote: They are evil because they are not in correspondence with the communion with God.
quotes.author: Nelly van Doorn-Harder

quotes.quote: Evil is a possibility found in all of us, because we are all free, moral beings.
quotes.author: Lars Fr. H. Svendsen

quotes.quote: Evil is part of common humanity, as is goodness.
quotes.author: Lars Fr. H. Svendsen

quotes.quote: What is also clear is that a person can have a number of different motives---or no motive at all---for doing evil. The least plausible motives is the demonic---doing evil simply because an action is evil.
quotes.author: Lars Fr. H. Svendsen

quotes.quote: Evil starts small---most genocides didn't begin as extreme acts of violence, but grew to such enormous proportions precisely because the initial stages found little resistance.
quotes.author: Lars Fr. H. Svendsen

quotes.quote: Evil is undoubtedly a complex and controversial notion, but it continues to capture something that resonates across cultures in the modern world.
quotes.author: Bruce Haddock

quotes.quote: Evil is difficult to discuss. Too many people approach it as something occult. A similar overabundance of people believe it exists somehow tied in with God, or with good, as if evil is the other side of the coin.
quotes.author: Larry Kramer

quotes.quote: Evil is part of nothing more related to anything except evil, It exists unto itself, totally and utterly, and horridly.
quotes.author: Larry Kramer

quotes.quote: In normal circumstances the responsibility of evildoers does not dissolve by understanding how or why they came to do evil. Responsibility f for the evil done, not for the causes that led to the doing of it.
quotes.author: John Kekes

quotes.quote: This is not to say that people who are insane, have low intelligence, or a are otherwise incapacitated should not be exempted from responsibility for their evil actions.
quotes.author: John Kekes

quotes.quote: The dirty warriors are, therefore, responsible for the evil actions that caused them.
quotes.author: John Kekes

quotes.quote: People often do evil because they hate, envy, fear, are jealous of, or are provoked by their victims.
quotes.author: John Kekes

quotes.quote: It is rationally and morally justified to recognize the moral inequality between people who habitually cause evil and those who habitually cause good.
quotes.author: John Kekes

quotes.quote: Everyone commits some evil in life, but a person whose will is generally turned outward toward the light is not an evil person.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Burton Russell

quotes.quote: With evolution, things are always changing, so I sort of think: Should we all be growing three heads?
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.quote: Evolution isn't true, because if we evolved from monkeys, how can they still be here?
quotes.author: Stephen Baldwin

quotes.quote: It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change.
quotes.author: Leon C. Megginson

quotes.quote: God created a number of possibilities in case some of his prototypes failed - that is the meaning of evolution.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Evolution is the fundamental idea in all of life science - in all of biology.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: We're in the midst of an evolution, not a revolution.
quotes.author: James Levine

quotes.quote: The first step in the evolution of ethics is a sense of solidarity with other human beings.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: It is hard for the ape to believe he descended from man.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: If evolution really works, how come mothers only have two hands?
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Promise yourself to live your life as a revolution and not just a process of evolution.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Those who do not move, do not notice their chains.
quotes.author: Rosa Luxemburg

quotes.quote: Evolution tells us where we came from, not where we can go.
quotes.author: Jerry Coyne

quotes.quote: The pre-human creature from which man evolved was unlike any other living thing in its malicious viciousness toward its own kind. Humanization was not a leap forward but a groping toward survival.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: If you really want to study evolution, you've got go outside sometime, because you'll see symbiosis everywhere!
quotes.author: Lynn Margulis

quotes.quote: The goal of evolution is self-conquest.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The human's place in the universe will be set in the scheme of evolution, the product of our biological inheritance.
quotes.author: Walter Gilbert

quotes.quote: Evolution is fascinating to watch. To me it is the most interesting when one can observe the evolution of a single man.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: Evolution is not a force but a process. Not a cause but a law.
quotes.author: John Morley

quotes.quote: The evolution of humans can not only be seen as the grand total of their wars; it is also defined by the evolution of the human mind and the development of the human consciousness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quotes.quote: Evolution evolutionary change, does not happen quickly.
quotes.author: Jack Horner

quotes.quote: Every now and then a man's mind is stretched by a new idea or sensation, and never shrinks back to its former dimensions.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quotes.quote: The theory of evolution, like the theory of gravity, is a scientific fact.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Evolution is a change from an indefinite, incoherent, homogeneity to a definite, coherent, heterogeneity, through continuous differentiations and integrations.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: Evolution never looks to the future.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Today the theory of evolution is about as much open to doubt as the theory that the earth goes round the sun.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Darwinian man, though well-behaved, at best is only a monkey shaved.
quotes.author: William Schwenck Gilbert

quotes.quote: Nevertheless, it is even harder for the average ape to believe that he has descended from man.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Evolution is a process of constant branching and expansion.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: You have to look at history as an evolution of society.
quotes.author: Jean Chretien

quotes.quote: Evolution seems to close the heart to some of the plainest spiritual truths while it opens the mind to the wildest guesses advanced in the name of science.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: The world doesn't change in front of your eyes, it changes behind your back.
quotes.author: Terry Hayes

quotes.quote: Evolution happens in jumps, very rapidly.
quotes.author: Marilyn Ferguson

quotes.quote: There are no shortcuts in evolution.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent that survives. It is the one that is the most adaptable to change.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: At some point in your life, if you're lucky, you get to design the way in which things evolve.
quotes.author: Daniel Day-Lewis

quotes.quote: Evolution in nature is not inconsistent with the notion of creation, because evolution requires the creation of beings that evolve.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: All life evolves by the differential survival of replicating entities.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: You will evolve past certain people. Let yourself.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Evolution requires intermediate forms between species and palaeontology does not provide them.
quotes.author: David Kitts

quotes.quote: We shall have to evolve problem-solvers galore since each problem they solve creates ten problems more.
quotes.author: Piet Pieterszoon Hein

quotes.quote: You grow and evolve and as you do that, your art hopefully reflects that change and that growth.
quotes.author: Fefe Dobson

quotes.quote: Our ambitions are bold and so must be our desire to change and evolve our culture
quotes.author: Satya Nadella

quotes.quote: Evolving and bettering yourself is wonderful, but not if the set of standards and values you adopt smothers you into oblivion in the process.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The whole point of being alive is to evolve into the complete person you were intended to be.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Develop the wings of loyalty and you will fly above the dooms of disappointments. Disloyalty has one whistle; when it's blown, opportunities take to their heels.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If evolution is outlawed, only outlaws will evolve
quotes.author: Jello Biafra

quotes.quote: If history tells us anything, it is that human culture and knowledge are constantly evolving.
quotes.author: James Redfield

quotes.quote: People evolve and it's important to not stop evolving just because you've reached 'adulthood.
quotes.author: J. K. Simmons

quotes.quote: You must always be able to predict what's next and then have the flexibility to evolve.
quotes.author: Marc Benioff

quotes.quote: Be the change you want to see in your networks.
quotes.author: James H. Fowler

quotes.quote: It has become evident that the primary lesson of the study of evolution is that all evolution is coevolution: every organism is evolving in tandem with the organisms around it.
quotes.author: Kevin Kelly

quotes.quote: Evolution is constant. Evolving better is individual's conscience.
quotes.author: Pradeepa Pandiyan

quotes.quote: Optimism is the most important human trait, because it allows us to evolve our ideas, to improve our situation, and to hope for a better tomorrow.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: One cannot evolve from one's robothood until one realizes how totally one has been robotized.
quotes.author: Timothy Leary

quotes.quote: We still have to evolve, that's how we're created, we're created to evolve so you can believe in that the answer is in this book or in this one idea that the masses most believe in, each individual must evolve themselves, spiritually and consciously.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: People evolve and grow, and life is fascinating and fun and tragic
quotes.author: Fred Durst

quotes.quote: Progress comes from the intelligent use of experience.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Change and growth is so painful. But it's so necessary for us to evolve
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.quote: Progress is man's ability to complicate simplicity.
quotes.author: Thor Heyerdahl

quotes.quote: Everything has to evolve or else it perishes.
quotes.author: John Knowles

quotes.quote: Everything becomes an opportunity to evolve and grow.
quotes.author: Bryan Kest

quotes.quote: The only things that evolve by themselves in an organization are disorder, friction and malperformance.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Only after disaster can we be resurrected. It's only after you've lost everything that you're free to do anything. Nothing is static, everything is evolving, everything is falling apart.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: I want to grow. I want to be better. You Grow. We all grow. We're made to grow.You either evolve or you disappear.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: For peace to reign on Earth, humans must evolve into new beings who have learned to see the whole first.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Evolve or dissolve... It's your decision.
quotes.author: Larry Price

quotes.quote: I reserve the right to evolve. What I think and feel today is subject to revision tomorrow.
quotes.author: Laurence Overmire

quotes.quote: I feel myself becoming the fearless person I have dreamt of being. Have I arrived? No. But I'm constantly evolving and challenging myself to be unafraid to make mistakes.
quotes.author: Janelle Monae

quotes.quote: We're still growing into that place of higher consciousness; we are becoming a global conscience. The idea is to unravel the onion and let go of the ego and evolve to that place where you perceive everything to be a beautiful experience rather than a daunting experience.
quotes.author: John Roy Anderson

quotes.quote: Life is never static. Despite catastrophic tragedies, life has persisted in evolving new varieties of unimaginable forms. I find comfort in the narrative of evolutionary history.
quotes.author: Gregory Walter Graffin

quotes.quote: How man evolved with such an incredible reservoir of talent and such fantastic diversity isn't completely understood... he knows so little and has nothing to measure himself against.
quotes.author: Edward T. Hall

quotes.quote: Happy are those who evolve from within.
quotes.author: Amit Abraham

quotes.quote: Just when the caterpillar thought her world was over, she became a butterfly.
quotes.author: Barbara Haines Howett

quotes.quote: Very often a change of self is needed more than a change of scene.
quotes.author: Arthur Christopher Benson

quotes.quote: The process of metamorphosis is scary and sometimes painful but it is also the way to experience wonderful new adventures we weren't able to imagine in our caterpillar identities. Accept the process: care for yourself, dream big, work hard, and keep learning. Then don't be surprised when one morning, you wake up to find that you have wings.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: You evolve, or you don't evolve, in front of millions of people. You evolve in front of dads then in front of their children.
quotes.author: Kevin Costner

quotes.quote: It's important to create an environment that fosters innovation, but you want to let it evolve in a Darwinian way. You don't want to, at a high level, at a gut level, pick a technology and decide that that's the thing that's going to win because it may not be. You should really let things evolve.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Do not try to solve your problems. Surpass them by growing and becoming better tomorrow than you were yesterday. That's why problems exist. They are there to make you evolve.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: Walk through life eager and open to self-improvement and that which is going to best help you evolve, because that's really why we're here: to evolve as human beings.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I don't understand why people insist on pitting concepts of evolution and creation against each other. Why can't they see that spiritualism and science are one? That bodies evolve and souls evolve and the universe is a fluid package that marries them both in a wonderful package called a human being.
quotes.author: Garth Stein

quotes.quote: I think a lot of the times we misunderstand the idea of being ourselves with choosing one thing that you are and staying true to it. I think we as human beings, we evolve so much and so quickly that we can be a lot of different things at the same time.
quotes.author: Lido

quotes.quote: The highest love a person can have for you is to wish for you to evolve into the best person you can be. No one owns you, no matter what your relationship.
quotes.author: Viscott

quotes.quote: Evolutionary behavior is addictive. Once you start, it's very hard stop. After all, why live and evolve unconsciously when we can live consciously and, at the same time, speed up the process of evolution for ourselves and others.
quotes.author: Jonas Salk

quotes.quote: Our brains have evolved to get us out of the rain, find where the berries are and keep us from getting killed. Our brains did not evolve to help us grasp really large numbers or to look at things in a hundred thousand dimensions.
quotes.author: Ronald L. Graham

quotes.quote: Unless you continually work, evolve, and innovate, you'll learn a quick and painful lesson from someone who has.
quotes.author: Cael Sanderson

quotes.quote: Make sure that you are seeing each person on your team with fresh eyes every day. People evolve, and so your relationships must evolve with them. Care personally; don’t put people in boxes and leave them there.
quotes.author: Kim Malone Scott

quotes.quote: The point of learning is not to affirm our beliefs. It's to evolve our beliefs.
quotes.author: Adam Grant

quotes.quote: To evolve is to challenge. To challenge is to grow. And to grow is where legacy resides.
quotes.author: Anthony C. Gruppo

quotes.quote: What's dangerous is not to evolve.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: The new shift in thinking is the gateway to human transformation. And because of the sheer number of people involved in this shift, and the growing magnitude of the crises that are driving us to change the way we think, we are standing on the threshold of human transformation at a level unlike anything ever before known on Earth.
quotes.author: Gregg Braden

quotes.quote: The secret of your growth is in developing passion to learn and evolve.
quotes.author: Jawad Abid

quotes.quote: As you evolve you will make a lot of people uncomfortable. Evolve anyway.
quotes.author: Dwarkadhish Holistic Centre

quotes.quote: The best revenge you can get on your ex is to move on and let them see you happy with someone that treats you better than they did
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Exes are like our old diaries-they know the whole truth and the unedited version of you. If you can still attain their respect after the relationship you must have done something well.
quotes.author: Nontobeko Sibiya

quotes.quote: Nobody deserves your tears, but whoever deserves them will not make you cry.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: I don't think much about guys from the past. I'm glad I knew them, but there's a reason they didn't make it into my future.
quotes.author: Lorraine Zago Rosenthal

quotes.quote: Going back to your ex is like reading a book you have already read. The outcome will always be the same.
quotes.author: Matthew Donnell

quotes.quote: To fall in love is awfully simple, but to fall out of love is simply awful.
quotes.author: Bess Myerson

quotes.quote: Dating an ex is the equivalent of failing a test you already had the answers to.
quotes.author: Kendrick Cole

quotes.quote: A heartbreak is a blessing from God. It's just his way of letting you realize he saved you from the wrong one.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All discarded lovers should be given a second chance, but with somebody else.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: You can choose to be happy or sad and whichever you choose that is what you get. No one is really responsible to make someone else happy, no matter what most people have been taught and accept as true.
quotes.author: Sidney Madwed

quotes.quote: Sometimes a woman will look back on what she had, not because she wants to go there but to motivate her to do better.
quotes.author: Reuben " Mulah Truth " Holmes II

quotes.quote: We are all trying to get over the person who broke our hearts. We are all far from perfect.
quotes.author: Alex Rosa

quotes.quote: One relationship ends but life goes on. Your 'Ex' was just a stepping stone to something better.
quotes.author: Sushan R Sharma

quotes.quote: If you feel the need to insult your ex or their new lover, you obviously still have feelings for them.
quotes.author: Alexis Rose

quotes.quote: I couldn't deal with my ex and his new she-devil girlfriend being all up in my face and him trying to be friendly and her trying to poison me with her existence.
quotes.author: Sarah Bilington

quotes.quote: Never get jealous when you see your ex with someone else, because our parents taught us to give our used toys to the less fortunate.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It may seem as the hardest thing in the world, but you have to forget the guy who forgot about you.
quotes.author: The Notebook

quotes.quote: You're still my person, even if I'm not yours.
quotes.author: Grey's Anatomy

quotes.quote: The truth is that it hurts because it's real. It hurts because it mattered. And that's an important thing to acknowledge to yourself.
quotes.author: John Greene

quotes.quote: The hottest love has the coldest end.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: I never hated a man enough to give him his diamonds back.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard
quotes.author: Carol Sobieski and Thomas Meehan

quotes.quote: Irregardless, ex boyfriends are just off limits to friends. I mean, that's just the rules of feminism.
quotes.author: Mean Girls

quotes.quote: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.author: Victoria Holt

quotes.quote: If you really love something set it free. If it comes back it's yours, if not it wasn't meant to be.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I don't miss him, I miss who I thought he was.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It rather goes without saying that Katherine drank her coffee black. Katherines do, generally. They like their coffee like their ex-boyfriends: bitter.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: He heals the broken hearted and binds up their wounds.
quotes.author: Psalm 147:3

quotes.quote: Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted make-up.
quotes.author: Marian Keyes

quotes.quote: Why is it that when you miss someone so much that your heart is ready to disintegrate, you hear the saddest song on the radio?
quotes.author: Pete & Pete

quotes.quote: When a love comes to an end, weaklings cry, efficient ones instantly find another love, and the wise already have one in reserve.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you’re not part of their happiness.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of withering, of tarnishing.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Relationships are hard. It's like a full-time job, and we should treat it like one. If your boyfriend or girlfriend wants to leave you, they should give you two weeks’ notice. There should be severance pay, and before they leave you, they should have to find you a temp.
quotes.author: Bob Ettinger

quotes.quote: When you get back together with an old boyfriend, it's pathetic. It’s like having a garage sale and buying your own stuff hack.
quotes.author: Laura Kightlinger

quotes.quote: Exes should never, never go out with or marry other people but should remain celibate to the end of their days in order to provide you with a mental fallback position.
quotes.author: Helen Fielding

quotes.quote: There is a good way to break up with someone and it doesn’t include a Post-it.
quotes.author: Carrie Bradshaw

quotes.quote: I will always love the false image I had of you.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: He’s the kind of man a woman would have to marry to get rid of.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: I've had enough boyfriends and enough issues. I'd seen enough train wrecks.
quotes.author: Taylor Dayne

quotes.quote: Love blurs your vision; but after it recedes, you can see more clearly than ever.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: It's probably a bad indicator of your lifestyle when you miss your ex-boyfriend because he's absolutely lethal.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.quote: Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted make-up.
quotes.author: Marian Keyes

quotes.quote: Next time, we don't date the girl with eleven evil ex-boyfriends.
quotes.author: Stacey Pilgrim

quotes.quote: You'll always be my favorite ex-boyfriend.
quotes.author: Cassidy

quotes.quote: Yeah, well, trouble stalks me like a crazy ex-boyfriend.
quotes.author: Claire Temple

quotes.quote: To make an omelette, you have to kill some ex-boyfriends
quotes.author: Sadie Cunningham

quotes.quote: It's not cheating if you dream of kissing your ex-boyfriend, right?
quotes.author: Tori Spelling

quotes.quote: He's the guy that you should feel sorry for / He had the world but he thought that he wanted more / I owe it all to the mistake he made back then / I owe it all to my girl's ex-boyfriend
quotes.author: Matthew Thiessen

quotes.quote: My boyfriend and I broke up. He wanted to get married and I didn't want him to.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: There is only one real tragedy in a woman’s life. The fact that her past is always her lover, and her future invariably her husband.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Got a long list of ex lovers / They'll tell you I'm insane / But I've got a blank space, baby / And I'll write your name
quotes.author: Max Martin; Johan Karl Schuster; Taylor Alison Swift

quotes.quote: Forget about your ex he wasn't good enough / Only when he called is when the spot got rough
quotes.author: Cliff Lighty; Keir Gist; Balewa Muhammed; Eddie Berkeley; Smooth

quotes.quote: Every lover known in comparison is a failure, I forget their names now.
quotes.author: Ali Payami; Karl Johan Schuster; Max Martin; Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Guess I should say thank you, / For the ‘hate yous’ and the tattoos, / Oh baby I’m cool by the way, / Ain’t sure I loved you anyway
quotes.author: Camille Purcell et al.

quotes.quote: This is a shout out to my ex / Heard he in love with some other chick / Yeah yeah, that hurt me, I'll admit / Forget that boy, I'm over it
quotes.author: Camille Purcell et al.

quotes.quote: Shout out to my ex, you're really quite the man / You made my heart break and that made me who I am
quotes.author: Camille Purcell et al.

quotes.quote: Here's to my ex, hey, look at me now / Well, I, I'm all the way up / I swear you'll never bring me down
quotes.author: Camille Purcell et al.

quotes.quote: Head in the clouds / Got no weight on my shoulders / I should be wiser / And realize that I've got / One less problem without you
quotes.author: Amethyst Amelia Kelly; Ariana Grande; Ilya Salmanzadeh; Martin Karl Sandberg; Savan Harish Kotecha

quotes.quote: You must not know 'bout me / You must not know 'bout me / I'll have another you by tomorrow / So don't you ever for a second / Get to thinking you're irreplaceable
quotes.author: Mikkel Eriksen; Amund Bjorklund; Beyonce Knowles; Espen Lind; Tor Hermansen; Shaffer Smith

quotes.quote: But even if the stars and moon collide / I never want you back into my life / You can take your words and all your lies / Oh oh oh I really don't care
quotes.author: Carl Anthony Falk; Savan Harish Kotecha; Cher Lloyd; Demitria Lovato; Rami Yacoub

quotes.quote: But since you been gone / I can breathe for the first time / I'm so movin' on, yeah, yeah / Thanks to you / Now I get what I want
quotes.author: Lukasz Gottwald; Martin Karl Sandberg

quotes.quote: I try to forget about you, baby / And I die when I think of you with someone else and / I don't know why, I don't know why you're dancing in my mind / From the breaking of the day to the middle of the night
quotes.author: Ilsey Anna Juber; Linus Thure Wiklund; Noonie Bao; Zara Maria Larsson

quotes.quote: Here I am / Once again / I'm torn into pieces / Can't deny it / Can't pretend / Just thought you were the one / Broken up deep inside / But you won't get to see the tears I cry / Behind these hazel eyes
quotes.author: Martin Max Sandberg; Kelly Brianne Clarkson; Lukasz Gottwald

quotes.quote: I used to cry to all my friends / But they would say, 'I told ya' / Finally, I can breathe again / The weight is off my shoulders / I was warned but fooled by charm / And you, you deserve to be alone
quotes.author: Meghan Trainor; Eric Frederic; Tommy Brown; Steven Franks; Mario Mims; Taylor Parks; Travis Sayles

quotes.quote: I will love you 'til the end of time / I would wait a million years / Promise you'll remember that you're mine / Baby can you see through the tears?
quotes.author: Daniel Law Heath; Elizabeth Grant; Emile Haynie

quotes.quote: And after all the obstacles / It's good to see you now with someone else / And it's such a miracle that you and me are still good friends / After all that we've been through / I know we're cool
quotes.author: Dallas Austin; Gwen Stefani

quotes.quote: When I said I hope you're happy, didn't mean it / Never thought you'd be so good at moving on / When I'm lying wide awake, you're probably sleeping / And maybe what I'm thinking is wrong
quotes.author: Adam King Feeney; Camila Cabello; Louis Bell; Ryan B. Tedder

quotes.quote: Walk away / You know how / Don't start caring / About me now
quotes.author: Emily Warren; Ian Kirkpatrick; Caroline Ailin; Dua Lipa

quotes.quote: Aren't you the guy who tried to / Hurt me with the word 'goodbye'? / Though it took some time to survive you / I'm better on the other side / I'm all good already / So moved on, it's scary / I'm not where you left me at all
quotes.author: Emily Warren; Ian Kirkpatrick; Caroline Ailin; Dua Lipa

quotes.quote: Well, I'll be damned / Here comes your ghost again / But that's not unusual / It's just that the moon is full / And you happened to call / And here I sit / Hand on the telephone / Hearing a voice I'd known / A couple of light years ago / Heading straight for a fall
quotes.author: Joan Baez

quotes.quote: Now you're telling me / You're not nostalgic / Then give me another word for it / You who are so good with words / And at keeping things vague / 'Cause I need some of that vagueness now / It's all come back too clearly / Yes, I loved you dearly / And if you're offering me diamonds and rust / I've already paid
quotes.author: Joan Baez

quotes.quote: At first I was afraid, I was petrified / Kept thinking I could never live without you by my side / But then I spent so many nights thinking how you did me wrong / And I grew strong / And I learned how to get along
quotes.author: Dino Fekaris; Frederick J. Perren

quotes.quote: I loved you, and / You love me / And I just couldn't see tomorrow, baby / And I cared for you / And I didn't see us through / Now I know in my heart you will always be / The greatest x ever
quotes.author: Christopher A. Stewart; Terius Youngdell Nash

quotes.quote: Did you know when you go it's the perfect ending / To the bad day I was just beginning / When you go all I know is you're my favorite mistake
quotes.author: Jeff Trott; Sheryl Crow

quotes.quote: 'Member when we argued on the concept of regret? / You were an expert even then but not me, not yet / Now all you gotta do's remind me that we met / And there ya got me, that's how you got me, taught me to regret
quotes.author: Fiona Apple Maggart

quotes.quote: I'm giving you up / I've forgiven it all / You set me free, oh
quotes.author: Adele Adkins; Max Martin; Johan Shellback

quotes.quote: Send my love to your new lover / Treat her better / We've gotta let go of all of our ghosts / We both know we ain't kids no more
quotes.author: Adele Adkins; Max Martin; Johan Shellback

quotes.quote: And I just can't believe / We went from strangers to lovers to strangers in a lifetime / Now just memories / We've gone from strangers to lovers to strangers / Yeah
quotes.author: Charlie Puth; Jacob Kasher Hindlin; Johan Jens Erik Carlsson; Katheryn Elizabeth Hudson

quotes.quote: Now and then I think of all the times you screwed me over / But had me believing it was always something that I'd done / And I don't wanna live that way / Reading into every word you say / You said that you could let it go / And I wouldn't catch you hung up on somebody that you used to know
quotes.author: Wally De Backer

quotes.quote: Old friend, why are you so shy / Ain't like you to hold back / Or hide from the light
quotes.author: Adele Laurie Blue Adkins; Daniel Dodd Wilson

quotes.quote: Never mind I'll find someone like you / I wish nothing but the best / For you too, don't forget me / I beg, I'll remember you say / Sometimes it lasts in love / But sometimes it hurts instead
quotes.author: Adele Laurie Blue Adkins; Daniel Dodd Wilson

quotes.quote: I used to know my place was a spot next to you / Now I'm searching the room for an empty seat / 'Cause lately I don't even know what page you're on
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Cause when I'm with him / I am thinking of you / Thinking of you / What you would do if / You were the one / Who was spending the night / Oh I wish that I / Was looking into your eyes
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.quote: We are never ever, ever getting back together / We are never ever, ever getting back together / You go talk to your friends, talk to my friends, talk to me / But we are never ever, ever, ever getting back together
quotes.author: Taylor Swift; Max Martin; Johan Shellback

quotes.quote: And I'm here, to remind you / Of the mess you left when you went away / It's not fair, to deny me / Of the cross I bear that you gave to me / You, you, you oughta know
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: Oh, you had me several years ago / When I was still quite naive / Well, you said that we made such a pretty pair / And that you would never leave / But you gave away the things you loved / And one of them was me / I had some dreams, they were clouds in my coffee / Clouds in my coffee
quotes.author: Carly E. Simon

quotes.quote: That's how it is with legends. The greater they sound, the more must've got left out.
quotes.author: Tim Tharp

quotes.quote: There are some people so addicted to exaggeration that they can't tell the truth without lying.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Never exaggerate. It is a matter of great importance to forego superlatives, in part to avoid offending the truth, and in part to avoid cheapening your judgment. Exaggeration wastes distinction and testifies to the paucity of your understanding and taste.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Some so speak in exaggerations and superlatives, that we need to make a large discount from their statements, before we can come at their real meaning.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Unless you embellish, you can't tell the truth.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Exaggeration is a standard peculiarity of man. To deprecate is often a form of exaggeration which people do not notice, because it appears to be its opposite.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Exaggeration, the inseparable companion of greatness.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Exaggeration is lying. It does not take long for the people in the community to get the habit of discounting twenty-five percent of all you say. If you continually overstate and vociferate you must keep on getting louder, until you soon become incoherent.
quotes.author: Frank Crane

quotes.quote: Eschew the monumental. Shun the Epic. All the guys who can paint great big pictures can paint great small ones.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: It is the essence of truth that it is never excessive.... We must not resort to the flame where only light is required.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Every exaggeration of the truth once detected by others destroys our credibility and makes all that we do and say suspect.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: If you add to the truth, you subtract from it.
quotes.author: The Talmud

quotes.quote: But exaggeration establishes no good understanding between the reader and the author. It is a solemn appeal to our credulity, and we are right to resent it. It is the violence of a weakling hand—the worst manner of violence.
quotes.author: Alice Meynell

quotes.quote: I don't exaggerate—I just remember big.
quotes.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Sometimes in life we blow things out of proportion because proportion is so dull.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: If you use the term 'over-exaggerate,' you know the definition neither of 'exaggerate' nor of 'over.'
quotes.author: Rodney Ulyate

quotes.quote: To exaggerate is to weaken.
quotes.author: Jean François de La Harpe

quotes.quote: Exaggeration is a branch of lying.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Exaggeration is truth that has lost its temper.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: It is always the novice who exaggerates.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Exaggeration is the melodramatic child of truth.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: Exaggeration is in the course of things. Nature sends no creature, no man into the world, without adding a small excess of his proper quality. Given the planet, it is still necessary to add the impulse; so, to every creature nature added a little violence of direction in its proper path, a shove to put it on its way; in every instance, a slight generosity, a drop too much.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Exaggeration! was ever any virtue attributed to a man without exaggeration? was ever any vice, without infinite exaggeration? Do we not exaggerate ourselves to ourselves, or do we recognize ourselves for the actual men we are? Are we not all great men? Yet what are we actually, to speak of? We live by exaggeration.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I know exaggerators of both kinds: people whose lies are only picturesque adjectives, and people whose picturesque adjectives are only lies.
quotes.author: Katherine Fullerton Gerould

quotes.quote: An element of exaggeration clings to the popular judgment: great vices are made greater, great virtues greater also; interesting incidents are made more interesting, softer legends more soft.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: All the exaggerations are right, if they exaggerate the right thing.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Exaggeration is the cheapest form of humor.
quotes.author: Barbara Mertz

quotes.quote: Exaggeration is a blood relation to falsehood, and nearly as blamable.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: He who cannot exaggerate is not qualified to utter truth.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The temptation to vivify the tale and make it walk abroad on its own legs is hard to deny.
quotes.author: Gelett Burgess

quotes.quote: Exaggeration in every sense is as essential to newspaper writing as it is to the writing of plays: for the point is to make as much as possible of every occurrence.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: All passions exaggerate; and they are passions only because they do exaggerate.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: You always get exaggerated notions about things you don't know anything about.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Thought is a process of exaggeration. The refusal to exaggerate is not infrequently an alibi for the disinclination to think or praise.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Stop telling such outlandish tales. Stop turning minnows into whales.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: We exaggerate misfortune and happiness alike. We are never as bad off or as happy as we say we are.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Examples of exaggeration can be found in almost any advertising medium. The use of the superlative is altogether too prevalent. 'The finest,' 'the best,' 'the greatest,' 'the purest,' 'the most economical,' and so on ad infinitum, are hurled at the public everywhere. Surely not all products of the same class can be the best or the finest.
quotes.author: Daniel Starch

quotes.quote: He's the type who makes mountains out of molehills and then sells climbing equipment.
quotes.author: Ivern Ball

quotes.quote: Don't, Sir, accustom yourself to use big words for little matters.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: People add color to their story because they think it happened in black and white.
quotes.author: Tawny Lara

quotes.quote: There is no one who does not exaggerate. In conversation, men are encumbered with personality, and talk too much.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Men of great conversational powers almost universally practise a sort of lively sophistry and exaggeration which deceives for the moment both themselves and their auditors.
quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quotes.quote: By speaking, by thinking, we undertake to clarify things, and that forces us to exacerbate them, dislocate them, schematize them. Every concept is in itself an exaggeration.
quotes.author: José Ortega y Gasset

quotes.quote: Exaggeration misleads the credulous and offends the perceptive.
quotes.author: Eliza Cook

quotes.quote: Exaggeration is a prodigality of the judgment which shows the narrowness of one's knowledge or one's taste.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Danger lies in the writer becoming the victim of his own exaggeration, losing the exact notion of sincerity, and in the end coming to despise truth itself as something too cold, too blunt for his purpose—as, in fact, not good enough for his insistent emotion. From laughter and tears the descent is easy to sniveling and giggles.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: When we exaggerate the tenderness of our friends towards us, it is often less from gratitude than from a desire to exhibit our own merit.
quotes.author: François de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: People exaggerate the value of things they haven't got: everybody worships truth and unselfishness because they have no experience with them.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: We aim above the mark, to hit the mark. Every act hath some falsehood of exaggeration in it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Never believe extraordinary characters which you hear of people. Depend upon it, they are exaggerated. You do not see one man shoot a great deal higher than another.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Poets and writers who are in love with the superlative all want to do more than they can.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I was always conscious of that weak point of mine, and sometimes very much afraid of it. I exaggerate everything, that is where I go wrong.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: 'Tis a rule of manners to avoid exaggeration.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Adding more bull to bull yields bigger bull.
quotes.author: Cathy Burnham Martin

quotes.quote: Like I said, all comedy is based on exaggeration, big or small, whatever you can get away with.
quotes.author: Drew Carey

quotes.quote: Nothing makes a fish bigger than almost being caught.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Exaggeration is to paint a snake and add legs.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Man is inclined to exaggerate almost everything — except his own mistakes.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Exams test your memory, life tests your learning; others will test your patience.
quotes.author: Fennel Hudson

quotes.quote: If my future were determined just by my performance on a standardized test, I wouldn't be here. I guarantee you that.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: When you do exams you never want to be the one who finishes first and you never want to be the one who finishes last.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: There's more to life than passing exams, and paper qualifications can only take you so far. A lot depends on luck, and on being in the right place at the right time, which was certainly true in my case.
quotes.author: Terry Wogan

quotes.quote: May your final exam grades be less damaging to your employment prospects than everything else you've done in college.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In years to come, Harry would never quite remember how he had managed to get through his exams when he half expected Voldemort to come bursting through the door at any moment.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Recipe for success: Study while others are sleeping; work while others are loafing; prepare while others are playing; and dream while others are wishing.
quotes.author: William A. Ward

quotes.quote: Good luck passing the bar exam and my deepest early condolences if you don't.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you fail an examination, it means you have not yet mastered the subject. With diligent study and understanding, you will succeed in passing the exams.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The difference between try and triumph is a little umph.
quotes.author: Marvin Phillips

quotes.quote: To be better equipped for the tests that the year will bring – read a textbook. To prepare for the tests that life will bring – read a book.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Few minds wear out; most rust out.
quotes.author: Christian Nextell Bovee

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Herman Cain

quotes.quote: The best way to finish an unpleasant task is to get started.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work learning from failure.
quotes.author: General Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Much good work is lost for the lack of a little more.
quotes.author: Edward H. Harriman

quotes.quote: Prove yourself to yourself not others.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You might not make heaven if you cover your script during an exam. Sharing is caring!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven't planted.
quotes.author: David Bly

quotes.quote: If you believe in what you're doing, you'll be successful.
quotes.author: Connie Sellecca

quotes.quote: Strength of mind is exercise, not rest.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: You can't have a million-dollar dream with a minimum-wage work ethic.
quotes.author: Stephen C. Hogan

quotes.quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Because so often when we say we're unqualified for something, what we're really saying is that we're too scared to try it, not that we can't do it
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.quote: The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want, and, if they can't find them, make them.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Put your heart, mind, intellect and soul even to your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: School exams are memory tests. In the real-world, no one is going to stop you from referring to a book to solve a problem.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Our brains can only handle so much information at once without exploding, so by looking at each task separately, the larger task suddenly becomes more manageable
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.quote: It’s very easy to be number one: find the guy who is number one, and score one point higher than he does.
quotes.author: Paul Kalanithi
