quotes.author: William Goldman

quotes.quote: Every time a value is born, existence takes on a new meaning; every time one dies, some part of that meaning passes away.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: Existence is no more than the precarious attainment of relevance in an intensely mobile flux of past, present, and future.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: The very purpose of existence is to reconcile the glowing opinion we hold of ourselves with the appalling things that other people think about us.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: The existence of things does not depend on the existence of words.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The life of inner peace, being harmonious and without stress, is the easiest type of existence.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: The whole existence of man is a ceaseless duel between the forces of life and death.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Existence is where the soul goes to learn how to interpret itself again.
quotes.author: Duncan McNaughton

quotes.quote: Existence was not only absurd, it was plain hard work.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Existence is self-enjoyment, by means of some object distinct from ourselves.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: And the existence is tedious, anyway; it is a senseless, dirty business, this life.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: Existence in itself, taken at its least miraculous, is a miracle.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: The existence of a majority logically implies a corresponding minority.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: The basic fact about human existence is not that it is a tragedy, but that it is a bore. It is not so much a war as an endless standing in line
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: No existence can be validly fulfilled if it is limited to itself.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: The continued existence of wildlife and wilderness is important to the quality of life of humans.
quotes.author: Jim Fowler

quotes.quote: Every moment of one's existence one is growing into more or retreating into less. One is always living a little more or dying a little bit.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: Existence always helps those who live in tune with their nature!
quotes.author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quotes.quote: It is impossible to imagine existence void of any intelligence.
quotes.author: Kedar Joshi

quotes.quote: If your existence does not make any difference, you are no more than a dead body.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: The whole secret of existence is to have no fear. Never fear what will become of you, depend on no one. Only the moment you reject all help are you freed.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Existence is the end of endless eternity without a beginning or an end.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: All that makes existence valuable to any one depends on the enforcement of restraints upon the actions of other people.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: The simplicity of existence is that it is. The complexity of existence is that it is not.
quotes.author: Réné Gaudette

quotes.quote: The existence of forgetting has never been proved: We only know that some things don't come to mind when we want them.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Existence is Identity, consciousness is identification.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The existence of a man is so small a thing to take, so mighty a thing to employ.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Existence must be asserted in the present if one does not want all life to be defined as an escape toward nothingness.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: You only exist because of the agreements you made with yourself and with the other humans around you.
quotes.author: José Luis Ruiz

quotes.quote: Existence is a mystery , and one should accept it as a mystery and not pretend to have any explanation .
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The rightful claim to dissent is an existential right of the individual.
quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quotes.quote: I'm trying to use the language of today to express a general existential crisis that I think the world and I are going through.
quotes.author: Sean Lennon

quotes.quote: I walk around feeling a sort of existential guilt all the time; and honestly for me this house is a way of feeling less guilty about the universe.
quotes.author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quotes.quote: There is something infantile in the presumption that somebody else has a responsibility to give your life meaning and point? The truly adult view, by contrast, is that our life is as meaningful, as full and as wonderful as we choose to make it.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: The proof that the little prince existed is that he was charming, that he laughed, and that he was looking for a sheep. If anybody wants a sheep, that is a proof that he exists.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: He was free, free in every way, free to behave like a fool or a machine, free to accept, free to refuse, free to equivocate; to marry, to give up the game, to drag this death weight about with him for years to come. He could do what he liked, no one had the right to advise him, there would be for him no Good or Evil unless he thought them into being.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Man is nothing else but what he makes of himself.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: You look up when you wish to be exalted. And I look down because I am exalted.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Man cannot endure his own littleness unless he can translate it into meaningfulness on the largest possible level.
quotes.author: Ernest Becker

quotes.quote: Human freedom involves our capacity to pause between the stimulus and response and, in that pause, to choose the one response toward which we wish to throw our weight. The capacity to create ourselves, based upon this freedom, is inseparable from consciousness or self-awareness
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: man is free, in so far as he has the power of contradicting himself and his essential nature. Man is free even from his freedom; that is, he can surrender his humanity.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: A freedom which is interested only in denying freedom must be denied. And it is not true that the recognition of the freedom of others limits my own freedom: to be free is not to have the power to do anything you like; it is to be able to surpass the given toward an open future; the existence of others as a freedom defines my situation and is even the condition of my own freedom. I am oppressed if I am thrown into prison, but not if I am kept from throwing my neighbor into prison.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Man is not what he believes himself to be in his conscious decisions
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: In the consciousness of the truth he has perceived, man now sees everywhere only the awfulness or the absurdity of existence and loathing seizes him.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Life begins on the other side of despair.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Dying is not romantic, and death is not a game which will soon be over.Guildenstern
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: You are free and that is why you are lost.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Regarding life, the wisest men of all ages have judged alike: it is worthless.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Remember that no man loses any other life than this which he now lives, nor lives any other than this which he now loses.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Sometimes people don't want to hear the truth because they don't want their illusions destroyed
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: As soon as there will exist for everyone a margin of real freedom beyond the production of life, Marxism will have lived out its span; a philosophy of freedom will take its place. But we have no means, no intellectual instrument, no concrete experience which allow us to conceive of this freedom or of this philosophy.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Be joyful, though you have considered all the facts.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Struggle is what it means to be alive and free.
quotes.author: David Budbill

quotes.quote: Maturity is achieved when a person accepts life as full of tension.
quotes.author: Joshua Loth Liebman

quotes.quote: No one can advise and help you, no one. There is only one way: go within. Rainer Maria Rilke
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: All human actions are equivalent and all are on principle doomed to failure.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: You are the music while the music lasts.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: We can regard our life as a uselessly disturbing episode in the blissful repose of nothingness.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: I saw that my life was a vast glowing empty page and I could do anything I wanted.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Life begins on the other side of despair.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: You have a choice. Live or die. Every breath is a choice. Every minute is a choice. To be or not to be.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: I saw that my life was a vast glowing empty page and I could do anything I wanted.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Everything has been figured out, except how to live.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Life should be lived on the edge of life.
quotes.author: Philippe Petit

quotes.quote: Life is a tale told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, signifying nothing.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Everything has been figured out, except how to live.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Man is condemned to be free; because once thrown into the world, he is responsible for everything he does.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: freedom only gives you something to be sorry for.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Seeking what is true is not seeking what is desirable.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: I want my name to mean me.
quotes.author: Mark Haddon

quotes.quote: If you don't know where you're going,any road will take you there.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Remember, no matter where you go, there you are.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Where there is injury let me sow pardon.
quotes.author: St. Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: Where there's life, there's hope.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: To choose not to choose is still a choice for which you alone are responsible.
quotes.author: Gary Cox

quotes.quote: I rebel therefore I exist.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Few men of action have been able to make a graceful exit at the appropriate time.
quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.quote: The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: He tries to find the exit from himself but there is no door.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: He who hesitates is not only lost, but miles from the next exit.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When my soul steps to exit this frame, I will be reincarnated as rain.
quotes.author: Eyedea

quotes.quote: I describe a world with no exit, convinced that God accompanies man throughout his history.
quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

quotes.quote: Whenever your well-being feels at risk around certain people, make a tactful and swift exit.
quotes.author: Judith Orloff

quotes.quote: The trick was looking past the illusion, because the exit was never as far away as it seemed.
quotes.author: Lauren DeStefano

quotes.quote: Sometimes it seems that to exit this world, they must go through my heart, leaving me scarred and sore.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Can't take a chance that one day, in one spot, somewhere, an exit might appear. We can't give up. Ever.
quotes.author: James Dashner

quotes.quote: Death is losing its terror. It is the emergency exit for a world that is becoming more frightening death ever was.
quotes.author: Julian Green

quotes.quote: If we can exit a relationship, pressure to reconcile lessens; if we must live with those who have wronged us, we are pushed to reconcile.
quotes.author: Miroslav Volf

quotes.quote: Divorce is a fire exit. When a house is burning, it doesn't matter who set the fire. If there is no fire exit, everyone in the house will be burned!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When swimming into a dark tunnel,there arrives a point of no return when you no longer have enough breath to double back.your choice is to swim forward into the unknown....and pray for an exit
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Death must simply become the discreet but dignified exit of a peaceful person from a helpful society that is not torn, not even overly upset by the idea of a biological transition without significance, without pain or suffering, and ultimately without fear.
quotes.author: Philippe Aries

quotes.quote: You can't talk your way out of a problem you behaved your way into!
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: The way out of fear isn't safety. It's freedom.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: Never abandon life. There is a way out of everything except death.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: My exit is the result of too many entrees.
quotes.author: Richard Monckton Milnes

quotes.quote: There is no exit from the circle of one's beliefs.
quotes.author: Keith Lehrer

quotes.quote: Exit is a letter away from Exist.A part, just a space away from Apart.
quotes.author: Noor Iskandar

quotes.quote: Change allows us to exit the comfortable and enter the improved.
quotes.author: David Cottrell

quotes.quote: When you are the invisible man to the head coach, the only option is to head for the exit
quotes.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quotes.quote: Act smarter than you are and always know where your exit is in case you get into too much trouble.
quotes.author: Vanilla Ice

quotes.quote: One never knows what life may have in store for us, and it's always good to know where the emergency exit is.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Reading is like travel, allowing you to exit your own life for a bit, and to come back with a renewed, even inspired, perspective.
quotes.author: Laurie A. Helgoe

quotes.quote: When you're ready to stop, stop. If you have presented all the facts and made the point you want to make, look for the nearest exit.
quotes.author: William Zinsser

quotes.quote: Always start at the end before you begin. Professional investors always have an exit strategy before they invest. Knowing your exit strategy is an important investment fundamental.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: When you become angry, you enter a tunnel, leaving the light behind you; when you get calm, you exit the tunnel, finding the light in front of you!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: We do on stage things that are supposed to happen off. Which is a kind of integrity, if you look on every exit as being an entrance somewhere else.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: You can memorize your way through a labyrinth if it is simple enough and you have the time and urge to escape. But the learning is of no use for the next time when the exit will be differently placed.
quotes.author: David R. Hawkins

quotes.quote: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The way out of trouble is never as simple as the way in.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.quote: As a musician usually music is your way out.
quotes.author: Damon Albarn

quotes.quote: Reading is the way out of ignorance, and the road to achievement.
quotes.author: Ben Carson

quotes.quote: There's always a way out. All you have to do is take it.
quotes.author: Julie Anne Peters

quotes.quote: Everyone knows that even the best exorcism has to be renewed once in a while.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah

quotes.quote: It's impossible to exorcise the darkness out of you. We can pretend it's not there until something bursts.
quotes.author: Arca

quotes.quote: Be careful, lest in casting out your demon you exorcise the best thing in you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Only after you've done the exorcism, then you'll understand that ghost's also a species.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Possession and exorcism is something that's in every religion and every culture. It's a real primal fear: Is the body a vessel for our spirits? What happens if something else takes over it? Where does the spirit go?
quotes.author: Eli Roth

quotes.quote: Quitting a job can be like an exorcism where you cast out a demon. The demon is the foreign spirit who occupies you through your occupation.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: An exorcism is tantamount to a miracle - an extraordinary intervention of God.
quotes.author: Gabriele Nanni

quotes.quote: By the power of Phil Collins, I rebuke you!
quotes.author: Grady Hendrix

quotes.quote: Performing an exorcism was like changing your oil. It's a drag, but necessary.
quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

quotes.quote: Humans have will. In an exorcism with a human, you are dealing with the human will, and whether that will is sufficiently resolved in terms of what allowed it to be manipulated. The will must have done something to surrender to the presence of the demon. You have to resurrect the moral authority of the person's will.
quotes.author: Bob Larson

quotes.quote: In account after account of exorcisms the demonic voices will propound nihilism of one variety or another.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: The ritual of exorcism is not practiced by an ordinary priest. An exorcist requires specific training and must be thought to have a personal sanctity. He can be exposed to dangerous behavior and personal threat. His prayers often cause a violent response as he attempts to shine a beam of light into the darkness.
quotes.author: Gabriele Amorth

quotes.quote: In exorcism, a verbal argument can never do anything. You can't ever beat the entity in a verbal argument because that's what he wants. It's only through a confront, a non-verbal confront, that anything happens. It has to be non-verbal.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Exorcists always need to distinguish demonic possessions from mental or psychiatric disorders, and they use three symptoms to identify people as possessed. First, those people have the ability to see hidden sacred objects, which they always want removed. Second, they have an extraordinary physical strength. And third, they show an aversion to the sacred.
quotes.author: Gerard Verschuuren

quotes.quote: One of the things people don't know about exorcism, is that you can't really use exorcism on things that are older than Christianity.
quotes.author: Dolores Ashcroft-Nowicki

quotes.quote: You can exorcise the demons of schizophrenics who perceive that there's something foreign inside them. But it's much harder with depressed people because we believe we are seeing the truth. But the truth lies.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: What we find exotic abroad may be what we hunger for in vain at home.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: The pursuit of exotic beauty in such a life would have been like having a ball of tinfoil in your stomach, all that airy metal filling you up with hunger.
quotes.author: Laura Kasischke

quotes.quote: An exotic and irrational entertainment, which has been always combated, and always has prevailed.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: For me exotic means beaches, palm trees and sand and frolicking in the ocean.
quotes.author: Priyanka Chopra

quotes.quote: An exotic birthplace on its own is not informative of anything.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: A mundane lie hiding an exotic truth is deception; an exotic lie hiding a mundane truth is storytelling. Deception may be necessary to preserve life, but storytelling makes life worth living.
quotes.author: Christopher Buehlman

quotes.quote: The exotic and the erotic ideals go hand in hand, and this fact also contributes another proof of a more or less obvious truth - that is, that a love of the exotic is usually an imaginative projection of a sexual desire.
quotes.author: Mario Praz

quotes.quote: Happiness is an exotic of celestial birth.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: Even the most distant and exotic place has its parallel in ordinary life.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: There is a sort of exotic preposterousness about a lot of elections, the way arguments are made even cruder.
quotes.author: Chris Patten

quotes.quote: We massively exaggerate the exotic risks we can least control and massively undervalue the mundane risks we can control.
quotes.author: David L. Katz

quotes.quote: Most exotic animals are not particularly interested in people, which makes it hard to provoke them. Human-rearing gets them used to and sometimes imprinted on humans, which makes them potentially dangerous.
quotes.author: Frans De Waal

quotes.quote: Don't go overboard with exotic or complex ways to paint. Stick to simple solutions, unless there is a good reason to do otherwise.
quotes.author: Richard Schmid

quotes.quote: One of the easiest forms of pretense to break down is the pretense of enthusiasm for exotic foods. Just bring on the exotic foods.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: Anyone who loves in the expectation of being loved in return is wasting their time.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: When you stop expecting people to be perfect, you can like them for who they are.
quotes.author: Donald Miller

quotes.quote: The quality of our expectations determines the quality of our action.
quotes.author: A. Godin

quotes.quote: High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: Peace begins When expectation ends.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: So the secret to good self-esteem is to lower your expectations to the point where they're already met?
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: A life that is burdened with expectations is a heavy life. Its fruit is sorrow and disappointment.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Expect everything so that nothing comes unexpected.
quotes.author: Norton Juster

quotes.quote: Unhappiness lies in that gap between our talents and our expectations.
quotes.author: Sebastian Horsley

quotes.quote: I'm not in this world to live up to your expectations and you're not in this world to live up to mine.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: You can't expect everyone to have the same dedication as you.
quotes.author: Jeff Kinney

quotes.quote: Expectations were like fine pottery. The harder you held them, the more likely they were to crack.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: That was the thing about the world: it wasn't that things were harder than you thought they were going to be, it was that they were hard in ways that you didn't expect.
quotes.author: Lev Grossman

quotes.quote: You don't ask nobody to give what they can't give, or be what they can't be. You've learnt that, you got a headstart on heartbreak.
quotes.author: Jack Farris

quotes.quote: Expectation is the mother of all frustration.
quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

quotes.quote: We must rediscover the distinction between hope and expectation.
quotes.author: Ivan Illich

quotes.quote: Carry out a random act of kindness, with no expectation of reward, safe in the knowledge that one day someone might do the same for you.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: We love to expect, and when expectation is either disappointed or gratified, we want to be again expecting.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: If you do not the expect the unexpected you will not find it, for it is not to be reached by search or trail.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: We find what we expect to find, and we receive what we ask for.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Good is not good, when better is expected.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: It's a funny thing about life: if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Anger always comes from frustrated expectations
quotes.author: Elliott Larson

quotes.quote: We must learn to reawaken and keep ourselves awake, not by mechanical aid, but by an infinite expectation of the dawn.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The best things in life are unexpected - because there were no expectations.
quotes.author: Eli Khamarov

quotes.quote: The expectations of life depend upon diligence; the mechanic that would perfect his work must first sharpen his tools.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Don't lower your expectations to meet your performance. Raise your level of performance to meet your expectations. Expect the best of yourself, and then do what is necessary to make it a reality.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: When we put down ideas of what life should be like, we are free to wholeheartedly say yes to our life as it is.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.quote: Do what you can with what you have where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The problem is not that there are problems. The problem is expecting otherwise and thinking that having problems is a problem.
quotes.author: Theodore Rubin

quotes.quote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: If we did the things we are capable of, we would astound ourselves.
quotes.author: Thomas Alva Edison

quotes.quote: Where there is love there are no demands, no expectations, no dependency. I do not demand that you make me happy; my happiness does not lie in you. If you were to leave me, I will not feel sorry for myself; I enjoy your company immensely, But I do not cli
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: Creating perfection will also create expectations for the future
quotes.author: Rick Helders

quotes.quote: Expect much from yourself and little from others and you will avoid incurring resentments.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The universe constantly and obediently answers to our conceptions; whether we travel fast or slow, the track is laid for us.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I did what I came here to do. What I've done I've done with sincerity and to the best of my ability. You can't expect much more from life.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Expect to have hope rekindled. Expect your prayers to be answered in wondrous ways. The dry seasons in life do not last. The spring rains will come again.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: Do everything with a mind that lets go. Do not expect praise or reward.
quotes.author: Achaan Chah

quotes.quote: You have to take risks.We will only understand the miracle of life fully when we allow the unexpected to happen.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in return. To just give. That takes courage, because we don't want to fall on our faces or leave ourselves open to hurt.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: Every human being is entitled to courtesy and consideration. Constructive criticism is not only to be expected but sought.
quotes.author: Margaret Chase Smith

quotes.quote: If you align expectations with reality, you will never be disappointed.
quotes.author: Terrell Owens

quotes.quote: You can't base your life on other people's expectations.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: Whatever happens in the world is real, what one thinks should have happened is projection. We suffer more from our fictitious illusion and expectations of reality.
quotes.author: Jacque Fresco

quotes.quote: We don't want people to have expectations of us, but then we have expectations of everybody else.
quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

quotes.quote: There's a victory in letting go of your expectations.
quotes.author: Mike White

quotes.quote: Our expectations are our standards imposed upon someone else.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: Expectations manifest when we impose our standards on the people around us. We often do this with good intentions—we genuinely believe that the person should adopt what we believe because it's a better standard compared to theirs.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: Expectations almost always carry the concept of 'should' in our minds, which brings with it furious thoughts of unfairness and indignation.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: Without expectations, we see someone for who they are— in all their flawed imperfection—without judgment.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: Expectations lead to resentment and resentment always leads to judgment.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: A man who lives with expectations is bound to feel frustrated because existence has no obligation to you. But if you live without intentions, without expectations, then miraculously you will find that everything you ever dreamed of is being fulfilled.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The real thing is that you are suffering from your expectations. When they are not fulfilled-frustration arises, failure arises, and you feel neglected as if existence does not care for you.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: High expectations can lead to great disappointments.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Expectations have so long and so often been combated by disappointment that I feel myself unhappy, my spirits which were naturally cheerful are depressed and the enjoyments of life are growing very insipid to me.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: One month of daily expectation is more tedious than a year of certainty.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: I indicated no wish or purpose of my own;I simply expressed my expectation. Cannot the judge perceive the distinction between a purpose and an expectation? I have often expressed an expectation to die but I have never expressed a wish to die.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Remaining trapped in the world of preferences we are led to an expectation of how things should be. When our expectation of how things should be conflicts with how things are, there is dukkha, suffering.
quotes.author: Mu Soeng

quotes.quote: Soldiers! Your country has a right to expect great things from you. Justify her expectations!...All, when they return home, would wish to say proudly, 'I was with the victorious Army of Italy.'
quotes.author: Napoleon

quotes.quote: In meditation, don't expect anything. Just sit back and see what happens. Treat the whole thing as an experiment. Take an active interest in the test itself, but don't get distracted by your expectations about the results. For that matter, don't be anxious for any result whatsoever.
quotes.author: Bhante Henepola Gunaratana

quotes.quote: Your life is colored by your expectations.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: You don't like being rejected, but your expectations were minimum and your patience maximum.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: Victory in a great cause is measured not only by reaching the final goal. It is also a triumph to live up to expectations in your lifetime.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: If our expectations—if our fondest prayers and dreams— are not realized, then we should all bear in mind that the greatest glory of living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time you fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The knowledge that in your day you did your duty, and lived up to the expectations of your fellow men is in itself a rewarding experience and magnificent achievement.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Make the expectations lively enough, and action will follow.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: It was only when you started to insatiably expect; / that every stranger on the street would wholeheartedly smile; / altruistically enshroud each dreary aspect of your beleaguered existence with unprecedented happiness, / That it terribly hurt you; when he unsparingly abused you; / excoriating you apart like inconspicuously frigid shit; / for ostensibly no reason or plausible rhyme; instead.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: If you spent your life concentrating on what everyone else thought of you, would you forget who you really were? What if the face you showed the world turned out to be a mask... with nothing beneath it?
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Treat a man as he is and he will remain as he is. Treat a man as he can and should be and he will become as he can and should be.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: To wish was to hope, and to hope was to expect.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: What I have since realized is that if people expect you to be brave, sometimes you pretend that you are, even when you are frightened down to your very bones.
quotes.author: Sharon Creech

quotes.quote: There were two ways to be happy: improve your reality or lower your expectations.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: A wonderful gift may not be wrapped as you expect.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: I hope you do not let anyone else’s expectations direct the course of your life.
quotes.author: Julianne Donaldson

quotes.quote: I'd rather be pleasantly surprised than fatally disappointed.
quotes.author: Julia Glass

quotes.quote: Expectation wasn't just about what people expected of you. It was about what you expected of yourself.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: Making a decision to have a child—t's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stone

quotes.quote: Before you were born I carried you under my heart. From the moment you arrived in this world until the moment I leave it, I will always carry you in my heart.
quotes.author: Mandy Harrison

quotes.quote: A new baby is like the beginning of all things—wonder, hope, a dream of possibilities.
quotes.author: Eda J. Le Shan

quotes.quote: A mother's joy begins when new life is stirring inside...when a tiny heartbeat is heard for the very first time, and a playful kick reminds her that she is never alone.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life is tough enough without having someone kick you from the inside.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Now my belly is as noble as my heart.
quotes.author: Gabriela Mistral

quotes.quote: I begin to love this creature, and to anticipate her birth as a fresh twist to a knot, which I do not wish to untie
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: A baby is an inestimable blessing.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Feeling fat lasts nine months but the joy of becoming a mom lasts forever.
quotes.author: Nikki Dalton

quotes.quote: You never understand life until it grows inside of you.
quotes.author: Sandra C. Kassis

quotes.quote: Babies are always more trouble than you thought - and more wonderful.
quotes.author: Charles Osgood

quotes.quote: It was the tiniest thing I ever decided to put my whole life into.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: There is such a special sweetness in being able to participate in creation.
quotes.author: Pamela S. Nadav

quotes.quote: Happiness is on the way.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Baby in the tummy, it's all up to mommy. But once the baby's had, it's bragging rights for Dad.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Honey is sweet. A little baby is even sweeter.
quotes.author: Asian saying

quotes.quote: You are the closest I will ever come to magic.
quotes.author: Suzanne Finnamore

quotes.quote: A grand adventure is about to begin.
quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh

quotes.quote: For now in mommy's tummy...Forever in her heart...
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A baby is God’s opinion that life should go on.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: A baby is something you carry inside you for nine months, in your arms for three years and in your heart till the day you die.
quotes.author: Mary Mason

quotes.quote: A baby will make love stronger, days shorter, nights longer, bankroll smaller, home happier, clothes shabbier, the past forgotten, and the future worth living for.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A mother is always the beginning. She is how things begin.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: A woman has two smiles that an angel might envy, the smile that accepts a lover before words are uttered, and the smile that lights on the first born baby, and assures it of a mother’s love.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: Absolutely. It is the most powerful creation for you to be able have life growing inside of you. There is no bigger gift, nothing more empowering.
quotes.author: Beyoncé

quotes.quote: All the time we wondered and wondered, who is this person coming, growing, turning, floating, and swimming deep, deep inside.
quotes.author: Crescent Dragonwagon

quotes.quote: An angel in the book of life wrote down my baby’s birth. Then whispered as she closed the book, “too beautiful for earth”.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Babies are bits of star-dust blown from the hand of God. Lucky is the woman who knows the pangs of birth for she has held a star.
quotes.author: Larry Barretto

quotes.quote: Before you were conceived I wanted you. Before you were born I loved you. Before you were here an hour I would die for you. This is the miracle of Mother’s Love.
quotes.author: Maureen Hawkins

quotes.quote: Birth is not only about making babies. Birth is about making mothers… strong, competent, capable mothers who trust themselves and know their inner strength.
quotes.author: Barbara Katz Rothman

quotes.quote: Birth takes a woman’s deepest fears about herself and shows her that she is stronger than them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Birthing is the most profound initiation to spirituality a woman can have.
quotes.author: Robin Lim

quotes.quote: Even when freshly washed and relieved of all obvious confections, children tend to be sticky.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Every child born into the world is a new thought of God, an ever-fresh and radiant possibility.
quotes.author: Kate Douglas Wiggin

quotes.quote: Everything grows rounder and wider and weirder, and I sit here in the middle of it all and wonder who in the world you will turn out to be.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.quote: Getting a burp out of your little thing is probably the greatest satisfaction I've come across. It's truly one of life's most satisfying moments.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.quote: Giving birth and being born brings us into the essence of creation, where the human spirit is courageous and bold and the body, a miracle of wisdom.
quotes.author: Harriette Hartigan

quotes.quote: Having a baby changes the way you view your in-laws. I love it when they come to visit now. They can hold the baby and I can go out.
quotes.author: Matthew Broderick

quotes.quote: Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.
quotes.author: Taylor Hanson

quotes.quote: Having kids—the responsibility of rearing good, kind, ethical, responsible human beings—is the biggest job anyone can embark on.
quotes.author: Maria Shriver

quotes.quote: I am going to send an angel in front of you, to guard you on the way and to bring you to the place that you have prepared.
quotes.author: Exodus 23: 20

quotes.quote: I believe the choice to become a mother is the choice to become one of the greatest spiritual teachers there is.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I loved you from the very start, you stole my breath, embraced my heart. Our life together has just begun, you’re part of me, my little one.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If I had my life to live over, instead of wishing away nine months of pregnancy, I’d have cherished every moment and realized that the wonderment growing inside me was the only chance in life to assist God in a miracle.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: In giving birth to our babies, we may find that we give birth to new possibilities within ourselves.
quotes.author: Myla and Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Life is always a rich and steady time when you are waiting for something to happen or to hatch.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: Loving a baby is a circular business, a kind of feedback loop. The more you give the more you get and the more you get the more you feel like giving.
quotes.author: Penelope Leach

quotes.quote: Motherhood is the biggest gamble in the world. It is the glorious life force. It’s huge and scary—it’s an act of infinite optimism.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: No influence is so powerful as that of the mother.
quotes.author: Sarah Josepha Hale

quotes.quote: One definition of insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a kind of miracle. Especially so in that, it proves that a man and woman can conspire to force God to create a new soul.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: Sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart.
quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh

quotes.quote: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The natural state of motherhood is unselfishness. When you become a mother, you are no longer the center of your own universe. You relinquish that position to your children.
quotes.author: Jessica Lange

quotes.quote: The pain you have been feeling can’t compare to the joy that's coming.
quotes.author: Romans 8: 18

quotes.quote: To be pregnant is to be vitally alive, thoroughly woman, and distressingly inhabited. Soul and spirit are stretched – along with body – making pregnancy a time of transition, growth, and profound beginnings.
quotes.author: Anne Christian Buchanan

quotes.quote: We have a secret in our culture, and it’s not that birth is painful. It’s that women are strong.
quotes.author: Laura Stavoe Harm

quotes.quote: Whether your pregnancy was meticulously planned, medically coaxed, or happened by surprise, one thing is certain – your life will never be the same.
quotes.author: Catherine Jones

quotes.quote: With every newborn baby, a little sun rises.
quotes.author: Irmgard Erath

quotes.quote: Our expenses are all for conformity.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Even though work stops, expenses run on.
quotes.author: Cato

quotes.quote: Rich gets richer with the expenses of the poorest.
quotes.author: Pradeepa Pandiyan

quotes.quote: Love is an ocean of emotions entirely surrounded by expenses.
quotes.author: Thomas Dewar

quotes.quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Waste of time is the most extravagant and costly of all expenses.
quotes.author: Theophrastus

quotes.quote: It's through our expenses that we become richer or poorer, regardless of how much money we make.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: A wealthy mindset minimizes expenses in self-entertainment and maximizes investments in self-education.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: It's more important to grow your income than cut your expenses. It's more important to grow your spirit that cut your dreams.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: The expenses required to prevent a war are much lighter than those that will, if not prevented, be absolutely necessary to maintain it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Budget thy expenses that thou mayest have coins to pay for thy necessities, to pay for thy enjoyments, and to gratify thy worthwhile desires without spending more than nine-tenths of thy earnings.
quotes.author: George Samuel Clason

quotes.quote: Spare no expense to make everything as economical as possible.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Households and businesses cut expenses every day. Passing a financial down payment alongside the debt limit sends the right message to the public, and gives members of Congress greater comfort, or cover, depending on your perspective.
quotes.author: John Sununu

quotes.quote: Look everywhere you can to cut a little bit from your expenses. It will all add up to a meaningful sum.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Know the difference between your necessary and discretionary expenses.
quotes.author: Alexa Von Tobel

quotes.quote: A man is rich whose income is larger than his expenses, and he is poor if his expenses are greater than his income.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Control your expenses better than your competition. This is where you can always find the competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: A stumble may prevent a fall.
quotes.author: English (on experience)

quotes.quote: After crosses and losses, men grow humbler and wiser.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: All experience is education for the soul.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: An old ox makes a straight furrow.
quotes.author: Spanish (on experience)

quotes.quote: By crawling, a child learns to stand.
quotes.author: Hausa (West African) (on experience)

quotes.quote: Experience is the best teacher.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: Experience is the mother of wisdom.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Experience teaches slowly and at the cost of mistakes.
quotes.author: James Anthony Froude

quotes.quote: If you are not a fish, how can you tell if the fish are happy?
quotes.author: Chinese (on experience)

quotes.quote: If youth knew, if age could.
quotes.author: Henri Estienne

quotes.quote: If you've never run aground, you've never been anywhere!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is foolish to try to imitate the skills of others.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: It pays to be prepared.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: It takes a heap of licks to hit a nail in the dark.
quotes.author: African American (on common sense)

quotes.quote: Learn from other peoples mistakes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Learn from your mistakes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Learning is best when put into practice.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely.
quotes.author: Auguste Rodin

quotes.quote: Only the sufferers know how their bellies ache.
quotes.author: Burmese (on experience)

quotes.quote: The buyer needs a hundred eyes, the seller but one.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The early bird catches the worm.
quotes.author: William Camden

quotes.quote: The grand instructor, time.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The most exquisite folly is made of wisdom spun too fine.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The person with burnt fingers asks for tongs.
quotes.author: Samoan (on experience)

quotes.quote: The years teach much which the days never know.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Well begun is half done.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: You cannot put an old head on young shoulders.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Everything we do is sowing, and all of our experiences are harvests.
quotes.author: Khemetic Saying

quotes.quote: I hear and I forget, I see and I remember, I do and I understand.
quotes.author: Kongfuzi

quotes.quote: To know the road ahead, ask those coming back.
quotes.author: Chinese Saying

quotes.quote: Practice is the supreme teacher.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: As the eye needs light to see, so the soul needs labor to comprehend.
quotes.author: Philo of Alexandria

quotes.quote: If you have not lived through something, it is not true,
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: We are usually convinced more easily by reasons we have found ourselves than by those which have occurred to others.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Knowledge of the world is only to be acquired in the world, and not in the closet.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: When the bird and the book disagree, always believe the bird.
quotes.author: John James Audubon

quotes.quote: Never give up what you have seen for what you have heard.
quotes.author: Swahili Saying

quotes.quote: The years teach much what the days never know.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There are many truths of which the full meaning cannot be realized until personal experience has brought it home.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: Experience is a grindstone and it is lucky for us if we get brightened by it— not ground.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: An ounce of application is worth a ton of abstraction.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Knowledge can only be got in one way, the way of experience. There is no other way to know.
quotes.author: Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Experience is a dim lamp which only lights the one who bears it.
quotes.author: Louis Celine

quotes.quote: Experience is not what happens to a man; it is what he does with what happens to him.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Experience teaches only the teachable.
quotes.author: Huxley

quotes.quote: We learn the rope of life by untying the knots.
quotes.author: Jean Toomer

quotes.quote: You cannot acquire experience by making experiments. You cannot create experience. You must undergo it.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lessons afterward.
quotes.author: Vernon Law

quotes.quote: The best lessons, the best sermons, are those that are lived.
quotes.author: Yolanda King

quotes.quote: Nothing has happened to you unless you make much of it.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: Each man can interpret another's experience only by his own.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: Practical wisdom is only to be learned in the school of experience.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: With the ancient is wisdom, and in length of days understanding.
quotes.author: Job 12:12

quotes.quote: Experience is the best of schoolmasters, only the school fees are heavy.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: The light which experience gives is a lantern on the stern, which shines only on the waves behind us.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: We shall have to learn to refrain from doing things merely because we know how to do them.
quotes.author: Theodore Fox

quotes.quote: I was told by a very smart man a long time ago that talent always beats experience. Because by the time you get experience, the talent's gone.
quotes.author: Pat Corrales

quotes.quote: The pilgrims didn't have any experience when they first arrived here. Hell, if experience was that important, we'd never have had anybody walking on the moon.
quotes.author: Doug Rader

quotes.quote: Ask the experienced rather than the learned.
quotes.author: Arab Saying

quotes.quote: The tongue of experience has the most truth.
quotes.author: Arab Sayings

quotes.quote: The ground I have already passed over enables me to see my way into that which is before me.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: But all theory must lead to experience, and every constitution has its own laws.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Forty years of experience in government is worth a century of book-reading.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The broader one's understanding of the human experience, the better design we will have.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Experiment is the sole source of truth. It alone can teach us something new; it alone can give us certainty.
quotes.author: Henri Poincaré

quotes.quote: Experiment has a stimulus which withers its fear.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Experiments are mediators between nature and idea.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Experiment is folly when experience shows the way.
quotes.author: Roger Babson

quotes.quote: Experiment is the sole interpreter of the artifices of Nature.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Experiment is the expected failure to deliberately learn something.
quotes.author: Scott Berkun

quotes.quote: If your experiment needs statistics, you ought to have done a better experiment.
quotes.author: Ernest Rutherford

quotes.quote: Every experiment, by multitudes or by individuals, that has a sensual and selfish aim, will fail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Experiment is the only means of knowledge at our disposal. Everything else is poetry, imagination.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.quote: Experiments that crash atoms together could start a chain reaction that erodes everything on Earth.
quotes.author: Martin Rees

quotes.quote: Experiment is actually doing the art. That's the experiment and then you get to experience the experiment.
quotes.author: Robert Glasper

quotes.quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Life is an experiment in which you may fail or succeed. Explore more, expect least.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a failed experiment, only experiments with unexpected outcomes.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: You have a right to experiment with your life. You will make mistakes. And they are right too.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.quote: The value of experimentation is not the trying. It's the trying again after the experiment fails.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Every great inspiration is but an experiment - though every experiment we know, is not a great inspiration.
quotes.author: Charles Ives

quotes.quote: Life is an experiment, experiment by sending as many ideas in the universe and see which idea takes off and put your heart into that.
quotes.author: Matthew Donnelly

quotes.quote: What most experimenters take for granted before they begin their experiments is infinitely more interesting than any results to which their experiments lead.
quotes.author: Norbert Wiener

quotes.quote: Experiment is the mother of knowledge.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: Unperformed experiments have no results.
quotes.author: Asher Peres

quotes.quote: The test of all knowledge is experiment.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: An experiment disproving a prediction is discovery.
quotes.author: Enrico Fermi

quotes.quote: Experiment is fundamentally only induced observation.
quotes.author: Claude Bernard

quotes.quote: An experiment not worth doing is not worth doing well.
quotes.author: Peter Medawar

quotes.quote: Experiment is the sole judge of the validity of any idea.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: A failed experiment can be more important than a trivial design.
quotes.author: Verner Panton

quotes.quote: No experiment is ever a complete failure. It can always be used as a bad example.
quotes.author: Paul Dickson

quotes.quote: Every experiment destroys some of the knowledge of the system which was obtained by previous experiments.
quotes.author: Werner Heisenberg

quotes.quote: Be Shameless. Experiment. This is the only way to identify your true passion.
quotes.author: Vishwas Mudagal

quotes.quote: The test of all knowledge is experiment. Experiment is the sole judge of scientific truth.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: A theory can be proved by experiment; but no path leads from experiment to the birth of a theory.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you call failures experiments, you can put them in your resume and claim them as achievements.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The willingness to experiment with change may be the most essential ingredient to success at anything.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: You have to experiment and that's gonna help your confidence so much when you step out and try things.
quotes.author: Zendaya

quotes.quote: An experiment is a question which science poses to Nature, and a measurement is the recording of Nature's answer.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.quote: Physiological experiment on animals is justifiable for real investigation, but not for mere damnable and detestable curiosity.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: To live you have to experiment, to have the ability to experiment you have to have confidence, to have confidence you have to be loved, to be loved you have to love.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.quote: No experiment can be more interesting than that we are now trying, and which we trust will end in establishing the fact, that man may be governed by reason and truth.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The ultimate arbiter of truth is experiment, not the comfort one derives from one's a priori beliefs, nor the beauty or elegance one ascribes to one's theoretical models.
quotes.author: Lawrence M. Krauss

quotes.quote: Thought experiment is in any case a necessary precondition for physical experiment. Every experimenter and inventor must have the planned arrangement in his head before translating it into fact.
quotes.author: Ernst Mach

quotes.quote: Any experiment of interest in life will be carried out at your own expense.
quotes.author: John Wilmot

quotes.quote: Have lots of experiments, but make sure they're strategically focused.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: Every joke is an experiment. When you sit, alone, and write a script, or just a joke, you really have no idea if it will succeed.
quotes.author: Judd Apatow

quotes.quote: Experiments work when, and only when, they call into action cognitive capacities that might reliably deliver the conclusions drawn.
quotes.author: Philip Kitcher

quotes.quote: The problem with experiments has always been that human beings make the decisions on whether or not the animals have benefitted from the treatment.
quotes.author: James Randi

quotes.quote: It is important to experiment and endlessly seek after creating the best possible flavors when preparing foods. That means not being afraid to experiment with various ingredients.
quotes.author: Rocco DiSpirito

quotes.quote: Don'tÂ explainÂ why it works;Â explainÂ how you use it.
quotes.author: Steven Brust

quotes.quote: Never explain what you do. It speaks for itself. You only muddle it by talking about it.
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.quote: You can't truthfullyÂ explainÂ your smallest action without fully revealing your character.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The more youÂ explainÂ it, the more I don't understand it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Never apologize. NeverÂ explain. Just get the thing done, and let them howl.
quotes.author: Agnes Macphail

quotes.quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It's easier toÂ explainÂ price once than to apologize for quality forever.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: For when any oneÂ explainsÂ himself guardedly, nothing is more uncivil than to put a new question.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Don'tÂ explainÂ your philosophy. Embody it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: You can'tÂ explainÂ the unknown in terms of the incomprehensible.
quotes.author: Theodore Schick

quotes.quote: It's just not easy to explain to someone else what you don't understand yourself.
quotes.author: Wislawa Szymborska

quotes.quote: If you can'tÂ explainÂ something in a few words, try fewer.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Never explain - your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Never complain and never explain.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: When youÂ explainÂ to people what you're trying to do, as opposed to just making demands or delegating tasks, you can build instant trust, even if it's just for that short time you're on the phone.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: The hardest thing to explain is the glaringly evident which everybody had decided not to see.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The desire toÂ explainÂ what is simple by what is complex, what is easy by what is difficult, is a calamity.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: I believe that there will be ultimately be a clash between the oppressed and those who do the oppressing. I believe that there will be a clash between those who want freedom, justice and equality for everyone and those who want to continue the system of exploitation. I believe that there will be that kind of clash, but I don't think it will be based on the color of the skin.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Undocumented aliens unfortunately are not protected by the law, and they are tremendously subjected to exploitation. The result is that they would be willing to work for a wage that no person who is welcome in our shores would take.
quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.quote: The kings of Spain brought us the conquistadores and masters, whose footprints remained in the circular land grants assigned to those searching for gold in the sands of rivers, an abusive and shameful form of exploitation, traces of which can be noted from the air in many places around the country.
quotes.author: Fidel Castro

quotes.quote: All of us have been trained by education and environment to seek personal gain and security and to fight for ourselves. Though we cover it over with pleasant phrases, we have been educated for various professions within a system which is based on exploitation and acquisitive fear.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Africa shares with Asia a common background of colonialism, of exploitation, of discrimination, of oppression. At Bandung, African and Asian States dedicated themselves to the liberation of their two continents from foreign domination and affirmed the right of all nations to develop in their own way, free of any external interference.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.quote: Innocence is thought charming because it offers delightful possibilities for exploitation.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Racial discrimination, South Africa's economic power, its oppression and exploitation of all the black peoples, are part and parcel of the same thing.
quotes.author: Oliver Tambo

quotes.quote: When knowledge is limited - it leads to folly... When knowledge exceeds a certain limit, it leads to exploitation.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.quote: The essential relationship across American history between black people and white people is one of exploitation and one of plunder. This is not, you know, necessarily about, you know, whether you're a good person or not or whether you see black people, you know, on the street, and you're willing to shake their hands and be polite.
quotes.author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

quotes.quote: If we are concerned about the exploitation of human workers in countries with low standards of worker protection, we should also be concerned about the treatment of even more defenceless non-human animals.
quotes.author: Peter Singer

quotes.quote: Only by observing the laws of nature can mankind avoid costly blunders in its exploitation. Any harm we inflict on nature will eventually return to haunt us. This is a reality we have to face.
quotes.author: Xi Jinping

quotes.quote: The mother's battle for her child with sickness, with poverty, with war, with all the forces of exploitation and callousness that cheapen human life needs to become a common human battle, waged in love and in the passion for survival.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: Unfair and deceptive business practices have been illegal in most states for decades. Yet traffickers routinely use what appear to be legitimate businesses - massage parlors, bars, nail salons - as fronts for their illegal exploitation. It's the ultimate business scam.
quotes.author: Josh Hawley

quotes.quote: A common danger tends to concord. Communism is the exploitation of the strong by the weak. In Communism, inequality comes from placing mediocrity on a level with excellence.
quotes.author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon

quotes.quote: labor in the export industry, we are also eliminating their labour from the informal sector, which is more invisible to public scrutiny - and thus leaves the children more open to abuse and exploitation.
quotes.author: Carol Bellamy

quotes.quote: It's not difficult in South Africa for the ordinary person to see the link between capitalism and racist exploitation, and when one sees the link one immediately thinks in terms of a socialist alternative.
quotes.author: Joe Slovo

quotes.quote: When it comes to gang-based child exploitation, it is self-evident to anyone who cares to look that if you look at all the recent high-profile cases, there is a high proportion of men that are of Pakistani heritage.
quotes.author: Sajid Javid

quotes.quote: In the late '90s, I spent a lot of time on reservations, and there was a level of poverty and injustice that I had not witnessed before. I was shocked by it. This is federally controlled land, and there was an insidious mix of apathy and exploitation.
quotes.author: Taylor Sheridan

quotes.quote: People who exploit others come to spend an enormous amount of energy wondering about and justifying that exploitation.
quotes.author: Mary Beard

quotes.quote: Products made in China are cheap through the exploitation of the workforce. Every time we shop, we are driving the nail further into the coffin of American manufacturing jobs.
quotes.author: Joe Baca

quotes.quote: Protecting children at risk of exploitation will always be a priority, and at the other end, safeguarding an ageing population brings its own challenges.
quotes.author: Amber Rudd

quotes.quote: Over the past year, several cases of human rights abuses, specifically sexual exploitation and abuse, by individuals involved in U.N. peacekeeping operations have raised the suspicions of many Members of Congress and members of the International Relations Committee.
quotes.author: Michael McCaul

quotes.quote: The Singaporean government, which represents legal migrant workers in employment disputes and claims of exploitation, requires that they stay in the country until the disputes are settled. If they leave, their claims are closed.
quotes.author: Alan Huffman

quotes.quote: America does not want vulgarity and sexual exploitation to be our values and we do not want the world to think those are our standards. We want to be a better nation and a better people, with better standards.
quotes.author: Charles W. Pickering

quotes.quote: The sexual abuse and exploitation of children is one of the most vicious crimes conceivable, a violation of mankind's most basic duty to protect the innocent.
quotes.author: James T. Walsh

quotes.quote: If we created a society based on love, it would be a society without exploitation.
quotes.author: Boots Riley

quotes.quote: The Soviet Union used the exploitation of workers under capitalism as an agitational issue to subvert Western democracies even as it practiced slave labor at home.
quotes.author: Robert Zubrin

quotes.quote: Whenever people with money have power over people with less money, you have the potential for exploitation.
quotes.author: Jennifer Weiner

quotes.quote: In my view, there is nothing more vicious and outrageous than the abuse, exploitation and harm of the most vulnerable members of our society, and I firmly believe that our nation's laws and resources need to reflect the seriousness of these terrible crimes.
quotes.author: Bob Ney

quotes.quote: Public protests against globalization - protests that occur by and large in the prosperous West - denounce free trade and the mobility of capital as instruments of exploitation and oppression.
quotes.author: Thomas Woods

quotes.quote: We shall not cease from exploration, and the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Exploration of space is worth it because humans need to explore. Knowledge is always good, and it's a really cool thing to see.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.quote: Success is an act of exploration. That means the first thing you have to find is the unknown. Learning is searching; anything else is just waiting.
quotes.author: Dale Dauten

quotes.quote: Exploration, of course, is going to new places, but I don't think we go to new places just solely to say: well, we've been there, and come back, interesting though it may be. To me, each time we go farther into space we should use that to do basic research basic research that can't be done before you go there.
quotes.author: John Glenn

quotes.quote: Exploration is really the essence of the human spirit.
quotes.author: Frank Borman

quotes.quote: Adventure is allowing the unexpected to happen to you. Exploration is experiencing what you have not experienced before. How can there be any adventure, any exploration, if you let somebody else above all, a travel bureau arrange everything before-hand?
quotes.author: Richard Aldington

quotes.quote: Speculation and the exploration of ideas beyond what we know with certainty are what lead to progress.
quotes.author: Lisa Randall

quotes.quote: Exploration is what you do when you don't know what you're doing. That's what scientists do every day. If a scientist already knew what they were doing, they wouldn't be discovering anything, because they already knew what they were doing.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Nothing is so dangerous to the progress of the human mind than to assume that our views of science are ultimate, that there are no mysteries in nature, that our triumphs are complete and that there are no new worlds to conquer.
quotes.author: Humphry Davy

quotes.quote: Exploration is in our nature. We began as wanderers, and we are wanderers still. We have lingered long enough on the shores of the cosmic ocean. We are ready at last to set sail for the stars.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: The future author is one who discovers that language, the exploration and manipulation of the resources of language, will serve him in winning through to his way.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: That is the exploration that awaits you! Not mapping stars and studying nebula, but charting the unknown possibilities of existence.
quotes.author: Leonard Nimoy

quotes.quote: In wisdom gathered over time I have found that every experience is a form of exploration.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Not all who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J R R Tolkien

quotes.quote: The exploration of space will go ahead, whether we join in it or not, and it is one of the great adventures of all time, and no nation which expects to be the leader of other nations can expect to stay behind in this race for space.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures that we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the essence of human existence and exploration has been part of humankind for a long time. The exploration of space, like the exploration of life, if you will, is a risk. We've got to be willing to take it.
quotes.author: Gene Cernan

quotes.quote: We live in an age of universal investigation, and of exploration of the sources of all movements.
quotes.author: Alfred de Vigny

quotes.quote: The future is in the hands of those who explore and from all the beauty they discover while crossing perpetually receding frontiers, they develop for nature and for humankind an infinite love.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: We must go beyond textbooks, go out into the bypaths and untrodden depths of the wilderness and travel and explore and tell the world the glories of our journey.
quotes.author: John Hope Franklin

quotes.quote: Exploring is delightful to look forward to and back upon, but it is not comfortable at the time, unless it be of such an easy nature as not to deserve the name.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Exploration really is the essence of the human spirit, and to pause, to falter, to turn our back on the quest for knowledge, is to perish.
quotes.author: Frank Borman

quotes.quote: All art is a kind of exploring. To discover and reveal is the way every artist sets about his business.
quotes.author: Robert Flaherty

quotes.quote: Exploration is a wonderful way to open our eyes to the world, and to truly see that impossible is just a word.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Exploration was for those with a measure of peasant blood, those with big thighs and thick ankles who could take punishment as they took bread and salt, on every inch of flesh and spirit.
quotes.author: F Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The free exploring mind of the individual human is the most valuable thing in the world.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Exploration is wired into our brains. If we can see the horizon, we want to know what's beyond.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: The exploration of oneself is usually also an exploration of the world at large, of other writers, a process of comparison with oneself with others, discoveries of kinships, gradual illumination of one's own potentialities.
quotes.author: Colin Wilson

quotes.quote: Many say exploration is part of our destiny, but it's actually our duty to future generations and their quest to ensure the survival of the human species.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: Exploration is the engine that drives innovation. Innovation drives economic growth. So let's all go exploring.
quotes.author: Edith Widder

quotes.quote: Exploration of the natural world begins in early childhood, flourishes in middle childhood, and continues in adolescence as a pleasure and a source of strength for social action.
quotes.author: David Sobel

quotes.quote: Exploration is a quite legitimate purpose for a journey. You have the opportunity to learn the territories of the Upper and Lower Worlds and their assets, which you can employ as needed in the future.
quotes.author: Sandra Harner

quotes.quote: Adventure is allowing the unexpected to happen to you. Exploration is experiencing what you have not experienced before. How can there be any adventure, any exploration, if you let somebody else - above all, a travel bureau - arrange everything before-hand?
quotes.author: Richard Aldington

quotes.quote: I have to recognize the elements of exploration that excite people. It's not only the discoveries and the beautiful photos that come down from the heavens; it's the vicarious participation in discovery itself.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Travel means the consciousness of adventure and exploration, the sense of covering the miles, the ability to seize indefatigably upon every new or familiar source of delight.
quotes.author: Richard Aldington

quotes.quote: A fair prospect indeed, and an unforgettable moment when one comes for the first time to the crest of a hill and looks over an unknown country shimmering in the sun with the white coiling English lanes inviting exploration.
quotes.author: Richard Aldington

quotes.quote: Exploration is experiencing what you have not experienced before.
quotes.author: Richard Aldington

quotes.quote: It was hunger that drove us to exploration. And it took a depression to teach us the real value of a job.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Exploration! Exploring the past! We students in the camps seminar considered ourselves radical explorers. We tore open the windows and let in the air, the wind that finally whirled away the dust that society had permitted to settle over the horrors of the past.
quotes.author: Bernhard Schlink

quotes.quote: Watching and listening and recording were our contributions to the exploration of history.
quotes.author: Bernhard Schlink

quotes.quote: Every new city or country or continent that I visit is a beautiful exploration from which I can learn.
quotes.author: Andrea Michaels

quotes.quote: In mountaineering and exploration, efficiency does not depend on the amassing of material and manpower so much as the power to improvise plans at a moment's notice.
quotes.author: Frank S. Smythe

quotes.quote: Periods of positive emotion and unhindered exploration are when you see the possibilities for how your past experiences fit into your future life, when you begin to develop skills that blossom into useful talents later on, and when you spark the urge for further exploration and adventure.
quotes.author: Aberdin Louis

quotes.quote: The happiness that promoted the exploration and creation of new skills has long since ended, but the skills themselves live on.
quotes.author: Aberdin Louis

quotes.quote: As every student of exploration knows, the prize goes not to the explorer who first sets foot upon the virgin soil but to the one who gets that foot home first. If it is still attached to his leg this is a bonus.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Exploration is about seeing things with your own eyes.
quotes.author: Rick Berman

quotes.quote: Exploration is a dirty game.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah
