quotes.quote: Life is devoted to exploration and deep-sea research work.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah

quotes.quote: In the right frame of mind, to walk from one room in a house to another can be exploration of the highest order. To a child a back garden can be an unknown country.
quotes.author: Robert Macfarlane

quotes.quote: Exploration and experimentation of new ways of being, in isolation, does not support change.
quotes.author: Pamela McLean

quotes.quote: Space may seem like the final frontier for exploration and colonization but the ocean is a viable and more immediate destination for human colonization.
quotes.author: Kailin Gow

quotes.quote: Fear of the unknown will always be overpowered by human desire toward exploration. Curiosity is the risk, whose gifts often pays off.
quotes.author: Mladen Đorđević

quotes.quote: With exploration and hope. It is a result of my soul traveling. I am still waiting.I am still thirsty for love.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: The greater the feeling of safety, the wider the range of exploration and the more exuberant the exploratory drive.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Siegel M.D.

quotes.quote: Whereas fear constricts, safety expands the range of exploration.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Siegel M.D.

quotes.quote: Ordinary exploration begins in the juiciest sort of indecision, in deliberate, then routine fits of absence of mind... Exploring requires the cloak of invisibility bicyclists and walkers take for granted.
quotes.author: John R. Stilgoe

quotes.quote: If you know who you are then your ego feels safe instead of fearful, and is more open to exploration.
quotes.author: Julia Woodman

quotes.quote: Life is an expression of the sum total of our beliefs. Believe in faith.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: Expression is the mystery of beauty.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: If you have the words, there's always a chance that you'll find the way.
quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

quotes.quote: Expression is the essence of thought.
quotes.author: Tony Calderone

quotes.quote: Sometimes you don't need words to say something your silence is enough to convey your message.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Love and express your feelings to the people you love when you still have the time to do so.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: The expression a woman wears on her face is far more important than the clothes she wears on her back.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The truest expression of a people is in its dances and its music. Bodies never lie.
quotes.author: Agnes De Mille

quotes.quote: Emotion constantly finds expression in bodily position.
quotes.author: Mabel Elsworth Todd

quotes.quote: The expression of your heart is beating beneath your fears.
quotes.author: Rachel Archelaus

quotes.quote: Feelings or emotions are the universal language and are to be honored. They are the authentic expression of who you are at your deepest place.
quotes.author: Judith Wright

quotes.quote: All expression of truth does at length take this deep ethical form.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Our self-expression is meant to be a manifestation of the silence of our hearts.
quotes.author: Matthew Fox

quotes.quote: Freedom of expression comes with responsibilities, especially when it comes with serious implications for peace.
quotes.author: Mohammed Morsi

quotes.quote: The expression of gratitude for whatever blessing you receive from God here on earth can only be in Joy.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Your attitude is an expression of your values, beliefs and expectations.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Creative expression is not just a means of getting attention, although some have approached art that way. Think of art as a way of connecting, of sharing your insights with others.
quotes.author: Nita Leland

quotes.quote: To express one's inner self so that others can understand you, is art. If your expressions are elevated and beautiful, it is good art.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is important to express oneself, provided the feelings are real and are taken from your own experience.
quotes.author: Berthe Morisot

quotes.quote: Expression is a function of intention and intention emanates from your thought faculty.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

quotes.quote: Unexpressed emotions will never die. They are buried alive and will come forth later in uglier ways.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Expression and the right to express is vital, anyone can be artistic.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Modest expression is a beautiful setting to the diamond of talent and genius.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: Self-expression must pass into communication for its fulfillment.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: There is something of the essence of creative expression that informs and transcends all its manifestations â€“ and when you touch it magic!
quotes.author: Annie Bevan

quotes.quote: Happiness is an expression of the soul in considered actions.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Expression that comes from the deepest, darkest place that most of us would rather hide from the rest of the world is the substance that will most likely also deeply affect others.
quotes.author: Ken Poirot

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is a powerful expression of the love within our soul.
quotes.author: Anthony Douglas

quotes.quote: Say what you feel, it's not being rude. It's being real. Better be truthful than illusive.
quotes.author: Malika E Nura

quotes.quote: The expression of preferences is the essence of love.
quotes.author: Stefan Molyneux

quotes.quote: Caring for others is an expression of what it means to be fully human.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Expression is the dress of thought.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: The most perfect expression of human behavior is a string quartet.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Tate

quotes.quote: Expression alone can invest beauty with supreme and lasting command over the eye.
quotes.author: Henry Fuseli

quotes.quote: Expressing gratitude to others can increase our self esteem.When gratitude becomes way of life success, satisfaction and happiness makes feeling of fullness.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kumar Sinha

quotes.quote: Expression, to a great extent, is a matter of terms, and terms are anyone's.
quotes.author: Charles Ives

quotes.quote: Sometimes expressing yourself fully helps to let go faster. So cry, laugh, scream when you need to.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Self expression is a function of responsibility.
quotes.author: Werner Erhard

quotes.quote: Self-expression must pass into communication for its fulfillment
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Exaggerated sensitiveness is an expression of the feeling of inferiority.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Self-expression is always a right, but its still not there to be abused.
quotes.author: Isaac Hayes

quotes.quote: Total freedom of expression does not compensate for lack of talent.
quotes.author: Nicolás Gómez Dávila

quotes.quote: Expression is never helped by suppression.
quotes.author: Ming-Dao Deng

quotes.quote: Every expression of desired friendship has potential bite. Every smile reveals the teeth.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Expression is when you are at one with nothingness.
quotes.author: John Frusciante

quotes.quote: Emotions become more violent when expression is stifled.
quotes.author: Philo

quotes.quote: Great art is the outward expression of an inner life in the artist, and this inner life will result in his personal vision of the world.
quotes.author: Edward Hopper

quotes.quote: The world is not ready for some people when they show up, but that shouldn't stop anyone.
quotes.author: Ashly Lorenzana

quotes.quote: Become aware of what is in you. Announce it, pronounce it, produce it, and give birth to it.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Speak what we feel, not what we ought to say.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: One can and should say everything— if one knows how to say it.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: That which cannot be expressed otherwise can only be told through music. A thought, which seems commonplace in its analysis, acquires a deeper sense in music.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: To say what you think will certainly damage you in society, but a free tongue is worth more than a thousand invitations.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: It is better not to express what one means than to express what one does not mean.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: oh, who will deliver my mind from the heavy chains of logic? My sincerest emotion is distorted as soon as I express it.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: We should be eternally vigilant against attempts to check the expression of opinions that we loathe.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: When the heart overflows, it comes out through the mouth.
quotes.author: Ethiopian Saying

quotes.quote: The ability to express an idea is well nigh as important as the idea itself.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: Even when you elect to be absolutely honest it is difficult. Expression seems such a God-given thing— and yet it's not either. It's a lifelong struggle to find yourself.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Language serves not only to express thoughts but to make possible thoughts that could not exist without it.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: I know why the caged bird sings.
quotes.author: Paul Lawrence Dunbar

quotes.quote: You can muffle the drum and you can loosen the strings of the lyre, but who shall command the skylark not to sing?
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: There is no agony like bearing an untold story inside you.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Man is the actual medium of expression— not the tool he elects to use as a means.
quotes.author: Edward Henry Weston

quotes.quote: Speech is man's most confused and egocentric expression, his most orderly and magnanimous utterance is music.
quotes.author: Ned Rorem

quotes.quote: Philistinism!— We have not the expression in English. Perhaps we have not the word because we have so much of the thing.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: having something / to say is the thing being sincere / counts for more than forms of expression.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: The more acute the experience, the less articulate its expression.
quotes.author: Harold Pinter

quotes.quote: All erroneous ideas would perish of their own accord if given clear expression.
quotes.author: Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: When words become unclear, I shall focus on photographs. When images become inadequate, I shall be content with silence.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: I quote others only in order to better express myself.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: I cannot speak well enough to be unintelligible.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: I like you; your eyes are full of language.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: Everyone has their own ways of expression. I believe we all have a lot to say, but finding ways to say it is more than half the battle.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: To go wrong in one's own way is better than to go right in someone else's.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life, but define yourself.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: Do your own thing on your own terms and get what you came here for.
quotes.author: Oliver James

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is contained in every single expression of life.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Expression is not a matter of passion mirrored on the human face or revealed by a violent gesture. When I paint a picture, it's every detail is expressive.
quotes.author: Henri Mattise

quotes.quote: Silence is the most perfect expression of scorn.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Good enough is never good enough, when extraordinary is expected and is the standard.
quotes.author: Ty Howard

quotes.quote: It is strange that only extraordinary men make the discoveries, which later appear so easy and simple.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: There are no extraordinary men just extraordinary circumstances that ordinary men are forced to deal with.
quotes.author: William Halsey

quotes.quote: When one man, for whatever reason, has the opportunity to lead an extraordinary life, he has no right to keep it to himself.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: Extraordinary afflictions are not always the punishment of extraordinary sins, but sometimes the trial of extraordinary graces.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: To find extraordinary things, go to the ordinary streets!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Extraordinary accomplishments are only achieved when we are able to overcome extraordinary challenges.
quotes.author: O. J. Brigance

quotes.quote: Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: We all have the extraordinary coded within us, waiting to be released.
quotes.author: Jean Houston

quotes.quote: The virtue of a man ought to be measured not by his extraordinary exertions, but by his every-day conduct.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Extraordinary allegations require extraordinary evidence.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: You can only accomplish extraordinary things by involving excellent people who can do things that you cannot.
quotes.author: James Carville

quotes.quote: It takes an extraordinary intelligence to contemplate the obvious.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.quote: To live an extraordinary life, you must resist an ordinary approach.
quotes.author: Frank McKinney

quotes.quote: Extraordinary people visualize not what is possible or probable, but rather what is impossible. And by visualizing the impossible, they begin to see it as possible.
quotes.author: Cherie Carter-Scott

quotes.quote: Sometimes the most ordinary things could be made extraordinary, simply by doin them with the right people.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Only an extraordinary person can turn opportunity into reality.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Sometimes our light goes out but is blown into flame by another human being. Each of us owes deepest thanks to those who have rekindled this light.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Extraordinary rains pretty generally fall after great battles.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Behind extraordinary achievement you'll always discover extraordinary effort.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: An extraordinary life is all about daily, continuous improvements in the areas that matter most.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: The ordinary are here to fit into the world; the extraordinary are here to create their own worlds.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: We must overcome the notion that we must be regular it robs you of the chance to be extraordinary and leads you to the mediocre.
quotes.author: Uta Hagen

quotes.quote: Extraordinary moves of God begin with ordinary acts of obedience.
quotes.author: Steven Furtick

quotes.quote: Extraordinary people survive under the most terrible circumstances and they become more extraordinary because of it.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: Something extraordinary happens when you dramatically increase the focus, drive, and intention you bring to your life, work and relationships.
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.quote: People do not decide to become extraordinary. They decide to accomplish extraordinary things.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: One of the extraordinary things about human events is that the unthinkable becomes thinkable.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Extraordinary things are always hiding in places people never think to look.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: The simple things are also the most extraordinary things, and only the wise can see them.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: It is remarkable how quickly extraordinary things turn ordinary.
quotes.author: Nathan Hill

quotes.quote: Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great. Weak men wait for opportunities; strong men make them.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: It never failed to amaze me how the most ordinary day could be catapulted into the extraordinary in the blink of an eye.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Extraordinary magic is woven through ordinary life. Look around!
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: If you want to lead an extraordinary life, find out what the ordinary do–and don't do it.
quotes.author: Tommy Newberry

quotes.quote: We have one precious life: do something extraordinary today, even if it's tiny. A pebble starts the avalanche.
quotes.author: K. A. Laity

quotes.quote: To be the cynosure of all eyes, do the extraordinary when you are least expected.
quotes.author: Ogwo David Emenike

quotes.quote: Ordinary [people] avoid troubles. Extraordinary [people] turn them into advantage.
quotes.author: Enoch L. Johnson

quotes.quote: I was not a messiah, but an ordinary man who had become a leader because of extraordinary circumstances.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: We get these lives for free. I didn't do anything to get this life, and no matter what the hardships are, it is free and, in a way, it's an extraordinary bargain.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: Drop the idea of being extraordinary! It's keeping you mediocre. To be ordinary is the most extraordinary thing in the world. The ordinary person has light in his eyes; he has become extraordinary but he has no idea of it.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The ordinary people must lead a life of strict obedience and have no right to transgress the law because they are ordinary. Whereas the extraordinary people have the right to commit any crime they like and transgress the law in any way just because they happen to be extraordinary.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: I think it is possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: To have excellent days from now on. Take control of your mind and you will have an extraordinary life. Focus only on the knowledge you really want in the library of your life.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: Don't lose sight of ordinary people with extraordinary hearts.
quotes.author: Emily Thomas

quotes.quote: Life is extraordinary. / Life is full of love & kindness. / Real life is experienced from the heart. / I'm not just talking about my life. / I'm talking about your life. / The one you live. / But you need to agree that I'm right.
quotes.author: Jayce McMeeken

quotes.quote: You can do some rather extraordinary things if that's what you really believe.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: If you want extraordinary results, you must put in extraordinary efforts.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: In the right light, at the right time, everything is extraordinary.
quotes.author: Aaron Rose

quotes.quote: Amid the jagged rocks and cloudy days of life, extraordinary beauty can be found.
quotes.author: Anne Scottlin

quotes.quote: Seize the day. Make your life extraordinary.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Excellence is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: Stay true to your deepest intuition that an extraordinary and miraculous life is possible.
quotes.author: Craig Hamilton

quotes.quote: Things don't have to be extraordinary to be beautiful, even the ordinary can be beautiful.
quotes.author: Matthew

quotes.quote: Heroes are ordinary people who make themselves extraordinary.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Every day you can do extraordinary things in both your personal and professional life if you just ask yourself the right question. You have the power to elevate your life and the lives of those around you. It’s simply a matter of identifying what an extraordinary person would do, and then doing it. Pretty soon you’ll find yourself being extraordinary. It’s a daily choice. Give it a try now.
quotes.author: Daniel Burrus

quotes.quote: An extraordinary person lives his life fully. The trick to leading an extraordinary life is to lead your simple, ordinary life and be open to experiencing the extraordinary you find within it. Striving too hard to be different is not the way to stand out; rather it is the way to becoming an object of ridicule. Just live your life fully and by your rules; do not make compromises you do not believe in. Stand up for what is right and work with focus and sincerity.
quotes.author: Vinita Dawra Nangia

quotes.quote: When we spend our lives waiting until we’re perfect or bulletproof before we walk into the arena, we ultimately sacrifice relationships and opportunities that may not be recoverable, we squander our precious time, and we turn our backs on our gifts, those unique contributions that only we can make.
quotes.author: Brené Brown

quotes.quote: Extremism is so easy. You've got your position, and that's it. It doesn't take much thought. And when you go far enough to the right you meet the same idiots coming around from the left.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: Faith minus vulnerability and mystery equals extremism. If you've got all the answers, then don't call what you do 'faith.'
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Extremism can flourish only in an environment where basic governmental social responsibility for the welfare of the people is neglected. Political dictatorship and social hopelessness create the desperation that fuels religious extremism.
quotes.author: Benazir Bhutto

quotes.quote: Nationalism and extremism ... are spreading today like a cancerous growth in the fabric of people's national self-awareness.
quotes.author: Raisa Gorbacheva

quotes.quote: A people inspired by democracy, human rights and economic opportunity will turn their back decisively against extremism.
quotes.author: Benazir Bhutto

quotes.quote: We have not confronted forcefully enough the intolerance, sectarianism, and hopelessness that feeds violent extremism in too many parts of the globe.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: I would remind you that extremism in the defense of liberty is no vice! And let me remind you also that moderation in the pursuit of justice is no virtue.
quotes.author: Barry Goldwater

quotes.quote: Religious extremism. We hear about it all the time. We see it all the time. Heck, most of us are just sick of talking about it all the time.
quotes.author: Steven Crowder

quotes.quote: Extremism thrives amid ignorance and anger, intimidation and cowardice.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Violent extremism is going viral, but our response to it is moving at bureaucratic, sluggish speed.
quotes.author: Michael McCaul

quotes.quote: Political extremism involves two prime ingredients: an excessively simple diagnosis of the world's ills, and a conviction that there are identifiable villains back of it all.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: I always think extremism is basically a reaction out of fear. What we seem to be experiencing is polar extremism that keeps people from coming together.
quotes.author: David Hyde Pierce

quotes.quote: Extremism means borders beyond which life ends, and a passion for extremism, in art and in politics, is a veiled longing for death.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: I cannot determine what people or nations should do, but I do think that extremism gives birth to following and subsequent extremism.
quotes.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

quotes.quote: We have a rise of extremism because we need to give a sense that we are targeting some of the deeper problems in Greece, the injustices.
quotes.author: George Papandreou

quotes.quote: Radicalism and extremism, while they are dangers, they exist in every society on some level.
quotes.author: Edward Snowden

quotes.quote: Extremism is injurious to peace.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: To me extremism is targeting endangered whales in a whale sanctuary in violation of a moratorium. That, to me, is extreme.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.quote: We are in a world that is quite extremist and extremism makes more noise. Normality does not sell.
quotes.author: Vicente del Bosque

quotes.quote: Non-violent extremism is essentially the increase of intolerant and bigoted demands made by groups seeking to dominate society.
quotes.author: Maajid Nawaz

quotes.quote: Our culture made a virtue of living only as extroverts. We discouraged the inner journey, the quest for a center. So we lost our center and have to find it again.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: They say that extroverts are unhappier than introverts and have to compensate for this by constantly proving to themselves how happy and contented and at ease with life they are.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Extroverts sparkle, introverts glow. Extroverts are fireworks, introverts are a fire in the hearth.
quotes.author: Sophia Dembling

quotes.quote: Extroverts communicate well with others, Introverts communicate well with themselves.
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.quote: In an extroverted society, the difference between an introvert and an extrovert is that an introvert is often unconsciously deemed guilty until proven innocent.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Whoever you are, bear in mind that appearance is not reality. Some people act like extroverts, but the effort costs them energy, authenticity, and even physical health. Others seem aloof or self-contained, but their inner landscapes are rich and full of drama. So the next time you see a person with a composed face and a soft voice, remember that inside her mind she might be solving an equation, composing a sonnet, designing a hat. She might, that is, be deploying the powers of quiet.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: We're told that to be great is to be bold, to be happy is to be sociable. We see ourselves as a nation of extroverts which means that we've lost sight of who we really are. Depending on which study you consult, one-third to one half of Americans are introverts in other words one out of every two or three people you know.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: Extroverts are more responsive to high-intensity and 'happy' stimuli, which may be why an extrovert gets frustrated at the less 'readable' face of the introvert.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: We all move along the continuum of introvert and extrovert behaviors and preferences all day long.
quotes.author: Patricia Weber

quotes.quote: Some findings reveal extroverts as more adept at reading nonverbal cues, and attribute this to the extrovert’s greater interest and experience with social interactions.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: Extroverts never understand introverts, and it was like that in school days. I read recently that all of us can be defined in adult life by the way others perceived us in high school.
quotes.author: Neil Peart

quotes.quote: Extroverts may get places faster, but for introverts it's all about working at the pace you need and, at the end of the day, performing at your best.
quotes.author: Douglas Conant

quotes.quote: If the extrovert is trying to 'cheer up' the introvert - extroverts are programmed to seek social rewards! - he or she may feel like a failure if the introvert remains unmoved.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: Either we are here to motivate others or to become an extrovert in our own world.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: For the extrovert, cause is from outside, he tries to achieve when he sees the things. While the introvert lives from inside, he feels something then he goes to find it or achieve it.
quotes.author: Chetan Patel

quotes.quote: An extrovert is more likely to share immediate reactions and process information through conversation.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: We have this myth that extroverts are better salespeople. As a result, extroverts are more likely to enter sales; extroverts are more likely to get promoted in sales jobs. But if you look at the correlation between extroversion and actual sales performance - that is, how many times the cash register actually rings - the correlation's almost zero.
quotes.author: Daniel H. Pink

quotes.quote: Being an extrovert isn’t essential to evangelism – obedience and love are.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: If the extrovert watches and listens a bit more, the introvert’s true mood will become more evident.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: If you don't have eyebrows, you don't really have a face.
quotes.author: Saoirse Ronan

quotes.quote: Separate but equal is terrible for education but it's perfect for eyebrows.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: The raising of an eyebrow, how you do it; when you look, how you look. All those little things are physical.
quotes.author: Chevy Chase

quotes.quote: My eyebrows make a more profound impact on other people than they do on me. I just let 'em grow.
quotes.author: Peter Gallagher

quotes.quote: It only takes 30 seconds to pluck my eyebrows, but it hurts. I have to tweeze 'em in the middle once a week. Otherwise, I look like Bert from 'Sesame Street.'
quotes.author: Freddie Prinze, Jr.

quotes.quote: A raised eyebrow, an inflection of the voice, a caustic remark dropped in the middle of a broadcast can raise doubts in a million minds about the veracity of a public official or the wisdom of a governmental policy.
quotes.author: Spiro T. Agnew

quotes.quote: You must never underestimate the power of the eyebrow.
quotes.author: Jack Black

quotes.quote: No-one is born with perfect eyebrow.
quotes.author: Linda Evangelista

quotes.quote: Life is too short to spend hoping that the perfectly arched eyebrow or hottest new lip shade will mask an ugly heart.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.quote: It's a great beauty tip, if you ever want to look five years younger, to shave off your eyebrows. It's amazing what it does. It really shaves off the years.
quotes.author: Malin Akerman

quotes.quote: Why does it raise eyebrows when a woman uses cuss words?
quotes.author: Mallika Sherawat

quotes.quote: Well, actually, plucking my eyebrows is more of a hobby than a grooming tip.
quotes.author: Courteney Cox

quotes.quote: I'm down to bleach my eyebrows again. I tell you what, though - that didn't go down well with my boyfriend. Girls love it. Guys, not so into it.
quotes.author: Florence Welch

quotes.quote: I went through an obsession with eyebrows. I used to paint my eyebrows really, really strong. I look back now, and some were a little bit strong.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: When she was excited she liked to raise one thin eyebrow and then the other so that they almost leapt off her face like antennae.
quotes.author: Molly Giles

quotes.quote: People have judged me because of my eyebrow. I can't control my eyebrow. I can't control it. I can't control what's on my face 24/7.
quotes.author: Tierra (The Bachelor)

quotes.quote: And then the lover, sighing like a furnace, with a woeful ballad / Made to his mistress' eyebrow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: In Cincinnati, we were lucky to have eyebrows.
quotes.author: Dann Bilardello

quotes.quote: I fancy she has been good to everyone. Only some people are dour, and when she gives them the come hither with her eyes, they look down or turn away and lift an eyebrow. But me, I give her the wink and away we go.
quotes.author: William Allen White

quotes.quote: The eyebrows are the most visible facial feature where imbalance and asymmetry is obvious.
quotes.author: Marvin Westmore

quotes.quote: My goal is to make the eyebrows beautifully symmetrical because even when features are asymmetrical— as they often are— well-shaped brows will bring a kind of harmony to the face.
quotes.author: Anastasia Soare

quotes.quote: I would pretend the earth was a living. moving giant and I lived on his eyebrow balcony surveying the universe from my perch. I chose his eyebrow because I could see the entire world from there.
quotes.author: Maria Garay Reynolds

quotes.quote: The eyebrow is the frame for the eye.
quotes.author: Arlene Alpert

quotes.quote: Overgrown eyebrows can cast a shadow on the brow bone or between the two eyebrows. Overtweezed eyebrows can make the face look puffy or protruding, or may give the eyes a surprised look.
quotes.author: Arlene Alpert

quotes.quote: Eyebrow position and shape determine not only the overall aesthetic look of the face, but also serve as a key factor in facial recognition.
quotes.author: Guy G. Massry

quotes.quote: Eyebrow hairs that grow long and wild are called 'mad scientist's eyebrows.' These eyebrow hairs look like they have a mind of their own and belong to owners that definitely have unusual minds.
quotes.author: Lilian Bridges

quotes.quote: Eyebrows that are highly arched in the middle so that each eyebrow looks like a n upside-down v, belong to people who worked their way into decisiveness but are still quick to act.
quotes.author: Lilian Bridges

quotes.quote: The eyes are the windows to the soul, as the adage goes, but we might add that your eyebrows are the curtains and drapes.
quotes.author: Alana Classice

quotes.quote: A well-trimmed pair of brows balances your features while framing a central and essential part of your overall good looks— your eyes.
quotes.author: Alana Classice

quotes.quote: The most beautiful eyes have a Golden Ratio between the eyebrows and the eyelids.
quotes.author: Andrew A. Jacono

quotes.quote: The right brows acn be an incredible beauty aset while the wrong ones can spoil the look of an otherwise pretty face.
quotes.author: Nancy Kalish

quotes.quote: Changing your brow shape can change the way people perceive you, giving you a more sexy, smart, or confident look— without even switching lipsticks.
quotes.author: Nancy Kalish

quotes.quote: I'm getting a wrinkle above my eyebrow because I just can't stop lifting it, and I love that you know.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: My acting range has always been something between the two extremes of 'raises left eyebrow' and 'raises right eyebrow.'
quotes.author: Roger Moore

quotes.quote: The human eye uses the eyebrow as an anchor point for the rest of the face. This is why a woman can look truly stunning without any makeup but perfectly shaped, full eyebrows.
quotes.author: Anastasia Soare

quotes.quote: There were times when the mood of woman was a result of how she felt. Now days her mood depends on how her eyebrows are been drawn.
quotes.author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quotes.quote: Relationships, like eyebrows, are better when there is space between them.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: If you don't have eyebrows, you don't really have a face.
quotes.author: Saoirse Ronan

quotes.quote: Life is too short to spend hoping that the perfectly arched eyebrow or hottest new lip shade will mask an ugly heart.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Where words are restrained, the eyes often talk a great deal.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: The eye through which I see God is the same eye through which God sees me; my eye and God's eye are one eye, one seeing, one knowing, one love.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: It is often said that before you die your life passes before your eyes. It is in fact true. It's called living.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: If I can see pain in your eyes then share with me your tears. If I can see joy in your eyes then share with me your smile.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The eye sees a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination awake.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: For I dipped into the future, far as human eye could see, Saw the vision of the world, and all the wonder that would be
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: My eyes are an ocean in which my dreamsare reflected....
quotes.author: Anna M. Uhlich.

quotes.quote: A gray eye is a sly eye, And roguish is a brown one; Turn full upon me thy eye,-- Ah, how its wavelets drown one! A blue eye is a true eye; Mysterious is a dark one, Which flashes like a spark-sun! A black eye is the best one.
quotes.author: William Alger

quotes.quote: The ear tends to be lazy, craves the familiar and is shocked by the unexpected; the eye, on the other hand, tends to be impatient, craves the novel and is bored by repetition.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: They seemed to be staring at the dark, but their eyes were watching God
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Tears are nature's lotion for the eyes. The eyes see better for being washed by them.
quotes.author: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.quote: Since we cannot change reality, let us change the eyes which see reality.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: The soul, fortunately, has an interpreter - often an unconscious but still a faithful interpreter - in the eye.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Here was an ugly little girl asking for beauty....A little black girl who wanted to rise up out of the pit of her blackness and see the world with blue eyes. His outrage grew and felt like power. For the first time he honestly wished he could work miracles.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: The eyes of Doctor T. J. Eckleburg are blue and gigantic—their irises are one yard high. They look out of no face, but, instead, from a pair of enormous yellow spectacles which pass over a nonexistent nose. Evidently some wild wag of an oculist set them there to fatten his practice in the borough of Queens, and then sank down himself into eternal blindness, or forgot them and moved away. But his eyes, dimmed a little by many paintless days, under sun and rain, brood on over the solemn dumping ground.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The eyes are one of the most powerful tools a woman can have. With one look, she can relay the most intimate message. After the connection is made, words cease to exist.
quotes.author: Jennifer Salaiz

quotes.quote: The eye is the jewel of the body.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The world only exists in your eyes. You can make it as big or as small as you want..
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Anyone can look at others' eyes, but Lovers can seeinto each others' souls through the eyes
quotes.author: Larry Latta.

quotes.quote: Those true eyes Too pure and too honest in aught to disguise The sweet soul shining through them
quotes.author: Owen Meredith

quotes.quote: I shut my eyes and all the world drops dead; I lift my eyes and all is born again.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Every closed eye is not sleeping, and every open eye is not seeing.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: A woman's eyes cut deeper than a knife.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: The eyes like sentinel occupy the highest place in the body.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: The eyes indicate the antiquity of the soul.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The eyes see only what the mind is prepared to comprehend.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: If your eyes dwell in your heart; then your inner voice will be your congenial Guide.
quotes.author: Sir Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quotes.quote: Shut your eyes and see.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: His eyes have made love to me all evening.
quotes.author: Marguerite Gautier

quotes.quote: My eyes make pictures when they are shut.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: i am a museum full of art but you had your eyes shut
quotes.author: Rupi Kaur

quotes.quote: For she had eyes and chose me.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: the intensity / in your eyes / burns my pen / as i write.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: No one knows what it's like / To be the bad man / To be the sad man / Behind blue eyes
quotes.author: Pete Townshend

quotes.quote: She'll tease you / She'll unease you / Just to please you / She's got Bette Davis eyes
quotes.author: Jackie DeShannon

quotes.quote: Drink to me only with thine eyes, / And I will pledge with mine;
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: Mine eye and heart are at a mortal war, / How to divide the conquest of thy sight; / Mine eye my heart thy picture’s sight would bar, / My heart mine eye the freedom of that right.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Eyes are the window to the soul.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Cat's eyes seem a bridge to a world beyond the one we know.
quotes.author: Lynn-Holly Johnson

quotes.quote: For the eyes are the signs of the soul within, / Of the heart that is leal and true, / And, my own sweetheart, I shall love you still, / Just as long as your eyes are blue.
quotes.author: Andrew Barton Paterson

quotes.quote: Our eyes are full of terrible confessions.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: Open your eyes and see what you can with them before they close forever.
quotes.author: Anthony Doerr

quotes.quote: Eyes – the head’s chief of police. They watch and make mental notes.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: There's a light in a woman's eyes that speaks louder than words.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: It is in their eyes that their magic resides.
quotes.author: Arthur Symons

quotes.quote: When your eyes drooped before mine eyes, / As though some secret made them wise, / Some wisdom veiled them secretly, / I knew your heart began to be / In love with love, in love with me.
quotes.author: Arthur Symons

quotes.quote: When your eyes opened to mine eyes, / Without desire, without surprise, / I knew your soul awoke to see / All, dreams foretold, but could not be, / Yet loving me, not loving me.
quotes.author: Arthur Symons

quotes.quote: Through the eyes of the brave, the future makes past tense perfect sense.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Look at their eyes. If their eyes are shining, you know youre doing it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Zander

quotes.quote: Your eyes are like two jewels in the sky.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Fix your eyes on what you believe and not what you see.
quotes.author: Chris Burkmenn

quotes.quote: The sexiest part of the body is the eyes. That's what I believe.
quotes.author: Clive Owen

quotes.quote: To see through my eyes you first have to know me. / Most little girls have a mommy and lots of love.
quotes.author: Coral Peterson

quotes.quote: If you close your eyes to see the view, you miss everything surrounding you.
quotes.author: David Archuleta

quotes.quote: love is in the eyes, and one woman knows when another woman is in love.
quotes.author: David Gemmell

quotes.quote: Eyes on eyes, I thought you taught me / Don't get caught too tied to eyes / Eyes that frequently do cross me / Wake me up, I want your type
quotes.author: David Michael Portner

quotes.quote: You are most beautiful when your eyes are glowing with kindness and joy.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: The voice of your eyes is deeper than all roses.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: My madness // See in the eyes // My love's truth // See in the eyes
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Beautiful eyes are those that show the beautiful thoughts that burn below.
quotes.author: Ellen Palmer Allerton

quotes.quote: The eyes are the windows of a woman's heart; you may enter that a way!
quotes.author: Eugene Sue

quotes.quote: The eyes have one language everywhere.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: When the tongue lies, the eyes tell the truth.
quotes.author: George Horace Lorimer

quotes.quote: Eyes that have never wept cannot comprehend sorrow.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Eyes are more accurate witnesses than ears.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: People who shut their eyes to reality simply invite their own destruction.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Over the eyes of gladness / The lids of sorrow fall, / And the light of mirth is darkened / Under the funeral pall.
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: If your eyes are blinded with your worries, you cannot see the beauty of the sunset.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Eyes raised toward heaven are always beautiful, whatever they be.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: The worldling's eyes are dusty dim, / The eyes of sin are weary and cold, / The fighting boy brings home with him / The unsullied eyes of old.
quotes.author: Katharine Tynan

quotes.quote: The eyes see everything through the heart.
quotes.author: Katherine Center

quotes.quote: Our eyes are always blind when they view the future.
quotes.author: Kelly Link

quotes.quote: If my eyes could show my soul, everyone would cry when they saw me smile.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Through the eyes of a child, —is your heart then set free
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: He who closes his eyes sees nothing, even in the full light of day.
quotes.author: Leopold Trepper

quotes.quote: You can tell a lot from someone's eyes.
quotes.author: Lorne Michaels

quotes.quote: There are many things that can only be seen through eyes that have cried.
quotes.author: Oscar Romero

quotes.quote: The eyes are hungry but often satiated before they see.
quotes.author: Otl Aicher

quotes.quote: The curve of your eyes embraces my heart / A ring of sweetness and dance / halo of time, sure nocturnal cradle, / And if I no longer know all I have lived through / It’s that your eyes have not always been mine.
quotes.author: Paul Eluard

quotes.quote: Your eyes show the strength of your soul.
quotes.author: Paulo Coehlo

quotes.quote: If we could see through each other's eyes you'd be surprise by the many things you may see, things you could never imagine and things you thought could never be.
quotes.author: Poetic Description

quotes.quote: The eyes are not responsible when the mind does the seeing.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The eyes see not what is before them when the mind is intent on other matters.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Many eyes go through the meadow, but few see the flowers in it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Children listen best with their eyes. What you do is what they hear.
quotes.author: Richard Carlson

quotes.quote: Your eyes are even smaller, yet they behold the world.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Look into my eyes / Eyes are the windows to the soul / Look into my eyes / Eyes, oh you will know / There is no surprise / Eyes, because love is plain to see / Look into my eyes
quotes.author: Ryan Raddon, Finn Bjarrnson and John Hancock

quotes.quote: You believe what your eyes want to believe!
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: Eyes will not see when the heart wishes them to be blind.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: The eyes are the pioneers that first announce the soft tale of love.
quotes.author: Sextus Propertius

quotes.quote: The eyes are black and beautiful complexion fair and sweet.
quotes.author: Shad Azimabadi

quotes.quote: The eyes of men love to pluck the blossoms from the faded flowers they turn away.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The eyes are the landing strip to the heart.
quotes.author: Stan Dale

quotes.quote: You can close your eyes to reality but not to memories.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: When you close your eyes to tragedy, you close your eyes to greatness.
quotes.author: Stephen Vizinczey

quotes.quote: If you see the sun in my eyes / It should be as no surprise / It's the light of love inside of me / Now tell me what do you see
quotes.author: Stevie B

quotes.quote: Eyes so transparent that through them the soul is seen.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.quote: Look deep inside the eyes of a woman, see the man you want to be.
quotes.author: Tim McGraw

quotes.quote: When the eyes of the flesh are shut, the eyes of the spirit are open.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: The eyes of our souls only then begin to see when our bodily eyes are closing.
quotes.author: William Law

quotes.quote: A lover's eyes will gaze an eagle blind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
